HP:0100872.CNS_DEF: 脚跖部的异常，即足底部位。

HP:0003538.CNS_NAME: 血清艾杜糖醛硫酸酯酶活性增高
HP:0003538.ENG_DEF: An `increased rate` (PATO:0000912) of `iduronate-2-sulfatase activity`(GO:0004423) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0003538.CNS_DEF: 一个`增加rate`（PATO:0000912）`艾杜糖醛酸-2-硫酸酯酶activity`的（GO:0004423）在`blood`（FMA:9670）。

HP:0008198.CNS_NAME: 先天性甲状旁腺功能减退症
HP:0008198.ENG_DEF: Deficiency of parathyroid hormone with congenital onset.
HP:0008198.CNS_DEF: 先天性发病的甲状旁腺激素缺乏

HP:0009723.ENG_DEF: A lesion located beneath a fingernail or toenail.
HP:0009723.CNS_DEF: 位于指甲或趾甲下方的病变。

HP:0012726.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased `potassium` (CHEBI:29103) concentration in the blood occurring periodically with a return to normal between the episodes.
HP:0012726.CNS_DEF: 一个异常降低`potassium`（CHEBI:29103）的浓度在血液中与返回到正常的发作之间周期性出现。

HP:0100695.ENG_DEF: Excess deposit and expansion of `adipose tissue` (FMA:20110) in an unusual pattern which cannot be lost through diet and exercise .
HP:0100695.CNS_DEF: 超额存款和扩张'脂肪tissue`（FMA:20110）在一个不寻常的图案可以不通过饮食和锻炼丢失。

HP:0006067.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006067.ENG_DEF: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the `epiphysis` (FMA:24012) of one or more long bones.
HP:0006067.CNS_DEF: 在形成`epiphysis`的和成熟的过程中的延迟（FMA:24012）的一个或多个长骨。

HP:0012905.ENG_DEF: Euryblepharon is a congenital eyelid anomaly characterized by horizontal enlargement of the palpebral fissure. The eyelid is shortened vertically compared with the horizontal dimension, with associated lateral canthal malpositioning and lateral ectropion abnormally wide lid opening.
HP:0012905.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性眼睑异常，其特点是水平方向放大的睑裂。与横向尺寸相比，眼睑的垂直尺寸缩短，并且外眦位置异常、横向外翻、眼皮开口异常扩张。

HP:0008829.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003090.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003090.ENG_NAME: Hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis
HP:0003090.CNS_NAME: 股骨近端骨骺发育低下
HP:0003090.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).

HP:0003782.ENG_DEF: A body habitus that is tall, slim and underweight, with long legs and long arms (i.e., arm span exceeds height by 5 cm or more).
HP:0003782.CNS_DEF: 体型是高大，苗条和体重过轻，有很长的腿和臂（即，臂展超过5厘米以上）。

HP:0007007.ENG_DEF: The formation of small cavities in the tissue of the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013).
HP:0007007.CNS_DEF: 在`基底节组织（FMA:84013）中形成的小腔。

HP:0011560.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect with failure to open of the mitral valve orifice.
HP:0011560.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性缺陷，二尖瓣口不能打开。

HP:0001028.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;心血管系统的异常
HP:0001028.ENG_DEF: A hemangioma is a benign tumor characterized by blood-filled spaces lined by benign endothelial cells. A hemangioma characterized by large endothelial spaces (caverns) is called a cavernous hemangioma (in contrast to a hemangioma with small endothelial spaces, which is called capillary hemangioma).
HP:0001028.CNS_DEF: 血管瘤是一种良性肿瘤特征在于由良性血管内皮细胞衬里血管腔。特点是被称为海绵状血管瘤的大内皮腔（海绵体腔）（与被称为毛细管血管瘤的小内皮腔不同）。

HP:0007033.ENG_DEF: The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `cerebellum` (FMA:67944).

HP:0010914.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `valine metabolic process` (GO:0006573).

HP:0008691.ENG_DEF: Presence of a single `diverticulum` (MPATH:68) (sac or pouch) in the `wall of the urinary bladder` (FMA:15902).
HP:0008691.CNS_DEF: 膀胱壁上形成的单个憩室（囊或袋状）。

HP:0009776.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009776.ENG_DEF: The absence of all phalanges of all the digits of a limb and the associated soft tissues.
HP:0009776.CNS_DEF: 如果没有一个肢体的所有数字和相关软组织的所有指骨。

HP:0004797.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple areas of `atresia` (PATO:0001819) affecting the `small intestine` (FMA:7200).
HP:0004797.CNS_DEF: 影响小肠的多个区域的闭锁。

HP:0011239.ENG_DEF: Decreased protrusion of the inferior crus relative to the prominence of the antihelix stem.
HP:0011239.CNS_DEF: 与对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮下脚的突出减少。

HP:0000403.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;耳朵的异常
HP:0000403.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to otitis media, as manifested by recurrent episodes of otitis media.
HP:0000403.CNS_DEF: 中耳炎易感性增加，表现为中耳炎反复发作。

HP:0008802.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012628.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the suspensory ligament of lens
HP:0012628.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the `suspensory ligament of lens` (FMA:58838), also known as the ciliary zonule. These ligaments represent a series of fibers connecting the ciliary body and lens of the eye, holding the lens in place.
HP:0012628.CNS_DEF: 晶状体悬韧带的异常（FMA:58838），晶状体悬韧带也被称为睫状小带。这些韧带是连接睫状体和晶状体的纤维，保持晶状体在适当位置。

HP:0000071.ENG_DEF: The presence of a stenotic, i.e., `constricted` (PATO:0001847) `ureter` (FMA:9704).
HP:0000071.CNS_DEF: 输尿管狭窄，即输尿管缢缩。

HP:0001657.ENG_DEF: Increased time between the start of the Q wave and the end of the T wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).
HP:0001657.CNS_DEF: 由心电图（EKG）测量所得的从Q波的起始至T波的时间过长。

HP:0010156.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010953.ENG_DEF: A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) in which the flow of cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) within the cerebral ventricular system or in the outlets of the CSF to the arachnoid space is obstructed.
HP:0010953.CNS_DEF: 引流脑脊液的脑室系统或蛛网膜下腔阻塞后导致的一种脑积水

HP:0100768.MAIN_CLASS: 胎儿发育或出生异常;肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0100768.ENG_DEF: A malignant, trophoblastic and aggressive cancer, usually of the placenta. It is characterized by early hematogenous spread to the lungs and belongs to the far end of the spectrum of gestational trophoblastic disease (GTD), a subset of germ cell tumors.
HP:0100768.CNS_DEF: 源自胎盘细胞的恶性侵润性滋养细胞癌。它的特点是早期血行播散到肺，属于妊娠滋养细胞疾病谱（GTD）的一种罕见类型，GTS是生殖细胞肿瘤的一个子集。

HP:0002833.ENG_DEF: Disseminated multifocal hemangiomatous or lymphangiomatous lesions of the skeleton. The lesions are lytic, well-defined, round or oval lesions within the medullary cavity, and they have an intact cortex, and manifest variable peripheral sclerosis and may exhibit endosteal scalloping.
HP:0002833.CNS_DEF: 弥漫性多灶性hemangiomatous或骨骼lymphangiomatous病变。病变是裂解的，明确定义，圆形或椭圆形的病变髓腔内，并且它们具有一个完整皮层，和货单可变外围硬化和可表现出骨内膜扇形。

HP:0004704.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012171.ENG_DEF: Habitual clasping and squeeezing of the hands.
HP:0012171.CNS_DEF: 习惯性紧扣或挤压双手。

HP:0000559.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;眼睛的异常

HP:0040120.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the reflex of the tensor tympanii muscle

HP:0000589.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect characterized by a cleft of some portion of the `eye` (FMA:54448`) or ocular adnexa.
HP:0000589.CNS_DEF: 一个发育缺陷，特点是眼球的某些部分（FMA:54448`）或眼附属器的缺损。

HP:0007950.CNS_NAME: 乳头旁脉络膜视网膜萎缩
HP:0007950.ENG_DEF: Chorioretinal atrophy concentrated around the optic papilla (i.e., the optic nerve head).
HP:0007950.CNS_DEF: 脉络膜视网膜萎缩集中在视神经乳头（即视神经乳头）。

HP:0001513.ENG_DEF: Body weight that is grossly above the acceptable or desirable weight, usually due to accumulation of excess fats in the body. The standards may vary with age, sex, genetic or cultural background. In the body mass index (BMI), a BMI greater than 30.0 kg/m2 is considered obese, and a BMI greater than 40.0 kg/m2 is considered morbidly obese.
HP:0001513.CNS_DEF: 体重严重高于可接受或期望重量，通常是由于过量的脂肪在体内蓄积。该标准可能随年龄，性别，遗传或文化背景不同而变化。就身体质量指数（BMI）而言，当BMI大于30.0kg/m2被认为是肥胖，BMI大于40.0kg/m2被认为是病态肥胖。

HP:0010894.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of serine family amino acid metabolism
HP:0010894.CNS_NAME: 丝氨酸族氨基酸代谢异常
HP:0010894.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `serine family amino acid metabolic process` (GO:0009069).
HP:0010894.CNS_DEF: `丝氨酸族氨基酸代谢过程`（GO:0009069）的异常。

HP:0100849.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0011803.ENG_DEF: Visually assessable vertical indentation, cleft, or depression of the nasal bridge, ridge and tip.
HP:0011803.CNS_DEF: 目视可见的垂直压痕，裂开，或凹陷的鼻梁，鼻脊和鼻尖

HP:0010037.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0040171.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常

HP:0004313.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0004313.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin in blood.
HP:0004313.CNS_DEF: 血液中异常降低的免疫球蛋白水平。

HP:0010113.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010113.ENG_DEF: Failure to form (agenesis) of one or more epiphyses of the big toe.
HP:0010113.CNS_DEF: 未能形成大脚趾的一个或多个骨骺（发育不全）。

HP:0009155.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009155.ENG_NAME: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009155.CNS_NAME: 小手指近节指骨的锥形骨骺
HP:0009155.ENG_DEF: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the little finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.
HP:0009155.CNS_DEF: 锥形外观手的小指近节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。

HP:0030633.ENG_NAME: Perifoveal ring of hyperautofluorescence surrounded by normal autofluorescence
HP:0030633.CNS_NAME: 正常自动荧光所环绕的中央凹周边强自动荧光环

HP:0012753.ENG_DEF: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the basal ganglia. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting all of the basal ganglia.
HP:0012753.CNS_DEF: 基底神经节在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期的暗。这个术语指的是影响整个基底神经节的弥漫性低信号。

HP:0004991.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004991.ENG_DEF: Disproportionate shortening of the proximal segment of the arm (i.e. the humerus).
HP:0004991.CNS_DEF: 臂的近端段的不成比例缩短（即肱骨）。

HP:0011183.ENG_NAME: EEG with hyperventilation-induced focal epileptiform discharges
HP:0011183.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电
HP:0011183.ENG_DEF: Focal epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).
HP:0011183.CNS_DEF: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的局灶癫痫样放电。

HP:0011868.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011868.ENG_DEF: Pain in the lower back and hip radiating in the distribution of the sciatic nerve.
HP:0011868.CNS_DEF: 疼痛在腰部和臀部的辐射在坐骨神经的分布。

HP:0011095.ENG_DEF: An abnormal anteroposterior extension of the maxillary teeth beyond the plane of the mandibular teeth upon jaw closure.
HP:0011095.CNS_DEF: 在颌骨闭合情况下，上颌牙齿超出下颌牙平面的异常前后横向延伸。

HP:0011726.ENG_DEF: A syndrome of persistent pulmonary hypertension in the newborn infant,without demonstrable cardiac disease. It is characterized by cyanosis and acidosis,severe pulmonary vasoconstriction, hypertrophy of pulmonary arterial muscle,and elevated pulmonary vascular resistance,with resultant right-to-left shunting of blood through a patent ductus arteriosus and at times a patent foramen ovale.
HP:0011726.CNS_DEF: 指出生时动脉导管和卵圆孔未闭,当肺动脉压及肺血管阻力升高,导致右向左分流而引起新生儿青紫。

HP:0012177.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0012177.CNS_NAME: 自然杀伤细胞功能异常
HP:0012177.ENG_DEF: A functional anomaly of the `natural killer cell` (CL:0000623).
HP:0012177.CNS_DEF: 自然杀伤细胞的功能异常（CL:0000623）。

HP:0030887.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030887.ENG_DEF: A elevation in the rate of apoptosis in lymphocytes.

HP:0010531.ENG_DEF: Spinal myoclonus is generally due to a tumor, infection, injury, or degenerative process of the spinal cord, and is characterized by involuntary rhythmic muscle contractions, usually at a rate of more than one per second. Myoclonus occurs synchronously in several muscles and can be increased in severity and frequency by fatigue or stress, but is usually unaffected by sensory stimuli. Spinal myoclonus ceases during sleep or anesthesia.
HP:0010531.CNS_DEF: 脊肌阵挛通常是由于一个肿瘤，感染，损伤，或脊髓变性过程，其特征是节律不自主的肌肉收缩，通常在一个以上的每秒的速率。同步发生肌阵挛在几个肌肉和所用的严重程度和频率由疲劳或应力增加，但通常是不受感官刺激。睡眠或麻醉期间脊髓性肌阵挛停止。

HP:0011254.ENG_DEF: A type of cryptotia associated with reduction in size of the antihelix and inferior crus that are affected.
HP:0011254.CNS_DEF: 与对耳轮和其下脚大小缩小相关的隐耳类型。

HP:0010898.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the metabolism of `sarcosine` (CHEBI:15611).

HP:0000093.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0000093.ENG_DEF: Increased levels of protein in the urine.
HP:0000093.CNS_DEF: 尿液中蛋白质水平增加。

HP:0009520.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009520.ENG_NAME: Pseudoepiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009520.CNS_NAME: 第二手指中节指骨假骺

HP:0012248.ENG_DEF: Increased time for the  PR interval (beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex).
HP:0012248.CNS_DEF: PR间期延长（P波起始到QRS波群起始）。

HP:0011001.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones which is often refered to as osteosclerosis. Osteosclerosis can be detected on radiological examination as an increased whiteness (density) of affected bones.
HP:0011001.CNS_DEF: 骨密度异常增加，即物质的每骨头其通常refered作为骨硬化立方厘米的量的，。骨硬化可以在放射学检查作为受影响骨骼的白度增加（密度）进行检测。

HP:0003924.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012463.ENG_DEF: An above normal level of saturation of serum transferrin with iron.
HP:0012463.CNS_DEF: 血清转铁蛋白与铁的饱和度高于正常水平。

HP:0100437.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100437.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100437.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的第三趾近节趾骨
HP:0100437.ENG_DEF: An abnormal morphology of the proximal phalanx of the third toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.
HP:0100437.CNS_DEF: 第三趾近节指骨的形态异常，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

HP:0030526.ENG_NAME: Peripheral visual field constriction with 10-20 degrees central field preserved
HP:0030526.CNS_NAME: 周边视野缩小且保留 10-20 度中心视野

HP:0030392.ENG_DEF: Intraventricular papillary neoplasm derived from choroid plexus epithelium. Plexus tumors are most common in the lateral and fourth ventricles; while 80% of lateral ventricle tumors present in children, fourth ventricle tumors are evenly distributed in all age groups. Clinically, choroid plexus tumors tend to cause hydrocephalus and increased intracranial pressure. Histologically, choroid plexus papillomas correspond to WHO grade I, choroid plexus carcinomas to WHO grade III.

HP:0000586.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000586.ENG_DEF: Reduced depth of the orbits associated with prominent-appearing ocular globes.
HP:0000586.CNS_DEF: 眼眶深度减少而表现为眼球相对突出。

HP:0007628.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030371.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030371.CNS_NAME: 初始 B 细胞计数增加
HP:0030371.ENG_DEF: An elevation above normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.

HP:0012568.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0012568.ENG_DEF: Edema in the region of the `Lower eyelid` (FMA:54442).

HP:0100357.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100357.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the metatarsophalangeal joint of the 3rd toe
HP:0100357.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾的跖趾关节挛缩
HP:0100357.ENG_DEF: The joint between the second metatarsal and the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.
HP:0100357.CNS_DEF: 第二跖骨和第三趾的近端指骨之间的接合不能被主动或被动地拉直。

HP:0008573.CNS_NAME: 低频感音神经性听力障碍
HP:0008573.ENG_DEF: A form of `sensorineural hearing impairment` (===HP:0008538===) that affects primarily the lower frequencies.
HP:0008573.CNS_DEF: 主要以影响低频听力为主的“感音神经性听力障碍”(===HP:0000365===)的类型。

HP:0009818.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001723.ENG_DEF: Myocardial disease in which the ventricular walls are excessively rigid,impeding ventricular filling; it is marked by abnormal diastolic function but by normal or nearly normal systolic function.
HP:0001723.CNS_DEF: 限制性心肌病是一类心室壁过分坚硬，有碍于心室充盈的心肌病，特征性表现为舒张功能异常，而收缩功能却正常或几乎正常。

HP:0005004.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005004.ENG_DEF: An abnormally flat form of the proximal epiphysis of the radius.
HP:0005004.CNS_DEF: 半径的近端骨骺的异常扁平状。

HP:0011519.ENG_DEF: Individuals with anomalous trichromacy possess three types of cones, but one of the three types of cones has an abnormal spectral sensitivity compared to normal cones.
HP:0011519.CNS_DEF: 个体异常三色视具有三种类型的锥体，但三种视锥细胞中的一个相对于正常锥体具有异常的光谱灵敏度。

HP:0002286.ENG_DEF: A lesser degree of hair pigmentation than would otherwise be expected.
HP:0002286.CNS_DEF: 毛发色素沉着与正常状态相比较减少。

HP:0010049.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010049.ENG_DEF: Diminished length of one or more metacarpal bones in relation to the others of the same hand or to the contralateral metacarpal.
HP:0010049.CNS_DEF: 减少的一个或多个掌骨长度相对于同一只手的人或对对侧掌骨。

HP:0030393.ENG_DEF: A low-grade papillary epithelial neoplasm (adenocarcinoma) with a slow growth pattern. The endolymphatic duct emerges from the posterior wall of the saccule (of the inner ear) and ends in a blind pouch, the endolymphatic sac. Endolymphatic sac tumors (ELSTs) are known under different names in the literature (Heffner tumor, aggressive papillary middle ear tumor, and low-grade adenocarcinoma of endolymphatic sac origin).

HP:0008244.CNS_NAME: 先天性肾上腺发育不全
HP:0008244.ENG_DEF: A type of `adrenal hypoplasia` (HP:0000835) with `congenital onset` (HP:0003577).
HP:0008244.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性发病的肾上腺发育不全

HP:0012495.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0012495.ENG_DEF: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `posterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50583).

HP:0011822.ENG_DEF: Increased width of the midpoint of the mandible (mental protuberance) and overlying soft tissue.
HP:0011822.CNS_DEF: 下颌骨（心理突起）和上覆的软组织中点的宽度增加。

HP:0002661.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002661.ENG_DEF: An increased tendency to fractures following trauma, with fractures occurring without pain.
HP:0002661.CNS_DEF: 增加的趋势，创伤骨折，骨折发生无疼痛。

HP:0010553.ENG_DEF: An acute dystonic reaction with blepharospasm, periorbital twitches, and protracted fixed staring episodes. There may be a maximal upward deviation of the eyes in the sustained fashion. Oculogyric crisis can be triggered by a number of factors including neuroleptic medications.
HP:0010553.CNS_DEF: 眼睑痉挛，眶周抽搐，和长期固定注视的一种急性肌张力障碍，可能伴有持续的眼球最大向上运动的偏差。动眼神经危象可被很多种因素包括镇静药物所诱发。

HP:0001142.ENG_DEF: A conical projection of the anterior or posterior surface of the lens, occurring as a developmental anomaly.
HP:0001142.CNS_DEF: 晶状体的前或后表面的锥形突起，一种发育异常。

HP:0025009.ENG_DEF: The upper incisors deviate from the normal angle of being roughly parallel to the surface of the face and instead slant outwards.

HP:0010061.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010061.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more phalanges of the big toe.
HP:0010061.CNS_DEF: 从大脚趾的一个或多个指骨正常的直线形式的偏差。

HP:0009637.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009637.ENG_DEF: Absence of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009637.CNS_DEF: 缺席拇指近节指骨。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0006778.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0006778.CNS_DEF: 泌尿生殖系统的非恶性增生。

HP:0010263.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010263.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphyses of the middle phalanges of the hand
HP:0010263.ENG_DEF: Epiphyses of the middle phalanges of the hand are hard and dense like ivory. Such an epiphysis has a uniformly dense appearance on radiographs.
HP:0010263.CNS_DEF: 手的中间指骨骨骺硬且致密的像象牙。这样的骨骺具有均匀密集的出现在X光片。

HP:0005923.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005923.ENG_NAME: Abnormalities of the metaphyses of the hand
HP:0005923.ENG_DEF: Any Abnormal structure or form of the growing part of a long bone between the diaphysis and the epiphysis in hands.
HP:0005923.CNS_DEF: 手骨干骺端部位的异常结构。

HP:0004097.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004097.ENG_DEF: Deviated fingers is a term that should be used if one or more fingers of the hand are deviated from their normal position, either to the radial or ulnar side. A deviation of a finger can be caused by an abnormal form of one or more of the phalanges of the affected finger, or by a deviation or displacement of one or more phalanges.
HP:0004097.CNS_DEF: 偏离的手指是应使用如果手的一个或多个手指从其正常位置偏离的术语，无论对径向或尺侧。手指的偏差可以由一个或多个受影响的手指的指骨，或由一个或多个指骨的偏差或位移的异常形式引起。

HP:0002474.ENG_DEF: A delay in the acquisition of the ability to use language to communicate needs, wishes, or thoughts.
HP:0002474.CNS_DEF: 延迟获得使用语言进行表达需要、愿望或想法的能力

HP:0030048.ENG_DEF: Colpocephaly is an anatomic finding in the brain manifested by occipital horns that are disproportionately enlarged in comparison with other parts of the lateral ventricles.

HP:0100717.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001059.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0001059.ENG_DEF: Pterygia are 'winglike' triangular membranes occurring in the neck, eyes, knees, elbows, ankles or digits.
HP:0001059.CNS_DEF: 翼状胬肉是发生在脖子，眼睛，膝盖，手肘，脚踝或数字“翼状”的三角膜。

HP:0100474.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100474.ENG_NAME: Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100474.CNS_NAME: 第四趾近节趾关节粘连

HP:0005365.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005365.CNS_NAME: 严重的B淋巴细胞减少症
HP:0005365.ENG_DEF: A `severe` (PATO:0000396) form of `B lymphocytopenia` (HP:0010976) in which the count of B cells` (CL:0000236) is very low or absent.
HP:0005365.CNS_DEF: 重型（PATO:0000396）的B 淋巴细胞减少症`（HP:0010976），其中B 细胞（CL:0000236）的数量非常低或不存在。

HP:0005792.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001297.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0001297.ENG_DEF: Sudden impairment of blood flow to a part of the brain due to occlusion or rupture of an artery to the brain.
HP:0001297.CNS_DEF: 由于大脑动脉闭塞动脉或破裂导致供应部分大脑的血流突然受损。

HP:0010794.ENG_DEF: Reduced ability affecting mainly  visuospatial cognition which may be tested using pattern construction (for example by Differential Ability Scales, which test a person's strengths and weaknesses across a range of intellectual abilities).
HP:0010794.CNS_DEF: 主要累及视空间认知的能力下降，视空间认知通过结构模式检测（例如，通过差别能力量表评价一个人在一系列智力能力的优缺点）。

HP:0006426.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030192.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0030192.CNS_NAME: 口咽部肌肉易于疲乏无力
HP:0030192.ENG_DEF: A type of weakness of the bulbar muscles (muscles of the mouth and throat responsible for speech and swallowing) that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

HP:0200047.ENG_DEF: Inflammation of the cartilage of the external ear.

HP:0010351.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010351.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 2nd toe
HP:0010351.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾趾骨溶骨性缺陷

HP:0012846.ENG_DEF: Presence of multiple trichilemmomata, a benign tumour originating from the outer root sheath of the hair follicle.
HP:0012846.CNS_DEF: 毛囊瘤呈多发性，是起源于毛囊外根鞘的良性肿瘤。

HP:0005978.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0005978.ENG_DEF: A type of diabetes mellitus initially characterized by insulin resistance and hyperinsulinemia and subsequently by glucose interolerance and hyperglycemia.
HP:0005978.CNS_DEF: 2型糖尿病的特征是最开始胰岛素抵抗和高胰岛素血症，随后葡萄糖不耐受和高血糖症。

HP:0012802.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012802.ENG_DEF: Bigonial distance (lower facial width) more than 2 SD above the mean (objective); or an apparently increased width of the lower jaw (mandible) when viewed from the front (subjective).
HP:0012802.CNS_DEF: 下颌角间距离（脸下部宽度）大于平均值2个标准偏差（客观）;或从正面观察下颌（颌骨）宽度显得增加（主观）。

HP:0002621.ENG_DEF: A condition characterized by patchy atheromas or atherosclerotic plaques which develop in the walls of medium-sized and large arteries and can lead to arterial stenosis with reduced or blocked blood flow.
HP:0002621.CNS_DEF: 大、中型动脉壁形成片状斑块或粥样斑块，导致动脉狭窄，减小或阻断血流。

HP:0009105.ENG_NAME: Abnormal ossification of the pubic bone
HP:0009105.ENG_DEF: Abnormal bone tissue formation of the pubic bone.
HP:0009105.CNS_DEF: 耻骨的骨组织形成异常。

HP:0100672.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0100672.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `hernia` (MPATH:75) of the `vagina` (FMA:19949).

HP:0007078.ENG_NAME: Decreased amplitude of sensory action potentials
HP:0007078.CNS_NAME: 感觉动作电位波幅降低
HP:0007078.ENG_DEF: A reduction in the amplitude of sensory nerve action potential. This feature is measured by nerve conduction studies.
HP:0007078.CNS_DEF: 感觉神经动作电位波幅降低。这一表现可通过神经传导速度研究发现。

HP:0002592.ENG_DEF: An `ulcer` (MPATH:579), that is, an erosion of an area of the `gastric mucous membrane` (FMA:14907).
HP:0002592.CNS_DEF: 胃溃疡，即，胃粘膜区的糜烂。

HP:0000039.ENG_DEF: Displacement of the urethral opening on the dorsal (superior) surface of the penis.
HP:0000039.CNS_DEF: 尿道口开口异常，开在阴茎背侧（上面）。

HP:0002593.ENG_DEF: Angiectasia of lymph vessels (i.e., dilatation of lymphatic vessels) in the intestines.
HP:0002593.CNS_DEF: 肠淋巴管的扩张（即，淋巴管的膨胀）。

HP:0000475.ENG_DEF: Increased side-to-side width of the neck.
HP:0000475.CNS_DEF: 颈部一侧到另一侧宽度增加

HP:0001301.CNS_NAME: 慢性多发性感觉神经病

HP:0100064.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100064.ENG_NAME: Stippling of the epiphyses of the 3rd toe
HP:0100064.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾骨骺点状钙化

HP:0010708.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010708.ENG_DEF: 1-5 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 5th finger (complete syndactyly of all fingers of the hand).
HP:0010708.CNS_DEF: `全部手指融合型并指（所有手指完全并指）。

HP:0011033.ENG_DEF: An impairment of a `fructose metabolic process` (GO:0006000).
HP:0011033.CNS_DEF: 一个`果糖代谢process`的资产减值（GO:0006000）。

HP:0000929.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000929.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `skull` (FMA:46565), the bony framework of the head which is comprised of eight cranial and fourteen facial bones.
HP:0000929.CNS_DEF: 颅骨的异常。颅骨由八块颅部和14块面部骨骼构成的头部骨架。

HP:0012314.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012314.ENG_DEF: Bony swelling of the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIP) associated with the formation of osteophytes (calcific spurs) of the articular (joint) cartilage thzat are visible radiographically.
HP:0012314.CNS_DEF: 近端指间关节（PIP）与关节（关节）软骨thzat可见X线的骨赘（钙化杂散）的形成相关的骨膨胀。

HP:0004897.CNS_NAME: 应激/感染诱发的乳酸酸中毒
HP:0004897.ENG_DEF: A form of `lactic acidemia` (HP:0003128) that occurs in relation to stress or infection.
HP:0004897.CNS_DEF: 表单`乳酸acidemia`（HP:0003128）的发生有关压力或感染。

HP:0006152.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006152.ENG_DEF: The term proximal symphalangism refers to a bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the digits of the hand, in other words the proximal interphalangeal joint (PIJ) is missing which can be seen either on x-rays or as an absence of the proximal interphalangeal finger creases.
HP:0006152.CNS_DEF: 术语近侧symphalangism指的手的数字的中间和近端指骨的骨融合，换句话说近端指间关节（PIJ）是缺失的，可以看出无论是在X射线或作为不存在近端的指间手指折痕。

HP:0009573.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009573.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009573.CNS_NAME: 第二手指中节指骨斑片状硬化
HP:0009573.ENG_DEF: Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the middle phalanx of the second finger.
HP:0009573.CNS_DEF: 不均匀的（不规则）增加第二手指的中间指骨骨密度。

HP:0008019.ENG_DEF: Partial dislocation of the lens in a superior direction.
HP:0008019.CNS_DEF: 晶状体在一个向上的方向上局部错位。

HP:0100758.ENG_DEF: A serious and potentially life-threatening condition that arises when a considerable mass of body tissue dies (necrosis).
HP:0100758.CNS_DEF: 一个严重和潜在威胁生命的条件出现时，有相当质量体组织死亡（坏死）。

HP:0003387.ENG_NAME: Decreased number of large peripheral myelinated nerve fibers
HP:0003387.CNS_NAME: 大的周围有髓鞘神经纤维数量减少
HP:0003387.ENG_DEF: A reduced number of large myelinated nerve fibers.
HP:0003387.CNS_DEF: 周围神经系统大的有髓鞘神经纤维数量减少。

HP:0003150.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003150.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `glutaric acid` (CHEBI:17859) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0003150.CNS_DEF: 尿液中戊二酸的浓度增加。

HP:0011475.ENG_DEF: Persistence of the stapedial artery, which normally regresses during embryonic life.
HP:0011475.CNS_DEF: 通常在胚胎期退化却残存下来的镫骨动脉。

HP:0011385.ENG_DEF: Aplasia of the internal auditory canal.

HP:0012578.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012578.ENG_DEF: A type of glomerulonephropathy characterized by thickening of the basement membrane and deposition of immune complexes in the subepithelial space.
HP:0012578.CNS_DEF: 肾小球肾炎的一种，特点是基底膜增厚和上皮下间隙免疫复合物沉积。

HP:0000444.ENG_DEF: Nasal ridge curving anteriorly to an imaginary line that connects the nasal root and tip. The nose appears often also prominent, and the columella low.
HP:0000444.CNS_DEF: 鼻脊向连接鼻根和鼻尖的假想线之前弯曲。鼻子经常会同时显得突出和鼻小柱低

HP:0001664.CNS_NAME: 尖端扭转型室性心动过速
HP:0001664.ENG_DEF: A type of ventricular tachycardia characterized by polymorphioc QRS complexes that change in amplitue and cycle length, and thus have the appearance of oscillating around the baseline in the EKG.
HP:0001664.CNS_DEF: 一种室性心动过速，多种形态的QRS波群改变了原有振幅和周期长度，因而在心电图中有围绕基线出现振荡。

HP:0000240.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000240.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the size of the skull.

HP:0030142.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the amount or nature of abdominal sounds. Abdominal sounds (bowel sounds) are made by the movement of the intestines as they promote passage of abdominal contents by peristalsis.

HP:0006696.CNS_NAME: 多态性及多发性室性早搏
HP:0006696.ENG_DEF: It is an extrasystole or premature electrical impulse in the ventricular, generated above multiple  loci of the heart.
HP:0006696.CNS_DEF: 是指起源于心脏不同位点的心室期前收缩或过早起搏。

HP:0002023.ENG_DEF: Congenital absence of the anus, i.e., the opening at the bottom end of the intestinal tract.
HP:0002023.CNS_DEF: 肛门，即肠道末端的开口的先天性缺失。

HP:0010562.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0010562.ENG_DEF: Presence of one or more keloids. A keloid is a sharply elevated, irregularly shaped, progressively enlarging scar resulting from formation of excessive amounts of collagen in the dermis during connective tissue repair.
HP:0010562.CNS_DEF: 瘢痕疙瘩可单发或多发，具有高出皮面、形状不规则、持续增生等特点，是皮肤在结缔组织修复过程中，真皮层胶原蛋白过度合成所致。

HP:0000764.CNS_DEF: 外周神经轴突的逐步恶化。

HP:0001476.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001476.ENG_NAME: Delayed closure of the anterior fontanelle
HP:0001476.ENG_DEF: A delay in closure (ossification) of the anterior fontanelle, which generally undergoes closure around the 18th month of life.
HP:0001476.CNS_DEF: 前囟闭合（骨化）延迟，一般出生后18个月闭合

HP:0010649.ENG_DEF: An abnormal degree of flatness of the `Ala of nose` (FMA:59519), which can be defined as a reduced nasal elevation index (lateral depth of the nose from the tip of the nose to the insertion of the nasal ala in the cheek x 100 divided by the side-to-side breadth of the nasal alae).
HP:0010649.CNS_DEF: 鼻翼的平坦度异常扁平，可被定义为鼻高指数（鼻子从鼻尖到鼻翼插入脸颊的部位的外侧深度×100再除以由鼻翼一侧到另一侧的的宽度）降低。

HP:0008734.ENG_DEF: Reduced volume of the testicle (the male gonad).
HP:0008734.CNS_DEF: 睾丸（男性性腺）体积缩小。

HP:0000242.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000242.ENG_DEF: Parietal bossing is a marked prominence in the parietal region.
HP:0000242.CNS_DEF: 顶骨隆起是指在顶骨区明显突出。

HP:0001043.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0001043.ENG_DEF: Veins raised up from the scalp.

HP:0030629.CNS_NAME: 中央凹周边强自动荧光环

HP:0012198.ENG_DEF: The presence of more than 5 juvenile polyps of the colon.
HP:0012198.CNS_DEF: 结肠存在至少5个幼年性息肉。

HP:0004295.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `gastric mucous membrane` (FMA:14907).

HP:0040018.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030751.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0030751.CNS_NAME: 早产儿脑室内出血 IV 级
HP:0030751.ENG_DEF: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that shows parenchymal extension.

HP:0100822.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0100822.ENG_DEF: A Rectocele results from a tear in the rectovaginal septum (which is normally a tough, fibrous, sheet-like divider between the rectum and vagina). Rectal tissue bulges through this tear and into the vagina as a hernia. There are two main causes of this tear: childbirth, and hysterectomy.
HP:0100822.CNS_DEF: 直肠阴道隔撕裂（正常是一个坚韧的纤维状片状分隔结构，位于直肠和阴道之间）导致的直肠前突。直肠组织像疝气一样通过这个裂隙膨入阴道。有两个主要撕裂原因:分娩和子宫切除术。

HP:0010424.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010424.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010424.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的末节趾骨的完全重复
HP:0010424.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32628).
HP:0010424.CNS_DEF: 第二toe`的`末节指骨完全复制（FMA:32628）。

HP:0011127.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0011127.ENG_DEF: A type of `eczema` (HP:0000964) that occurs in the lips and perioral area.
HP:0011127.CNS_DEF: 湿疹的一种类型，发生在唇部或口周部位。

HP:0011854.ENG_DEF: Accumulation of blood in the peritoneal cavity owing to internal hemorrhage.
HP:0011854.CNS_DEF: 由于内部出血导致腹腔中血的积累。

HP:0011223.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011223.ENG_DEF: Linear vertical groove in the midline of the forehead, extending from hairline to glabella.
HP:0011223.CNS_DEF: 在额头中线存在线性纵沟，可从发际线伸展到眉间。

HP:0001807.ENG_DEF: Longitudinal, linear prominences in the nail plate.

HP:0001913.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0001913.ENG_DEF: An abnormally reduced number of `granulocytes` (CL:0000094) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0001913.CNS_DEF: 在外周血中粒细胞（0000094 CL）的数量异常减少（FMA:9670）。

HP:0100205.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100205.ENG_NAME: Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100205.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾末节趾骨骨骺膨大

HP:0004440.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004440.ENG_DEF: Premature closure of the `coronal suture of skull` (FMA:52928).

HP:0000590.ENG_DEF: Initial bilateral ptosis followed by limitation of eye movements in all directions and slowing of saccades.
HP:0000590.CNS_DEF: 最初的双眼上睑下垂，随后眼球运动在各个方向上发生限制和扫视放缓。

HP:0004471.ENG_NAME: aplasia cutis congenita over the scalp vertex
HP:0004471.CNS_NAME: 先天性头顶部表皮发育不全
HP:0004471.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect resulting in the congenital absence of skin on the scalp vertex, often just lateral to the midline.
HP:0004471.CNS_DEF: 发育缺陷导致的头顶部皮肤缺损，常指中线两侧的皮肤先天性缺损的疾病。

HP:0011652.ENG_NAME: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011652.CNS_NAME: 右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄
HP:0011652.ENG_DEF: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect without pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011652.CNS_DEF: 右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损不伴肺动脉狭窄

HP:0001620.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase in the pitch (frequency) of the voice.
HP:0001620.CNS_DEF: 嗓音音调（频率）的异常升高。

HP:0005723.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0004558.ENG_DEF: A flattened vertebral body shape with reduced distance between the vertebral endplates affecting the cervical spine.
HP:0004558.CNS_DEF: 扁平椎体形状，影响颈椎的椎体终板间距离缩短。

HP:0025021.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal range of the erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR), a test that measures the distance that erythrocytes have fallen after one hour in a vertical column of anticoagulated blood under the influence of gravity. The ESR is a nonspecific finding. An elevation may indicate inflammation or may be caused by any condition that elevates fibrinogen. A decreased ESR may be seen in polycythemia or in certain blood diseases in which red blood cells have an irregular or smaller shape that causes slower settling.

HP:0011793.ENG_DEF: Neoplasm categorized according to the anatomical site of origin of the neoplasm.
HP:0011793.CNS_DEF: 肿瘤根据肿瘤的起源的解剖学部位分类。

HP:0100423.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100423.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100423.CNS_NAME: 第四趾近节趾骨部分多趾

HP:0100063.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010101.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010101.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the phalanges of the hallux

HP:0100149.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100149.ENG_NAME: Enlarged epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100149.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾中节趾骨骨骺膨大

HP:0005214.ENG_DEF: Blockage or impairment of the normal flow of the contents of the intestine towards the anal canal.
HP:0005214.CNS_DEF: 肠内容物向肛管的正常流通受到阻塞或损害。

HP:0002981.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `calf` (FMA:24984), i.e. of the posterior part of the lower leg.
HP:0002981.CNS_DEF: 即小腿的后侧面的异常。

HP:0040250.ENG_DEF: Reduced prothrombin antigen as measured by ELISA assay. Prothrombin is a vitamin K-dependent coagulation factor that is proteolytically cleaved to form thrombin.

HP:0005906.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005906.ENG_NAME: Delayed pneumatization of the mastoid process
HP:0005906.ENG_DEF: An abnormally reduced degree of pneumatization (i.e., formation of air cells) in the `mastoid process` (FMA:52872) with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0005906.CNS_DEF: 与同年龄正常情况相比，乳突气腔形成（即形成气囊）的程度异常降低。

HP:0010009.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010009.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of the first metacarpal.

HP:0010504.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010504.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase in the length of the tibia.
HP:0010504.CNS_DEF: 在胫骨的长度的异常增加。

HP:0004871.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `fistula` (MPATH:70) between the `bowel` (FMA:7199) and the `perineum` (FMA:9579).
HP:0004871.CNS_DEF: 会阴和肠管之间的瘘道。

HP:0012896.ENG_DEF: An anomaly identified by motor evoked potentials (MEPs). MEPs are measured following single-pulse or repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation and can be used for the assessment of the excitability of the motor cortex and the integrity of conduction along the central and peripheral motor pathways.
HP:0012896.CNS_DEF: 一种由运动诱发电位（MEPs）发现的的异常。 MEP通过单脉冲或经颅重复磁刺激进行检测，可用于评估运动皮层的兴奋性，以及中枢和外周运动传导通路的完整性。

HP:0100916.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100916.ENG_DEF: An elevation in bone density in one or more middle phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0100916.CNS_DEF: 骨密度在手指的一个或多个中间指骨标高。硬化的是，X射线照片作为增加不透明度的区域正常检测。

HP:0012639.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of the `nervous system` (FMA:7157).
HP:0012639.CNS_DEF: 在`神经系统`的结构异常（FMA:7157）。

HP:0012378.ENG_DEF: A subjective feeling of tiredness characterized by a lack of energy and motivation.
HP:0012378.CNS_DEF: 主观的疲劳感，其特点是是缺乏能量和动力。

HP:0000016.ENG_DEF: Inability to completely empty the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) during the process of `urination` (GO:0060073).
HP:0000016.CNS_DEF: 排尿过程中无法完全排空膀胱。

HP:0002578.MAIN_CLASS: 肌肉组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0002578.ENG_DEF: `Decreased strength` (PATO:0001779) of the `Muscle layer of stomach` (FMA:14909), which leads to a decreased ability to empty the contents of the stomach despite the absence of obstruction.
HP:0002578.CNS_DEF: 胃部肌肉层张力降低，尽管不存在阻塞也将导致胃排空能力降低。

HP:0003635.ENG_NAME: Loss of subcutaneous adipose tissue in limbs
HP:0003635.CNS_NAME: 四肢皮下脂肪组织的丢失

HP:0004031.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004031.ENG_DEF: Increase in width of the `diaphysis of radius` (FMA:33782).

HP:0012674.ENG_DEF: A failure to develop of the lower part of the vagina.

HP:3000007.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000007.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a mentalis muscle.

HP:0009816.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009816.ENG_DEF: Leg shortening because of underdevelopment of one or more bones of the lower extremity.
HP:0009816.CNS_DEF: 腿缩短，因为下肢的一个或多个骨骼不发达。

HP:0004362.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0004362.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the enteric nervous system, which comprises two types of ganglia, the myenteric (Auerbach's) and submucosal (Meissner's) plexuses. The enteric nervous system functions to control gut movement, fluid exchange between the gut and its lumen, and local blood flow.
HP:0004362.CNS_DEF: 肠神经系统的异常，其包括两种类型的神经节，肌间的（奥尔巴赫的）和粘膜下（迈斯纳的）丛的神经节。肠神经系统的功能是控制肠道运动、肠道其内腔和局部血流之间的流体交换。

HP:0005643.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005643.CNS_DEF: 在`第三toe`不发达（发育不全）（FMA:25051）。

HP:0100301.ENG_DEF: Unusual regions of densely packed membranous tubules known as tubular aggregates which present as membranous inclusions, derived from membranes of sarcoplasmic reticulum and mitochondria, containing miscellaneous proteins with a variety of enzymatic activities.
HP:0100301.CNS_DEF: 为紧密包裹的膜性管状区域，表现为膜性包涵体的管状聚集。这些膜性包涵体来源于肌浆网和线粒体膜，含有多种具有酶活性的蛋白。

HP:0009591.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the `vestibulocochlear nerve` (FMA:50869), the eighth cranial nerve, which is involved in transmitting sound and equilibrium information from the inner ear to the brain.
HP:0009591.CNS_DEF: `前庭耳蜗神经`（FMA:50869）的异常，此神经是对第八对颅神经，它从内耳传送声音和平衡信息到大脑。

HP:0100892.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `xiphoid process` (FMA:7488) of the sternum.

HP:0011621.ENG_DEF: A type of ventricular septal defect communicating directly between the left ventricle and right atrium. This is anatomically possible because the normal tricuspid valve is more apically displaced than the mitral valve.
HP:0011621.CNS_DEF: 一类直接连通左心室和右心房之间的室间隔缺损。这在解剖学上可能是因为正常的三尖瓣比二尖瓣顶部移位更多。

HP:0010971.ENG_NAME: Absence of Lutheran antigen on erythrocytes
HP:0010971.CNS_NAME: 红细胞路德抗原（Lutheran抗原）缺失
HP:0010971.ENG_DEF: Absence of the Lutheran antigen (a type I integral membrane glycoprotein) from the surface of red blood cells.
HP:0010971.CNS_DEF: 红血细胞的表面上的Lutheran抗原缺失（I型整合膜糖蛋白）。

HP:0004341.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the vitamin B12 metabolism

HP:0011636.ENG_NAME: Abnormal origin of the coronary arteries
HP:0011636.ENG_DEF: Isolated abnormalities of the coronary artery origins. This may be in associated with other structural heart malformations but not the patterns of complex structural heart malformations which result in abnormal course of the coronary arteries.
HP:0011636.CNS_DEF: 单纯的冠状动脉起源异常。这可能与其它心脏结构畸形有关，但并不是复杂的心脏结构畸形导致的冠状动脉走行异常。

HP:0012394.ENG_DEF: Allergy to iodine contrast media used in radiological studies.
HP:0012394.CNS_DEF: 在放射性研究中对所用的碘造影剂过敏。

HP:0100486.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100486.ENG_NAME: Symphalangism of the proximal phalanx of the 5th toe with the 5th metatarsal
HP:0100486.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾近端趾骨与第五跖骨趾关节粘连

HP:0002645.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002645.ENG_DEF: The presence of extra bones within a cranial suture. Wormian bones are irregular isolated bones which appear in addition to the usual centers of ossification of the cranium.
HP:0002645.CNS_DEF: 缝间骨为颅缝中的多余的骨头，呈不规则形且孤立存在，不单单生长在颅骨骨化中心。

HP:0100266.ENG_DEF: The carpus consists of the scaphoid, lunate, triquetal, pisiform, captitate, hamate, trapezoid, and trapezium bones. The tarsus consists of the talus, calcaneus, navicular, cuboid, cuneiform, and navicular bones. This term applies if there is any fusion among the bones of the carpus or tarsus.
HP:0100266.CNS_DEF: 腕骨由舟状骨、月骨、三角骨、豆状骨、头状骨、钩骨、棱形骨和斜方骨。跗骨由距骨、跟骨、舟状骨、骰骨、楔状骨和舟形骨。如果腕骨和跗骨间发生任何骨融合的，应用此术语。

HP:0000239.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000239.ENG_DEF: In newborns, the two frontal bones, two parietal bones, and one occipital bone are joined by fibrous sutures, which form a small posterior fontanelle, and a larger, diamond-shaped anterior fontanelle. These regions allow for the skull to pass the birth canal and for later growth. The fontanelles gradually ossify, whereby the posterior fontanelle usually closes by eight weeks and the anterior fontanelle by the 9th to 16th month of age. Large fontanelles are diagnosed if the fontanelles are larger than age-dependent norms.
HP:0000239.CNS_DEF: 在新生儿中，两块额骨、两块顶骨和一块枕骨由纤维缝合线连接，形成一个小的后囟和一个较大的菱形前囟。这些区域允许头颅通过产道和以后的增长。囟门逐渐骨化，后囟通常在出生后八周，前囟在出生后9〜16个月的年龄闭合。如果囟门比年龄相符的正常值大，则被诊断为大囟门。

HP:0012775.ENG_DEF: A lacy pattern or iris pigmentation that resembles the spokes of a bicycle wheel.
HP:0012775.CNS_DEF: 蕾丝般的图案或虹膜的色素沉着，类似于自行车车轮的辐条。

HP:0012346.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of a `protein glycosylation` (GO:0006486) process, i.e., of a protein modification process that results in the addition of a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit to a protein amino acid, e.g. the addition of glycan chains to proteins.
HP:0012346.CNS_DEF: 异常的`蛋白糖基化`（GO:0006486），即蛋白修饰过程，其可导致碳水化合物或碳水化合物衍生物单元位添加到蛋白质氨基酸分子上，例如加入聚糖链到蛋白质上。

HP:0012302.ENG_DEF: A severe virus infection of the central nervous system by the herpes simplex virus (HSV).
HP:0012302.CNS_DEF: 由单纯疱疹病毒（HSV）感染中枢神经系统的严重病毒感染。

HP:0002914.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0002914.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0002914.CNS_DEF: 尿液中氯化物浓度增加。

HP:0001384.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003307.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased cuvature (anterior concavity) of the lumbar or cervical spine.
HP:0003307.CNS_DEF: 异常增加腰椎或颈椎力学曲率（前凹）。

HP:0011901.CNS_DEF: 纤维蛋白原的定性异常。

HP:0002049.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0002049.ENG_DEF: A type of renal tubular acidosis characterized by a  failure of the proximal tubular cells to reabsorb bicarbonate, leading to urinary bicarbonate wasting and subsequent acidemia.
HP:0002049.CNS_DEF: 一种肾小管酸中毒，其特征是由于近端肾小管上皮细胞重吸收碳酸氢盐障碍，导致尿碳酸氢盐消耗及继发性酸血症。

HP:0000852.CNS_NAME: 假性甲状旁腺功能减退症
HP:0000852.ENG_DEF: A condition characterized by resistance to the action of parathyroid hormone, in which there is hypocalcemia, hyperphosphatemia, and (appropriately) high levels of parathyroid hormone.
HP:0000852.CNS_DEF: 此症特点是对甲状旁腺激素的作用失敏，低血钙，高血磷，和相对高浓度的甲状旁腺激素。

HP:0002666.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0002666.ENG_DEF: Pheochromocytomas (also known as chromaffin tumors) produce, store, and secrete catecholamines. Pheochromocytomas usually originate from the adrenal medulla but may also develop from chromaffin cells in or about sympathetic ganglia. A common symptom of pheochromocytoma is hypertension owing to release of catecholamines.
HP:0002666.CNS_DEF: 嗜铬细胞瘤（也称为嗜铬肿瘤）生产，储存，并分泌儿茶酚胺。嗜铬细胞瘤，通常从肾上腺髓质发起的，但也可以从在或约交感神经节铬细胞发展。嗜铬细胞瘤的常见症状是高血压，由于儿茶酚胺的释放。

HP:0003693.ENG_DEF: Muscular atrophy affecting muscles in the distal portions of the extremities.
HP:0003693.CNS_DEF: 四肢远端部分的肌肉萎缩。

HP:0008122.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008122.ENG_DEF: Synostosis of the `calcaneus` (FMA:24496) with the `navicular bone` (FMA:24499).
HP:0008122.CNS_DEF: 用`舟bone`:在`calcaneus`（24496 FMA）的骨性愈合（FMA:24499）。

HP:0007183.ENG_NAME: Focal T2 hyperintense basal ganglia lesion
HP:0007183.CNS_NAME: 基底节局灶性T2高信号病变
HP:0007183.ENG_DEF: A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the basal ganglia. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the basal ganglia.
HP:0007183.CNS_DEF: 在MRI T2加权像上，基底节区存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指基底节特定区域的局部高信号。

HP:0004523.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0004523.ENG_DEF: Increased length of the hairs of the eyebrows.

HP:0007103.ENG_NAME: Hypointensity of cerebral white matter on MRI
HP:0007103.ENG_DEF: A darker than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the cerebral white matter.
HP:0007103.CNS_DEF: 磁共振成像上较预期脑白质信号更暗。

HP:0010779.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormally large pelvis.

HP:0012711.ENG_DEF: A delay in the process of formation and maturation of the epiphysis of one or more vertebrae.
HP:0012711.CNS_DEF: 在形成一个或多个椎骨骨骺和成熟过程的延迟。

HP:0011460.ENG_DEF: Onset of disease at up to 8 weeks of gestation.

HP:0002392.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，伴多棘慢复合波
HP:0002392.ENG_DEF: The presence of complexes of repetitive spikes and waves in EEG.
HP:0002392.CNS_DEF: 脑电图示重复的棘波之后紧随慢波。

HP:0000658.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常

HP:0005256.ENG_NAME: Unilateral absence of pectoralis major muscle
HP:0005256.ENG_DEF: Aplasia (congenital absence) of the `pectoralis major` (FMA:13109) on only one side of the chest.

HP:0011108.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;免疫系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常;呼吸系统异常

HP:0005068.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001830.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001830.ENG_DEF: Polydactyly of the foot most commonly refers to the presence of six toes on one foot. Postaxial polydactyly affects the lateral ray and the duplication may range from a well-formed articulated digit to a rudimentary digit.
HP:0001830.CNS_DEF: 脚指畸形最常见的是指六个脚趾一只脚的存在。 Postaxial多趾影响横向线和复制的范围可以从一个良好的关节位，以一个基本的数字。

HP:0012818.CNS_NAME: 双心室心肌致密化不全
HP:0012818.ENG_DEF: Noncompaction cardiomyopathy that affects both ventricles.
HP:0012818.CNS_DEF: 影响两个心室的心肌致密化不全。

HP:0030077.ENG_DEF: A tumor originating in a bronchus.

HP:0004002.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0002169.ENG_DEF: A series of rhythmic and involuntary muscle contractions (at a frequency of about 5 to 7 Hz) that occur in response to an abruptly applied and sustained stretch.
HP:0002169.CNS_DEF: 对一个突然施加并持续拉伸的外力做出的回应，出现一系列有节律、不自主的肌肉收缩（频率约为5-7赫兹）。

HP:0010612.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple pits (small, pinpoint-large indentations on the surface of the skin) located on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).
HP:0010612.CNS_DEF: 存在于足底皮肤的许多凹点（位于皮肤表面、针尖样大小的凹点）。

HP:0003949.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009416.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009416.ENG_DEF: Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 3rd finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0009416.CNS_DEF: 硬化的第三手指的骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。

HP:0009506.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009506.ENG_NAME: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009506.CNS_NAME: 食指末节指骨骨骺碎裂
HP:0009506.ENG_DEF: Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.
HP:0009506.CNS_DEF: 第二个手指的末节指骨骨骺零散出现。

HP:0002028.ENG_DEF: The presence of chronic `diarrhea` (HP:0002014), which is usually taken to mean diarrhea that has persisted for over 4 weeks.
HP:0002028.CNS_DEF: 通常指持续4周以上的腹泻。

HP:0010943.ENG_DEF: Echogenic bowel is defined as fetal bowel with homogenous areas of echogenicity that are equal to or greater than that of surrounding bone.
HP:0010943.CNS_DEF: 肠管回声增强是指胎儿肠管回声强度接近或高于其周围骨骼回声的强度。

HP:0012087.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the surface contour of mitochondria.
HP:0012087.CNS_DEF: 线粒体表面轮廓的异常。

HP:0009559.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009559.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009559.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的食指末节指骨
HP:0009559.ENG_DEF: Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger is affected.
HP:0009559.CNS_DEF: 子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第二手指的指骨受到影响。

HP:0011173.ENG_DEF: Seizures with a decrease in amplitude and/or rate or arrest of ongoing motor activity.
HP:0011173.CNS_DEF: 伴随正进行地活动停止和/或幅度减低的癫痫发作。

HP:3000030.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:3000030.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of bony orbit of skull
HP:3000030.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an orbit of skull.

HP:0001988.ENG_DEF: `Recurrent` (PATO:0000427) episodes of `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `glucose` (CHEBI:17234) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0008207.CNS_NAME: 原发性肾上腺功能不全
HP:0008207.ENG_DEF: Insufficient production of steroid hormones (primarily cortisol) by the adrenal glands as a result of a primary defect in the glands themselves.
HP:0008207.CNS_DEF: 由于肾上腺自身的原发性缺陷而导致的类固醇激素产生不够（主要是皮质醇）。

HP:0030253.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0030253.ENG_DEF: A reduced ability of a T cell population to expand by cell division following T cell activation.

HP:0011497.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0011497.ENG_DEF: New growth of vessels on the surface of the iris.

HP:0003800.ENG_NAME: Muscle abnormality related to mitochondrial dysfunction
HP:0003800.CNS_NAME: 线粒体功能障碍引起的肌异常

HP:0012019.ENG_DEF: Complete dislocation of the lens of the eye.
HP:0012019.CNS_DEF: 眼睛的晶状体完全脱位。

HP:0030425.ENG_DEF: A cyst of the ovary that exhibits deposition of calcium salts.

HP:0010262.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010262.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphyses of the middle phalanges of the hand
HP:0010262.CNS_NAME: 手中节指骨骨骺不规则

HP:0009321.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009321.ENG_NAME: Absent epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009321.CNS_NAME: 中指中节指骨骨骺缺失
HP:0009321.ENG_DEF: Absence of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger.
HP:0009321.CNS_DEF: 中指中节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。

HP:0011813.ENG_DEF: Lipofuscin (age pigment) is a brown-yellow, electron-dense, autofluorescent material that accumulates progressively over time in lysosomes of postmitotic cells, such as neurons and cardiac myocytes.  This term pertains if there is an increase in the accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.
HP:0011813.CNS_DEF: 脂褐素（老年斑）是一种棕黄色的，电子致密的，自体荧光材料，随着时间推移逐步沉积于有丝分裂后细胞的溶酶体，如神经元和心肌细胞。此术语适用于脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。

HP:0100238.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100238.ENG_NAME: Synostosis involving bones of the upper limbs
HP:0100238.CNS_NAME: 累及上肢骨骼的骨性连合
HP:0100238.ENG_DEF: An abnormal union between bones or parts of bones of the upper limbs.
HP:0100238.CNS_DEF: 上肢骨骼或骨骼的一部分之间的不正常连合。

HP:0012475.ENG_DEF: The presence of normal overall immunoglobulin levels with deficiency of specific immunoglobulins directed against a specific antigen or microorganism.
HP:0012475.CNS_DEF: 总体免疫球蛋白水平正常，但针对特定抗原或微生物的特定免疫球蛋白缺乏。

HP:0000100.ENG_DEF: Nephrotic syndrome is a collection of findings resulting from glomerular dysfunction with an increase in glomerular capillary wall permeability associated with pronounced proteinuria. Nephrotic syndrome refers to the constellation of clinical findings that result from severe renal loss of protein, with Proteinuria and hypoalbuminemia, edema, and hyperlipidemia.
HP:0000100.CNS_DEF: 肾病综合症包含一系列的异常，由肾小球功能障碍所致肾小球毛细血管壁通透性增加而产生明显的蛋白尿。肾病综合征是指严重的肾性蛋白质损失，致蛋白尿、低蛋白血症水肿和高血脂症等一系列临床表现。

HP:0011048.ENG_NAME: Agenesis of permanent mandibular central incisor
HP:0011048.CNS_NAME: 恒下颌中切牙发育不全
HP:0011048.CNS_DEF: 恒下颌中切牙发育不全

HP:0000108.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple cysts at the border between the renal cortex and medulla.
HP:0000108.CNS_DEF: 皮质和髓质边界的多发性囊肿。

HP:0008420.ENG_DEF: The presence of punctiform calcification of the bone of the vertebral bodies.
HP:0008420.CNS_DEF: 椎体的骨的钙化点状的存在。

HP:0030743.ENG_NAME: Glial remnants anterior to the optic disc
HP:0030743.CNS_NAME: 视神经盘前方胶质残余
HP:0030743.ENG_DEF: Persistanced of a posterior remnant of the hyaloid artery located at the optic disc.

HP:0010848.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，棘慢复合波（2.5-3.5赫兹）
HP:0010848.ENG_DEF: The presence of complexes of spikes and waves (2.5-3.5 Hz) in electroencephalography (EEG).
HP:0010848.CNS_DEF: 脑电图存在棘慢复合波（2.5〜3.5赫兹）。

HP:0012527.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal contents of the platelet alpha granules, which normally contain hemostatic proteins such as fibrinogen, von Willebrand factor, and growth factors such as platelet-derived growth factor.
HP:0012527.CNS_DEF: 血小板α颗粒通常含有凝血因子如纤维蛋白原、von Willebrand因子和生长因子 (如血小板衍生的生长因子)。此处指这些成分的异常。

HP:0011363.ENG_DEF: Hair whose growth rate deviates from the norm.
HP:0011363.CNS_DEF: 毛发的生长速度偏离常态。

HP:0002034.ENG_DEF: An abnormaltiy of the `rectum` (FMA:14544), the final segment of the large intestine that stores solid waste until it passes through the anus.
HP:0002034.CNS_DEF: 直肠，即储存固体废物直至其通过肛门的大肠的最后一段的一种异常。

HP:0000473.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0000473.ENG_DEF: Involuntary contractions of the `neck musculature` (FMA:71290) resulting in an abnormal posture of or abnormal movements of the head.
HP:0000473.CNS_DEF: 颈部肌肉不自主收缩导致头部运动异常或位置异常。

HP:0000309.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the midface, which is a region and not an anatomical term. It extends, superiorly, from the inferior orbital margin to, inferiorly, the level of nasal base. It is formed by the maxilla (upper jaw) and zygoma. Traditionally, the nose and premaxilla are not included in the midface.
HP:0000309.CNS_DEF: 面中部的异常。面中部指区域而不是解剖术语。其范围上至眼眶下缘，下至鼻基。它是由上颌骨（上颌）和颧骨形成。传统上，面中部不包括鼻和前颌骨。

HP:0010561.ENG_DEF: An abnormally wavy surface or edge of the ribs.
HP:0010561.CNS_DEF: 肋骨表面或边缘异常起伏。

HP:0030323.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of the vertebral artery on one side.

HP:0005557.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005557.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `zygomatic arch` (FMA:53120), also known as the cheek bone.
HP:0005557.CNS_DEF: 颧弓的异常。颧弓也被称为颊骨。

HP:0005684.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005684.ENG_DEF: A form of arthrogryposis primarily affecting the hands and the feet.
HP:0005684.CNS_DEF: 关节挛缩的一种形式，主要影响手和脚。

HP:0010828.ENG_DEF: A segmental myoclonus of muscles innervated by the facial nerve.
HP:0010828.CNS_DEF: 面神经支配肌肉的节段性肌阵挛。

HP:0009120.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009120.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of a cranial sinus or sinuses.
HP:0009120.CNS_DEF: 没有或发育不全的颅内窦或鼻窦

HP:0000138.ENG_DEF: The presence of one or more `cysts` (MPATH:62) of the `ovary` (FMA:7209).
HP:0000138.CNS_DEF: 卵巢有一个或多个囊肿。

HP:0012216.CNS_NAME: 压迫性肩胛上神经病变
HP:0012216.ENG_DEF: An entrapment neuropathy of the suprascapular nerve, presenting with shoulder weakness confined to the supraspinatus muscle (this muscle initiates shoulder abduction) or to the infraspinatus (this muscle externally rotates the arm), as well as with pain in the posterior part of the shoulder and upper periscapular region.
HP:0012216.CNS_DEF: 肩胛上神经的嵌压性周围神经病，表现为局限于冈上肌或冈内肌的肩部无力，且伴有肩胛后部和上部的疼痛。

HP:0007964.CNS_DEF: 发生于玻璃体和视网膜上的变性改变

HP:0012875.ENG_DEF: Abnormality in the process of ejection of semen (usually carrying sperm) from the male reproductive tract.
HP:0012875.CNS_DEF: ​​从男性生殖道射出精液（通常携带精子）的过程中出现异常。

HP:0100458.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100458.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the distal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100458.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾末节趾骨溶骨性缺陷

HP:0012797.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0012797.ENG_DEF: A neoplasm in tubular vessels that are involved in the transport of LYMPH and LYMPHOCYTES.

HP:0010176.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010176.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more toe phalanges.
HP:0010176.CNS_DEF: 从一个或多个脚趾趾骨正常的直线形式的偏差。

HP:0009734.ENG_DEF: A `glioma` (HP:0009733) originating in the `optic nerve` (FMA:50863) or `optic chiasm` (FMA:62045).
HP:0009734.CNS_DEF: 一种起源于视神经或视交叉的视神经胶质瘤

HP:0010841.ENG_DEF: A abnormality in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG) and being identified at multiple locations (foci).
HP:0010841.CNS_DEF: 由脑电图记录到的多灶的大脑异常放电活动

HP:0011006.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0011006.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the musculature of the neck

HP:0007068.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of the inferior portion of the `vermis of cerebellum` (FMA:76928).
HP:0007068.CNS_DEF: 小脑下蚓部（FMA:76928）发育不完全。

HP:0002861.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `melanoma` (MPATH:359), a malignant cancer originating from pigment producing melanocytes. Melanoma can originate from the skin or the pigmented layers of the eye (the uvea).
HP:0002861.CNS_DEF: 恶性黑素瘤起源于产生色素的黑素细胞的恶性肿瘤，多发生于皮肤或眼的葡萄膜色素层。

HP:0100232.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100232.ENG_NAME: Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100232.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾近节趾骨骨骺小

HP:0009544.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009544.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger

HP:0000276.ENG_DEF: Facial height (length) is more than 2 standard deviations above the mean (objective); or, an apparent increase in the height (length) of the face (subjective).
HP:0000276.CNS_DEF: 面部高度（长度）比平均值高大于2个标准偏差（客观）；或者，面部高度（长度）显得增加（主观）。

HP:0005101.ENG_DEF: A type of `hearing impairment` (===HP:0000365===) affecting primarily the higher frequencies of sound (3,000 to 6,000 Hz).
HP:0005101.CNS_DEF: 主要以损害高频听力（3000至6000赫兹）为主的“听力障碍”(===HP:0000365===)类型。

HP:0000512.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the electrical responses of various cell types in the retina as measured by electroretinography.
HP:0000512.CNS_DEF: 视网膜中各种类型细胞的电反应异常可通过视网膜电流图检测。

HP:0000616.CNS_DEF: 异常（非生理的）收缩瞳孔。

HP:0010605.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0010605.ENG_DEF: A chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland. A chalazion or meibomian cyst appears as a painless tuberous swelling in the upper lid without loss of eyelashes.
HP:0010605.CNS_DEF: 由睑板腺堵塞发炎引起的慢性睑板腺上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症。霰粒肿或睑板囊肿表现为上眼睑无痛性结节肿胀而睫毛不脱落。

HP:0008227.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0008227.CNS_NAME: 垂体甲状腺激素不敏感
HP:0008227.ENG_DEF: A condition in which the pituitary gland is partially resistant to thyroid hormone, so that it continues to secrete thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH) until the blood level of thyroid hormone rises higher than normal.
HP:0008227.CNS_DEF: 指垂体对甲状腺激素不敏感，因此持续分泌促甲状腺激素（TSH），直到甲状腺激素的血浓度高于正常。

HP:0040093.ENG_NAME: Asymmetry of the position of the ears

HP:0007898.CNS_DEF: 视网膜内因液体渗出而导致的病变

HP:0003194.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormally short of the nasal root in comparison to the usual length for age.
HP:0003194.CNS_DEF: 与同龄人相比，鼻梁异常短小。

HP:0011757.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常

HP:0002445.ENG_DEF: Paralysis of all four limbs, and trunk of the body below the level of an associated injury to the spinal cord. The etiology of quadriplegia is similar to that of paraplegia except that the lesion is in the cervical spinal cord rather than in the thoracic or lumbar segments of the spinal cord.
HP:0002445.CNS_DEF: 相关的脊髓损伤水平以下的所有四肢、躯干的麻痹。四肢瘫的病因是类似于截瘫的不同之处在于病变是在颈脊髓而不是在脊髓的胸腰椎段。

HP:0009829.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009829.ENG_DEF: Missing or malformed long bones of the extremities with the distal parts (such as hands and/or feet) connected to the variably shortened or even absent extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the hole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).
HP:0009829.CNS_DEF: 误或缺失长骨与远侧部分（如手和/或脚），连接到所述可变地缩短或甚至不存在末端四肢，导致脚蹼状外观，相对于其他形式的肢畸形的要么所述孔肢缺失（如阿梅利亚），或一肢的前端部分不存在（peromelia）。

HP:0009099.ENG_DEF: Cleft palate of the midline of the palate.

HP:0011225.ENG_DEF: Redundant eyelid skin pressing the eyelashes against the cornea and/or conjunctiva.
HP:0011225.CNS_DEF: 将睫毛压在角膜和/或结膜的冗余眼睑皮肤。

HP:0030430.ENG_DEF: A tumor made up of nerve cells and nerve fibers.

HP:0008866.ENG_NAME: Failure to thrive secondary to recurrent infections
HP:0008866.CNS_NAME: 继发于反复感染的发育停滞

HP:0011862.CNS_NAME: 骨胶原纤维的形态异常
HP:0011862.ENG_DEF: Any structural anomaly of the connective tissue bundles in the extracellular matrix of bone tissue that are composed of collagen, and play a role in tissue strength and elasticity.
HP:0011862.CNS_DEF: 骨组织的细胞外基质结缔组织束的任何异常，结缔组织由胶原蛋白组成、在维持组织强度和弹性中发挥作用。

HP:0200067.ENG_DEF: Repeated episodes of abortion (Expulsion of the product of fertilization before completing the term of gestation) without deliberate interference.
HP:0200067.CNS_DEF: 无人为干扰而重复发生的流产事件（在足月妊娠期之前妊娠物排出体外）。

HP:0008997.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0008997.ENG_NAME: Proximal muscle weakness in upper limbs
HP:0008997.ENG_DEF: A lack of strength of the proximal muscles of the arms.
HP:0008997.CNS_DEF: 上肢近端肌肉缺乏力量。

HP:0007063.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the inferior half of the cerebellar vermis
HP:0007063.CNS_NAME: 小脑蚓部的下部发育缺陷

HP:0006889.ENG_DEF: Borderline intellectual disability is defined as an intelligence quotient (IQ) in the range of 70-79.
HP:0006889.CNS_DEF: 边缘状态智力残疾定义为智商（IQ）在70-79的范围内。

HP:0009614.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009614.ENG_NAME: Bifid proximal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009614.ENG_DEF: This term applies if the proximal phalanx of the thumb is partially duplicated. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx) to a partially fused appearance of the two bones. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009614.CNS_DEF: 该术语的情况发生在拇指近节指骨部分复制。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）的两个骨头的部分熔合外观变化。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0004754.ENG_DEF: AF that cannot be successfully terminated by cardioversion, and longstanding (more than 1 year) AF, where cardioversion is not indicated or has not been attempted, is termed permanent.
HP:0004754.CNS_DEF: 不能由复律成功终止，持续性发生（超过1年），其中复律无效或未实行复律，被称为永久性房颤。

HP:0000308.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000308.ENG_DEF: A form of `developmental hypoplasia` (MPATH:10060) of the `mandible` (FMA:52748) in which the mandible is `mislocalised posteriorly` (PATO:0001922).
HP:0000308.CNS_DEF: 下颌骨发育不全的一种形式，指下颌骨向后错位。

HP:0011727.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0012283.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012283.ENG_DEF: Reduced size of the `Distal epiphysis of femur` (FMA:32844).

HP:0006443.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006443.CNS_NAME: 髌骨发育不全或不发育

HP:0002009.ENG_DEF: A facial appearance characteristic of a fetus or neonate due to oligohydramnios experienced in the womb, comprising ocular hypertelorism, low-set ears, receding chin, and flattening of the nose.
HP:0002009.CNS_DEF: 胎儿或新生儿因经历了子宫羊水过少而形成的面部形态，特征包括眼距过宽，低置耳朵，回缩下巴，和扁平鼻子。

HP:0000593.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the `anterior chamber` (FMA:58078), which is the space in the eye that is behind the cornea and in front of the iris.
HP:0000593.CNS_DEF: 前房异常（FMA:58078），前房是指角膜后面和虹膜前面的空间。

HP:0001444.CNS_NAME: 常染色体显性体细胞突变

HP:0010915.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of pyruvate family amino acid metabolism
HP:0010915.CNS_NAME: 丙酮酸族氨基酸代谢异常
HP:0010915.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `pyruvate family amino acid metabolic process` (GO:0009078).
HP:0010915.CNS_DEF: `丙酮酸族氨基酸代谢过程`（GO:0009078）的异常。

HP:0002630.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the absorption of fat from the gastrointestinal tract.
HP:0002630.CNS_DEF: 自胃肠道吸收脂肪的异常。

HP:0000220.ENG_DEF: Inability of velopharyngeal sphincter to sufficiently separate the nasal cavity from the oral cavity during speech.
HP:0000220.CNS_DEF: 腭咽括约肌功能下降，言语时不能把鼻腔与口腔分开。

HP:0012589.CNS_NAME: 多药耐受性肾病综合征
HP:0012589.ENG_DEF: A form of nephrotic syndrome that does not respond to any immunosuppresive treatment.
HP:0012589.CNS_DEF: 一种肾病综合症，任何免疫抑制治疗都无效。

HP:0012645.ENG_DEF: Increase in size of a peripheral nerve. This finding can be appreciated by palpation along the axis of the nerve.

HP:0012098.ENG_NAME: Edema of the dorsum of feet
HP:0012098.ENG_DEF: An abnormal accumulation of fluid beneath the skin on the back of the feet.
HP:0012098.CNS_DEF: 流体的上脚背部的皮肤下的异常积累。

HP:0002071.ENG_DEF: A neurological condition related to lesions of the basal ganglia leading to typical abnormalities including akinesia (inability to initiate changes in activity and perform volitional movements rapidly and easily), muscular rigidity (continuous contraction of muscles with constant resistance to passive movement), chorea (widespread arrhythmic movements of a forcible, rapid, jerky, and restless nature), athetosis (inability to sustain the muscles of the fingers, toes, or other group of muscles in a fixed position), and akathisia (inability to remain motionless).
HP:0002071.CNS_DEF: 与基底节病变导致神经状态异常，典型的表现包括运动不能（无法发起动作的启动，或不能迅速和容易地进行随意运动），肌强直（广泛的无节律的肌肉快速持续收缩），舞蹈症（普遍一个强制，快速，干，和不宁性质）的心律失常的动作，手足徐动症（不能维持手指，脚趾，或其他组的肌肉中的固定位置的肌肉），和静坐不能（不能保持不动）。

HP:0001001.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0005789.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase of bone mineral density with generalized involvement of the skeleton.
HP:0005789.CNS_DEF: 骨矿物质密度与骨骼的普遍参与的异常增加。

HP:0012130.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of cells of the erythroid lineage
HP:0012130.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of `erythroid lineage cells` (CL:0000764), that is, of the erythropoietic cells in the lineage leading to and including erythrocytes.
HP:0012130.CNS_DEF: 红细胞系（CL:0000764）的异常，即生成红细胞的细胞谱系异常。

HP:0011346.CNS_NAME: 语言表达轻度发育延迟
HP:0011346.ENG_DEF: A mild delay in the acquisition of the ability to use language to communicate needs, wishes, or thoughts.
HP:0011346.CNS_DEF: 获取根据需求、愿望或想法运用语言进行交流的能力轻度延迟。

HP:0010023.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010023.ENG_DEF: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0010023.CNS_DEF: 相对于年龄相关的标准，第一掌骨骨骺尺寸异常小。

HP:0010641.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the midnasal cavity which includes the cavity between the nares and the choanae.
HP:0010641.CNS_DEF: 鼻中腔的异常。鼻中腔包括鼻孔和鼻后孔之间的空腔。

HP:0009587.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009587.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009587.ENG_DEF: Triangular shaped proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.
HP:0009587.CNS_DEF: 食指近节指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。

HP:0030490.CNS_NAME: 渗出性玻璃体视网膜病变

HP:0000219.ENG_DEF: Height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the midline more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently reduced height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the frontal view (subjective).
HP:0000219.CNS_DEF: 上唇中线唇红的高度小于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，从正面看上唇唇红的高度显得变短（主观）。

HP:0011349.ENG_DEF: Malfunction of the abducens nerve as manifested by impairment of the ability of the affected eye to be moved outward.
HP:0011349.CNS_DEF: 由于外展神经功能异常引起受累眼球转向外侧的运动障碍。

HP:0004854.ENG_DEF: Reduced platelet count that occurs sporadically, i.e., it comes and goes.
HP:0004854.CNS_DEF: 偶尔出现血小板计数减少，也就是说，出现后可以自动消失。

HP:0011321.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011321.ENG_DEF: Premature synostosis of only the left lambdoid suture.
HP:0011321.CNS_DEF: 只影响左侧人字缝的过早骨性愈合。

HP:0000256.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000256.ENG_DEF: Occipitofrontal (head) circumference greater than 97th centile compared to appropriate, age matched, sex-matched normal standards. Alternatively, a apparently increased size of the `cranium` (FMA:46565).
HP:0000256.CNS_DEF: 枕额（头）周长大于年龄和性别相匹配的正常值的第97百分位数。或者头盖骨尺寸显得增大。

HP:0009897.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常
HP:0009897.ENG_DEF: An abnormal `horizontal` (PATO:0001855) axis orientation of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, the main axis of the crus of the helix is perpendicular to the medial longitudinal axis of the ear, instead of sloping inferoposteriorly.
HP:0009897.CNS_DEF: “耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)呈异常的“横向位轴”(PATO:0001855)，即耳轮脚的主轴垂直于耳朵纵轴，不是倾斜于后下方。

HP:0009154.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009154.ENG_NAME: Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009154.CNS_NAME: 小指的近节指骨三角形骨骺
HP:0009154.ENG_DEF: A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the little finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.
HP:0009154.CNS_DEF: 小指近节指骨的骨骺呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常差不多是平的。

HP:0001812.ENG_DEF: When viewed on end (with the finger tip pointing toward the examiner's eye) the curve of the fingernail forms a tighter curve of convexity.
HP:0001812.CNS_DEF: 当检查者竖着看向指尖部位时可以观察到甲表面有纵向凸起。

HP:0010891.ENG_DEF: A developmental growth retardation of the vertebral end plates that may lead to secondary destruction of the vertebral end plates and protrusion of the nucleus pulposus into the vertebral body (so called Schmorl's nodes as seen on x-rays).
HP:0010891.CNS_DEF: 椎骨端板可能导致椎骨端板的二次破坏和髓核到椎体的突起的发育生长迟缓（所谓Schmorl的节点作为看到的X射线）。

HP:0006326.CNS_NAME: 包裹在粘多糖里的埋牙

HP:0009443.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the phalanges of the 3rd finger.
HP:0009443.CNS_DEF: 解散或第三手指的指骨骨组织的退化。

HP:0001003.ENG_DEF: Presence of an unusually high number of lentigines (singular: lentigo), which are flat, tan to brown oval spots.
HP:0001003.CNS_DEF: 外观扁平，棕褐色至褐色的椭圆形雀斑样痣数量增多。

HP:0002414.ENG_DEF: Incomplete closure of the embryonic neural tube, whereby some vertebral arches remain unfused and open. The mildest form is spina bifida occulta, followed by meningocele and meningomyelocele.
HP:0002414.CNS_DEF: 胚胎神经管不完全闭合，因此一些椎弓仍然未融合和开放。在最轻的形式是隐性脊柱裂，其次为脑脊髓膜膨出和脑脊髓脊膜膨出。

HP:0003700.ENG_DEF: Generalized (diffuse, unlocalized) amyotrophy (muscle atrophy) affecting multiple muscles.
HP:0003700.CNS_DEF: 广泛的（弥漫性，未本地化）肌萎缩，影响多处肌肉。

HP:0002166.CNS_DEF: 腿感知振动的能力下降。

HP:0011706.ENG_DEF: An intermittent  atrioventricular block with failure of some atrial impulses to conduct to the ventricles, i.e., some but not all atrial impulses are conducted through the atrioventricular node and trigger ventricular contraction.
HP:0011706.CNS_DEF: 一种脉冲不能正常的从心房传导至心室的间歇性房室传导阻滞，也就是说，有一些但不是所有的心房冲动能通过房室结传导进而触发心室收缩。

HP:0030087.ENG_DEF: An anomalous concentration of testosterone in the blood.

HP:3000010.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an orbicularis oris muscle.

HP:0001090.ENG_DEF: Increased size of the  ocular globe (eyeball).

HP:0012366.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012366.CNS_DEF: 窝点尖端突出超过硬腭至枕骨大孔后唇连线（即张伯伦的线）5毫米以上或超过麦格雷戈氏线（硬腭后至枕鳞最低点）7毫米以上。

HP:0002579.CNS_DEF: 肠的异常收缩，如痉挛和肠麻痹，与由于内源性或外源性因素导致的肠调整肌肉活性的能力丧失相关。

HP:0006721.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常

HP:0006721.CNS_DEF: 急性白血病的一种形式，特点是增多的淋巴母细胞。

HP:0001019.ENG_DEF: An inflammatory exfoliative dermatosis involving nearly all of the surface of the skin. Erythroderma develops suddenly. A patchy erythema may generalize and spread to affect most of the skin. Scaling may appear in 2-6 days and be accompanied by hot, red, dry skin, malaise, and fever.
HP:0001019.CNS_DEF: 炎症性剥脱性皮炎几乎累及全身皮肤，往往起病较急，通常表现为斑片状红斑并泛发扩散至全身， 2-6天后开始脱屑并伴有皮肤发热潮红、干燥不适和体温升高。

HP:0012502.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the `internal capsule` (FMA:61950), which is an area of white matter in the brain that separates the caudate nucleus and the thalamus from the putamen and the globus pallidus.
HP:0012502.CNS_DEF: `内囊`（61950 FMA）的异常。内囊是白质在分隔尾状核和丘脑，与壳核和苍白球的区域。

HP:0005905.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal curvature of the `cervical vertebral column.

HP:0100483.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾近端趾骨与第二跖骨关节粘连

HP:0009270.CNS_NAME: 无名指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化
HP:0009270.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger.
HP:0009270.CNS_DEF: 无名指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

HP:0012666.CNS_DEF: 在每个心动周期从左心室泵送的血液的分数大大减少。正常范围的成人为至少55％，射血分数减少被定义为不到30％。
