HP:0001712.ENG_DEF: Enlargement of the left ventricle of the heart. This increase in ventricular mass is attributed to sustained abnormal pressure or volume loads and is a contributor to cardiovascular morbidity and mortality.
HP:0001712.CNS_DEF: 由于长期压力或容量负荷异常引起的心脏左心室扩张，是由心室质量增大形成的，是心血管病发病和死亡的一个重要原因。

HP:0000653.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0000653.CNS_DEF: 睫毛密度降低或数量减少。

HP:0009122.ENG_NAME: aplasia/hypoplasia affecting bones of the axial skeleton
HP:0009122.CNS_NAME: 中轴骨架骨发育不全或发育低下
HP:0009122.ENG_DEF: Absence (due to failure to form) or underdevelopment of bones of the axial skeleton.
HP:0009122.CNS_DEF: 缺席（由于未形成）或中轴骨的骨骼不发达。

HP:0010858.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电
HP:0010858.ENG_DEF: Epileptiform discharges induced by hyperventilation (overbreathing) in cerebral electrical activity recorded along the scalp by electroencephalography (EEG).
HP:0010858.CNS_DEF: 通过头皮脑电图记录的脑电活动中，由过度换气诱发的癫痫样放电。

HP:0011128.ENG_DEF: A condition characterized by necrosis of the mucosal and submucosal layers of the esophagus not related to ingestion of caustic or other injurious agents. Endoscopically, there is a dark lesion ('black esophagus') distributed in a circumferential manner in the distal one-third of the esophagus with or without exudates. There is involvement of the distal esophagus ending sharply at the gastroesophageal junction.
HP:0011128.CNS_DEF: 其特征在于食管粘膜或粘膜下层坏死，这种坏死与腐蚀剂或其他有害物质的摄入无关。内窥镜观察会发现有黑色病灶（“黑食管”），环绕食管远端1/3分布，有或无渗出液。涉及食管下端，止于胃食管交界处。

HP:0010529.ENG_DEF: The tendency to repeat vocalizations made by another person.
HP:0010529.CNS_DEF: 有重复他人发声的倾向。

HP:0011461.ENG_DEF: Onset prior to birth but after 8 weeks of gestation.

HP:0012081.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased size of the cerebellum compared to other brain structures.
HP:0012081.CNS_DEF: 相对于其他的颅脑结构，小脑的尺寸异常增加。

HP:0004023.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030488.ENG_NAME: Abnormal central response of multifocal electroretinogram
HP:0030488.CNS_NAME: 多焦视网膜电图中心反应异常

HP:0002094.CNS_DEF: 呼吸费力或劳力性呼吸困难。

HP:0004315.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0004315.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin IgG in blood.
HP:0004315.CNS_DEF: 免疫球蛋白IgG的水平降低。

HP:0004524.ENG_DEF: Reduced or lacking hair growth in the temporal region (i.e., around the temples on the side of the skull).
HP:0004524.CNS_DEF: 头发生长减少或缺失发生于颞部（即两鬓周围）。

HP:0011750.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0011750.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `adenohypophysis` (FMA:74627), which is also known as the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland.
HP:0011750.CNS_DEF: 腺垂体，也被称为脑垂体的前叶的肿瘤。

HP:0001917.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0001917.ENG_DEF: A form of `amyloidosis` (HP:0011034) that affects the `kidney` (FMA:7203).

HP:0009973.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009973.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 4th finger
HP:0009973.CNS_NAME: 无名指的指骨的完全重复
HP:0009973.ENG_DEF: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 4th finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.
HP:0009973.CNS_DEF: 一个完整的复制影响一个的第四手指的指骨或更多。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。

HP:0005265.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `jejunum` (FMA:7207), i.e., of the middle section of the small intestine.
HP:0005265.CNS_DEF: 空肠，即小肠的中间部分的异常。

HP:0000679.CNS_DEF: 恒大臼齿的牙髓腔增大。

HP:0100174.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100174.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100174.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾的末节趾骨骨骺不规则

HP:0000958.ENG_DEF: Skin characterized by the lack of natural or normal moisture.

HP:0008964.ENG_DEF: Muscular atrophy that does not display a progression in severity with time.
HP:0008964.CNS_DEF: 肌萎缩不随时间进行性加重。

HP:0005341.ENG_DEF: Abnormal bladder function (increased urge or frequency of urination or urge incontinence) resulting from abnormal functioning of the autonomic nervous system.
HP:0005341.CNS_DEF: 自主神经系统功能异常导致的膀胱功能异常（尿急、尿频或急迫性尿失禁）。

HP:0011608.ENG_DEF: Truncus arteriosus (single great artery leaving the base of the heart, giving rise to the coronary, pulmonary, and systemic arteries) with each pulmonary artery arising separate from each other on the posterior or lateral aspect of the truncus.
HP:0011608.CNS_DEF: II型动脉干（起源于心脏的单大动脉，产生冠脉，肺动脉和全身动脉）两支肺动脉与分别从它的前后侧起源。

HP:0004887.CNS_NAME: 呼吸衰竭，需要辅助通气

HP:0001974.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0001974.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase in the number of `leukocytes` (CL:0000738) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0001974.CNS_DEF: 血液中白细胞（CL:0000738）的数量异常增加。

HP:0012016.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，伴枕部局灶棘波。
HP:0012016.ENG_DEF: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the occipital region.
HP:0012016.CNS_DEF: 脑电图，在枕区时限小于80毫秒的局灶短暂尖波。

HP:0030752.ENG_DEF: A nasolacrimal duct obstruction presenting as a grey-blue cystic swelling just below the medial canthus. Believed to be a result of concomitant upper obstruction of the Rosenmuller valve and lower obstruction of the Hasner valve.

HP:0009673.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009673.ENG_NAME: Stippling of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009673.CNS_NAME: 拇指近节指骨骨骺点状钙化
HP:0009673.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009673.CNS_DEF: 拇指近节指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。与第二至五指的近端指骨不同，在胚胎学上拇指的近端指骨相当于其他手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨则来源于指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨。

HP:0010309.ENG_DEF: The sternal cleft is a rare congenital anomaly resulting from a fusion failure of the sternum.
HP:0010309.CNS_DEF: 胸骨裂是一种罕见的先天性异常，从胸骨融合故障导致。

HP:0005576.ENG_DEF: Fibrosis that involves the tubules and interstitial tissue of the kidney.
HP:0005576.CNS_DEF: 肾小管和肾间质组织纤维化。

HP:0007835.ENG_DEF: The space between the upper and lower eyelids looks like a capital letter ‘S’.

HP:0000062.ENG_DEF: A genital phenotype that is not clearly assignable to a single gender. Ambiguous genitalia can be evaluated using the Prader scale: Prader 0: Normal female external genitalia. Prader 1: Female external genitalia with clitoromegaly. Prader 2: Clitoromegaly with partial labial fusion forming a funnel-shaped urogenital sinus. Prader 3: Increased phallic enlargement. Complete labioscrotal fusion forming a urogenital sinus with a single opening. Prader 4: Complete scrotal fusion with urogenital opening at the base or on the shaft of the phallus. Prader 5: Normal male external genitalia. The diagnosis of ambiguous genitalia is made for Prader 1-4.
HP:0000062.CNS_DEF: 根据生殖器外型无法确定是属于哪一种性别。外阴性别不明可以使用Prader计分来进行评估:Prader 0:正常女性外生殖器；Prader 1:女性外阴但阴蒂增大；Prader 2:阴蒂较大，阴唇部分融合，形成漏斗状阴道口；Prader 3:阴茎增大，阴唇完全融合形成尿生殖窦，有单一的尿道开口。Prader 4:阴囊完全融合，泌尿生殖口在阴茎的根部或阴茎上，类似尿道下裂；Prader 5:正常男性外生殖器。Prader 1-4 诊断为外阴性别不明。

HP:0003974.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003974.ENG_DEF: Missing radius bone associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003974.CNS_DEF: 用发展的先天缺失故障桡骨有关。

HP:0012233.ENG_DEF: Blood clot formed within muscle tissue following leakage of blood into the tissue.
HP:0012233.CNS_DEF: 以下泄漏的血液进入组织血块形成的肌肉组织内。

HP:3000043.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:3000043.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a facial vein.

HP:0003623.ENG_DEF: Onset of signs or symptoms of disease within the first 28 days of life.

HP:0011956.ENG_DEF: A lymphoproliferative abnormality of the intestine characterized by numerous visible mucosal nodules measuring up to, and rarely exceeding, 0.5 cm in diameter Histologically, hyperplastic lymphoid follicles with large germinal centres are seen in the lamina propria and superficial submucosa. There is enlargement of the mucosal B cell follicles caused by hyperplasia of the follicle centres; surrounded by a normal appearing mantle zone. Disease may involve the stomach, the entire small intestine, and the large intestine.
HP:0011956.CNS_DEF: 肠淋巴组织异常增生，其特征为大量可见的粘膜结节，直径可达或超过0.5厘米。在组织学上，在固有层和表面粘膜下层可见具有大的生发中心的增生的淋巴滤泡。卵泡中心增生引起粘膜B细胞滤泡肿大，由看似正常的冠状带围绕。该病可涉及胃、整个小肠及大肠。

HP:0002027.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0002027.ENG_DEF: Pain perceived to originate in the abdomen.

HP:0006409.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006409.ENG_DEF: Progressive bending or abnormal curvature of the leg.
HP:0006409.CNS_DEF: 渐进的弯曲或腿的异常弯曲。

HP:0010647.ENG_DEF: Any abnormal increase or reduction in skin elasticity.
HP:0010647.CNS_DEF: 皮肤弹性的异常增加或降低。

HP:0000771.ENG_DEF: Abnormal development of large mammary glands in males resulting in breast enlargement.
HP:0000771.CNS_DEF: 大型乳腺中导致乳房增大男性发育异常。

HP:0011804.ENG_DEF: A functional abnormality of a skeletal muscle.

HP:0009507.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009507.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009507.CNS_NAME: 食指末节指骨骨骺不规则
HP:0009507.ENG_DEF: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger.
HP:0009507.CNS_DEF: 食指的末节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。

HP:0045052.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the brachial nerve plexus
HP:0045052.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the brachial nerve plexus.

HP:0012776.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of the ciliary body (FMA:58295).

HP:0004528.ENG_DEF: Reduced or lacking hair growth in a generalized distribution.
HP:0004528.CNS_DEF: 泛发性毛发生长减慢或停滞。

HP:0005103.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常

HP:0011134.ENG_DEF: Mild fever that does not exceed 38.5 degree centrigrade.

HP:0012740.ENG_DEF: A tumor of the skin or mucous membrane with finger-like projections.
HP:0012740.CNS_DEF: 皮肤或粘膜表面乳头状突起的肿物。

HP:0011009.ENG_DEF: Sudden appearance of disease manifestations over a short period of time.

HP:0004379.CNS_NAME: 碱性磷酸酶的活性异常

HP:0005451.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011917.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011917.CNS_DEF: 在`第五toe`不发达（发育不全）（FMA:25053）。

HP:0005616.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased rate of skeletal maturation. Accelerated skeletal maturation can be diagnosed on the basis of an estimation of the bone age from radiographs of specific bones in the human body.
HP:0005616.CNS_DEF: 骨骼成熟的异常率增高。加速骨骼成熟可诊断的骨龄从特定骨骼在人体放射照片的估计的基础上。

HP:0002078.ENG_DEF: A kind of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) that affects the proximal musculature, especially that involved in gait stability.
HP:0002078.CNS_DEF: 一种影响近端肌肉的共济失调（HP:0001251），尤其是那些参与步态稳定的肌肉。

HP:0011696.ENG_NAME: Supraventricular tachycardia with a manifest accessory pathway on the left free wall
HP:0011696.CNS_NAME: 左侧游离壁显性旁路性室上性心动过速

HP:0100244.ENG_DEF: A fibroblastic sarcoma is a malignant tumor derived from fibrous connective tissue and characterized by immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells.
HP:0100244.CNS_DEF: 纤维母细胞肉瘤是起源于纤维结缔组织增生的恶性肿瘤，以未成熟或未分化的梭形细胞增生的成纤维细胞为特征。

HP:0001259.ENG_DEF: Complete absence of wakefulness and content of conscience, which manifests itself as a lack of response to any kind of external stimuli.
HP:0001259.CNS_DEF: 完全没有觉醒和意识内容，表现为对任何外部刺激没有反应。

HP:0010961.ENG_DEF: A kind of `bronchopulmonary sequestration` that is incorporated into the normal surrounding lung.
HP:0010961.CNS_DEF: 与周围正常肺成为一体的一种支气管肺隔离症。

HP:0000341.ENG_DEF: Width of the forehead or distance between the frontotemporales is more than two standard deviations below the mean (objective); or apparently narrow intertemporal region (subjective).
HP:0000341.CNS_DEF: 前额的宽度或者额颞间距离低于平均值多于两个标准偏差（客观）;或显得狭窄的颞骨间区域（主观）。

HP:0030812.ENG_DEF: Increase in size of the tonsils, small collections of lymphoid tissue facing into the aerodigestive tract on either side of the back part of the throat.

HP:0030837.ENG_DEF: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the finger.

HP:0005588.ENG_DEF: A focal type of palmoplantar keratoderma in which only certain areas of the palms and soles are affected.
HP:0005588.CNS_DEF: 局灶性掌趾角化症，仅掌跖的某些部位发生角化异常。

HP:0002324.ENG_DEF: A defect of development of the brain characterized by replacement of greater portions of the cerebral hemispheres and the corpus striatum by cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) and glial tissue.
HP:0002324.CNS_DEF: 脑脊液和胶质组织替代大部分大脑半球和胼胝体为特征的一种脑发育缺陷。

HP:0005165.ENG_DEF: Reduced time for the  PR interval (beginning of the P wave to the beginning of the QRS complex). In adults, normal values are 120 to 200 ms long.
HP:0005165.CNS_DEF: 为PR间期时间减少（从P波起始处到QRS波群的开头）。在成人中，正常值为120〜200毫秒。

HP:0009674.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009674.ENG_NAME: Triangular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009674.CNS_NAME: 拇指近节指骨三角形骨骺
HP:0009674.ENG_DEF: A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009674.CNS_DEF: 拇指近节指骨骨骺的呈三角外观。此骨骺位于指骨的近端，正常是几乎是持平。与第二至五手指的指骨近端趾相比，拇指的近端指骨是在胚胎学上相当于其它指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，因此相当于其他手指的近端指骨。

HP:0100117.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100117.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0100117.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的中节趾骨乳白色骨骺

HP:0011013.CNS_NAME: 碳水化合物代谢/体内稳态平衡异常
HP:0011013.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the metabolism/homeostasis of a `carbohydrate` (CHEBI:23008).
HP:0011013.CNS_DEF: `碳水化合物`(CHEBI:23008)的代谢/体内稳态平衡异常。

HP:0011532.ENG_DEF: A type of retinal exudate located in the subretinal space between the sensory retina and the retinal pigment epithelium.
HP:0011532.CNS_DEF: 位于在神经视网膜和视网膜色素上皮细胞之间的视网膜下腔内的视网膜渗出。

HP:0100118.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100118.ENG_NAME: Pseudoepiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0100118.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的中节趾骨假性骨骺

HP:0007574.CNS_NAME: 弥漫性青铜色色素沉着

HP:0011309.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011309.ENG_DEF: The gradual reduction in girth of the digit from proximal to distal.
HP:0011309.CNS_DEF: 脚趾从近端向远端逐渐变小。

HP:0011784.CNS_NAME: 甲状腺毒症伴弥漫性甲状腺肿

HP:0003469.ENG_DEF: Defective structure and function of myelin sheaths.
HP:0003469.CNS_DEF: 有缺陷的结构和髓鞘的作用。

HP:0009241.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009241.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009241.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的小指末节指骨
HP:0009241.ENG_DEF: Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 5th finger is affected.
HP:0009241.CNS_DEF: 子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第五手指的远端指骨受到影响。

HP:0011946.ENG_DEF: Inflammation and fibrosis of the bronchioles leading to partial or complete obstruction of these airways.
HP:0011946.CNS_DEF: 细支气管的炎症和纤维化导致这些气道的局部或完全闭塞。

HP:0030050.ENG_DEF: An abnormal phenomenon characterized by a classic tetrad of excessive daytime sleepiness with irresistible sleep attacks, cataplexy (sudden bilateral loss of muscle tone), hypnagogic hallucination, and sleep paralysis.

HP:0030618.CNS_NAME: OCT 测量法中央凹厚度增加

HP:0010815.ENG_DEF: A congenital, hairless plaque consisting of overgrown epidermis, sebaceous glands, hair follicles, apocrine glands and connective tissue. They are a variant of epidermal naevi. Sebaceous naevi most often appear on the scalp, but they may also arise on the face, neck or forehead. At birth, a sevaceous nevus typically appears as a solitary, smooth, yellow-orange hairless patch. Sebaceous naevi become more pronounced around adolescence, often appearing bumpy, warty or scaly.
HP:0010815.CNS_DEF: 皮脂腺痣是先天性的表面光滑无毛发的隆起皮损，由增生的表皮、皮脂腺、毛囊、汗腺腺体和结缔组织构成，是表皮痣的一个变种，常发生在头皮、面、颈部及前额。出生时，多为孤立光滑、无毛发的橙黄色斑点。在青春期，皮损更加明显，呈乳头瘤样、疣状或鳞片状。

HP:0012276.ENG_DEF: Inflammation of the  flexor digitorum tendon, often associated with the Kanavel signs: (i) finger held in slight flexion, (ii) fusiform swelling, (iii) tenderness along the flexor tendon sheath, and (iv) pain with passive extension of the digit.
HP:0012276.CNS_DEF: 屈指肌腱，常与Kanavel体征相关的炎症:在轻度屈曲（I）指持有，（二）梭形肿胀，（三）有压痛沿屈肌腱鞘，及（iv）疼痛与被动扩展位的。

HP:0030115.CNS_NAME: 肌肉纤维 dysferlin 减少
HP:0030115.ENG_DEF: Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced dysferlin protein in the muscle biopsy.

HP:0100747.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010952.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;胎儿发育或出生异常
HP:0010952.ENG_DEF: A kind of `ventriculomegaly` (HP:0002119) occurring in the fetal period and usually diagnosed by prenatal ultrasound. Cerebral ventriculomegaly is defined by atrial measurements 10 mm or more. Mild ventriculomegaly (MVM) is defined as measurements between 10 and 15 mm. Measurements are obtained from an axial plane at the level of the thalamic nuclei just below the standard image to measure the BPD (pmid:16100637).
HP:0010952.CNS_DEF: 发生于胎儿期的脑室扩大（HP:0002119）的一种类型，通常利用产前超声诊断。脑室扩大定义为是体径10mm以上。轻度脑室扩大（MVM）定义为10至15毫米之间。从丘脑核团水平的轴位完成测量，刚好低于测量BPD（PMID:16100637）的标准图像。

HP:0030788.ENG_DEF: Blockage of the external auditory canal by a buildup of earwax.

HP:0003482.ENG_DEF: Electromyographic (EMG) findings characteristic of axonal neuropathy, with normal or slightly decreased nerve conduction velocities, normal or slightly prolonged distal latencies, but significantly reduced motor potentials and sensory amplitudes. There may be spontaneous activity upon needle EMG studies, such as increased insertional activity, positive sharp waves and fibrillation potentials.
HP:0003482.CNS_DEF: 肌电图（EMG）发现轴突性神经病变，神经传导速度正常或略有下降，远端潜伏期正常或稍长时间，但动作电位和感觉电位幅度显著降低。有可能是在肌电图中的自发活动，如增加插入性活动，正锐波和纤颤电位。

HP:0006291.ENG_NAME: Marked delay in eruption of permanent teeth

HP:0002092.ENG_DEF: Pulmonary hypertension is defined as a mean pulmonary artery pressure greater than 25 mm Hg during rest (normal level, 10 mm Hg) or greater than 30 mm Hg during exercise (normal level, 15 mm Hg), as determined with right heart catheterization.
HP:0002092.CNS_DEF: 肺动脉高血压被定义为在休息平均肺动脉压大于25毫米汞柱（正常水平，10个毫米汞柱）或在锻炼期间大于30毫米汞柱（正常水平，15个毫米汞柱），由右心脏导管插入术来确定。

HP:0008629.ENG_DEF: Pulsatile tinnitus is generally classified a kind of objective tinnitus, meaning that it is not only audible to the patient but also to the examiner on auscultation of the auditory canal and/or of surrounding structures with use of an auscultation tube or stethoscope. Usually, pulsatile tinnitus is heard as a lower pitched thumping or booming, a rougher blowing sound which is coincidental with respiration, or as a clicking, higher pitched rhythmic sensation. Pulsatile tinnitus may be associated with vascular abnormalities such as arterioevenous shunts or glomus tumors or the jugular vein, arterial bruits related to a high-riding carotid artery (close to the auditory areas) or carotid stenosis, or venous abnormalities such as a dehiscent jugular bulb or to hypertension. Finally, in some patients, mechanical abnormalities such a spatulous eustachian tubes, palatomyoclonus (small spasms of muscles in the soft palate area), or idiopathic stapedial muscle spasm may represent the underlying cause of pulsatile tinnitus.
HP:0008629.CNS_DEF: 搏动性耳鸣通常被分类为客观性耳鸣，意味着不仅是病人可听及耳鸣声音，检查者应用听诊管或听诊器对耳道和/或其周围结构进行听诊时亦可听及。搏动性耳鸣一般为低的重击声或者隆隆声，粗糙的与呼吸一致的吹风声，或者为较高音调的有节奏感的敲击声。搏动性耳鸣可能与血管异常相关，如动静脉分流、颈静脉球体瘤，高位颈动脉（近听觉区域）相关的动脉杂音或颈动脉狭窄，或静脉异常如颈静脉球开裂或高血压。最后，在一些患者中，机械异常如咽鼓管扩张、腭肌阵挛（软腭区域肌肉小痉挛）或特发性镫骨肌痉挛也可能是搏动性耳鸣的根本原因。

HP:0006548.ENG_DEF: Abnormal,tangled collections of pulmonary dilated blood vessels that result from congenitally malformed vascular structures.
HP:0006548.CNS_DEF: 由先天性血管畸形导致的肺部毛细血管的异常及汇合紊乱。

HP:0011151.ENG_DEF: Atypical absence lasting for more than 30 minutes.
HP:0011151.CNS_DEF: 不典型失神持续超过30分钟。

HP:0011794.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0011794.ENG_DEF: The presence of an embryonal neoplasm of the `kidney` (FMA:7203) that primarily affects children.
HP:0011794.CNS_DEF: 主要在儿童期发病的肾脏胚胎肿瘤。

HP:0008542.ENG_DEF: A type of `hearing impairment` (===HP:0000365===) affecting primarily the low frequencies of sound (125 Hz to 1000 Hz).

HP:0011527.ENG_DEF: Exaggerated curvature of the lens of the eye, producing an anterior or posterior spherical bulging.
HP:0011527.CNS_DEF: 晶状体的曲率增大，产生的前或后球形膨出。

HP:0100141.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100141.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100141.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾的末节趾骨乳白色骨骺

HP:0009434.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009434.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009434.CNS_NAME: 第三手指中节指骨斑片状硬化
HP:0009434.ENG_DEF: Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the middle phalanx of the third finger.
HP:0009434.CNS_DEF: 不均匀的（不规则）增加第三个手指中节指骨骨密度。

HP:0012404.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012404.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal of the concentration of  `citrate(3-)` (CHEBI:16947) in the urine.
HP:0012404.CNS_DEF: 尿液中三价柠檬酸根(3-)浓度异常。

HP:0002230.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased hair growth over much of the entire body.

HP:0009945.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009945.ENG_DEF: This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.
HP:0009945.CNS_DEF: 该术语适用于如果一个第二手指的指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。

HP:0012287.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0012287.CNS_NAME: 下丘脑促黄体生成素释放激素缺乏
HP:0012287.ENG_DEF: Decreased secretion of luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone by the hypothalamus.
HP:0012287.CNS_DEF: 下丘脑促黄体生产素释放激素的分泌减少。

HP:0000999.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0000999.ENG_DEF: Any manifestation of a skin disease associated with the production of pus.
HP:0000999.CNS_DEF: 具有与脓液产生相关的任何皮肤表现的疾病。

HP:0030438.ENG_DEF: A squamous cell carcinoma that originates in the anal canal.

HP:0012164.ENG_DEF: A clinical sign indicating a lapse of posture and is usually manifest by a bilateral flapping tremor at the wrist, metacarpophalangeal, and hip joints.
HP:0012164.CNS_DEF: 一种临床体征，其表明一种错误的姿态，通常表现是双侧腕部、掌指和髋关节明显扑翼样震颤。

HP:0010267.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010267.ENG_NAME: Triangular epiphyses of the middle phalanges of the hand
HP:0010267.CNS_NAME: 手中节指骨三角形骨骺

HP:0005600.ENG_DEF: The giant congenital nevus is greater than 8 cm in size, pigmented and often hairy. A giant congenital nevus is smaller in infants and children, but it usually continues to grow with the child.
HP:0005600.CNS_DEF: 痣大于8厘米，颜色较深并伴有毛发生长。婴幼儿期痣较小，但其随着年龄的增长会增大。

HP:0010168.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0004478.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0040034.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0040034.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the second metatarsal bone

HP:0002731.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常

HP:0011180.ENG_DEF: EEG dominated by diffuse beta waves (>13 Hz) with occipitally localized alpha waves (8-13 Hz).
HP:0011180.CNS_DEF: 脑电图占主导地位的弥漫性β波（> 13赫兹）与occipitally本地化的α波（8-13赫兹）。

HP:0040021.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001397.CNS_DEF: 存在于肝脏的脂肪变性。

HP:0009717.ENG_DEF: Cortical tubers in the brain are hamartomatous lesions typically located at the gray-white matter interface, commonly in the frontal and parietal lobes. Cortical tubers are composed of abnormal glial and neural cells, and the size, number, and location vary among patients.
HP:0009717.CNS_DEF: 大脑皮质结节是错构瘤性病变，典型病灶位于灰白质交界区，通常位于额叶和顶叶。皮质结节由异常的神经胶质和神经细胞组成，不同患者中皮质结节的大小，数量，和位置差异很大。

HP:0200046.ENG_DEF: The presence of a characteristic high-pitched cry that sounds similar to the meowing of a kitten.
HP:0200046.CNS_DEF: 特征性高音调发声，听起来有点像小猫在叫。形容婴儿的哭声微弱、高调，见于5p-综合征（“猫叫综合征”）

HP:0012760.ENG_DEF: A reduced ability to participate in the back and forth flow of social interaction, which is normally characterized by an influence of the behavior of one person on the behavior of another person who is in conversation with the first.
HP:0012760.CNS_DEF: 参加互动的社会交往能力下降，其正常特征为一个人的行为影响与之交流的另外一个人的行为。

HP:0200056.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;眼睛的异常

HP:0009613.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009613.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009613.ENG_DEF: Complete or partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009613.CNS_DEF: 拇指近节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）各不相同，这两个骨头的部分熔合外观，或两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0011479.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `lacrimal punctum` (FMA:59365), an opening on the eyelid close to the medial canthus that drains tears from the conjunctival sac into the lacrimal duct in the same eyelid.
HP:0011479.CNS_DEF: 在泪点的异常（FMA:59365），泪点在下眼睑靠近内侧眼角部位，主要作用是吸收结膜囊中的泪液，引流到泪道中。

HP:0004828.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0004828.CNS_NAME: 难治性贫血伴环状铁粒幼红细胞
HP:0004828.ENG_DEF: A type of myelodysplastic syndrome characterized by less than 5% myeloblasts in the bone marrow, but with 15% or greater red cell precursors in the marrow being abnormal iron-stuffed cells called ringed sideroblasts.
HP:0004828.CNS_DEF: 一型骨髓增生异常综合征，骨髓特征在原粒细胞于小于5％，但15％或更多的骨髓红细胞前体是环状铁粒幼细胞。

HP:0009280.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009280.ENG_DEF: Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `fourth finger` (FMA:24948), also known as the ring finger.
HP:0009280.CNS_DEF: 发育不全（先天性减小大小）的`第四finger`的（FMA:24948），也被称为无名指。

HP:0011846.ENG_DEF: A benign, painful, tumor of bone characterized by the formation of osteoid tissue, primitive bone and calcified tissue.
HP:0011846.CNS_DEF: 甲良性的，痛苦的，肿瘤的骨为特征的骨样组织，原始骨和钙化组织的形成。

HP:0003031.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003031.ENG_DEF: Bending of the diaphysis (shaft) of the `ulna`(FMA:23466).

HP:0030084.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0030084.ENG_DEF: An angulation of a digit at an interphalangeal joint in the plane of the palm (finger) or sole (toe).
HP:0030084.CNS_DEF: 在手掌（手指）或足部（脚趾）的平面，手指(脚趾)于指（趾）间关节弯曲成角。

HP:0001555.ENG_DEF: Lack of symmetry between the left and right halves of the thorax.
HP:0001555.CNS_DEF: 缺乏胸廓的左，右两半之间的对称。

HP:0030675.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0030675.ENG_NAME: Contracture of proximal interphalangeal joints of 2nd-5th fingers
HP:0030675.CNS_NAME: 第二至第五指的近端指间关节挛缩
HP:0030675.ENG_DEF: Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd, 3rd, 4th, and 5th fingers due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.
HP:0030675.CNS_DEF: 由于非骨性组织的结构改变，导致第二至第五指的近端指间关节活动的慢性丧失。

HP:0009782.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0009782.CNS_NAME: 肱二头肌发育不全或发育低下
HP:0009782.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the biceps muscle.
HP:0009782.CNS_DEF: 缺席或肱二头肌的不发达。

HP:0011187.ENG_NAME: Focal EEG discharges with propagation to ipsilateral hemisphere
HP:0011187.CNS_NAME: 脑电图局灶性放电，传播到同侧半球
HP:0011187.ENG_DEF: Focal epileptiform discharges with spreading to the hemisphere on the same side of the brain.
HP:0011187.CNS_DEF: 局灶性癫痫样放电0011186，扩散到同一侧大脑半球。

HP:0006493.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006493.ENG_NAME: aplasia/hypoplasia involving bones of the lower limbs
HP:0006493.CNS_NAME: 下肢骨骼发育不全或发育低下
HP:0006493.ENG_DEF: Absence (due to failure to form) or underdevelopment of the bones of the lower limbs.
HP:0006493.CNS_DEF: 缺席（由于未形成）或下肢的骨骼不发达。

HP:0009545.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012245.ENG_DEF: Development of the reproductive system is inconsistent with the chromosomal sex.
HP:0012245.CNS_DEF: 生殖系统的发展与染色体性别不一致。

HP:0000700.ENG_DEF: Radiolucency (reflecting a reduction in the bony substance) around the apex (the tip of the dental root).
HP:0000700.CNS_DEF: 牙顶点（牙根的尖端）周围的射线可透（反映出骨质降低）。

HP:0010528.ENG_DEF: Inability to recognize faces of familair persons.

HP:0100595.ENG_DEF: An abnormal forward-flexed posture e.g. forward flexion of the spine, which is noticeable when standing or walking but disappears when lying down. It is becoming an increasingly recognized feature of Parkinson's disease and dystonic disorders.
HP:0100595.CNS_DEF: 不正常的向前弯曲的姿势如脊椎，站立或行走时明显，但平躺时前倾前屈位消失。它逐渐成为确认帕金森氏病和肌张力障碍性疾病的特征。

HP:0000022.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `male internal genitalia` (FMA:45655).

HP:0012373.CNS_DEF: 眼球功能异常中的一种（FMA:54448）。

HP:0004439.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004439.ENG_DEF: A characteristic appearance resulting from defective ossification of craniofacial bones.
HP:0004439.CNS_DEF: 由于颅面骨的骨化缺陷造成特征性的外表

HP:0006471.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010646.ENG_DEF: An abnormal lack of stability of the cervical spine.
HP:0010646.CNS_DEF: 一个异常缺乏对颈椎的稳定性。

HP:0009546.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009546.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 2nd finger
HP:0009546.ENG_DEF: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 2nd finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.
HP:0009546.CNS_DEF: 食指指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。

HP:0003697.ENG_DEF: Muscular atrophy in the distribution of shoulder girdle and peroneal muscles.
HP:0003697.CNS_DEF: 肌肉萎缩分布于肩胛带和腓骨肌。

HP:0005918.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005918.ENG_DEF: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone belongs to any finger.
HP:0005918.CNS_DEF: 手指指骨的结构或形态异常。

HP:0010947.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of ductus venosus blood flow
HP:0010947.ENG_DEF: The abnormal velocity or direction of blood flow in the ductus venosus， which can reflect the fetus cardiac function and overall development.
HP:0010947.CNS_DEF: 静脉导管中血流的速度或方向异常，可反映胎儿心功能和胎儿的整体发育状况。

HP:0001592.ENG_DEF: `Agenesis` (MPATH:57) specifically affecting one of the classes `incisor` (FMA:12823), `premolar` (FMA:55637), or `molar` (FMA:55638).
HP:0001592.CNS_DEF: 只累及中切牙、小臼齿或大臼齿之中某一类的发育不全

HP:0008127.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008127.ENG_DEF: A two-part `calcaneus`(FMA:24496), a finding that probably results from delayed coalescence of two primary calcaneal centers of ossification.
HP:0008127.CNS_DEF: 由两部分组成`calcaneus`（FMA:24496），这一发现可能是从骨化的两个主要跟骨中心推迟合并的结果。

HP:0100342.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100473.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100473.ENG_NAME: Symphalangism affecting the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100473.CNS_NAME: 第三趾近节趾关节粘连

HP:0006802.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the anterior horn cell
HP:0006802.CNS_NAME: 脊髓前角细胞形态异常
HP:0006802.ENG_DEF: Any anomaly of the `anterior horn cell` (CL:0000100).
HP:0006802.CNS_DEF: 在`前角细胞`的任何异常（CL:0000100）。

HP:0012367.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012367.ENG_DEF: Bony defects situated along the cranial suture lines or at the junction of the bone plates of the skull.
HP:0012367.CNS_DEF: 沿着颅缝线或位于颅骨骨板交界处的骨缺损。

HP:0006687.ENG_DEF: Abnormal tortuous (i.e., twisted) form of the `aorta` (FMA:3734).

HP:0010285.ENG_DEF: Fibrous band between the mucosal surfaces of the upper and lower alveolar ridges.
HP:0010285.CNS_DEF: 上下牙槽脊粘膜表面之间的纤维带。

HP:0008643.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0008643.ENG_DEF: Presence of persistent islands of renal blastoma in the postnatal kidney. Nephroblastomatosis represents a complex abnormality of nephrogenesis and has been defined as the persistence of metanephricblastoma into infancy and childhood.
HP:0008643.CNS_DEF: 出生后持续性岛屿状肾母细胞瘤。肾母细胞瘤病代表肾生成时的复杂性异常，并定义为原肾胚细胞瘤持续至婴儿期和儿童期 。

HP:0000044.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0000044.CNS_NAME: 低促性腺素性功能减退症
HP:0000044.ENG_DEF: Hypogonadotropic hypogonadism is characterized by reduced function of the gonads (testes in males or ovaries in females) and results from the absence of the gonadal stimulating pituitary hormones: follicle stimulating hormone (FSH) and luteinizing hormone (LH).
HP:0000044.CNS_DEF: 低促性腺素性功能减退症的特征是性腺（男性的睾丸，女性的卵巢）功能降低，是由于缺乏性腺刺激垂体激素，如卵泡刺激素（FSH）和促黄体生成激素（LH）。

HP:0004100.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004100.ENG_DEF: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone of the 2nd finger. also known as the index finger.
HP:0004100.CNS_DEF: 第二手指（也称食指）的异常结构或形态。

HP:0009328.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009328.ENG_NAME: Pseudoepiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009328.CNS_NAME: 第三手指中节指骨假骺
HP:0009328.ENG_DEF: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.
HP:0009328.CNS_DEF: 一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。

HP:0011481.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the ` lacrimal duct` (FMA:61063), a duct that drain tears from the conjunctiva, via the lacrimal puncta, into the lacrimal sac.
HP:0011481.CNS_DEF: 在`泪道（FMA:61063）的异常，泪道是泪液排出的通道，眼泪从泪小点进入泪囊。

HP:0009959.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009959.ENG_DEF: This term applies if one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger are either partially duplicated, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance of the phalanges, or completely duplicated.
HP:0009959.CNS_DEF: 该术语适用于如果一个第三手指的指骨或多个或者部分地重复，根据其严重性通往指骨的宽或双歧外观，或完全复制。

HP:0007717.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;头或颈部的异常;免疫系统的异常
HP:0007717.ENG_DEF: A chronic irritative conjunctivitis, which commonly presents with general irritation and redness of the eyes, with a burning, dry, or foreign-body sensation of the eyes.
HP:0007717.CNS_DEF: 慢性刺激性结膜炎，通常呈现刺激和眼睛发红，有灼热，干燥，或眼睛异物感。

HP:0006252.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001009.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0001009.ENG_DEF: Telangiectasias refer to small dilated blood vessels located near the surface of the skin or mucous membranes, measuring between 0.5 and 1 millimeter in diameter. Telangiectasia are located especially on the tongue, lips, palate, fingers, face, conjunctiva, trunk, nail beds, and fingertips.
HP:0001009.CNS_DEF: 毛细血管扩张指位于皮肤或粘膜表面的扩张血管，直径在0.5~1mm之间。主要位于舌部，唇部，上腭，手指，面部，结膜，躯干，甲床和指尖。

HP:0001653.ENG_DEF: An `abnormality of the mitral valve` (HP:0001633) characterized by insufficiency or incompetence of the mitral valve resulting in retrograde leaking of blood through the mitral valve upon ventricular contraction.
HP:0001653.CNS_DEF: 一种“二尖瓣异常”（HP:0001633），其特征是心室收缩过程中由于二尖瓣发育不全或无力导致血液通过二尖瓣逆流回漏。

HP:0009500.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009500.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009500.CNS_NAME: 食指中节指骨骨骺异常

HP:0100606.ENG_DEF: A benign or malignant `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) originating in the respiratory system.
HP:0100606.CNS_DEF: 良性或恶性`neoplasm`（的mpath:218）（肿瘤）发生于呼吸系统。

HP:0009681.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009681.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009681.CNS_NAME: 拇指末节指骨乳白色骨骺
HP:0009681.ENG_DEF: Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0009681.CNS_DEF: 硬化拇指末节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。

HP:0005597.ENG_DEF: Loss of all scalp hair with congenital onset.
HP:0005597.CNS_DEF: 先天性的全部头发脱落。

HP:0011675.ENG_DEF: Any cardiac rhythm other than the normal sinus rhythm. Such a rhythm may be either of sinus or ectopic origin and either regular or irregular. An arrhythmia may be due to a disturbance in impulse formation or conduction or both.
HP:0011675.CNS_DEF: 非正常窦性心律的其他心律。这样的心律可能是窦或异位的起源，有的规律有的不规律。心律失常由心脏搏动的起源或传导紊乱引起。

HP:0100784.ENG_DEF: An Peripheral arteriovenous fistula is an abnormal connection or passageway between Peripheral artery and Peripheral vein.
HP:0100784.CNS_DEF: 外周动静脉瘘是在外周动脉和外周静脉之间的异常连接和传输。

HP:0003884.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0000819.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0000819.ENG_DEF: A group of abnormalities characterized by hyperglycemia and glucose intolerance.
HP:0000819.CNS_DEF: 一组以高血糖和葡萄糖不耐受为特征的病症。

HP:0012076.ENG_DEF: A personality disorder characterized by impulsive behavior and unpredictable and capricious mood. Affected individuals show a liability to outbursts of emotion and an incapacity to control the behavioural explosions.
HP:0012076.CNS_DEF: 主要以冲动行为、不可预测和反复无常的情绪为特征的人格障碍。患者表现为易于情绪爆发并且不能控制行为爆发。

HP:0012385.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012385.ENG_DEF: The distal interphalangeal joint and/or the proximal interphalangeal joint of the fingers or toes cannot be extended to 180 degrees by either active or passive extension.
HP:0012385.CNS_DEF: 远端指间关节和/或手指或脚趾的近端指间关节，但无法通过主动或被动的扩展被扩展到180度。

HP:0030270.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0030270.ENG_NAME: Elevated red cell adenosine deaminase activity
HP:0030270.CNS_NAME: 红细胞腺苷脱氨酶活性增加
HP:0030270.ENG_DEF: Increase in the activity of adenosine deaminase (ADA), an enzyme involved in purine metabolism, within erythrocytes. ADA is involved in the catabolism of adenosine.

HP:0002521.ENG_DEF: Hypsarrhythmia is abnormal interictal high amplitude waves and a background of irregular spikes. There is continuous (during wakefulness), high-amplitude (>200 Hz), generalized polymorphic slowing with no organized background and multifocal spikes demonstrated by electroencephalography (EEG).
HP:0002521.CNS_DEF: 高度失律是发作间歇期异常的高波幅脑波和不规则的棘波背景活动。脑电图（EEG）显示持续的（清醒时），高波幅（> 200赫兹？？），广泛的多形慢波，伴无组织的背景活动和多灶棘波。

HP:0009011.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of the serratus anterior muscle, which is involved in abduction, upward Rotation, and elevation of the scapula.
HP:0009011.CNS_DEF: 不发达前锯肌，其涉及诱拐肩胛骨，向上旋转，和海拔。

HP:0001215.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001215.ENG_DEF: The distal interphalangeal joint and/or the proximal interphalangeal joint of the second to fifth fingers cannot be extended to 180 degrees by either active or passive extension.
HP:0001215.CNS_DEF: 远端指间关节和/或第二到第五手指的近端指间关节，但无法通过主动或被动的扩展被扩展到180度。

HP:0000728.ENG_NAME: Impaired ability to form peer relationships
HP:0000728.CNS_NAME: 同伴关系建立能力障碍

HP:0001350.ENG_DEF: Abnormal coordination of muscles involved in speech.
HP:0001350.CNS_DEF: 参与发声肌肉的异常共济失调。

HP:0001644.ENG_DEF: Dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) is defined by the presence of left ventricular dilatation and left ventricular systolic dysfunction in the absence of abnormal loading conditions (hypertension, valve disease) or coronary artery disease sufficient to cause global systolic impairment. Right ventricular dilation and dysfunction may be present but are not necessary for the diagnosis.
HP:0001644.CNS_DEF: 扩张型心肌病（DCM）被定义为，不存在其他异常病态（包括高血压、瓣膜病）或者冠心病的条件下，左心室扩张以及左心室功能异常。右心室扩张和功能障碍可能是存在的，但不是诊断的必要条件。

HP:0000870.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0000870.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormally increased levels of prolactin in the blood. Prolactin is a peptide hormone produced by the anterior pituitary gland that plays a role in breast development and lactation during pregnancy.
HP:0000870.CNS_DEF: 指泌乳素血中水平异常升高。泌乳素是一种由垂体前叶分泌的蛋白质激素，影响乳腺发育及怀孕期的泌乳。

HP:0010677.CNS_DEF: 睡觉的时候发生的遗尿。

HP:0030181.ENG_DEF: Dorsal extension of the big toe, sometimes accompanied by fanning of the other toes, elicited by compressing the calf muscles (a normal response is no movement of the big toe).

HP:0030345.CNS_NAME: 循环黄体生成素水平异常
HP:0030345.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the circulating level of luteinizing hormone (LH).

HP:0009532.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009532.ENG_NAME: Small epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger

HP:0007341.ENG_NAME: Diffuse swelling of cerebral white matter

HP:0009612.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009612.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009612.ENG_DEF: Complete or partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones, or two separate bones appearing side to side.
HP:0009612.CNS_DEF: 拇指末节指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合）各不相同，这两个骨头的部分熔合外观，或两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边。

HP:0012305.ENG_NAME: Coarctation of the descending aortic arch
HP:0012305.ENG_DEF: Narrowing or constriction of the aorta localized to the region of the `descending trunk of arch of aorta`(FMA:13082).
HP:0012305.CNS_DEF: 主动脉降支的狭窄或收缩。

HP:0000965.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0000965.ENG_DEF: A reticular discoloration of the skin with cyanotic (reddish-blue appearing) areas surrounding pale central areas due to dilation of capillary blood vessels and stagnation of blood within the vessels. Cutis marmorata, also called livedo reticularis, generally occurs on the legs, arms and trunk and is often more severe in cold weather.
HP:0000965.CNS_DEF: 因皮肤毛细血管扩张、静脉淤血，皮肤出现紫色或红蓝色围绕中央苍白区呈网状改变，又称网状青斑，常发生在下肢、手臂和躯干，冬季加重。

HP:0000609.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;眼睛的异常

HP:0006494.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia involving bones of the feet
HP:0006494.CNS_NAME: 脚的骨头发育不全或发育低下

HP:0002251.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0002251.CNS_DEF: 由于肠道缺乏神经节细胞引起的异常（即肠道的无神经节段），导致肠梗阻伴结肠扩大。

HP:0012858.ENG_DEF: Decreased number or density of the folded ridges (wrinkles) of skin of the scrotum.
HP:0012858.CNS_DEF: 阴囊皮肤的折叠脊（皱纹）的数量减少或密度降低。

HP:0040007.ENG_DEF: Lack of skin pigmentation (coloring) of the chest.

HP:0001126.ENG_DEF: Cryptophthalmos is a condition of total absence of eyelids and the skin of forehead is continuous with that of cheek, in which the eyeball is completely concealed by the skin, which is stretched over the orbital cavity.
HP:0001126.CNS_DEF: 隐眼是指完全没有眼睑，前额皮肤与脸颊相连，眼球被越过眼眶的皮肤完全掩盖的一种情况。

HP:0100894.ENG_DEF: Increased side-to-side width  of the `xiphoid process` (FMA:7488) of the sternum.
HP:0100894.CNS_DEF: 增大侧到另一侧的宽度`剑突process`（FMA:7488）的胸骨。

HP:0001992.CNS_DEF: 尿液中非氨基有机酸排泄增加。

HP:0040224.ENG_DEF: Clincial phenotype characterized by delayed bleeding accelerated break down of blood clot (fibrinolysis)

HP:0012408.ENG_DEF: The deposition of calcium salts in the parenchyma of the renal medulla (innermost part of the kidney).
HP:0012408.CNS_DEF: 在肾髓质（肾脏的最内部分）的实质细胞发生钙盐沉积。

HP:0000815.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0000815.ENG_DEF: Reduced function of the gonads (testes in males or ovaries in females) associated with excess pituitary gonadotropin secretion and resulting in delayed sexual development and growth delay.
HP:0000815.CNS_DEF: 性腺（男性的睾丸，女性的卵巢）的功能降低，伴随垂体促性腺激素的过量分泌，导致性发育延迟和生长发育迟缓。

HP:0010059.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010059.ENG_DEF: An increase in width in one or more phalanges of the big toe.
HP:0010059.CNS_DEF: 在宽度在大脚趾的一个或多个指骨的增加。

HP:0012413.CNS_DEF: 乳中切牙上存在一个V形凹口（缺口）。

HP:0009051.CNS_DEF: 糖原肌肉组织中的量增加。

HP:0010892.CNS_NAME: 支链族氨基酸代谢异常

HP:0010892.CNS_DEF: 支链族氨基酸代谢异常。

HP:0100441.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的第四趾末节趾骨

HP:0100441.CNS_DEF: 第四脚趾的末节指骨的形态异常，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

HP:0001402.ENG_DEF: A kind of `neoplasm of the liver` (HP:0002896) that originates in hepatocytes and presents macroscopically as a soft and hemorrhagic tan mass in the liver.
HP:0001402.CNS_DEF: 一种起源于肝细胞的肝肿瘤，宏观上为肝脏中柔软的和出血性黄褐色团块。

HP:0011164.ENG_DEF: A sensation consistent with involvement of the autonomic nervous system, including cardiovascular, gastrointestinal, sudomotor, vasomotor and thermoregulatory functions.
HP:0011164.CNS_DEF: 一种与自主神经系统受累相一致的感觉，包括心血管，胃肠，排汗，血管舒缩和体温调节功能。

HP:0001220.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006610.CNS_DEF: 阿比左和右乳头之间通常距离大。

HP:0010807.ENG_DEF: Visible space between the dental arches in occlusion.
HP:0010807.CNS_DEF: 牙咬合时牙弓之间可见空间。

HP:0012028.ENG_DEF: A benign tumor of the liver of presumably epithelial origin.
HP:0012028.CNS_DEF: 可能为上皮来源一种肝的良性肿瘤。

HP:0005009.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005009.ENG_DEF: The `humerus` (FMA:13303) is shortened and displays flaring (widening) of the metaphyses.

HP:0005498.CNS_NAME: 前/后囟门中线皮肤凹陷

HP:0030205.ENG_NAME: Increased jitter at single fibre EMG
HP:0030205.CNS_NAME: 单纤维肌电图时颤抖增加
HP:0030205.ENG_DEF: The variation in the time interval between the two action potentials of the same motor unit is called jitter. This term therefore applies to increased variability in the interval between successive action potentials of the same motor unit, which is measured by electromyography (EMG).

HP:0040240.CNS_NAME: 因子VWF前肽与VWF抗原比例增加
HP:0040240.ENG_DEF: An increased VWF propeptide to VWF antigen indicates that deficiency of VWF is not due to impaired synthesis but due to rapid clearance. The VWF propeptide is measured by ELISA.

HP:0005420.CNS_DEF: 对革兰氏阴性菌感染的传染易感性增加，表现为反复或频繁的革兰氏阴性杆菌病原体的感染史。

HP:0007193.CNS_NAME: 觉醒时全面性强直阵挛发作
HP:0007193.ENG_DEF: Generalized tonic-clonic seizures on awakening are a form of `Generalized tonic-clonic seizures` (HP:0002069) that occur upon awaking.
HP:0007193.CNS_DEF: 觉醒时全面性强直阵挛发作是'全面性强直阵挛发作（HP:0002069）的一种形式，在醒来时发生。

HP:0008569.CNS_DEF: 平均纵向长度低于平均值的两个以上的标准偏差，存在部分外耳结构。

HP:0003366.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the femoral neck and head region

HP:0000037.ENG_DEF: Hermaphroditism refers to a discrepancy between the morphology of the gonads and that of the external genitalia. In male pseudohermaphroditism, the genotype is male (XY) and the external genitalia are imcompletely virilized, ambiguous, or complete female. If gonads are present, they are testes.
HP:0000037.CNS_DEF: 两性畸形是指性腺的形态和外生殖器不吻合。男性假两性畸形的染色体核型为男性（XY），但外生殖器呈不完全男性化、模棱两可或完全女性化。如果有性腺存在，一般是睾丸。

HP:0009554.CNS_DEF: 朝脸颊延伸的舌状毛发部分。

HP:0012329.ENG_DEF: A vascular tumor of the skin and subcutaneous tissues and characterized by slow angiomatous proliferation.
HP:0012329.CNS_DEF: 皮肤和皮下组织的血管瘤，呈血管瘤样缓慢增生。

HP:0010616.CNS_DEF: 肺纤维瘤为一种良性的肿瘤，可表现为大块病变引起气道阻塞、咳嗽、咯血或没有症状的孤立性肺结节。

HP:0011262.CNS_DEF: 耳轮外表面凸面的线性环状切记。

HP:0000723.ENG_DEF: Behavior characterized by an abnormal limitation to few interests and activities.
HP:0000723.CNS_DEF: 行为特点是不正常的限制，仅有少量的兴趣和活动。

HP:0007372.CNS_NAME: 累及皮质脊髓束的萎缩/退化

Phases of REM sleep are characterized by desynchronized EEG patterns, increases in heart rate and blood pressure, sympathetic activation, and a profound loss of muscle tonus except for the eye and middle-ear muscles. There are then phases of rapid eye movements.
HP:0002494.CNS_DEF: REM睡眠异常。 REM睡眠阶段的特点是脑电图模式去同步化，心率增快、血压升高，交感神经激活，除了眼睛和中耳肌肉之外的其它肌张力明显消失。其后跟随快速眼球运动阶段。

HP:0002890.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `carcinoma` (MPATH:549) of the `thyroid gland` (FMA:9603).

HP:0010379.CNS_DEF: 的'第四toe`的指骨部分或完全复制（FMA:32901）。

HP:0008037.CNS_DEF: 没有正常的眼前节前房结构

HP:0010378.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 4th toe

HP:0012520.ENG_DEF: Increased dimensions of the Virchow-Robin spaces (also known as perivascular spaces), which surround the walls of vessels as they course from the subarachnoid space through the brain parenchyma. Perivascular spaces are commonly microscopic, and not visible on conventional neuroimaging. This term refers to an increase of size of these spaces such that they are visible on neuroimaging (usually magnetic resonance imaging). The dilatations are regular cavities that always contain a patent artery.
HP:0012520.CNS_DEF: Virchow-Robin spaces（又称为血管周围间隙）是指小血管从蛛网膜下腔发起时从脑实质穿过时在血管壁周围形成的腔隙。血管周围间隙多为显微镜下的，一般不能通过传统的神经影像学发现。这条术语是指这些腔隙变大可以从神经影像学上观察到（多为核磁共振），多为包含一条动脉的规则的空腔。

HP:0001667.CNS_DEF: 右心室的扩张。经常是由于肺动脉高压而引起心室质量的增加引起，也能导致心血管事件的发病率和死亡率增加。

HP:0012466.ENG_DEF: Longstanding impairment in ventilation such that the partial pressure of carbon dioxide (PaCO2) is elevated above the upper limit of the reference range (more than 45 mm Hg), with a normal or near-normal pH secondary to renal compensation and an elevated serum bicarbonate levels (more than30 mEq/L).
HP:0012466.CNS_DEF: 长期的通气损害，使二氧化碳的分压（PaCO2）升高超过参考范围（大于45毫米汞柱）的正常上限，继发于肾补偿和血清碳酸氢盐水平（高于30毫当量/升），pH值正常或接近正常。

HP:0006825.ENG_NAME: Pallor of dorsal columns of the spinal cord

HP:0009771.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009771.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the hand
HP:0009771.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the phalanges of the hand.
HP:0009771.CNS_DEF: 溶解或手的指骨骨骼组织的变性。

HP:0009127.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0009127.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the musculature of the limbs

HP:0006650.ENG_NAME: Thickening of the lateral border of the scapula

HP:0030758.ENG_DEF: A tooth abscess that occurs at the tip of the root (apex) of a tooth.

HP:0011295.ENG_DEF: EEG with sharp waves in the parietal region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.
HP:0011295.CNS_DEF: 脑电图在顶区的尖波，即时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。

HP:0004225.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004225.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004225.CNS_NAME: 小手指的末节指骨异常
HP:0004225.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the 5th (little) finger.

HP:0011553.ENG_DEF: Connection of the right atrium to the left ventricle and of the left atrium to the right ventricle in a biventricular heart.
HP:0011553.CNS_DEF: 双心室心脏中右心房连接左心室或左心房连接右心室。

HP:0010798.ENG_DEF: Increased focal pigmentation of the vermilion of the lips.
HP:0010798.CNS_DEF: 嘴唇唇红局部色素沉着增加。

HP:0040156.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0040156.ENG_DEF: An increased amount of carboxylic acid in the urine.

HP:0010391.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010391.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the phalanges of the 5th toe
HP:0010391.ENG_DEF: Partial or complete duplication of one or more `phalanx of little toe` (FMA:32902).
HP:0010391.CNS_DEF: 的小toe`的一个或多个`指骨部分或完全复制（FMA:32902）。

HP:0005598.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0005598.ENG_NAME: Facial telangiectasia in butterfly midface distribution
HP:0005598.CNS_NAME: 面部毛细血管蝶状扩张
HP:0005598.ENG_DEF: Telangiectases (small dilated blood vessels) located near the surface of the skin in a butterfly midface distribution.
HP:0005598.CNS_DEF: 面部皮肤毛细血管扩张呈蝶状分布（细小血管扩张）。

HP:0001747.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0001747.ENG_DEF: An accessory spleen is a round, iso-echogenic, homogenic and smooth structure and is seen as a normal variant mostly on the medial contour of the spleen, near the hilus or around the lower pole. This has no pathogenic relevance.
HP:0001747.CNS_DEF: 副脾为一个圆形的、等超声波回声的、均质的以及光滑的结构，被看作是一种正常变异，多数位于脾的内部轮廓，邻近门区或在肾下极周围。无致病相关性。

HP:0030230.ENG_NAME: Central core regions in muscle fibers
HP:0030230.CNS_NAME: 肌肉纤维中央轴空区域
HP:0030230.ENG_DEF: The presence of disorganized areas called cores in the center of muscle fibers. There is a typical appearance of the biopsy on light microscopy, where the muscle cells have cores that are devoid of mitochondria and specific enzymes. Cores are typically well demarcated and centrally located, but may occasionally be multiple and of eccentric.

HP:0009197.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009197.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009197.CNS_NAME: 小指的近节指骨支架样骨骺
HP:0009197.ENG_DEF: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009197.CNS_DEF: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0002322.ENG_DEF: A resting tremor occurs when muscles are at rest and becomes less noticeable or disappears when the affected muscles are moved. Resting tremors are often slow and coarse.
HP:0002322.CNS_DEF: 静止性震颤发生在肌肉静息时，当受累肌肉活动时变得很轻或消失，是缓慢的粗大的震颤。

HP:0100537.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;免疫系统的异常

HP:0011438.ENG_DEF: Matenal has been exposured  to  teratogenic substance for example drugs、 chemicals、 source of infection and other physical factors,during pregnancy,which  may cause fetal morphological abnormalities、neurological abnormalities or death.
HP:0011438.CNS_DEF: 孕期母体接触过可能对胎儿发育有影响的药物、化学制剂、感染源、物理因子等,可能会导致胎儿形体和/或神经系统发育异常，甚至死亡。

HP:0011972.ENG_DEF: Abnormally low glucose concentration content in the cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0011972.CNS_DEF: 脑脊液中葡萄糖浓度异常减低。

HP:0012272.ENG_DEF: The J wave is a positive convex deflection that occurs at the junction of the QRS complex and ST segment, the J-point.
HP:0012272.CNS_DEF: J波是发生在QRS波和ST段连接处的正凸偏转。

HP:0001362.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001362.ENG_DEF: A localized defect in the bone of the skull resulting from abnormal embryological development. The defect is covered by normal skin. In some cases, skull x-rays have shown underlying lytic bone lesions which have closed before the age of one year.
HP:0001362.CNS_DEF: 由胚胎期发育异常所导致的颅骨部分缺损。缺损的部位覆盖正常的皮肤。在某些病例，头颅的X射线表明潜在的溶骨性病变在一岁之前已停止。

HP:0007187.ENG_DEF: A congenital absence of the convolutions of the cerebral cortex and a poorly formed sylvian fissure that affects a particular part of the cortex.
HP:0007187.CNS_DEF: 大脑皮质卷积的先天性缺失和外侧裂形成不良，影响特定部分的大脑皮层。

HP:0010939.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010939.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `nasal bone` (FMA:52745), comprising the `left nasal bone` (FMA:53648) and the `right nasal bone` (FMA:53647).
HP:0010939.CNS_DEF: 鼻骨的异常，包括该`左鼻骨`和`有鼻骨`

HP:0011172.ENG_DEF: Febrile seizures with focal semiology, duration of more than 15 minutes, or occurring in a cluster of 2 or more convulsions within 24 hours.
HP:0011172.CNS_DEF: 有局灶性症状的高热惊厥，持续时间超过15分钟，或在24小时内连续惊厥发作2次以上。

HP:0009796.ENG_DEF: A branchial cyst is a remnant of embryonic development resulting from a failure of obliteration of a branchial cleft and consists of a subcutaneous cystic mass. Cysts are located anterior or posterior to the ear or in the submandibular region.
HP:0009796.CNS_DEF: 鳃裂囊肿是由鳃裂闭合不成导致的胚胎发育残余，包括皮下囊性包块。囊肿位于耳朵或颌下区的前后。

HP:0012047.ENG_DEF: A visual defect characterized by the inability to see as clearly in bright light as in dim light. The word hemeralopia literally means day blindness.
HP:0012047.CNS_DEF: 视觉缺陷的特点是光线明亮的地方视力下降，而夜间视力无影响，昼盲的字面意思白天盲。

HP:0100280.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0100280.ENG_DEF: A chronic granulomatous inflammatory disease of the intestines that may affect any part of the gastrointestinal tract from mouth to anus, causing a wide variety of symptoms. It primarily causes abdominal pain, diarrhea which may be bloody, vomiting, or weight loss, but may also cause complications outside of the gastrointestinal tract such as skin rashes, arthritis, inflammation of the eye, tiredness, and lack of concentration. Crohn's disease is thought to be an autoimmune disease, in which the body's immune system attacks the gastrointestinal tract, causing inflammation.
HP:0100280.CNS_DEF: 肠道的一种慢性肉芽肿炎症疾病，可能影响从口到肛门的消化道的任何部分，引起多种症状。该病主要引起腹痛、腹泻（可能便血）、呕吐或体重减轻，但也可能引起肠道外的并发症，如皮疹、关节炎、眼部炎症、疲倦、注意力不集中。克罗恩病被认为是一种自身免疫性疾病，个体的免疫系统攻击胃肠道，引起炎症。

HP:0000677.ENG_DEF: A developmental anomaly characterized by a `reduced number of` (PATO:0001999) teeth, whereby more than 6 teeth are missing.
HP:0000677.CNS_DEF: 以牙齿数目减少为特征的发育异常`（PATO:0001999），超过6颗牙齿缺失。

HP:0004823.ENG_DEF: A type of `poikilocytosis` (HP:0004447) characterized by the presence in the blood of erythrocytes of varying sizes and abnormal shapes.
HP:0004823.CNS_DEF: 一种红细胞形态多样性（HP:0004447），特点是存在不同大小和形状异常的红细胞。

HP:0100941.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100941.ENG_NAME: Sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the 4th toe

HP:0100543.ENG_DEF: Abnormality in the process of thought including the ability to process information.
HP:0100543.CNS_DEF: 思维加工过程异常，包括处理信息的能力。

HP:0010489.ENG_DEF: The absence of the major creases of the palm (distal transverse crease, proximal transverse crease, or thenar crease).
HP:0010489.CNS_DEF: 由于没有手掌的主要折痕的（远端横向折痕，近端横向折缝，或鱼际折痕）。

HP:0003637.CNS_NAME: 4-羟基苯丙酮酸双加氧酶活性降低'
HP:0003637.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction in `4-hydroxyphenylpyruvate dioxygenase activity` (GO:0003868).
HP:0003637.CNS_DEF: 在`4羟基苯基双加氧酶activity`异常减少（GO:0003868）。

HP:0001310.ENG_DEF: A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the inability to carry out movements with the correct range and motion across the plane of more than one joint related to incorrect estimation of the distances required for targeted movements.
HP:0001310.CNS_DEF: `共济失调`（HP:0001251）的一种，表现为因对完成目标动作需要的距离估计错误，导致不能在正确的范围内执行运动。

HP:0004962.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004962.ENG_DEF: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the `thoracic aorta` (FMA:3786).
HP:0004962.CNS_DEF: `胸总动脉发生钙盐病理沉积。

HP:0008330.CNS_NAME: 血管性血友病因子活性降低
HP:0008330.ENG_DEF: Decreased activity of `von Willebrand factor` (PR:000017364). Von Willebrand factor mediates the adhesion of platelets to the collagen exposed on endothelial cell surfaces.
HP:0008330.CNS_DEF: `血管性血友病因子`（PR:000017364）的活性减少。血管性血友病因子介导血小板对暴露于内皮细胞表面上的胶原蛋白的粘附。

HP:0000457.ENG_DEF: Lack of prominence of the nose resulting from a posteriorly-placed nasal ridge.
HP:0000457.CNS_DEF: 由鼻嵴凹陷导致的鼻子不突出。

HP:0008788.ENG_DEF: Delayed maturation and calcification of the pubic bone.
HP:0008788.CNS_DEF: 延迟成熟和耻骨的钙化。

HP:0010282.ENG_DEF: Height of the vermilion of the medial part of the lower lip more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently reduced height of the vermilion of the lower lip in the frontal view (subjective).
HP:0010282.CNS_DEF: 下唇中线唇红的高度小于平均值-2SD（标准差），或者，从正面看（主观），下唇唇红的高度明显变短。

HP:0009411.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009411.ENG_DEF: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009411.CNS_DEF: 托架骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有托架状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0006762.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0006762.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `carcinoma` (MPATH:549) in the `renal pelvis` (FMA:15575).

HP:0030865.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0030865.ENG_DEF: Abnormal increased size of the elbow joint.

HP:0002384.ENG_NAME: Focal seizures with impairment of consciousness or awareness
HP:0002384.CNS_NAME: 局灶性发作伴有意识障碍
HP:0002384.ENG_DEF: A `partial seizure` (HP:0007359) characterized by impairment or loss of consciousness.
HP:0002384.CNS_DEF: 表现为意识障碍或意识丧失的部分性发作（HP:0007359）。

HP:0002268.ENG_DEF: A form of dystonia characterized by episodes of dystonia (often hemidystonia or generalized) lasting from minutes to hours. There are no dystonic symptoms between episodes.
HP:0002268.CNS_DEF: 肌张力障碍的一种形式特征是肌张力障碍（通常hemidystonia或全身），从几分钟到几个小时持续发作。有发作之间没有肌张力障碍的症状。

HP:0011435.ENG_DEF: An abnormally low concentration of serum PAPP-A (pregnancy associated plasma protein A), as compared to normal values for gestational-age.
HP:0011435.CNS_DEF: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清PAPP-A浓度（妊娠相关血浆蛋白A）。

HP:0011484.ENG_NAME: Posterior synechiae of the anterior chamber
HP:0011484.ENG_DEF: Adhesions between the iris and the lens.
HP:0011484.CNS_DEF: 虹膜和透镜之间的粘连。

HP:0007371.ENG_DEF: The presence of atrophy (wasting) of the corpus callosum.

HP:0005035.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005035.ENG_NAME: Shortening of all phalanges of the toes
HP:0005035.ENG_DEF: Developmental hypoplasia (shortening) of all phalanges of the foot.
HP:0005035.CNS_DEF: 脚的所有指骨的发育发育不全（缩短）。

HP:0012634.ENG_DEF: Shedding of the pigment granules that normally adhere to the back of the iris into the aqueous humor.
HP:0012634.CNS_DEF: 脱落的色素颗粒进入房水。

HP:0005508.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0005508.ENG_DEF: A malignant monoclonal gammopathy characterized by a high level of an IgM monoclonal protein.
HP:0005508.CNS_DEF: 一种恶性单克隆丙种球蛋白病，特征为高水平的IgM 蛋白单克隆异常增高。

HP:0012000.ENG_DEF: EEG with generalized sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.
HP:0012000.CNS_DEF: 脑电图，广泛性时限小于80毫秒的短暂尖波。

HP:0100542.CNS_DEF: 肾脏位于不正常的部位。

HP:0006239.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006239.ENG_NAME: Shortening of all middle phalanges of the toes
HP:0006239.CNS_NAME: 脚趾所有中层指骨缩短
HP:0006239.ENG_DEF: Abnormal shortening of all middle phalanges of toes.
HP:0006239.CNS_DEF: 脚趾所有中间指骨异常缩短。

HP:0011596.ENG_NAME: Left aortic arch with right descending aorta and right ductus arteriosus
HP:0011596.CNS_NAME: 左位主动脉弓伴右位降主动脉及右动脉导管未闭
HP:0011596.ENG_DEF: The aortic arch is positioned on the left side of oesophagus and trachea, and continued behind oesophagus to form the descending aorta. The two parts are connected by the ductal ligament and form a ring, which may cause trachea or oesophagus compression symptoms.
HP:0011596.CNS_DEF: 主动脉弓位于食管和气管的左侧，绕经食管后方向脊柱右侧延续为降主动脉，经动脉导管连接形成血管环，产生对气管、食管的压迫症状。

HP:0003161.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003161.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of `(4-hydroxyphenyl)pyruvic acid` (CHEBI:15999) in the urine.
HP:0003161.CNS_DEF: 尿中4-羟基苯丙酮酸(CHEBI:15999)浓度升高。

HP:0012377.ENG_DEF: Partial or complete loss of vision in one half of the visual field of one or both eyes.
HP:0012377.CNS_DEF: 一只或两只眼睛的半边视野局部或全部的丧失。

HP:0010862.ENG_DEF: A type of `motor delay` (HP:0001270) characterized by an delay in acquiring the ability to control the fingers and hands.
HP:0010862.CNS_DEF: 以习得控制手指和手的能力延迟为特点的运动发育迟缓（HP:0001270）。

HP:0010888.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010888.ENG_DEF: Morbus Koehler is a `Juvenile aseptic necrosis` (HP:0100323) affecting the Os naviculare pedis.
HP:0010888.CNS_DEF: Morbus克勒是一个'少年无菌necrosis`（HP:0100323）影响O的舟骨足癣。

HP:0007854.CNS_DEF: 青光眼造成的视野缺损

HP:0001034.ENG_DEF: A hyperpigmented circumscribed area of change in normal skin color without elevation or depression of any size.
HP:0001034.CNS_DEF: 正常皮肤上发生的黑素沉着，不伴局部的隆起或凹陷。

HP:0009444.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009444.CNS_NAME: 第三手指指骨斑片状硬化
HP:0009444.ENG_DEF: Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the third finger.
HP:0009444.CNS_DEF: 不均匀的（不规则）的增加在一个第三手指的指骨的或更多的骨密度。

HP:0002862.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0002862.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `carcinoma` (MPATH:549) of the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900).

HP:0007215.ENG_DEF: Episodes of muscle weakness associated with elevated levels of potassium in the blood.
HP:0007215.CNS_DEF: 与血液中钾离子水平升高相关的发作性肌无力

HP:0000857.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0000857.CNS_NAME: 新生儿胰岛素依赖型糖尿病

HP:0100548.ENG_DEF: Eversion of a hollow organ and exposure, inside out, and protruded through the abdominal wall.
HP:0100548.CNS_DEF: 中空器官的外翻和暴露，里面翻到外面，并穿过腹壁伸出。

HP:0005037.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005037.ENG_DEF: An abnormal osseous union (fusion) between the proximal portions of the radius and the ulna.
HP:0005037.CNS_DEF: 半径和尺骨的近端部分之间的不正常的骨愈合（融合）。

HP:0011404.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011404.ENG_DEF: A type of `disproportionate short stature` (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs that is lethal at birth.
HP:0011404.CNS_DEF: A型'不相称的短stature`（HP:0003498），特点是短躯干，但一个中等大小的四肢是致命的出生。

HP:0012812.ENG_DEF: Increased bulk of tissue alongside the nose. The fullness can be caused by both bony and soft tissues.
HP:0012812.CNS_DEF: 鼻子周围大块组织的增大。骨骼或软组织均可造成这种丰满。

HP:0030375.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030375.CNS_NAME: 记忆 B 细胞计数增加
HP:0030375.ENG_DEF: An elevation above the normal count in the circulation of memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+). Memory B cells develop from naive B cells. Upon antigen rechallenge, memory B cells rapidly expand and differentiate into plasma cells under the cognate control of memory Th cells (Phase IV).

HP:0003562.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003562.ENG_DEF: Abnormal metaphyseal vascular invasion means the irregular intrusion of vasculars in metaphyeal bone.
HP:0003562.CNS_DEF: 干骺端异常的血管侵入是指在干骺端血管不规则的生长。

HP:0000158.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0000158.ENG_DEF: Increased length and width of the tongue.
HP:0000158.CNS_DEF: 舌头的长度和宽度增加。

HP:0002353.ENG_DEF: Abnormality observed by electroencephalogram (EEG), which is used to record of the brain's spontaneous electrical activity from multiple electrodes placed on the scalp.
HP:0002353.CNS_DEF: 通过头皮电极记录大脑的自发电活动的脑电图（EEG）观察到的异常。

HP:0008341.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0008341.ENG_DEF: A type of renal tubular acidosis characterized by a failure of acid secretion by the alpha intercalated cells of the cortical collecting duct of the distal nephron. The urine cannot be acidified below a pH of 5.3, associated with acidemia and hypokalemia.

HP:0011426.ENG_DEF: Fetal choroid plexus cysts (CPCs) are sonographically discrete, small cysts (3 mm or more) found in the choroid plexus within the lateral cerebral ventricles of the developing fetus at 14 to 24 weeks gestation. Imaging of the choroid plexus is performed in the transverse plane of the fetal head at the same level that the lateral cerebral ventricle is evaluated. The choroid plexus should be inspected bilaterally for the presence of cysts. The size of CPCs is not of clinical relevance (pmid:16100637).
HP:0011426.CNS_DEF: 胎脉络丛囊肿（每次点击成本）是超声离散的，小囊肿（3mm以上）的脉络丛中发现的发育中的胎儿的侧脑室内，在14至24周妊娠。在胎头的横向平面，该侧脑室被评估相同的水平进行的脉络丛的成像。脉络丛应双边检查是否包囊的存在。每次点击费用的大小是临床相关（PMID:16100637）不。

HP:0000557.ENG_DEF: Buphthalmos refers to a congenital open-angle glaucoma of the eye. HP:0030666.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0030666.ENG_DEF: In wound repair, neovascularization (NV) involves the sprouting of new vessels from pre-existent vessels to repair or replace damaged vessels. In the retina, NV is a response to ischemia. The NV adheres to the inner surface of the retina and outer surface of the vitreous. NV are deficient in tight junctions and hence leak plasma into surrounding tissue including the vitreous. Plasma causes the vitreous gel to degenerate, contract, and eventually collapse which pulls on the retina. Since retinal NV is adherent to both retina and vitreous, as the vitreous contracts the NV may be sheared resulting in vitreous hemorrhage or the NV may remain intact and pull the retina with the vitreous resulting in retinal elevation referred to as traction retinal detachment.

HP:0007976.ENG_DEF: Cerulean cataracts are a kind of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) having peripheral bluish and white opacifications in concentric layers with occasional central lesions arranged radially. Although the opacities may be observed during fetal development and childhood, usually visual acuity is only mildly reduced until adulthood, when lens extraction is generally necessary.
HP:0007976.CNS_DEF: 蔚蓝白内障是一种'先天性白内障`（HP:0000519），晶状体周边部存在蓝色和白色不透明区，呈放射状排列。虽然混浊可发生于胎儿发育和儿童期，通常不影响视力，成年后如果影响视力，当行晶状体摘除。

HP:0009576.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009576.ENG_DEF: Absence of the middle phalanx of the index (2nd) finger.
HP:0009576.CNS_DEF: 缺席的索引（2日）手指中节指骨。

HP:0005305.ENG_DEF: Formation of a blood clot (thrombus) inside a cerebral vein, causing the obstruction of blood flow.
HP:0005305.CNS_DEF: 脑静脉内形成血凝块（血栓），引起血流的阻塞。

HP:0012602.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012602.ENG_DEF: High urine chloride in the presence of hypochloridemia.
HP:0012602.CNS_DEF: 尿液中氯化物浓度高，发生低氯血症。

HP:0007943.ENG_DEF: A form of `stapes ankylosis` (===HP:0000381===) with congenital onset.
HP:0007943.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性发病的“镫骨硬化”(===HP:0000381===)形式。

HP:0011170.ENG_DEF: Seizures with sudden loss or diminution of muscle tone with a preceding myoclonic or tonic event lasting one to two seconds or more, involving head, trunk, jaw or limb musculature.
HP:0011170.CNS_DEF: 癫痫发作突然丢失或肌张力的缩小与前面的肌阵挛或强直性事件一至两秒以上，涉及头部，躯干，下颌或肢体肌肉组织。

HP:0030085.ENG_DEF: Abnormal concentration of lactate in the cerebrospinal fluid.

HP:0006174.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006174.ENG_DEF: Increase in bone denisty in the diaphyseal (shaft) region of a metacarpal bone.
HP:0006174.CNS_DEF: 增加骨denisty在掌骨的骨干（轴）的区域。

HP:0005605.ENG_NAME: Large cafe-au-lait macules with irregular margins
HP:0005605.CNS_NAME: 边缘不规则的较大咖啡牛奶斑
HP:0005605.ENG_DEF: Large hypermelanotic macules with jagged borders.
HP:0005605.CNS_DEF: 锯齿状边缘的较大色素沉着斑。

HP:0030460.ENG_NAME: Abnormal timing of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials
HP:0030460.CNS_NAME: 图形翻转视觉诱发电位时机异常

HP:0005773.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005773.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of both forearm bones, the ulna and the radius, resulting in a shortened forearm.
HP:0005773.CNS_DEF: 不发达两个前臂骨，尺骨和半径，从而缩短前臂。

HP:0003909.CNS_NAME: 骨皮质骨膜下再吸收（肱骨干骺端）

HP:0009389.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009389.ENG_DEF: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis.
HP:0009389.CNS_DEF: 一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。

HP:0001473.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001385.ENG_DEF: The presence of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `hip` (FMA:24964).

HP:0006755.CNS_DEF: 皮肤来源的平滑肌肉瘤。

HP:0100563.ENG_DEF: Coexistence of two hemicords, at variable levels, causing splaying of the posterior vertebral elements. Results in neurological deficits in lower limb or perineum.
HP:0100563.CNS_DEF: 由于脊髓发育畸形，在不同水平分裂为左右两部分共存，引起脊椎后部张开。导致下肢或会阴部神经功能缺损。

HP:0011311.ENG_DEF: Extension of the proximal transverse crease (five finger crease) to the ulnar edge of the palm.
HP:0011311.CNS_DEF: 近端横纹（五指折痕）外延到手掌尺侧缘。

HP:0002690.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002690.ENG_DEF: An abnormal enlargement of the `sella turcica` (FMA:54709).

HP:0000322.ENG_DEF: Distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border more than 2 SD below the mean. Alternatively, an apparently decreased distance between nasal base and midline upper lip vermilion border.
HP:0000322.CNS_DEF: 鼻基与上唇中线红唇的距离低于平均值超过2个标准偏差，或者，鼻基和上唇中线唇红之间的距离显得缩短。

HP:0030007.ENG_DEF: These are spontaneous firing action potentials stimulated by needle movement of an injured muscle fiber. There is propagation to, but not past, the needle tip. This inhibits the display of the negative deflection of the waveform.

HP:0004349.ENG_DEF: A reduction of bone mineral density, that is, of the amount of matter per cubic centimeter of bones.
HP:0004349.CNS_DEF: 的降低骨密度，即物质的每骨头立方厘米的量的，。

HP:0012600.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012600.CNS_NAME: 尿液中氯离子浓度异常
HP:0012600.ENG_DEF: An abnormal concentration of `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0012600.CNS_DEF: 尿液中氯离子浓度的超出正常范围。

HP:0040186.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0004762.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment or incomplete development of right ventricle.

HP:0010362.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010362.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more phalanges of the third toe.
HP:0010362.CNS_DEF: 从第三趾的一个或多个指骨正常直形式的偏差。

HP:0004207.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004207.ENG_DEF: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone of 5th fingers.
HP:0004207.CNS_DEF: 小手指的异常结构和形态。

HP:0004283.ENG_DEF: For children from birth to 4 years of age, the palm width is more than 2 SD below the mean; for children from 4 to 16 years of age the palm width is below the 5th centile; or, the width of the palm appears disproportionately narrow for its length.
HP:0004283.CNS_DEF: 对于从出生到4岁的儿童，手掌宽度大于2 SD低于平均值;从4至16岁儿童的手掌宽度低于第5百分位;或者，手掌的宽度出现不成比例的窄的它的长度。

HP:0002586.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0005556.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005556.ENG_DEF: The frontal suture divides the two halves of the frontal bone of the skull in infants and children and generally undergoes fusion by the age of six. A persistent frontal suture is referred to as a "metopic suture".
HP:0005556.CNS_DEF: 前额缝把婴儿和儿童头骨的额骨平分为两部分。这两半一般到六岁完全融合。持久性前额缝隙被称为“额骨缝”。

HP:0011861.ENG_DEF: Both lungs have three lobes. Normally, the left lung has two lobes, whereas the right lung has three lobes.
HP:0011861.CNS_DEF: 两肺有三个肺叶。通常情况下，左肺有两个肺叶，而右边肺部有三个肺叶。

HP:0003760.CNS_NAME: 扣击引起的快速滚动的肌肉收缩（PIRC）

HP:0030088.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0030088.ENG_DEF: An elevated circulating testosterone level in the blood.

HP:0011200.ENG_NAME: EEG with generalized polymorphic epileptiform discharges
HP:0011200.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，伴广泛性多态癫痫样放电
HP:0011200.ENG_DEF: Generalized epileptiform discharges of different shapes and frequencies.
HP:0011200.CNS_DEF: 不同形状和频率的广泛性癫痫样放电。

HP:0002850.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0002850.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased level of immunoglobulin IgM in blood.
HP:0002850.CNS_DEF: 免疫球蛋白的IgM在血液异常降低。

HP:0007588.ENG_DEF: Increased pigmentation of the skin with a netlike (reticular) pattern.
HP:0007588.CNS_DEF: 色素沉着过度增加且呈网状（网状）分布。

HP:0100519.ENG_DEF: Absence of urine, clinically classified as below 50ml/day.
HP:0100519.CNS_DEF: 临床上把尿量小于50毫升/天定义为无尿。

HP:0003903.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012036.ENG_DEF: Wasting of the `sternocleidomastoid muscle` (FMA:13407), the muscle in the anterior part of the neck that acts to flex and rotate the head.
HP:0012036.CNS_DEF: 胸锁乳突肌失用，是控制头部活动旋转的颈前肌。

HP:0008922.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008922.CNS_NAME: 儿童期发病的躯干短小性矮小
HP:0008922.ENG_DEF: A type of `disproportionate short stature` (HP:0003498) characterized by a short trunk but a average-sized limbs with onset in childhood.
HP:0008922.CNS_DEF: A型'不相称的短stature`（HP:0003498），特点是短躯干，但一个中等大小的肢体发生在童年。

HP:0000855.ENG_DEF: `Increased resistance` (PATO:0001650) towards `insulin` (PRO:000009054), that is, diminished effectiveness of insulin in reducing blood glucose levels.
HP:0000855.CNS_DEF: `增加resistance`（PATO:0001650）朝向`insulin`（PRO:000009054），即，胰岛素在降低血糖水平减少的效果。

HP:0009813.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009813.ENG_DEF: Missing or malformed long bones of the upper limbs with the distal parts (the hands) connected to the variably shortened or even absent upper extremity, leading to a flipper-like appearance, as opposed to other forms of limb malformations were either the whole limb is missing (such as amelia), or the distal part of a limb is absent (peromelia).
HP:0009813.CNS_DEF: 上肢的长骨缺失或畸形，手连接到缩短甚至阙如的手臂残端，外观似海豹的鳍，这与其他形式的肢体畸形不同，那些畸形要么整个肢体缺失（无肢），或一肢远端部分缺如（四肢不全）。

HP:0003534.CNS_NAME: 黄嘌呤脱氢酶活性降低
HP:0003534.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction in `xanthine dehydrogenase activity` (GO:0004854).
HP:0003534.CNS_DEF: 在`黄嘌呤脱氢酶activity`异常减少（GO:0004854）。

HP:0030096.CNS_NAME: 肌肉纤维肌营养不良蛋白表达异常
HP:0030096.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal in the amount of dystrophin in muscle fiber tissue. Dystrophin is located at the muscle sarcolemma in a membrane-spanning protein complex that connects the cytoskeleton to the basal lamina.

HP:0100158.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100158.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100158.CNS_NAME: 第三趾近节趾骨支架样骨骺

HP:0006955.CNS_NAME: 橄榄桥脑小脑发育不全
HP:0006955.ENG_DEF: Hypoplasia of the cerebellum, pontine nuclei, and inferior olivary nucleus.
HP:0006955.CNS_DEF: 小脑，脑桥核，下橄榄核的发育不全

HP:0000114.ENG_DEF: Dysfunction of the proximal tubule, which is the portion of the duct system of the nephron of the kidney which leads from Bowman's capsule to the loop of Henle.
HP:0000114.CNS_DEF: 近端肾小管功能障碍，近端肾小管是从肾小囊到细尿管袢（汉勒氏袢）的肾单位的部分管道系统。

HP:0012126.ENG_DEF: A cancer arising in any part of the stomach.
HP:0012126.CNS_DEF: 发生于胃任何部位的癌症。

HP:0030847.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the jugular venous pressure. The internal jugular veins, being continuous with the superior vena cava, provide a visible measure of the degree to which the systemic venous reservoir is filled. The vertical height above the right atrium to which they are distended and above which they are in a collapsed state provides an imperfect reflection of the right atrial pressure.

HP:0200084.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0000430.ENG_DEF: Thinned, deficient, or excessively arched `ala nasi` (FMA:59519).
HP:0000430.CNS_DEF: 鼻翼较薄、缺如或过度高拱

HP:0007165.ENG_DEF: A form of gray matter heterotopia were the mislocalized gray matter is typically located periventricularly, also sometimes called subependymal heterotopia. Periventricular means beside the ventricles. This is by far the most common location for heterotopia. Subependymal heterotopia present in a wide array of variations. There can be a small single node or a large number of nodes, can exist on either or both sides of the brain at any point along the higher ventricle margins, can be small or large, single or multiple, and can form a small node or a large wavy or curved mass.

HP:0009467.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009467.ENG_DEF: Displacement of the 2nd finger towards the radial side.
HP:0009467.CNS_DEF: 排量向桡侧的第二手指。

HP:0009609.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009609.ENG_DEF: Partail or complete duplication of the `first metacarpal bone` (FMA:23899).
HP:0009609.CNS_DEF: Partail或`第一掌骨bone`的完全复制（FMA:23899）。

HP:0012256.ENG_DEF: Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated outside of the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.
HP:0012256.CNS_DEF: 呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。

HP:0012637.CNS_DEF: 尿液钙浓度高，发生低钙血症。

HP:0010690.ENG_DEF: `Mirror image duplication of digits` (HP:0010689) affecting the hands only.
HP:0010690.CNS_DEF: 镜像复制digits`的`（HP:0010689），受影响的只是手中。

HP:0003850.ENG_NAME: Irregular metaphyses of the upper limbs

HP:0002872.ENG_NAME: Apneic episodes precipitated by illness, fatigue, stress
HP:0002872.CNS_NAME: 因疾病、疲劳、紧张而导致的呼吸暂停发作
HP:0002872.ENG_DEF: Recurrent episodes of apnea that are precipitated by factors such as illness, fatigue, or stress.
HP:0002872.CNS_DEF: 由疾病、疲劳或紧张导致的呼吸暂停反复发作。

HP:0010654.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect characterized by `aplasia` (MPATH:58) of the `Falx cerebri` (FMA:83967).
HP:0010654.CNS_DEF: 一种发育缺陷以大脑镰(FMA:83967)的发育缺陷为特征。

HP:0004232.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004232.ENG_DEF: The presence of more than the normal number of carpal bones.
HP:0004232.CNS_DEF: 超过腕骨的正常数量的存在。

HP:0000545.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of refraction characterized by the ability to see objects nearby clearly, while objects in the distance appear blurry.
HP:0000545.CNS_DEF: 屈光异常的一种，特征是看近处物体清楚，而在远处的对象出现模糊。

HP:0004059.ENG_DEF: Wrist is bent inward toward the thumb because of a congenital defect associated with shortening or absence of the radius.
HP:0004059.CNS_DEF: 由于有缩短或缺席半径相关联的先天性缺陷手腕向内弯向拇指。

HP:0011220.ENG_DEF: Forward prominence of the entire forehead, due to protrusion of the frontal bone.
HP:0011220.CNS_DEF: 由于额骨凸起导致整个前额的向前突出。

HP:0005897.CNS_NAME: 严重的泛发性骨质疏松症

HP:0003363.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;心血管系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0003363.ENG_DEF: A left-right reversal (or "mirror reflection") of the anatomical location of the `viscera of the abdomen` (FMA:259123).
HP:0003363.CNS_DEF: 腹部脏器解剖位置左右反转（或镜面反射）。

HP:0003835.ENG_DEF: A partial dislocation of the shoulder joint.
