HP:0010488.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the palmar creases.
HP:0010488.CNS_DEF: 缺席或手掌折痕的不发达。

HP:0100540.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0100540.ENG_DEF: Edema in the region of the `eyelids` (FMA:75178).

HP:0001962.ENG_DEF: A sensation that the heart is pounding or racing, which is a non-specific sign but may be a manifestation of arrhythmia.
HP:0001962.CNS_DEF: 心脏在砰砰地跳或竞态的感觉，这是一种非特异性体征，但可能是心律失常的一种表现。

HP:0030370.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030370.CNS_NAME: 初始 B 细胞计数异常
HP:0030370.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal of the count of naive B cells (CD19+/CD27-/IgD+/IgM+). Naive B cells represent one of the subtypes of B cells in the peripheral blood, and are B cells that have not been exposed to antigen.

HP:0003834.ENG_DEF: A displacement or misalignment of the humerus with respect to the other bones of the should joint. Note that a subluxation is a partial dislocation.
HP:0003834.CNS_DEF: 甲位移或肱骨错位相对于其它骨的应联合。注意，半脱位是一个局部错位。

HP:0011511.ENG_DEF: Splitting of the retina in the macular region.

HP:0000193.ENG_DEF: `Uvula` (FMA:55022) separated into two parts most easily seen at the tip.
HP:0000193.CNS_DEF: 悬雍垂分裂成两部分，最容易在尖端看到

HP:0004955.ENG_DEF: Abnormal tortuous (i.e., twisted) form of arteries affecting most or all arteries.
HP:0004955.CNS_DEF: 全身大部分或全部动脉血管发生扭曲。

HP:0005539.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005539.CNS_NAME: T细胞慢性淋巴细胞淋巴瘤/白血病

HP:0100096.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100096.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100096.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾近节趾骨骨骺异常

HP:0012362.ENG_NAME: Abnormal sialylation of O-linked protein glycosylation
HP:0012362.CNS_NAME: O-联蛋白糖基的唾液酸化异常
HP:0012362.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the addition of sialic acids to O-linked glycans.
HP:0012362.CNS_DEF: 唾液酸添加到O联聚糖的一种异常。

HP:0012011.ENG_NAME: EEG with occipital focal spike waves
HP:0012011.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，伴枕部局灶棘慢波
HP:0012011.ENG_DEF: EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the occipital region, i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.
HP:0012011.CNS_DEF: 脑电图，枕部局灶短暂棘慢波，即，时限小于80毫秒的局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。

HP:0000232.ENG_DEF: An abnormal configuration of the `lower lip` (FMA:59818) such that it is turned outward i.e., `everted` (PATO:0001597), with the Inner aspect of the lower lip vermilion (normally opposing the teeth) being visible in a frontal view.
HP:0000232.CNS_DEF: 下唇异常外翻，即从正面可见下唇唇红的内部（通常与牙齿相对）。

HP:0009645.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009645.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defect of the distal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009645.CNS_NAME: 拇指末节指骨溶骨性缺陷
HP:0009645.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the distal phalanx of the thumb.
HP:0009645.CNS_DEF: 解散或拇指末节指骨骨组织的退化。

HP:0010582.ENG_DEF: An alteration of the normally smooth contour of the epiphysis leading to an irregular appearance.
HP:0010582.CNS_DEF: 导致不规则外观骨骺的通常光滑轮廓的改变。

HP:0007802.ENG_DEF: The presence of central, fine, whitish granular lesions in the stroma of the cornea. This type of corneal dystrophy is usually asymptomatic and begins in childhood and shows a slow progression. Later in the course, the corneal epithelium and Bowman's layer may be affected. Histologically, the cornea shows a uniform deposition of hyaline material.
HP:0007802.CNS_DEF: 角膜的基质中央出现的细小，白浊粒状病变。这种类型的角膜营养不良的通常是无症状的，并且开始于儿童期，常伴有缓慢的进展。随着病变进展，角膜上皮和鲍曼氏层可能会受到影响。组织学上，角膜显示透明材料的均匀沉积。

HP:0000927.ENG_DEF: The bones of the skeleton undergo a series of characteristic changes in size, shape, and calcification from fetal life until puberty. An abnormality of this process can include delayed or accelerated skeletal maturation, or deviation of some, but not all bones from the expected patterns of maturation.
HP:0000927.CNS_DEF: 自胎儿至青春期，骨架的骨头的大小、形状和钙化发生一系列特征性改变。这个过程中的异常包括骨骼成熟的延迟或加速，或一些偏差，但不是所有骨头都会这样，发生成熟的预期模式的改变。

HP:0006927.ENG_DEF: Excessive number of small gyri (convolutions) on the surface of one side of the brain.
HP:0006927.CNS_DEF: 一侧大脑表面过多的小脑回（肠曲）。

HP:0010709.ENG_DEF: 2-4 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 2nd to 4th finger.
HP:0010709.CNS_DEF: 第二至四手指融合型并指。

HP:0007115.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0007874.ENG_DEF: A shape created by an acute downward arching of the upper eyelid and upward arching of the lower eyelid, toward the medial canthus, which gives the outline of the palpebral fissures the configuration of an almond. Thus, the maximum distance between the fissures is offset from, and medial to, the center point.
HP:0007874.CNS_DEF: 上眼睑呈向下的拱形，下眼睑呈向上的拱形，偏向内侧眼角，这使眼睑的裂开轮廓呈一种杏仁形状。因此，裂缝间的最大距离是从中心点偏移至靠内侧。

HP:0010843.ENG_DEF: Focal (localized) slow activity reflects focal dysfunction, not diffuse dysfunction (i.e., encephalopathy).
HP:0010843.CNS_DEF: 局灶（局部）慢活动反映局灶脑功能障碍，而不是弥散脑功能障碍（即脑病）。

HP:0040098.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;耳朵的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0007592.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplastia of the eccrine sweat glands
HP:0007592.CNS_NAME: 外分泌汗腺发育缺陷/不全
HP:0007592.ENG_DEF: Absence or developmental hypoplasia of the `eccrine sweat glands` (FMA:59154).
HP:0007592.CNS_DEF: 外分泌汗腺的缺失或者发育不全。

HP:0012062.ENG_DEF: A fluid filled cavity that develops with a bone.
HP:0012062.CNS_DEF: 一个充满液体的腔体与骨的发展。

HP:0005147.ENG_DEF: Bidirectional ventricular ectopy is a single form ventricular tachycardia，which appears two opposite forms of QRS waves in the seem lead and occurs in order.
HP:0005147.CNS_DEF: 双向心室异位是一种单形性室性心动过速，发作时同一导联出现两种形态相反的QRS波并按顺序交替出现。

HP:0010716.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010716.CNS_NAME: 第三至第五脚趾指畸形
HP:0010716.ENG_DEF: 3-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 3rd to 5th toe.
HP:0010716.CNS_DEF: 第三至五脚趾融合型并趾。

HP:0011920.MAIN_CLASS: 呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0011920.ENG_DEF: A type of pleural effusion with a transudate (extravascular fluid with low protein content and a low specific gravity). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.
HP:0011920.CNS_DEF: 漏出性胸腔积液（具有低蛋白含量和低比重特点）。根据light标准，可将胸腔积液分为漏出液和渗出液，符合以下一项或多项为渗出液:（1）胸水蛋白与血清蛋白的比率大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）与血清LDH比率大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于三分之二的正常血清LDH的上限。

HP:0012557.ENG_NAME: EEG with centrotemporal focal spike waves
HP:0012557.CNS_NAME: 脑电图伴中央颞区棘波
HP:0012557.ENG_DEF: EEG with focal sharp transient waves in the centrotemporal region of the brain (also known as the central sulcus), i.e., focal sharp waves of a duration less than 80 msec followed by a slow wave.
HP:0012557.CNS_DEF: 脑电图局灶短暂尖波位于大脑中央颞区（也称为中央沟），即，持续时间小于80毫秒的尖波（随后紧随慢波）。

HP:0008169.ENG_DEF: Reduced activity of `coagulation factor VII` (PR:000007301   ). Factor VII is part of the extrinsic coagulation pathway, which is initiated at the site of injury in response to the release of tissue factor (fIII). Tissue factor and activated factor VII catalyze the activation of factor X.
HP:0008169.CNS_DEF: `凝血因子VII`（PR:000007301）的活性减少。 Ⅶ因子是在外源性凝血途径中起作用，外源性凝血途径起源于损伤部位组织因子（FIII）的释放。组织因子和活化的因子VII一起催化因子X的活化

HP:0009313.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009313.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009313.CNS_NAME: 第四手指的近节指骨的斑片状硬化
HP:0009313.ENG_DEF: Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the proximal phalanx of the fourth finger.
HP:0009313.CNS_DEF: 不均匀的（不规则）增加无名指的近节指骨骨密度。

HP:0009597.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009597.ENG_NAME: Short proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009597.ENG_DEF: Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `proximal phalanx of the second finger` (FMA:23919).
HP:0009597.CNS_DEF: 第二finger`（:23919 FMA）的`近节指骨发育不全（先天性减小尺寸）。

HP:0010100.CNS_NAME: 脚拇趾趾骨的完全重复
HP:0010100.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of one or more `phalanx of big toe` (FMA:32884).
HP:0010100.CNS_DEF: 大toe`的一个或多个`指骨完全重复（FMA:32884）。

HP:0007443.CNS_NAME: 白点病；斑驳病；斑状白斑病；斑状白癜风；斑状白化病；
HP:0007443.ENG_DEF: Absence of melanin pigment in various areas, which is found at birth and is permanent. The lesions are known as leucoderma and are often found on the face, trunk, or limbs.
HP:0007443.CNS_DEF: 呈不同部位的黑素缺失，常见于面部、躯干和四肢。出生时即有，不会自行消退，皮损类白癜风样改变。

HP:0002415.ENG_DEF: Leukodystrophy refers to deterioration of white matter of the brain resulting from degeneration of myelin sheaths in the CNS. Their basic defect is directly related to the synthesis and maintenance of myelin membranes.
HP:0002415.CNS_DEF: 脑白质营养不良是指源于中枢神经系统髓鞘变性的脑白质退变。它们的基本缺陷与髓鞘膜的合成和维持直接相关。

HP:0009898.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;耳朵的异常
HP:0009898.ENG_DEF: Developmental hypoplasia of the `crus of the helix (FMA:61024). That is, flatter and/or shorter crus helix than average.
HP:0009898.CNS_DEF: “耳轮脚”(FMA:61024)的发育不全，即，较平均水平而言，耳轮脚变平及/或变短。

HP:0005688.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005688.ENG_NAME: Dysplastic distal thumb phalanges with a central hole
HP:0005688.CNS_NAME: 伴有中心孔的远端拇指指骨发育不良

HP:0010410.ENG_NAME: Symphalangism affecting the middle phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010410.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的中节趾关节粘连

HP:0030913.ENG_NAME: Exaggerated rugosity of the labia majora
HP:0030913.ENG_DEF: Marked rugae formation of the skin of the labia majora.

HP:0001421.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0001421.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the musculature of the hand

HP:0010481.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal membrane obstructing the `urethra` (FMA:19667).
HP:0010481.CNS_DEF: 尿道内形成异常膜阻碍尿流。

HP:0010942.MAIN_CLASS: 胎儿发育或出生异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0010942.ENG_DEF: A finding of a focus of increased echogenicity upon prenatal ultrasound examination of the fetus. The foci may be present in one or both ventricles. Echogenic intracardiac focus (EICF) is defined as a focus of echogenicity comparable to bone, in the region of the papillary muscle in either or both ventricles of the fetal heart.
HP:0010942.CNS_DEF: 心室强光点是因产前超声检查关注于胎儿超声回声增强而发现的。强光点可出现在一个或两个心室内。心室强光点是指胎儿心室内的、与邻近肋骨回声相似的超声现象，这种回声光点一般出现于一个或两个心室的乳突肌内。

HP:0011989.ENG_DEF: Formation of abnormal bony tissue within `ligament` (FMA:30319) tissue.
HP:0011989.CNS_DEF: 形成`ligament`内异常的骨组织（FMA:30319）的组织。

HP:0003427.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0012468.ENG_DEF: Longstanding abnormal acid accumulation or depletion of base.
HP:0012468.CNS_DEF: 长期不正常的酸堆积或碱消耗。

HP:0000123.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0004814.CNS_NAME: 蚕豆引起的溶血性贫血
HP:0004814.ENG_DEF: A kind of `hemolytic anemia` (HP:0001878) that is induced by the ingestion of fava beans.
HP:0004814.CNS_DEF: 溶血性溶血（HP:0001878）的一种类型，是有蚕豆摄入诱发。

HP:0012127.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of `uracil` (CHEBI:17568)  in the urine.
HP:0012127.CNS_DEF: 尿液中:增加`uracil`（17568 CHEBI）的浓度。

HP:0040239.ENG_NAME: Increased plasma vitamin K epoxide after vitamin K supplementation
HP:0040239.CNS_NAME: 补充维生素K后，血浆维生素K环氧化物增加
HP:0040239.ENG_DEF: Increased plasma vitamin K epoxide after vitamin K supplementation is present in VKCFD (vitamin K-dependent clotting factor deficiency) type 2, but not in VKCFD type 1.

HP:0012255.ENG_NAME: Dynein arm defect of motile cilia
HP:0012255.CNS_NAME: 能动纤毛动力蛋白臂缺陷
HP:0012255.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the dynein arms of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.
HP:0012255.CNS_DEF: 可动纤毛的动力蛋白臂异常，该特征常用电子显微镜评估。

HP:0030821.ENG_DEF: Lower eyelid partly covered by skin when eyes are open.

HP:0030413.ENG_NAME: Squamous cell carcinoma of the tongue
HP:0030413.ENG_DEF: A carcinoma derived from a squamous epithelial cell of the tongue.

HP:0008007.CNS_DEF: 先天遗传性青光眼，出生后即出现

HP:0010085.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010085.CNS_NAME: 脚拇趾近节趾骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0030396.ENG_DEF: Platelets are replete with secretory granules, which are critical to normal platelet function. Among the three types of platelet secretory granules - alpha-granules, dense granules, and lysosomes - the alpha-granule is the most abundant. Granule contents must be released from their intracellular repository in order to achieve their physiologic function, and this term refers to a functional defect in granule secretion.

HP:3000044.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:3000044.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of frontal process of maxilla
HP:3000044.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a frontal process of the maxilla bone.

HP:0000934.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000934.ENG_DEF: Radiographic evidence of articular calcification that represent calcium pyrophosphate depositions in soft tissue surrounding joints and at the insertions of tendons near joints (Entheses/Sharpey fibers) .
HP:0000934.CNS_DEF: 关节钙化的影像学证据表明，代表软组织周围的关节和肌腱处近关节（附着点/ Sharpey纤维结构）的插入焦磷酸钙沉积。

HP:0410015.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of ganglion of peripheral nervous system
HP:0410015.CNS_NAME: 外周神经系统中的神经节异常
HP:0410015.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of nerve cell cluster or a group of nerve cell bodies located in the peripheral autonomic nervous system.

HP:0030871.ENG_DEF: Osteoarthritis of facet joints in the spine. Degeneration of cartilage in the facet joints results in bone rubbing on bone and reactive new bone formation visible on X-ray.

HP:0011160.ENG_DEF: Auras with taste sensations including acidic, bitter, salty , sweet or metallic tastes.
HP:0011160.CNS_DEF: 味觉的先兆，包括酸，苦，咸，甜或金属的味道。

HP:0100070.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100070.ENG_NAME: Fragmentation of the epiphyses of the 4th toe

HP:0011657.ENG_NAME: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011657.CNS_NAME: 右室双出口肺动脉瓣下室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄
HP:0011657.ENG_DEF: Double outlet right ventricle with subpulmonary ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011657.CNS_DEF: 右室双出口肺动脉瓣下室间隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄。肺动脉下室间隔缺损（subpulmonary ventricular septal defect）:右心室双出口伴有肺动脉下室间隔缺损又称Taussig-Bing心脏畸形（Taussig-Bing malformation）。右心室双出口中占20%～30%，多为两大动脉并列，占73%。在此心脏畸形中，均有漏斗隔对位异常。室间隔缺损位于室间隔前上方。如有肺动脉下圆锥，圆锥肌肉构成室间隔缺损上缘，其后下缘可延伸至三尖瓣环；如无肺动脉下圆锥，则缺损侧位于肺动脉瓣环下方。根据肺动脉横跨程度，缺损后上缘为肺动脉瓣与二尖瓣或三尖瓣纤维连续或肺动脉瓣环，其后下缘为肌肉室间隔。

HP:3000015.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000015.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a risorius muscle.

HP:0000605.ENG_DEF: A supranuclear gaze palsy is an inability to look in a particular direction as a result of cerebral impairment. There is a loss of the voluntary aspect of eye movements, but, as the brainstem is still intact, all the reflex conjugate eye movements are normal.
HP:0000605.CNS_DEF: 核上性凝视麻痹是一个无法看在一个特定方向上的脑损伤的结果。有眼球运动的自愿性方面的损失，但是，由于脑干仍然完好，所有的反射共轭眼球运动正常。

HP:0003384.ENG_DEF: Atrophic changes of `axons` (FMA:67308) of the peripheral nervous system.
HP:0003384.CNS_DEF: 外周神经系统的神经轴突萎缩

HP:0011213.ENG_NAME: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade III
HP:0011213.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，光阵发性反应III级
HP:0011213.ENG_DEF: Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital, central, temporal and parietal regions during photic stimulation.
HP:0011213.CNS_DEF: 闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕区、中央区、颞区和顶区。

HP:0008935.CNS_NAME: 广泛新生儿肌张力低下
HP:0008935.ENG_DEF: Muscular hypotonia (abnormally low muscle tone) manifesting in the neonatal period and affecting the entire musculature.
HP:0008935.CNS_DEF: 肌张力减退（异常低肌张力）表现在新生儿期和影响整个肌肉组织。

HP:0011923.ENG_NAME: Decreased activity of mitochondrial complex I
HP:0011923.CNS_NAME: 线粒体复合物I活性降低
HP:0011923.ENG_DEF: A reduction in the activity of the `mitochondrial respiratory chain complex I` (GO:0005747), which is part of the electron transport chain in mitochondria.
HP:0011923.CNS_DEF: 在`线粒体呼吸链复合物I`的活性的降低（GO:0005747），这是在线粒体中的电子传递链的一部分。

HP:0100933.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100933.ENG_NAME: Sclerosis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th toe

HP:0005831.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012704.ENG_DEF: An increase in size of the anatomic space between the arachnoid membrane and pia mater.
HP:0012704.CNS_DEF: 蛛网膜和软脑膜之间解剖间隙扩大。

HP:0001635.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormality of cardiac function that is responsible for the failure of the heart to pump blood at a rate that is commensurate with the needs of the tissues or a state in which abnormally elevated filling pressures are required for the heart to do so. Heart failure is frequently related to a defect in myocardial contraction.
HP:0001635.CNS_DEF: 心脏组织或压力的异常升高迫使心脏泵血功能缺陷，导致功能异常。心脏衰竭与在心肌收缩缺陷有关。

HP:0009003.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0009003.CNS_NAME: 躯干皮下脂肪组织增加
HP:0009003.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormally increased amount of subcutaneous adipose tissue in the trunk of the body.
HP:0009003.CNS_DEF: 躯干皮下脂肪组织的量发生异常增加。

HP:0010322.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010322.ENG_DEF: Any abnormal structure or form of the 5th toe.
HP:0010322.CNS_DEF: 小脚趾的异常结构或形态。

HP:0011125.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the melanosomes, i.e., of the cellular organelles in which melanin pigments are synthesized and stored within melanocytes (the cells that produce pigment in the dermis).
HP:0011125.CNS_DEF: 黑素小体异常，例如，合成并贮存黑色素的黑素细胞器中的黑素小体异常（该黑素细胞在真皮产生黑色素）。

HP:0010830.ENG_DEF: A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation). This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.
HP:0010830.CNS_DEF: 触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。

HP:0002099.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0002099.ENG_DEF: Asthma is characterized by increased responsiveness of the tracheobronchial tree to multiple stimuli, leading to narrowing of the air passages with resultant dyspnea, cough, and wheezing.
HP:0002099.CNS_DEF: 哮喘的特征在于，气管支气管树因多种应激因素导致气道狭窄，引起了呼吸困难、咳嗽、喘息。

HP:0100644.ENG_DEF: Brown or black discoloration  of the `nails` (FMA:54326).
HP:0100644.CNS_DEF: 甲出现褐色或黑色甲线。

HP:0025034.ENG_NAME: Abnormal morphology of erythroid progenitor cell
HP:0025034.ENG_DEF: Abnormal form of the progenitor cells committed to the erythroid lineage.

HP:0005462.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005462.ENG_DEF: The presence of `calcium deposition` (MPATH:36) in the `falx cerebri` (FMA:83967).

HP:0001831.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001831.ENG_DEF: A `toe` (FMA:25046) that appears disproportionately short compared to the foot.
HP:0001831.CNS_DEF: 一个`toe`（FMA:25046）相比，足部出现不成比例的短。

HP:0012566.CNS_NAME: 桡骨过早外延干骺端融合
HP:0012566.ENG_DEF: Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the radius, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.
HP:0012566.CNS_DEF: 在骺板的透明软骨板在干骺端在一个或多个长骨的半径中，生长停止在一个比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。

HP:0008020.CNS_DEF: 逐渐发生的视锥细胞变性

HP:0012891.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0012891.ENG_DEF: Hair on the neck extends less inferiorly than usual.
HP:0012891.CNS_DEF: 脖子上方的头发没有通常延伸得低。

HP:0010886.ENG_DEF: A joint disorder caused by blood deprivation in the subchondral bone causing the subchondral bone to die in a process called avascular necrosis. The bone is then reabsorbed by the body, leaving the articular cartilage it supported prone to damage. The result is fragmentation (dissection) of both cartilage and bone, and the free movement of these osteochondral fragments within the joint space, causing pain and further damage.
HP:0010886.CNS_DEF: 联合障碍软骨下骨致气血匮乏引起软骨下骨死在一个称为股骨头缺血性坏死的过程。骨然后由身体再吸收，而使关节软骨它支持容易损坏。其结果是既软骨和骨，且这些骨软骨碎片的关节间隙内的自由运动，引起疼痛和进一步的损害的碎片（夹层）。

HP:0009222.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009222.ENG_NAME: Small epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009222.CNS_NAME: 无名指中节指骨小骨骺
HP:0009222.ENG_DEF: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0009222.CNS_DEF: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于无名指的中间指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。

HP:0000743.ENG_DEF: Primitive reflexes traditionally held to be a sign of disorders that affect the frontal lobes.
HP:0000743.CNS_DEF: 出现原始反射，是额叶受损的征象。

HP:0002249.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0002249.ENG_DEF: The passage of blackish, tarry feces associated with gastrointestinal hemorrhage. Melena occurs if the blood remains in the colon long enough for it to be broken down by colonic bacteria. One degradation product, hematin, imbues the stool with a blackish color. Thus, melena generally occurs with bleeding from the upper gastrointestinal tract (e.g., sotmach ulcers or duodenal ulcers), since the blood usually remains in the gut for a longer period of time than with lower gastrointestinal bleeding.
HP:0002249.CNS_DEF: 与消化道出血相关的黑色、柏油样粪便的排泄。如果血在结肠停留的时间够长，足以使结肠细菌将其降解而产生黑便。一种降解产物，血红素，浸染粪便使其呈黑色。因此，黑便通常伴随上消化道出血（例如，胃溃疡或十二指肠溃疡），其血液通常在肠道的停留时间较下消化道出血更长。

HP:0010909.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `arginine metabolic process` (GO:0006525).

HP:0100381.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100381.ENG_NAME: Absent middle phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100381.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾中节指骨缺失
HP:0100381.ENG_DEF: Developmental aplasia of the `middle phalanx of third toe` (FMA:32624).
HP:0100381.CNS_DEF: 第三toe`的`中节指骨的发育再生障碍性贫血（FMA:32624）。

HP:0012456.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012456.ENG_DEF: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the tunica media of arteries.
HP:0012456.CNS_DEF: `Calcification`（PATO:0001447），也就是，钙盐在动脉中膜的病理沉积。

HP:0000873.ENG_DEF: A state of excessive water intake and hypotonic (dilute) polyuria. Diabetes insipidus may be due to failure of vasopressin (AVP) release (central or neurogenic diabetes insipidus) or to a failure of the kidney to respond to AVP (nephrogenic diabetes insipidus).
HP:0000873.CNS_DEF: 一种过量饮水伴多尿，低渗尿（稀释性）的状态。尿崩症可能是由于血管加压素（AVP）分泌缺陷（中枢或神经性尿崩症）或肾脏对AVP的反应缺陷（肾性尿崩症）。

HP:0011542.ENG_NAME: Criss-cross atrioventricular valves with superior-inferior ventricles
HP:0011542.CNS_NAME: 十字形房室瓣伴上下排列心室
HP:0011542.ENG_DEF: Criss-cross atrioventricular valves occurs with superior-inferior ventricles.
HP:0011542.CNS_DEF: 伴随上下心室排列的十字型房室瓣。

HP:0011988.ENG_DEF: Formation of abnormal bony tissue within `tendon` (FMA:9721) tissue.

HP:0001520.ENG_DEF: The term large for gestational age applies to babies whose birth weight lies above the 90th percentile for that gestational age.
HP:0001520.CNS_DEF: 大于胎龄儿指婴儿出生时体重大于该孕龄体重90百分位以上。

HP:0011145.ENG_DEF: A seizure that occurs in the context of a brain insult (systemic, toxic, or metabolic) and may not recur when the underlying cause has been removed or the acute phase has elapsed.
HP:0011145.CNS_DEF: 在脑损伤（全身，有毒，或代谢）的基础上发生的癫痫发作，当去除潜在的病因或急性期过去后可能不会再发。

HP:0011773.ENG_DEF: Enlargement of the thyroid gland related to a singular nodule in the thyroid gland.
HP:0011773.CNS_DEF: 只有一个结节的甲状腺肿大。

HP:0004268.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004268.ENG_NAME: Osteoarthritis of the small joints of the hand
HP:0004268.CNS_NAME: 手的小关节的骨关节炎

HP:0002289.ENG_DEF: Loss of all hair on the entire body.

HP:0100162.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100162.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100162.CNS_NAME: 第三趾近节趾骨骨骺不规则

HP:0008797.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008797.ENG_NAME: Early ossification of capital femoral epiphyses
HP:0008797.CNS_NAME: 早发性股骨头骨骺骨化
HP:0008797.ENG_DEF: Developmental acceleration of ossification of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).
HP:0008797.CNS_DEF: 该femur`的`近端骨骺骨化的发展加速（FMA:32841）。

HP:0002847.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0002847.ENG_DEF: Impaired production of memory cells, the B-cells that persist for years or an entire lifetime and which confer rapid and enhanced response to secondary challenge.
HP:0002847.CNS_DEF: 记忆细胞生成受损，具有记忆功能的B细胞可以在体内持续存在数年或整个寿命，当第二次遇到相同抗原时，可以快速和增效反应。

HP:0003202.ENG_DEF: The presence of skeletal muscular atrophy (which is also known as amyotrophy).
HP:0003202.CNS_DEF: 骨骼肌肉萎缩（也称肌萎缩）。

HP:0011827.ENG_DEF: Absence of the usual parallel position of philtral ridges.
HP:0011827.CNS_DEF: 人中脊偏离正常平行位置。

HP:0012509.CNS_NAME: 甲状腺素结合球蛋白减少
HP:0012509.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased amount of thyroxin-binding globulin (TBG) in blood. TBG is responsible for carrying the thyroid hormones thyroxine (T4) and 3,5,3'-triiodothyronine (T3) in the bloodstream.
HP:0012509.CNS_DEF: 一个异常降低的数额甲状腺素结合球蛋白（TBG）的血液。 TBG负责执行甲状腺激素甲状腺素（T4）和3,5,3'碘甲状腺原氨酸（T3）在血流中。

HP:0012689.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0012689.CNS_NAME: 松果体褪黑素分泌异常
HP:0012689.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the amount or timing of melatonin secretion by the pineal gland. Note that melatonin is also synthesized by multiple tissues outside of the pineal gland.
HP:0012689.CNS_DEF: 松果体分泌的褪黑素的数量或时机的异常。注意，褪黑素也由除松果体外的多个组织合成。

HP:0008596.CNS_NAME: 学语后感音神经性听力损失
HP:0008596.ENG_DEF: A form of `sensorineural hearing impairment` (===HP:0000407===) with onset after the acquisition of speech.
HP:0008596.CNS_DEF: 发病年龄在学会语言后的一种感音神经性听力损失（===HP:0000407===）。

HP:0003352.ENG_NAME: Endopolyploidy on chromosome studies of bone marrow
HP:0003352.CNS_NAME: 骨髓染色体的核内多倍性检查
HP:0003352.ENG_DEF: An increase in the number of chromosome sets per cell in bone marrow cells.
HP:0003352.CNS_DEF: 在骨髓细胞每细胞中染色体的数目增加设置。

HP:0004607.ENG_NAME: Anterior beaking of lower thoracic vertebrae
HP:0004607.CNS_NAME: 下部胸椎前缘鸟喙样凸出
HP:0004607.ENG_DEF: Anterior tongue-like protrusions of the lower thoracic vertebral bodies.
HP:0004607.CNS_DEF: 下胸椎椎体前舌状突出。

HP:0012750.ENG_DEF: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire brainstem.
HP:0012750.CNS_DEF: 脑干在磁共振成像（MIR）上T2信号较暗比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个脑干的弥漫低信号。

HP:0005535.ENG_DEF: A form of `hemolytic anemia` (HP:0001878) that can be triggered by exertion.
HP:0005535.CNS_DEF: 溶血性贫血的`一种形式（HP:0001878），可以通过运动来触发。

HP:0012604.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012604.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased sodium concentration in the urine.
HP:0012604.CNS_DEF: 尿液中纳离子浓度的降低。

HP:0002970.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002970.ENG_DEF: A positional abnormality marked by outward bowing of the legs in which the knees stay wide apart when a person stands with the feet and ankles together.
HP:0002970.CNS_DEF: 标志向外弯曲在膝盖留的很开，当一个人的脚和脚踝站在一起的腿的位置异常。

HP:0100731.ENG_DEF: A horizontal cleft of the face, varying from slight widening of the mouth, to a cleft extending to the ear.
HP:0100731.CNS_DEF: 面部的水平裂口，可从轻微的口角裂扩大延伸至耳部。

HP:0012801.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012801.ENG_DEF: Bigonial distance (lower facial width) more than 2 standard deviations below the mean (objective); or an apparently decreased width of the lower jaw (mandible) when viewed from the front (subjective).
HP:0012801.CNS_DEF: 下颌角间距离（脸下部宽度）低于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）;或下巴（颌骨）的宽度从正面看显得减小（主观）。

HP:0006887.ENG_DEF: The term progressive intellectual disability should be used if intelligence decreases/deteriorates over time.
HP:0006887.CNS_DEF: 如果智力随着时间推移而下降/衰退，应使用进行性智力残疾的术语。

HP:0003099.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003099.ENG_DEF: Relatively increased growth of the fibula compared to that of the tibia.
HP:0003099.CNS_DEF: 相比，在胫骨的相对增加的腓骨的生长。

HP:0009991.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009991.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009991.CNS_NAME: 小手指的末节指骨的完全重复
HP:0009991.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of little finger` (FMA:23949).
HP:0009991.CNS_DEF: 小finger`的`末节指骨完全复制（FMA:23949）。

HP:0000011.ENG_DEF: An inability to completely empty the `urinary bladder` (FMA:15900) during the process of `urination` (GO:0060073) owing to a neurological condition.
HP:0000011.CNS_DEF: 由于神经系统疾患导致排尿过程中无法完全排空膀胱。

HP:0000786.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0004913.CNS_DEF: 一个`间歇性（非连续）`（PATO:0000690）形式的'乳酸acidemia`（HP:0003128）。

HP:0007370.CNS_NAME: 胼胝体发育缺陷/发育不全
HP:0007370.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the `corpus callosum` (FMA:86464).
HP:0007370.CNS_DEF: 胼胝体的缺席或不发育（FMA:86464）。

HP:0030748.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0030748.CNS_NAME: 早产儿脑室内出血 I 级
HP:0030748.ENG_DEF: Intraventricular hemorrhage that occurs in a preterm infant and that is restricted to subependymal region/germline matrix which is seen in the caudothalamic groove.

HP:0011637.ENG_NAME: Anomalous origin of coronary artery from the pulmonary artery
HP:0011637.CNS_NAME: 冠状动脉异常起源于肺动脉
HP:0011637.ENG_DEF: A coronary artery begins (branches off from) the pulmonary artery rather than as normal from the root of the aorta.
HP:0011637.CNS_DEF: 冠状动脉起源于肺动脉而不是主动脉根部。

HP:0010052.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010052.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010052.ENG_DEF: In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the big toe is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metatarsal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0010052.CNS_DEF: 与第二至五趾骨的近端趾骨不同，大脚趾的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其它趾骨的中间趾骨，而第一跖骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他脚趾的近端趾骨。

HP:0006772.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0006772.ENG_DEF: A benign renal neoplasm composed of fat, vascular, and smooth muscle elements.
HP:0006772.CNS_DEF: 一种良性的肾肿瘤，由脂肪、血管和平滑肌组成。

HP:0007023.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0007023.ENG_DEF: Cerebral hemorrhage that occurs before birth.

HP:0010651.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `Meninges` (FMA:231572), including any abnormality of the `Dura mater` (FMA:9592), the `Arachnoid mater` (FMA:9591), and the `Pia mater` (FMA:9590).
HP:0010651.CNS_DEF: 在`脑膜`的异常（FMA:231572），包括`杜拉mater`的任何异常（FMA:9592）:`蛛网膜mater`（FMA:9591），和`Pia mater`（FMA:9590） 。

HP:0009979.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009979.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009979.CNS_NAME: 无名指中节指骨的完全重复
HP:0009979.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of ring finger` (FMA:23935).
HP:0009979.CNS_DEF: 环finger`（:23935 FMA）的'中节指骨的完全重复。

HP:0010421.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010421.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010421.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾末节趾骨重复
HP:0010421.ENG_DEF: Partial or complete duplication of the `distal phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32628).
HP:0010421.CNS_DEF: 第二toe`的`末节指骨部分或完全复制（FMA:32628）。

HP:0001822.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001822.ENG_DEF: Lateral deviation of the great toe (i.e., in the direction of the little toe).
HP:0001822.CNS_DEF: 拇趾的横向偏差（即，在小趾方向）。

HP:0000215.ENG_DEF: Height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the midline more than 2 SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased height of the vermilion of the upper lip in the frontal view (subjective).
HP:0000215.CNS_DEF: 上唇中线唇红的高度大于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，从正面看下唇唇红的高度显得增加（主观）。

HP:0001319.ENG_DEF: Muscular hypotonia (abnormally low muscle tone) manifesting in the neonatal period.
HP:0001319.CNS_DEF: 肌张力减退（异常低肌张力）发生在新生儿期。

HP:0011419.ENG_DEF: Placental abruption is a serious condition in which the separation of the placenta from its site of implatation after 20 weeks of gestain or during the delivery before birth
HP:0011419.CNS_DEF: 胎盘早剥是指妊娠20周后或分娩期，正常位置的胎盘在胎儿娩出前从子宫壁剥离，是一种妊娠期重症。

HP:0004298.ENG_DEF: The presence of any abnormality affecting the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054).

HP:0002904.ENG_DEF: An increased amount of `bilirubin` (CHEBI:16990) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0012546.CNS_NAME: 母亲X染色体偏向性失活
HP:0012546.ENG_DEF: A deviation from equal (50%) inactivation of each parental X chromosome in maternal cells.
HP:0012546.CNS_DEF: 女性细胞中两条X染色体的其中之一失去活性的现象。

HP:0003025.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003025.ENG_DEF: Irregularity of the normally smooth surface of the metaphyses.
HP:0003025.CNS_DEF: 不规则的干骺端的正常光滑表面。

HP:0001349.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0001349.ENG_DEF: Facial diplegia refers to bilateral facial palsy (bilateral facial palsy is much rarer than unilateral facial palsy).
HP:0001349.CNS_DEF: 双侧面瘫指双侧面部神经麻痹（双侧面部麻痹比单侧面部麻痹更罕见许多）。

HP:0100558.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100558.ENG_DEF: Unilateral atrophy (reduction in size) of an arm.
HP:0100558.CNS_DEF: 单方面萎缩的臂的（减小的大小）。

HP:0040201.ENG_DEF: A subset of motor impersistence, defined as the inability to perform more than two of the simple voluntary acts simultaneously, such as closing the eyes and protruding the tongue.

HP:0002745.ENG_DEF: A white patch on the oral mucosa that cannot be rubbed off.
HP:0002745.CNS_DEF: 在口腔黏膜无法擦去的白斑。

HP:0012766.ENG_DEF: An increase in size of the anatomic space between the arachnoid membrane and pia mater in the region surrounding the cerebrum.
HP:0012766.CNS_DEF: 围绕大脑的蛛网膜和软脑膜之间的解剖学间隙扩大。

HP:0000647.ENG_DEF: A congenital anomaly in which a part or the whole of the cornea acquires the characteristics of sclera, resulting in clouding of the cornea.
HP:0000647.CNS_DEF: 先天性异常，其中部分或全部的角膜获得巩膜的特性，从而导致角膜混浊。

HP:0100411.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100411.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100411.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾中节趾骨的完全重复
HP:0100411.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of `middle phalanx of fourth toe` (FMA:32625).
HP:0100411.CNS_DEF: 的'第四toe`的中节指骨完全复制（FMA:32625）。

HP:0012667.ENG_NAME: Regional left ventricular wall motion abnormality
HP:0012667.CNS_NAME: 区域性左室壁运动异常
HP:0012667.ENG_DEF: An abnormal motion of a segment of the left ventricle during the cardiac cycle.
HP:0012667.CNS_DEF: 部分左心室在心动周期中的异常运动。

HP:0006638.ENG_DEF: Developmental defect resulting in congenital absence of the middle portion of the clavicle.
HP:0006638.CNS_DEF: 发育缺陷导致先天性无锁骨的中间部分的。

HP:0009104.CNS_NAME: 耻骨发育不全或发育低下
HP:0009104.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the pubic bone.

HP:0012816.ENG_DEF: A predominantly right ventricular variant of isolated noncompaction cardiomyopathy.
HP:0012816.CNS_DEF: 心肌病致密化不全主要发生在右心室。

HP:0100156.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100156.ENG_NAME: Triangular epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100156.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾的中节趾骨三角形骨骺

HP:0012066.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of `disaccharide` (CHEBI:36233) in the urine.
HP:0012066.CNS_DEF: 尿液中:增加`disaccharide`（36233 CHEBI）的浓度。

HP:0030154.ENG_DEF: Rupture of the wall of the gallbladder.

HP:0030894.CNS_NAME: 对短效肺血管扩张剂反应不足

In essence, mesangiolysis is an injurious process which affects the glomerular mesangium without causing obvious damage to the capillary basement membranes. The matrix swells, loosens, and eventually dissolves; the mesangial cells may show only edema and vacuolization, or may undergo severe degeneration and necrosis.

HP:0011540.CNS_NAME: 先天性矫正型大动脉转位
HP:0011540.ENG_DEF: The essence of the lesion is the combination of discordant atrioventricular and ventriculo-arterial connections. Thus, the morphologically right atrium is connected to a morphologically left ventricle across the mitral valve, with the left ventricle then connected to the pulmonary trunk. The morphologically left atrium is connected to the morphologically right ventricle across the tricuspid valve, with the morphologically right ventricle connected to the aorta.
HP:0011540.CNS_DEF: 病变的本质为房室以及房室动脉的连接不协调。因此，形态学右心房跨二尖瓣连接到形态左心室，然后左心室连接到肺动脉。形态学左心房跨三尖瓣连接到形态右心室，形态右心室连接到主动脉。

Columnar epithelium refers to a cell type that is typically found in more distal parts of the gastrointestinal system.
HP:0100580.CNS_DEF: 食管下部细胞的一种异常改变（组织转化）。食管的正常鳞状上皮层被化生的柱状上皮层取代。柱状上皮是指一种通常被发现于胃肠系统更远端部分细胞类型。

HP:0100885.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0100885.ENG_DEF: Persistence of the embryonic dorsal or sciatic vein system that normally should have involuted around the tenth to twelfth week of intrauterine life.
HP:0100885.CNS_DEF: 胚胎脊部或坐骨静脉系统持久性存在，正常情况下应该在胚胎发育第十周至第十二周退化。

HP:0001302.ENG_DEF: A congenital abnormality of the cerebral hemisphere chacterized by unusually thick gyrations (convolutions) of the cerebral cortex.
HP:0001302.CNS_DEF: 一种表现为大脑半球皮层脑回异常增厚的一种先天性畸形

HP:0012885.ENG_DEF: The presence of a supernumerary Fallopian tube.

HP:0004272.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003338.ENG_NAME: Focal necrosis of right ventricular muscle cells
HP:0003338.CNS_NAME: 右心室肌细胞局灶性坏死
HP:0003338.ENG_DEF: Focal necrosis of right ventricular muscle cells
HP:0003338.CNS_DEF: 右心室肌细胞局灶性坏死

HP:0008265.CNS_NAME: 线粒体赖氨酸转运缺陷

HP:0100817.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0100817.ENG_DEF: The presence of `hypertension` (HP:0000822) related to stenosis of the `renal artery` (FMA:14751).
HP:0100817.CNS_DEF: 与肾动脉狭窄相关的高血压。

HP:0010745.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010745.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the phalanges of the toes
HP:0010745.ENG_DEF: Absence of a digit or of one or more phalanges of a toe.
HP:0010745.CNS_DEF: 缺席的趾的一个或多个指骨一个数字或。

HP:0011478.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;头或颈部的异常
HP:0011478.ENG_DEF: Absence of globe, optic nerve, chiasm and optic tracts.  No evidence of ocular tissue on MRI scan or examination.
HP:0011478.CNS_DEF: 无眼球、视神经、视交叉及视束。 MRI扫描或体格检查眼部无内容物。

HP:0003160.ENG_NAME: Abnormal isoelectric focusing of serum transferrin
HP:0003160.CNS_NAME: 血清转铁蛋白的等电位聚焦异常
HP:0003160.ENG_DEF: Glycosylated transferrin concentrations can be measured in serum as a marker of N-linked glycosylation fidelity. In the traditional nomenclature for congenital disorders of glycosylation, absence of entire glycans was designated type I, and loss of one or more monosaccharides as type II. These terms are retained for historical reasons but for new annotations the precise glycosylation defect should be recorded.
HP:0003160.CNS_DEF: 糖基化转铁蛋白的浓度可作为N联糖基化保真度的标记物在血清中检测。在先天性糖基化缺陷病的传统命名法中，整个聚糖的缺失被命名为I型，一个或多个单糖的缺失被命名为II型。这些术语因历史原因被保留，但应记录新的注释作为对糖基化缺陷的精确注解。

HP:0011672.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;心血管系统的异常
HP:0011672.ENG_DEF: A myxoma (tumor of primitive connective tissue) of the heart. Cardiac myxomas consist of stellate to plump, cytologically bland mesenchymal cells set in a myxoid stroma. Cardiac myxomas are of endocardial origina and general project from the endocardium into a cardiac chamber.
HP:0011672.CNS_DEF: 心脏的粘液瘤（原生结缔组织肿瘤）。心脏粘液瘤由存在于粘液样基质中的星形、丰满的、表面光滑的细胞构成。心脏粘液瘤是由心内膜起源，由心内膜扩散到心腔。

HP:0008114.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008114.ENG_DEF: Osteosclerosis of the endosteal surface of the diaphyses (shafts) of the metatarsal bones.
HP:0008114.CNS_DEF: 骨硬化跖骨的diaphyses（轴）的内膜表面。

HP:0000935.ENG_DEF: Abnormal thickening of the cortex of long bones.
HP:0000935.CNS_DEF: 长骨的骨皮质异常增厚。

HP:3000068.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000068.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a lateral pterygoid muscle.

HP:0006490.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006490.ENG_DEF: Any Abnormal structure or form of the growing part of a long bone between the diaphysis and the epiphysis in legs.
HP:0006490.CNS_DEF: 下肢干骺端部位的结构异常。

HP:0008264.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0008264.ENG_DEF: The presence of intraceullar inclusion bodies (aggregates of stainable substances, usually proteins)  in neutrophils. Cytoplasmic neutrophil inclusions (oval, basophilic) are also known as Doehle bodies.
HP:0008264.CNS_DEF: 中性粒细胞细胞内存在包涵体（可染色的物质，通常为蛋白聚集体）。嗜中性粒细胞细胞质内含物（椭圆形，嗜碱性）也被称为Doehle小体。

HP:0010749.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0010749.ENG_DEF: Blepharochalasis is characterized by recurrent, non-painful, nonerythematous episodes of eyelid edema. It has been divided into hypertrophic and atrophic forms. In the hypertrophic form recurrent edema results in orbital fat herniation through a weakened orbital septum. Most patients who have blepharochalasis present in an atrophic condition with atrophy of redundant eyelid skin and superior nasal fat pads.
HP:0010749.CNS_DEF: 眼皮松弛的特征是复发性、非疼痛、非红肿的眼睑水肿发作。它被分成肥厚型和萎缩型。肥厚型反复水肿导致眼眶脂肪疝压迫穿透弱化的眶隔。大多数萎缩型眼皮松弛患者有萎缩的冗余眼睑皮肤和上鼻脂肪垫。

HP:0009537.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009537.ENG_DEF: Chronic loss of joint motion in the 2nd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue. The term camptodactyly of the 2nd finger is used if the distal and/or proximal interphalangeal joints are affected.
HP:0009537.CNS_DEF: 关节运动的第二手指的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。所述第二手指的术语camptodactyly用于如果远端和/或近端指间关节受到影响。

HP:0010522.ENG_DEF: A learning disorder characterized primarily by difficulties in learning to read and spell. Dyslectic children also exhibit a tendency to read words from right to left and to confuse letters such as b and d whose orientation is important for their identification. Children with dyslexia appear to be impaired in phonemic skills (the ability to associate visual symbols with the sounds they represent).
HP:0010522.CNS_DEF: 学习障碍的一种类型，主要表现为阅读和拼写困难。失读症的儿童还存在从右向左阅读单词的倾向，比如b和d的正确识别取决于阅读方向。并且可能存在音位能力受损（将视觉符号和其所代表的声音联系起来的能力）。

HP:0009293.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009293.ENG_NAME: Broad middle phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009293.ENG_DEF: Increased width of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.
HP:0009293.CNS_DEF: 增加的宽度第四手指中节指骨。

HP:0000778.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常

HP:0009463.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009463.ENG_DEF: Displacement of the 3rd finger towards the ulnar side (i.e., towards the ring finger).
HP:0009463.CNS_DEF: 中指向尺侧（即朝无名指）方向歪斜。

HP:0001278.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0001278.ENG_DEF: A form of hypotension characterized by a sudden fall in blood pressure that occurs when a person assumes a standing position.
HP:0001278.CNS_DEF: 当一个人变换为站立的位置时突然出现血压下降的一种低血压。

HP:0000325.ENG_DEF: Facial contour, as viewed from the front, triangular in shape, with breadth at the temples and tapering to a narrow chin.
HP:0000325.CNS_DEF: 从正面看，面部轮廓呈三角形，两侧太阳穴处较宽，下巴窄小。

HP:0030711.ENG_DEF: Distention of the vagina caused by accumulation of fluid due to congenital vaginal obstruction.

HP:0430022.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0430022.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the sphenoid sinus, one of the mucosa-lined, normally air-filled paranasal sinuses of the bones of the skull. The sphenoid sinus is located within the sphenoid bone.

HP:0003908.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0040248.CNS_NAME: 降低纤溶酶原激活物抑制剂1活性
HP:0040248.ENG_DEF: Reduced activity of plasminogen activator inhibitor 1. This protein down-regulates fibrinolysis in the circulation by inhibiting the two major plasminogen activators: tissue-plasminogen activator and urokinase-plasminogen activator.

HP:0002781.ENG_DEF: Increased resistance to the passage of air in the upper airway.
HP:0002781.CNS_DEF: 气体经过上气道的阻力增加。

HP:0008684.ENG_DEF: Absence or developmental hypoplasia of the `uterus` (FMA:17558).
HP:0008684.CNS_DEF: 子宫不发育或发育低下。

HP:0010089.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010089.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010089.CNS_NAME: 脚拇趾近节趾骨溶骨性缺陷

HP:0010095.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010095.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010095.CNS_NAME: 脚拇趾近节趾骨部分重复
HP:0010095.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of the `proximal phalanx of big toe` (FMA:43252).
HP:0010095.CNS_DEF: 大toe`的`近节指骨部分重复（FMA:43252）。

HP:0010239.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010239.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the middle phalanx of the hand
HP:0010239.CNS_NAME: 手的中间指骨发育不全
HP:0010239.ENG_DEF: Absence of one or more middle phalanx of a finger.
HP:0010239.CNS_DEF: 缺席的手指的一个或多个中间指骨。

HP:0030811.ENG_DEF: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the tongue.

HP:0003113.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.
HP:0003113.CNS_DEF: 一个异常降低`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。

HP:0000795.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `urethra` (FMA:19667), i.e., of the tube which connects the urinary bladder to the outside of the body.
HP:0000795.CNS_DEF: 尿道（将尿液从膀胱排到体外的管道）的异常。

HP:0006462.ENG_DEF: A generalized decrease in bone mineral density.

HP:0008061.CNS_DEF: 视网膜发育缺陷或缺如

HP:0005335.CNS_DEF: 面部表情看起来很疲倦。

HP:0012572.ENG_DEF: A complete duplication of the ureter such that the duplicated ureters with separate insertions into the bladder.
HP:0012572.CNS_DEF: 输尿管完全是双份，具有独立通道进入膀胱。

HP:0002105.ENG_DEF: Coughing up (expectoration) of blood or blood-streaked sputum from the larynx, trachea, bronchi, or lungs.
HP:0002105.CNS_DEF: 从喉、气管支气管或肺部咳出血或血丝痰。

HP:0030017.ENG_DEF: Recurrent or persistent involuntary spasms of the musculature of the outer third of the vagina that interferes with vaginal penetration, and which causes personal distress.

HP:0011599.ENG_DEF: Mesocardia is a abnormal location of the heart in which the heart is in a midline position and the longitudinal axis of the heart lies in the mid-sagittal plane.
HP:0011599.CNS_DEF: 中位心是一种心脏位置异常，心脏位于身体中线位置且心脏的纵轴位于正中矢状面。

HP:0011841.ENG_DEF: A potentially lethal cardiac arrhythmia characterized by an extremely rapid, hemodynamically unstable ventricular tachycardia (150-300 beats/min) with a large oscillating sine-wave appearance.
HP:0011841.CNS_DEF: 一种潜在的致命性心律失常具有血液动力学不稳定、极其迅速的室性心动过速（150〜300次/分）并（在心电图上）出现大振荡正弦波的特点。

HP:0001876.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction in numbers of all blood cell types (red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets).
HP:0001876.CNS_DEF: 所有血细胞类型的数目的异常降低（红细胞，白细胞，和血小板）。

HP:0009102.CNS_NAME: 前牙开咬错位咬合畸形
HP:0009102.ENG_DEF: A type of malocclusion in which there is a gap between the anterior teeth (incisors).
HP:0009102.CNS_DEF: 一种错牙合畸形，指前牙（切牙）之间的有间隙。

HP:0005134.ENG_DEF: Refers to the specific combination of defects with a severely dysplastic pulmonary valve and massively dilated branch pulmonary arteries.
HP:0005134.CNS_DEF: 指肺动脉瓣严重发育不良及肺动脉严重扩张形成的畸形。

HP:0009297.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009297.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009297.CNS_NAME: 第四手指中节指骨的溶骨性缺陷
HP:0009297.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the middle phalanx of the 4th finger.
HP:0009297.CNS_DEF: 溶解或第四手指的中间指骨骨骼组织的变性。

HP:0009736.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009736.ENG_DEF: Pseudarthrosis, or "false joint" of the tibia is the result of a developmental failure in the tibia progressing to spontaneous fracture and subsequent fibrous nonunion. The fracture is rarely present at birth but commonly develops during the first 18 months of life.
HP:0009736.CNS_DEF: 胫骨的“假关节”是胫骨发育进程的障碍，自发骨折后发生纤维状骨不连的结果。骨折在出生时很少见，但在出生后18个月内发生。

HP:0008442.ENG_DEF: Excessive growth of the bones of the vertebral bodies.

HP:0009635.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009635.ENG_DEF: Fusion of a phalanx of the thumb with another bone.
HP:0009635.CNS_DEF: 拇指的指骨与其他骨融合。

HP:0012399.ENG_DEF: A type of ulcer that is caused when an area of skin is subject to pressure over a prolonged period of time, ranging in range in severity from patches of discolored skin to open wounds that expose the underlying bone or muscle. The most common sites are the sacrum, coccyx, heels and the hips.
HP:0012399.CNS_DEF: 溃疡常由长时间受压迫引起，可仅表现为红斑，严重时可形成深达肌肉或骨骼的开放性创面。最常见的发病部位是骶骨、尾骨、脚踝和臀部。

HP:0002359.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0001875.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0001875.ENG_DEF: An abnormally low number of `neutrophils` (CL:0000775) in the peripheral `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0001875.CNS_DEF: 外周血中性粒细胞数目异常降低。

HP:0010806.ENG_DEF: Gentle upward curve of the upper lip vermilion such that the center is placed well superior to the commissures.
HP:0010806.CNS_DEF: 唇角略微向上弯曲，高于上唇联合处。

HP:0002269.ENG_DEF: An abnormality resulting from an anomaly of neuronal migration, i.e., of the process by which neurons travel from their origin to their final position in the brain.
HP:0002269.CNS_DEF: 神经细胞迁移异常，如神经元从他们的起源迁移至其在大脑中的最终位置的过程中的异常。

HP:0001251.ENG_DEF: Cerebellar ataxia refers to ataxia due to dysfunction of the cerebellum. This causes a variety of elementary neurological deficits including asynergy (lack of coordination between muscles, limbs and joints), dysmetria (lack of ability to judge distances that can lead to under- oder overshoot in grasping movements), and dysdiadochokinesia (inability to perform rapid movements requiring antagonizing muscle groups to be switched on and off repeatedly).
HP:0001251.CNS_DEF: 小脑共济失调是指由于小脑功能障碍导致的共济失调。这引起了各种基本的神经缺陷，包括协调不能（缺乏肌肉，四肢和关节之间的协调），辨距障碍（缺乏判断距离能力，可导致抓握运动时不能达到或超过目标），和轮替运动障碍（不能进行需要拮抗肌群反复切换开关的快速运动）。

HP:0040050.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0010919.CNS_NAME: 同型半胱氨酸代谢异常
HP:0010919.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `homocysteine metabolic process` (GO:0050667).
HP:0010919.CNS_DEF: '同型半胱氨酸的代谢过程`（GO:0050667）的异常。

HP:0004692.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004692.ENG_DEF: 4-5 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 4th and 5th toe.
HP:0004692.CNS_DEF: 第四、五脚趾融合型并趾。

HP:0000070.ENG_DEF: A ureterocele is a congenital saccular dilatation of the distal segment of the ureter.
HP:0000070.CNS_DEF: 输尿管远端段先天性囊状扩张。

HP:0003166.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003166.CNS_DEF: 尿液中牛磺酸浓度增加。

HP:0030296.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001017.ENG_DEF: A type of `pallor` (HP:0000980) that is secondary to the presence of `anemia` (HP:0001903).
HP:0001017.CNS_DEF: 继发于贫血的色素脱失。

HP:0009249.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009249.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009249.CNS_NAME: 无名指的末节指骨骨骺异常

HP:0006731.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0006731.ENG_DEF: The presence of an `follicular adenocarcinoma` (MPATH:278) of the `thyroid gland` (FMA:9603).
HP:0006731.CNS_DEF: 甲状腺内存在滤泡状腺癌

HP:0002074.CNS_NAME: 神经元自体荧光脂褐素增加
HP:0002074.ENG_DEF: Lipofuscin, a generic term applied to autofluorescent lipopigment, is a mixture of protein and lipid that accumulates in most aging cells, particularly those involved in high lipid turnover (e.g., the adrenal medulla) or phagocytosis of other cell types (e g., the retinal pigment epithelium or RPE; macrophage). This term pertains if there is an increase in the neuronal accumulation of lipofuscin (also known as autofluorescent lipoprotein) more than expected for the age of the patient.
HP:0002074.CNS_DEF: 脂褐素，自体荧光脂褐素的专业术语，是积聚在最衰老细胞的蛋白质和脂质混合物，尤其是涉及高脂质转换（例如，肾上腺髓质）或吞噬的其他类型细胞（例如视网膜色素上皮细胞或RPE；巨噬细胞）。此术语适用于神经元脂褐素（也称为自身荧光脂蛋白）的积聚增加是否超过患者预期的年龄。

HP:0002093.ENG_DEF: Failure to adequately provide oxygen to cells of the body and to remove excess carbon dioxide.
HP:0002093.CNS_DEF: 未能充分提供氧到机体的细胞和除去过量的二氧化碳。

HP:0040210.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal concentration of biopterin.

HP:0000175.ENG_DEF: Cleft palate is a developmental defect of the `palate` (FMA:54549) resulting from a failure of fusion of the palatine processes and manifesting as a separation of the roof of the mouth (soft and hard palate).
HP:0000175.CNS_DEF: 腭裂是由腭突融合失败造成的发育缺陷，表现为口腔顶（软硬腭）的分裂

HP:0001056.ENG_DEF: Presence of multiple small cysts containing keratin (skin protein) and presenting as tiny pearly-white bumps just under the surface of the skin.
HP:0001056.CNS_DEF: 皮下的多个呈细小白色珠状的囊肿，内含角蛋白（皮肤蛋白）。

HP:0010772.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0010772.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect characterized by abnormal connection of or more pulmonary veins to the superior or inferior vena cava, the right atrium, or the coronary sinus, resulting in a left-to-right shunt of oxygenated blood.
HP:0010772.CNS_DEF: 肺静脉与上、下腔静脉、右心房或者冠状窦连接异常，导致氧合血从左到右的分流。

HP:0001074.ENG_NAME: Atypical nevi in non-sun exposed areas

HP:0000235.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000235.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the fontanelles and cranial sutures
HP:0000235.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the fontanelles (the regions covered by a thick membrane that normally ossify in the first two years of life) or the cranial sutures (the fibrous joints in which the articulating bones or cartilages of the skull are connected by sutural ligaments ).
HP:0000235.CNS_DEF: 囟门（在出生两年内骨化的由厚膜覆盖的区域）和颅缝（颅骨之间由韧带和纤维性关节构成的结缔组织相连形成的缝隙）的任何异常

HP:0006619.ENG_DEF: Deposition of calcium salts in point-like foci within the anterior portion of one or more ribs.
HP:0006619.CNS_DEF: 沉积钙盐中的一个或多个肋的前部分内的点状病灶。

HP:0002761.ENG_DEF: Joint hypermobility (ability of a joint to move beyond its normal range of motion) affecting many or all joints of the body.
HP:0002761.CNS_DEF: 关节过度活动影响许多或（一个联合的能力超越运动的正常范围）的身体的所有关节。

HP:0007179.ENG_DEF: A complete lack of the ability to track objects with the ocular smooth pursuit system, a class of rather slow eye movements that minimizes retinal target motion.

HP:0004792.CNS_DEF: 直肠和会阴之间的瘘管。

HP:0006713.CNS_NAME: 肩胛骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0200064.CNS_NAME: 虹膜色素沉着的不对称
HP:0200064.CNS_DEF: 左右眼虹膜色素沉着的不对称

HP:0011734.CNS_NAME: 中枢性肾上腺功能不全
HP:0011734.ENG_DEF: A form of adrenal insufficiency related to a lack of ACTH, which leads to a decrease in the production of cortisol by the adrenal glands. Aldosterone production is not usually affected.
HP:0011734.CNS_DEF: 由于促肾上腺皮质激素缺乏, 导致皮质醇产生减少引起的肾上腺功能不全。醛固酮的产生通常不受影响。

HP:0008518.CNS_NAME: 脊柱发育不全或发育低下

HP:0011206.ENG_NAME: EEG with generalized slow activity grade 1
HP:0011206.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，广泛性慢活动1级
HP:0011206.ENG_DEF: Slowing at frequencies between 7.5 and 8.5 Hz.
HP:0011206.CNS_DEF: 频率在7.5和8.5赫兹之间的慢活动。

HP:0000614.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the nasolacrimal drainage system, which serves as a conduit for tear flow from the external eye to the nasal cavity.
HP:0000614.CNS_DEF: 鼻泪排水系统的异常，作为一个管道，眼中的泪液经鼻泪管流入鼻腔。

HP:0005236.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0005236.ENG_DEF: A form of `chronic pancreatitis` (HP:0006280) that is characterized by `calcification` (PATO:0001447).
HP:0005236.CNS_DEF: 慢性胰腺炎的一种形式，具有钙化特性。

HP:0003859.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003859.ENG_NAME: Cortical diaphyseal thickening of the upper limbs

HP:0003200.ENG_DEF: An abnormal appearance of muscle fibers observed on muscle biopsy. Ragged red fibers can be visualized with Gomori trichrome staining as irregular and intensely red subsarcolemmal zones, whereas the normal myofibrils are green. The margins of affect fibers appear red and ragged. The ragged-red  is due to the accumulation of abnormal mitochondria below the plasma membrane of the muscle fiber, leading to the appearance of a red rim and speckled sarcoplasm.
HP:0003200.CNS_DEF: 肌肉活检可见肌纤维异常。粗糙的红肌纤维可与莫里三色染色不规则和强烈的红色肌膜区域进行可视化，而正常的肌原纤维是绿色的。影响纤维的边缘出现红色粗糙的形态，异常形态的原因是由于肌肉纤维的质膜以下异常线粒体的积累，导致了红色边缘和肌浆斑点的外观。

HP:0002919.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0002919.ENG_DEF: High levels of ketone bodies in the urine.

HP:0000829.ENG_DEF: A condition caused by a deficiency of parathyroid hormone characterized by hypocalcemia and hyperphosphatemia.
HP:0000829.CNS_DEF: 甲状旁腺激素分泌不足导致的一种病理状态，特点是低钙血症和高磷酸盐血症。

HP:0002871.ENG_DEF: Apnea resulting from depression of the respiratory centers in the medulla oblongata. There is a lack of respiratory effort rather than obstruction of airflow.
HP:0002871.CNS_DEF: 由于延髓呼吸中枢的抑制而导致的呼吸暂停从，表现为呼吸动力缺失而非气流受阻。

HP:0011716.CNS_NAME: 异位性交界性心动过速
HP:0011716.ENG_DEF: A tachycardia arising in the conduction tissues surrounding the atrioventricular node. It usually occurs during myocardial infarction,after heart surgery,or in digitalis intoxication. The rate may range from 140 to 250 beats per minute.
HP:0011716.CNS_DEF: 起源于房室结附近传导组织的心动过速。通常发生于心脏手术后或洋地黄中度引起的心肌梗死。心率可能在140-250/分。

HP:0100310.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0100310.ENG_DEF: `Hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) occurring between the `dura mater` (FMA:9592) and the `skull` (FMA:46565).
HP:0100310.CNS_DEF: 存在于`硬脑膜`(FMA:9592)和`颅骨` (FMA:46565)之间的`出血` (MPATH:119)

HP:0430023.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0430023.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the maxillary sinus, one of the mucosa-lined, normally air-filled paranasal sinuses of the bones of the skull. The maxillary sinus is located within the skeleton of the midface, lateral to the nasal cavity.

HP:0002330.ENG_DEF: Attacks of disabling daytime drowsiness and low alertness.
HP:0002330.CNS_DEF: 不能控制的白天困倦及低警醒度

HP:0004337.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of an `amino acid metabolic process` (GO:0006520).

HP:0010223.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010223.ENG_DEF: The normal epiphysis of the third metacarpal is localised at the distal end of the metacarpal bone. This term aplies if an accesory epiphysis, located at the proximal end of the metacarpal bone, is present.
HP:0010223.CNS_DEF: 第三掌骨的正常骨骺被定位在掌骨的前端。这个位于掌骨的近端术语aplies如果accesory骨骺，是否存在。

HP:0011715.ENG_DEF: Abnormal conduction in all three divisions of the intraventricular conducting tissue.
HP:0011715.CNS_DEF: 心室内传导组织的三个分支全部异常传导。

HP:0040205.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0040205.CNS_NAME: 脑脊液新喋呤水平降低
HP:0040205.ENG_DEF: Decreased concentration of dopamine in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

HP:0001265.ENG_DEF: Reduction of neurologic reflexes such as the knee-jerk reaction.
HP:0001265.CNS_DEF: 神经反射减弱，如膝腱反射。

HP:0030092.CNS_NAME: 肌肉纤维分区蛋白减少
HP:0030092.ENG_DEF: A reduced amount of merosin in muscle fibers. This feature is usually assessed by immunohistochemical examination of muscle biopsy tissue.

HP:0030446.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常

HP:0001901.ENG_DEF: Polycythemia is diagnosed if the red blood cell count, the hemoglobin level, and the red blood cell volume all exceed the upper limits of normal.
HP:0001901.CNS_DEF: 红细胞增多症的诊断原则是红细胞计数、血红蛋白水平和红细胞体积都超过正常值的上限。

HP:0008660.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect characterized by absence or poor development of proximal renal tubules.
HP:0008660.CNS_DEF: 一种以近端肾小管缺如或发育不良为特征的发育缺陷。

HP:0000190.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `lingual frenulum` (FMA:59820), that is of the small fold of mucous membrane that attaches the tongue to the floor of the mouth, or the presence of accessory frenula in the oral cavity.
HP:0000190.CNS_DEF: 舌系带的异常或口腔内存在多余的系带。舌系带指连接舌头和口腔底部粘膜的小褶皱。

HP:0030667.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0030667.CNS_NAME: 周边视网膜新生血管形成
HP:0030667.ENG_DEF: A type of retinal neovascularization that affects the periphery of the retina.

HP:0100214.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100214.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100214.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的中节趾骨支架样骨骺

HP:0000847.CNS_NAME: 肾素 - 血管紧张素系统异常
HP:0000847.CNS_DEF: 肾素 - 血管紧张素系统的异常

HP:0008921.ENG_DEF: A type of short-limbed dwarfism that is manifest beginning in the neonatal period.
HP:0008921.CNS_DEF: 在新生儿期开始表现出的一种短肢侏儒症。

HP:0003453.CNS_NAME: 抗中性粒细胞抗体阳性
HP:0003453.ENG_DEF: The presence of autoantibodies in the serum that react against neutrophils.
HP:0003453.CNS_DEF: 存在于血清中对嗜中性粒细胞反应的自身抗体。

HP:0005312.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0005312.ENG_DEF: Formation of excess fibrous connective tissue in the tunica intima (innermost layer) of arteries in the pulmonary circulation.
HP:0005312.CNS_DEF: 在动脉中的肺循环的内膜（最内层）形成过量纤维性结缔组织。

HP:0004307.ENG_NAME: Abnormal anatomic location of the heart
HP:0004307.ENG_DEF: Normally,the heart is located in the thoracic cavity medial to the lungs and posterior to the sternum. Abnormal anatomic location of the heart is not located where it should be.
HP:0004307.CNS_DEF: 正常情况下，心脏位于胸腔内两肺之间、胸骨后面。如果心脏位置不在此处，则为心脏解剖位置异常。

HP:0005852.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0000759.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the peripheral nervous system
HP:0000759.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903), which is composed of the nerves that lead to or branch off from the central nervous system.
HP:0000759.CNS_DEF: `外周神经系统`（9903 FMA）的异常。外周神经系统是由从中枢神经系统发出的分支神经组成。

HP:0030907.ENG_DEF: Severe head pain with sudden onset, reaching its maximum intensity in less than one minute and lasting from one hour to ten days.

HP:0011374.ENG_NAME: Incomplete partition of the cochlea type I
HP:0011374.ENG_DEF: The cochlea is lacking the entire modiolus and cribriform area, resulting in a cystic appearance. This is accompanied by a large cystic vestibule.
HP:0011374.CNS_DEF: 耳蜗缺乏蜗轴和筛区，导致囊性外观。这种情况下，前庭也常常呈囊性。

HP:0003225.ENG_DEF: Decreased activity of coagulation factor V, Factor V, which is activated to factor Va by means of minute amounts of thrombin (and inactivated by larger amounts of thrombin). Activated factor V (fVa)  is a cofactor in the formation of the prothrombinase complex.
HP:0003225.CNS_DEF: 活性降低的凝血因子V。凝血因子V被凝血酶复合物激活后转变为因子Va。（和由较大量的凝血酶的灭活）。活化因子V（FVA）是在凝血酶原复合物形成中的辅助因子。

HP:0012311.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0012311.CNS_DEF: 在循环系统中单核细胞的数量增加（CL:0000576）。

HP:0002749.CNS_NAME: 软骨病是一个通用术语，骨虚弱由于在称为类骨质的蛋白质框架的矿化缺陷。这种有缺陷的矿化主要是维生素D骨软化症的儿童被称为佝偻病缺乏所引起。

HP:0002299.ENG_DEF: Fragile, easily breakable hair, i.e., with reduced tensile strength.
HP:0002299.CNS_DEF: 毛发抗拉强度降低并且脆弱易断裂。

HP:0100638.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;头或颈部的异常;呼吸系统异常

HP:0000494.ENG_DEF: The palpebral fissure inclination is more than two standard deviations below the mean.
HP:0000494.CNS_DEF: 睑裂倾角低于均值的两个标准差以上。

HP:0045017.ENG_NAME: Congenital malformation of the left heart

HP:0009301.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009301.CNS_DEF: 发育不全/第四finger`（FMA:23921）小`近节指骨。

HP:0011301.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011301.ENG_DEF: The total absence of the foot, with no bony elements distal to the tibia or fibula.
HP:0011301.CNS_DEF: 完全没有脚，在胫骨或腓骨的远端没有骨的结构。

HP:0010566.ENG_DEF: A disordered proliferation of mature tissues that is native to the site of origin - eg, exostoses, nevi and soft tissue hamartomas. Although most hamartomas are benign, some histologic subtypes - eg, neuromuscular hamartoma, may proliferate aggressively such as mesenchymal cystic hamartoma, Sclerosing epithelial hamartoma, Sclerosing metanephric hamartoma.
HP:0010566.CNS_DEF: 错构瘤是'起源于器官的正常成熟组织的无序增殖，例如，外生骨疣，痣和软组织错构瘤。虽然大多数错构瘤是良性的，但一些组织学亚型-如神经肌肉的错构瘤，可产生侵袭性增殖，如间充质囊性错构瘤、硬化性上皮错构瘤、硬化性肾错构瘤。

HP:0000034.ENG_DEF: Accumulation of clear fluid in the  between the layers of membrane (tunica vaginalis) surrounding the testis.
HP:0000034.CNS_DEF: 睾丸鞘膜层之间的透明液体积蓄。

HP:0030353.CNS_NAME: 血清胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平降低
HP:0030353.ENG_DEF: A reduced level of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1) in the blood circulation.

HP:0001773.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001773.ENG_DEF: A measured foot length that is more than 2 SD below the mean for a newborn of 27 - 41 weeks gestation, or foot that is less than the 3rd centile for individuals from birth to 16 years of age (objective). Alternatively, a foot that appears disproportionately short (subjective).
HP:0001773.CNS_DEF: 一个测量脚长度超过2 SD低于平均值为27新生 - 41周的妊娠，或脚小于第3百分位个人从出生到16岁（目标）。另外，出现不成比例的短脚（主观）。

HP:0011211.ENG_NAME: EEG with photoparoxysmal response grade I
HP:0011211.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，光阵发性反应I级
HP:0011211.ENG_DEF: Occurrence of epileptiform discharges in occipital regions during photic stimulation.
HP:0011211.CNS_DEF: 闪光刺激过程中癫痫样放电出现在枕部区域。

HP:0100327.ENG_DEF: Hypersensitivity in form of an adverse immune reaction against cow milk protein.
HP:0100327.CNS_DEF: 对牛乳蛋白产生不良免疫反应的超敏反应。

HP:0030327.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the number of osteoclasts, bone-resorbing cells that develop from macrophages.

HP:0009896.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the antitragus, which is a small tubercle opposite to the tragus of the ear. The antitragus and the tragus are separated by the intertragic notch.
HP:0009896.CNS_DEF: 对耳屏异常，是指耳朵上一个小的相反的耳屏结节的出现。对耳屏和耳屏是由耳屏间切迹分隔开的。

HP:0011283.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `metencephalon` (FMA:62003). The metencephalon is the part of the hindbrain that consists of the pons and the cerebellum.
HP:0011283.CNS_DEF: 在`后脑`的异常（FMA:62003）。后脑是由脑桥和小脑组成。

HP:0009414.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009414.CNS_DEF: 第三个手指骨骺零散出现。

HP:0006879.ENG_DEF: Atrophy affecting the pons and the cerebellum.

HP:0030179.CNS_NAME: 周围神经动作电位振幅异常
HP:0030179.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the magnitude of the action potential along a peripheral nerve, that is, of the rapid rise and fall of the electrical membrane potential of the nerve.

HP:0008275.CNS_NAME: 视锥细胞介导的视网膜电图异常
HP:0008275.ENG_DEF: Abnormal cone-mediated electroretinogram [HP:0008275]，cone is one type of photoreceptor.
HP:0008275.CNS_DEF: 异常的视锥细胞介导的视网膜电图 [HP:0008275]。其中，视锥细胞是感光细胞的一种类型。

HP:0001048.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;心血管系统的异常
HP:0001048.ENG_DEF: The presence of a cavernous hemangioma. A hemangioma characterized by large endothelial spaces (caverns) is called a cavernous hemangioma.
HP:0001048.CNS_DEF: 大血管内皮空间的血管瘤被称为海绵状血管瘤。

HP:0040238.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0040238.CNS_NAME: 中性粒细胞趋化功能受损
HP:0040238.ENG_DEF: An impairment of the migration of neutrophils towards chemoattractants as part of the innate immune response

HP:0010948.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the fetal circulation  system or fetal echocardiogram.
HP:0010948.CNS_DEF: 胎儿循环系统异常或胎儿超声心动图发现的异常。

HP:0011489.CNS_NAME: 角膜内皮细胞异常迁移
HP:0011489.CNS_DEF: 角膜内皮细胞异常迁移。

HP:0004411.ENG_DEF: Positioning of the nasal septum to the right or left in contrast to the normal midline position of the nasal septum.
HP:0004411.CNS_DEF: 鼻中隔位置偏左或偏右，而非正常的位于中线。

HP:0100207.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100207.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的末节趾骨骨骺不规则

HP:0000648.ENG_DEF: `Atrophy` (MPATH:127) of the `optic nerve` (FMA:50863). Optic atrophy results from the death of the retinal ganglion cell axons that comprise the optic nerve and manifesting as a pale optic nerve on fundoscopy.
HP:0000648.CNS_DEF: 视神经萎缩是由于视网膜神经节细胞轴突死亡所致，表现为眼底检查中视神经乳头颜色灰暗。

HP:0006088.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006088.CNS_NAME: 五个手指完全皮肤性并指
HP:0006088.ENG_DEF: 1-5 finger complete cutaneous syndactyly means that 1st to 5th finger are joined by cartilaginous union completely
HP:0006088.CNS_DEF: 全部手指完全皮肤性并指。

HP:0006558.ENG_NAME: Decreased mitochondrial complex III activity in liver tissue
HP:0006558.CNS_NAME: 肝组织线粒体复合物III活性降低
HP:0006558.ENG_DEF: Decreased activity of complex III Of the mitochondrion in the liver.
HP:0006558.CNS_DEF: 肝组织中线粒体复合物III活性降低。

HP:0001693.CNS_DEF: 偏离正常血液循环的心脏血流模式。

HP:0002366.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the lower motor neuron
HP:0002366.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `lower motor neuron` (FMA:84632).
HP:0002366.CNS_DEF: 在`下运动神经元`的异常（FMA:84632）。

HP:0005209.CNS_DEF: 存在于肝内胆管的囊肿。

HP:0003005.ENG_DEF: A benign neoplasm that usually arises from the sympathetic trunk in the mediastinum, representing a tumor of the sympathetic nerve fibers arising from neural crest cells.
HP:0003005.CNS_DEF: 良性肿瘤，通常起源于交感干纵隔，代表产生于神经嵴细胞的交感神经纤维瘤。

HP:0011581.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect of heart development characterized by origin of both pulmonary artery and aorta from the morphological left ventricle.
HP:0011581.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性心脏发育缺陷，特点是肺动脉和主动脉均从左心室发出。

HP:0030326.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030326.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the number of macrophages.

HP:0007832.CNS_DEF: 巩膜上发生的异常色素沉着

HP:0010348.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006119.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006119.ENG_DEF: Some or all of the metacarpal bones (i.e., metacarpal II to V) have a pointed proximal appearance.
HP:0006119.CNS_DEF: 部分或全部掌骨（即掌骨二到五）有针对性的近端的外观。

HP:0040113.CNS_NAME: 老年感音神经性听力障碍

HP:0008161.CNS_NAME: 白细胞碱性磷酸酶缺失
HP:0008161.ENG_DEF: A decrease in alkaline phosphatase activity measured within leukocytes below detectable levels .
HP:0008161.CNS_DEF: 白细胞内测量到的碱性磷酸酶活性降低至可检测范围以下。

HP:0003547.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0003547.ENG_DEF: The shoulder, or pectoral, girdle is composed of the clavicles and the scapulae. Shoulder-girdle weakness refers to lack of strength of the muscles attaching to these bones, that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the shoulders.
HP:0003547.CNS_DEF: 肩，或胸饰，腰带由锁骨和肩胛骨的。肩，腰带的弱点是指缺乏连接到这些骨头的肌肉的力量，那就是，缺乏的肩膀肌肉的力量。

HP:0002841.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to fungal infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of fungal infection.
HP:0002841.CNS_DEF: 真菌感染的传染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的真菌感染。

HP:0000485.ENG_DEF: An enlargement of the `cornea` (FMA:58238) with normal clarity and function. Megalocornea is diagnosed with a horizontal corneal diameter of 12 mm or more at birth or 13 mm or more after two years of age.
HP:0000485.CNS_DEF: 正常的清晰度和功能。 巨角膜的诊断是出生时角膜水平直径12毫米或更大，或两岁后水平角膜直径达13mm或以上。

HP:0012702.ENG_DEF: A repeated, painful urge to defecate without excreting stool.
HP:0012702.CNS_DEF: 重复的、疼痛的、急促排便感，但无排便。

HP:0006429.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006429.ENG_DEF: An abnormally wide femoral neck (which is the process of bone, connecting the femoral head with the femoral shaft).
HP:0006429.CNS_DEF: 异常宽股骨颈（这是骨的过程中，连接股骨头与股骨轴）。

HP:0010234.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010234.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
HP:0010234.ENG_DEF: Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the phalanges of the fingers, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0010234.CNS_DEF: 硬化手指的指骨的骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。

HP:0012540.ENG_DEF: An epidermoid cyst in the armpit.
HP:0012540.CNS_DEF: 位于腋下的表皮样囊肿。

HP:0009915.ENG_DEF: The presence of a size difference between the left and right cornea.
HP:0009915.CNS_DEF: 左和右角膜之间大小不一。

HP:0011280.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0011280.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of `calcium` (CHEBI:29108) concentration in the urine (FMA:12274).
HP:0011280.CNS_DEF: 尿中钙离子浓度的异常。

HP:0004859.CNS_NAME: 巨核细胞缺乏相关的血小板减少
HP:0004859.ENG_DEF: Thrombocytopenia related to lack of or severe reduction in the count of megakaryocytes.
HP:0004859.CNS_DEF: 巨核细胞的计数缺乏或严重衰减的血小板减少症有关的。

HP:0001334.ENG_DEF: A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) in which there is no visible obstruction to the flow of the cerebrospinal fluid between the ventricles and subarachnoid space.
HP:0001334.CNS_DEF: 一种脑积水（HP:0000238）类型，在脑室和蛛网膜下腔之间的脑脊液流动中没有可见的梗阻。

HP:0010247.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010247.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphyses of the distal phalanges of the hand
HP:0010247.CNS_NAME: 手末节指骨支架样骨骺

HP:0007286.ENG_DEF: Nystagmus consisting of horizontal to-and-fro eye movements, in which the movement in one direction is faster than in the other.
HP:0007286.CNS_DEF: 眼球震颤包括水平至往复眼球运动，其中在一个方向上的运动比在其它更快。

HP:0100127.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100127.CNS_NAME: 第二趾近节趾骨骨骺不规则

HP:0100412.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100412.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾中节趾骨的完全重复
HP:0100412.ENG_DEF: Complete duplication of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe.
HP:0100412.CNS_DEF: 第5脚趾的中节指骨的完全重复。

HP:0000930.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000930.ENG_NAME: Elevated imprint of the transverse sinuses

HP:0006112.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006112.ENG_NAME: Expanded phalanges with widened medullary cavities
HP:0006112.CNS_NAME: 髓质空腔加宽型指骨膨大

HP:0005267.ENG_NAME: Premature delivery because of cervical insufficiency or membrane fragility
HP:0005267.CNS_NAME: 宫颈机能不全或胎膜脆性原因导致的早产

HP:0007773.CNS_DEF: 发生于玻璃体或视网膜上的异常

HP:0012881.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the outer labia.

HP:0030442.ENG_DEF: A squamous cell carcinoma that originates in the skin of the anal margin.

HP:0011962.ENG_DEF: Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from post-testicular obstruction or retrograde ejaculation. Can be differentiated from non-obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.
HP:0011962.CNS_DEF: 由于睾丸后梗阻或逆行性射精造成病人精液中缺失任何可测水平的精子。睾丸活检可将之与非梗阻性无精子症相鉴别。

HP:0001315.ENG_DEF: Diminution of tendon reflexes, which is an invariable sign of peripheral nerve disease.
HP:0001315.CNS_DEF: 腱反射的降低，多为周围神经疾病较恒定的体征。

HP:0030195.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0030195.CNS_NAME: 吞咽肌肉易于疲乏无力
HP:0030195.ENG_DEF: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in swallowing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

HP:0003882.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100308.ENG_DEF: Atrophy of one side of the brain, characterized by findings including   thinning of the cerebral cortex, reduced volume of the cerebral white matter with r abnormal myelination, and enlargement of the ipsilateral fourth ventricle.
HP:0100308.CNS_DEF: 大脑一侧的萎缩，其特征包括大脑皮层变薄，髓鞘形成异常的脑白质体积缩小，并且同侧脑室扩大。

HP:0002724.ENG_DEF: An increased susceptibility to Aspergillus infections, as manifested by a history of recurrent episodes of Aspergillus infections.
HP:0002724.CNS_DEF: 曲霉菌传染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的曲霉菌感染史。

HP:0009169.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009169.ENG_NAME: Broad middle phalanx of the 5th finger

HP:0009169.CNS_DEF: 增加的宽度第五手指中节指骨。

HP:0004945.ENG_DEF: A separation (dissection) of the layers of the extracranial portion of the `internal carotid artery` (FMA:3947) wall.
HP:0004945.CNS_DEF: “颈内动脉”（FMA :3947）的颅外部分发生夹层（内膜撕裂血液进入到中膜）。

HP:0012035.ENG_DEF: Multiple, localized or widespread, asymptomatic or inflammatory dermal cysts involving the pilosebaceous units. Lesions can appear anywhere on the body, but steatocystoma multiplex is more commonly involved with those areas of the skin with a high density of developed pilosebaceous units (e.g., the axilla, groin, neck, and proximal extremities).
HP:0012035.CNS_DEF: 发生于毛囊皮脂腺的多发性，无症状或炎症性皮肤囊肿，局部或广泛分布。皮损可出现在身体的任何部位，但在毛囊皮脂腺分布密集的部位（如腋窝，腹股沟，颈部和四肢近端）更为常见。

HP:0007894.ENG_DEF: Decreased amount of pigmentation of the retina.
HP:0007894.CNS_DEF: 视网膜的色素沉着的量减少。

HP:0002216.ENG_DEF: Development of gray hair at a younger than normal age.
HP:0002216.CNS_DEF: 超过正常年龄提前出现白发。

HP:0002743.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to enteroviral infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of enteroviral infection.
HP:0002743.CNS_DEF: 肠道病毒的传染易感性增加，表现为肠道反复发作的病毒感染。

HP:0012115.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0012257.ENG_DEF: Absence of the outer dynein arms of respiratory motile cilia, which normally are situated within the peripheral microtubules of motile cilia. This feature is usually appreciated by electron microscopy.
HP:0012257.CNS_DEF: 呼吸运动纤毛的外动力蛋白臂通常位于动纤毛的周边微管外，其缺失常通过电子显微镜发现。

HP:0012251.ENG_DEF: An electrocardiographic anomaly in which the ST segment is observed to be located superior to the isoelectric line.
HP:0012251.CNS_DEF: 心电图异常，其中观察到ST段高于等电位线位置。

HP:0100733.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) (tumour) in the `parathyroid gland` (FMA:13890).

HP:0006571.ENG_DEF: The presence of `reduced numbers of ` (PATO:0001999) `intrahepatic bile duct` (FMA:15766) than normal.

HP:0011678.ENG_NAME: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and major aortopulmonary collateral arteries
HP:0011678.CNS_NAME: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁和主要肺主动脉侧支动脉
HP:0011678.ENG_DEF: A type of tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia in which all pulmonary blood flow is derived from major aortopulmonary collateral arteries (MAPCA).
HP:0011678.CNS_DEF: 法洛四联症合并肺动脉闭锁的一种，患者肺部的血液主要从体肺侧支动脉（MAPCA）流入。

HP:0000830.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0000830.ENG_DEF: A condition of reduced function of the pituitary gland characterized by decreased secretion of one or more of the pituitary hormones growth hormone, thyroid-stimulating hormone, adrenocorticotropic hormone, prolactin, luteinizing hormone, and follicle-stimulating hormone.
HP:0000830.CNS_DEF: 垂体前叶功能减退产生的症状,表现为一种或多种垂体激素分泌减少, 如生长激素，促甲状腺激素，促肾上腺皮质激素，泌乳素，黄体生成素和卵泡刺激素。

HP:0006108.CNS_DEF: 掌骨由近向远端逐渐变细。

HP:0030123.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal amount of lamin A/C in muscle tissue. The LMNA gene gives rise to at least three splicing isoforms including the two main isoforms, lamin A and lamin C. These are constitutive components of the fibrous nuclear lamina and have different roles, ranging from mechanical nuclear membrane maintenance to gene regulation.

HP:0003645.CNS_DEF: 在测量内源性和共同凝血通路的部分凝血活酶时间（PTT）测试中凝血时间增长。磷脂，活化剂，和钙混入抗凝血浆样品后，测量血栓形成所需的时间。

HP:0004606.ENG_DEF: A lack of `ossification` ( GO:0001503) of the `vertebral bodies` (FMA:11945).

HP:0000718.ENG_DEF: Aggressive behavior can denote verbal aggression, physical aggression against objects, physical aggression against people, and may also include aggression towards oneself.
HP:0000718.CNS_DEF: 攻击行为可以表现为言语攻击、对目标的物理攻击、对人的身体攻击、并且还可能包括自我攻击。

HP:0100573.CNS_DEF: 多见于左心室尖部的肌性膨出，不影响心肌收缩功能，常合并于其他先天性心脏畸形。

HP:0003902.CNS_DEF: 点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化在`肱骨epiphysis`的存在（FMA:32825）。

HP:0001920.ENG_DEF: The presence of `stenosis` (MPATH:80) of the `renal artery` (FMA:14751).

HP:0011304.CNS_DEF: 增加拇指宽度不增加背腹层面。

HP:0008497.CNS_NAME: 先天性颅面骨发育不全

HP:0012260.CNS_NAME: 运动纤毛的中央呈对微管形态异常

HP:0012260.CNS_DEF: 运动纤毛中央呈对微管结核呈现9 + 2 结构。

HP:0012615.ENG_DEF: The presence of renal casts (cylindrical structures produced by the kidney in certain disease states) in the urine.
HP:0012615.CNS_DEF: 尿中存在管型（在某些疾病状态由肾脏产生的圆柱结构）。

HP:0011949.CNS_DEF: 由于感染而出现的肺部急性炎症。

HP:0005949.ENG_DEF: Recurrent episodes of apnea occurring during infancy.
HP:0005949.CNS_DEF: 婴儿期发生的、反复发作的呼吸暂停。

HP:0011961.ENG_DEF: Absence of any measurable level of sperm in his semen, resulting from a defect in the production of spermatozoa in the testes. Can be differentiated from obstructive azoospermia on the basis of testicular biopsy.
HP:0011961.CNS_DEF: 由于睾丸生成精子缺陷导致病人精液中检测不到任何可测水平的精子，睾丸活检可以将之与梗阻性无精子症相鉴别。

HP:0001838.ENG_DEF: The presence of both a prominent heel and a convex contour of the sole.
HP:0001838.CNS_DEF: 的两个突出的脚跟和鞋底的凸形轮廓的存在。

HP:0008344.CNS_NAME: 血浆支链氨基酸水平升高

HP:0008344.CNS_DEF: 在`blood`（FMA:9670）:一个`支链氨基酸acid`（22918 CHEBI）的浓度增加。

HP:0100290.CNS_NAME: 周围体感诱发电位异常

HP:0003587.ENG_DEF: Gradual, very slow onset of disease manifestations.

HP:0005400.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005400.CNS_NAME: 中性粒细胞活动度降低
HP:0005400.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction of the cell motility of `neutrophils` (CL:0000775).
HP:0005400.CNS_DEF: 中性粒细胞的细胞运动的异常减少（CL:0000775）。

HP:0001245.CNS_DEF: 小鱼际发育不好，拇指根部手掌软组织减少。

HP:0010485.ENG_DEF: The ability of the elbow joint to move beyond its normal range of motion.
HP:0010485.CNS_DEF: 肘关节的能力超越运动的正常范围。

HP:0002385.ENG_DEF: Weakness or partial paralysis in the lower limbs.
HP:0002385.CNS_DEF: 双下肢力弱或部分瘫痪

HP:0002194.ENG_DEF: A type of `motor delay` (HP:0001270) characterized by an delay in acquiring the ability to control the large muscles of the body for walking, running, sitting, and crawling.
HP:0002194.CNS_DEF: 以习得控制身体大肌肉进行走、跑、坐及爬的能力延迟为特点的运动发育迟缓（HP:0001270）。

HP:0011770.CNS_NAME: 三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进症
HP:0011770.ENG_DEF: A type of hyperparathyroidism that occurs following kidney transplantation, which is a treatment for secondary hyperparathyroidism. Although kidney transplantation leads to a normalization of serum calcium and parathyroid hormone in most patients. The state of persistent hypercalcemia and hyperparathyroidism is referred to as tertiary hyperparathyroidism.
HP:0011770.CNS_DEF: 一种肾脏移植手术后出现的甲状旁腺功能亢进症。肾移植可以缓解继发性甲状旁腺功能亢进，大多数病人的血钙和甲状旁腺激素会趋向正常化，如果仍持续存在高血钙和甲状旁腺功能亢进则称为三发性甲状旁腺功能亢进。

HP:0012044.CNS_DEF: 跷跷板眼球震颤是一种摆动眼球震颤，其中一半周期表现为一只眼睛的升高和内旋，同时另一只眼睛下降和外展。在另一半周期中，眼运动反转。

HP:0011664.CNS_NAME: 左室致密化不全心肌病
HP:0011664.ENG_DEF: Left ventricular non-compaction (LVNC) is characterized by prominent left ventricular trabeculae and deep inter-trabecular recesses. The myocardial wall is often thickened with a thin, compacted epicardial layer and a thickened endocardial layer. In some patients, LVNC is associated with left ventricular dilatation and systolic dysfunction, which can be transient in neonates.
HP:0011664.CNS_DEF: 左室致密化不全性心肌病（LVNC）的特征是有显着的左心室小梁和深间小梁壁凹。心肌壁往往增厚，伴随薄且致密的心外膜层和增厚的心内膜层。在一些患者中，LVNC与左心室扩张和收缩功能障碍有关，在新生儿种可能只是瞬时的现象。

HP:0011904.ENG_DEF: Hemoglobin F (HbF) contains two globin alpha chains and two globin gamma chains. It is the main form of hemoglobin in the fetus during the last seven months of intrauterine  development and in the half year of postnatal life. In adults it normally makes up less than one percent of all hemoglobiin. This term refers to an increase in HbF above this limit. In beta thalassemia major, it may represent over 90 percent of all hemoglobin, and in beta thalassemia minor it may make up between 0.5 to 4 percent.
HP:0011904.CNS_DEF: 血红蛋白F（HbF的）含有两条α链球蛋白和两条γ链球蛋白。这是胎儿血红蛋白的主要形式，存在于子宫内发育的最后七个月至出生后的半年。在成人中，通常它少于总血红蛋白的百分之一。此术语是指HbF的增加超过1%的。在重型β地中海贫血，它可能总血红蛋白的超过90％，在轻型地中海贫血，HbF通常在0.5%-4％之间。

HP:0001336.ENG_DEF: Very brief, involuntary random muscular contractions occurring at rest, in response to sensory stimuli, or accompanying voluntary movements.
HP:0001336.CNS_DEF: 很简短，随意不自主的肌肉收缩发生在休息，以应对感官刺激，或陪同随意运动。

HP:0010190.CNS_NAME: 脚趾末节趾骨斑片状硬化
HP:0010190.ENG_DEF: Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the distal phalanges of the toes. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.
HP:0010190.CNS_DEF: 片状（不规则）增加一个或多个脚趾的远端指骨的骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0010443.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010443.ENG_DEF: A bifid or bifurcated appearance of the `femur` (FMA:9611) as seen on x-rays, possible appearing as a more or less severe bowing of the upper leg. Might be associated with hip dysplasia on the affected side.
HP:0010443.CNS_DEF: 在`femur`的裂或分叉外观（FMA:9611），为看到的X射线，可能出现作为上腿的或多或少严重弯曲。可能与患侧髋关节发育不良有关。

HP:0001923.ENG_DEF: An elevation in the number of `reticulocytes` (CL:0000558) (immature erythrocytes) in the peripheral blood circulation.
HP:0001923.CNS_DEF: 在外周血液循环中网状细胞（CL:0000558 ）（未成熟的红细胞）的数目增加。

HP:0005110.ENG_DEF: An atrial arrhythmia characterized by disorganized atrial activity without discrete P waves on the surface EKG, but instead by an undulating baseline or more sharply circumscribed atrial deflections of varying amplitude an frequency ranging from 350 to 600 per minute.
HP:0005110.CNS_DEF: 一种心脏节律异常的疾病，以心房脉冲快速、不规则，不能有效地引起心房收缩为特征。

HP:0001769.ENG_DEF: A foot for which the measured width is above the 95th centile for age; or, a foot that appears disproportionately wide for its length.
HP:0001769.CNS_DEF: 足部为其测量宽度高于第95百分位数年龄;或者，这似乎不成比例的宽它的长度足。

HP:0002726.CNS_NAME: 反复金黄色葡萄球菌感染

HP:0002726.CNS_DEF: 金黄色葡萄球菌传染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的金黄色葡萄球菌感染。
