HP:0007475.ENG_DEF: An ichthyosiform abnormality of the skin that presents at birth or shortly thereafter with generalized, erythema, blistering, erosions, and peeling. In the subsequent months, erythema and blistering improves but patients go on to develop hyperkeratotic scaling that is especially prominent along the joint flexures, neck, hands and feet.
HP:0007475.CNS_DEF: 一种鱼鳞病样皮肤发育不良，表现为在出生时或出生后不久出现的广泛的红斑，水疱，糜烂，脱皮等异常表现。在随后的几个月，红斑和水泡改善，但同时会出现角化过度性鳞屑，尤其是关节屈曲部位、颈部以及手足部位。

HP:0000871.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0000871.ENG_DEF: A pituitary functional deficit affecting all the anterior pituitary hormones (growth hormone, thyroid-stimulating hormone, follicle-stimulating hormone, luteinizing hormone, adrenocorticotropic hormone, and prolactin).
HP:0000871.CNS_DEF: 垂体功能缺损影响所有垂体前叶激素（生长激素，促甲状腺激素，卵泡刺激素，黄体生成素，促肾上腺皮质激素，和泌乳素）。

HP:0010445.ENG_DEF: Defects in the septum between the atria of the heart,due to failure of fusion between either the septum secundum or the septum primum and the endocardial cushions embryologic time.
HP:0010445.CNS_DEF: 由于在胚胎发育时期心内膜垫与第一房间隔或第二房间隔融合失败所导致的房室间隔缺损。

HP:0012481.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0012481.ENG_DEF: A congenital malformation of veins which drain normal brain characterized by a caput medusae or an umbrellalike convergence of multiple venules on a single, or occasionally multiple, enlarged parenchymal or medullary vein, like the trunk of a tree or the shank of an umbrella. This dilated terminal vein penetrates the cortex to drain either (a) superficially to cortical veins or sinuses, (b) deeply to subependymal veins of the lateral ventricle and then into the galenic system, (c) to the fourth ventricle and then to the pontomesencephalic vein, or (d) to the precentral cerebellar vein and into the galenic system.
HP:0012481.CNS_DEF: 先天性畸形的静脉为正常的脑组织提供静脉引流的特征是“水母头”、多个小静脉伞样汇聚成一个静脉或偶见多发髓静脉实质部分扩张，就像树干或伞柄一样。这种扩张的终末静脉穿透皮层引流至（a）浅表型至皮质静脉或窦，（b）深部型至侧脑室室管膜下静脉，然后进入galen’s静脉系统，（c）至第四脑室，然后到脑桥中脑静脉，或（d）到小脑中央前静脉并进入galen’s静脉系统。

HP:0011413.CNS_DEF: 胎头娩出后，胎儿前肩被嵌顿在耻骨联合上方，用常规助产方法不能娩出胎儿双肩。

HP:0100657.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0100657.ENG_DEF: Congenital protrusion of the abdominal or thoracic viscera, usually with a defect of the sternum and ribs as well as of the abdominal walls.
HP:0100657.CNS_DEF: 在腹腔或胸腔内脏先天性突出，通常与胸骨和肋骨的缺陷以及腹部壁。

HP:0006256.ENG_DEF: An abnormality in the range and movement of any joint in hands.

HP:0003208.CNS_NAME: 自体萤光脂色素存储物质的细胞内堆积指纹谱

HP:0003208.CNS_DEF: 在`trabecular`:萤光lipopigment存储material`（0003204 HP）的'细胞内积累（PATO:0002121）或指纹状花纹。

HP:0100202.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的末节趾骨骨骺缺失

HP:0200034.ENG_DEF: A circumscribed, solid elevation of skin with no visible fluid, varying in size from a pinhead to less than 10mm in diameter at the widest point.
HP:0200034.CNS_DEF: 为高出皮肤的局限性坚实的突起，没有液体渗出，从针头大小到直径10mm不等。

HP:0100254.ENG_NAME: Stenosis of the medullary cavity of the long bones

HP:0010549.ENG_NAME: Weakness due to upper motor neuron dysfunction
HP:0010549.CNS_NAME: 上运动神经元功能障碍造成的虚弱
HP:0010549.ENG_DEF: Paralysis of voluntary muscles means loss of contraction due to interruption of one or more motor pathways from the brain to the muscle fibers. Although the word paralysis is often used interchangeably to mean either complete or partial loss of muscle strength, it is preferable to use paralysis or plegia for complete or severe loss of muscle strength, and paresis for partial or slight loss. Paralysis due to lesions of the principle motor tracts is related to a lesion in the corticospinal, corticobulbar or brainstem descending (subcorticospinal) neurons.

HP:0012865.ENG_DEF: A structural abnormality of the sperm head.

HP:0007968.CNS_NAME: 持续性原始玻璃体增生症
HP:0007968.ENG_DEF: A failure of regression of the hyaloid vessel, which supplies the primary vitreous during embryogenesis and normally regresses in the third trimester of pregnancy, leading to a particular form of posterior cataract. This condition is known as Persistent Hyperplastic Primary Vitreous (PHPV).
HP:0007968.CNS_DEF: 玻璃体血管的消退发生障碍，其在胚胎发育过程中提供原始玻璃体营养，通常在妊娠晚期消退，其消退障碍导致白内障。这种情况被称为持久性原始玻璃体增生症（PHPV）。

HP:0011702.ENG_NAME: Abnormal electrophysiology of sinoatrial node origin
HP:0011702.CNS_NAME: 窦房结起源的电生理学异常
HP:0011702.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the sinoatrial (SA) node in the right atrium. THe SA node acts as the pacemaker of the heart.
HP:0011702.CNS_DEF: 位于右心房的窦房结（SA）的异常。窦房结起着心脏起搏器的作用。

HP:0007576.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;四肢异常;体壁的异常

HP:0000803.ENG_DEF: Cysts of the `cortex of the kidney` (FMA:15581).

HP:0030817.ENG_DEF: Severe nail curvature, causing the tip of the nail to point downwards with respect to the axis of the finger. Beaked nails are caused by resorption of the distal digit.

HP:0000716.ENG_DEF: A condition characterized by pervasive dysphoric mood, loss of interests, and inability to experience pleasure.
HP:0000716.CNS_DEF: 以普遍烦躁不安的情绪，失去兴趣，高兴不起来为特征的状态。

HP:0011863.ENG_DEF: An abnormal formation and mineralization of sternal.
HP:0011863.CNS_DEF: 胸骨的异常骨组织形成。

HP:0002200.ENG_DEF: Pseudobulbar signs result from injury to an upper motor neuron lesion to the corticobulbar pathways in the pyramidal tract. Patients have difficulty chewing, swallowing and demonstrate slurred speech (often initial presentation) as well as abnormal behavioral symptoms such as inappropriate emotional outbursts of uncontrolled laughter or weeping etc.
HP:0002200.CNS_DEF: 假性球麻痹症状是由于锥体束通路上皮层延髓束受损而出现的一种上运动神经元病变。表现为咀嚼、吞咽困难和表达不清（通常为最初表现）。还有不受控制的强哭强笑等症状

HP:0010498.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010498.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect that occurs if the two halves of the patella fail to fuse in early childhood.
HP:0010498.CNS_DEF: 如果髌骨的两半未能在儿童早期融合发生的一种发育缺陷。

HP:0010442.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010442.ENG_DEF: A congenital anomaly characterized by the presence of supernumerary fingers or toes.
HP:0010442.CNS_DEF: 先天性异常特征的编外手指或脚趾的存在。

HP:0002694.ENG_DEF: Increased bone density of the skull base without significant changes in bony contour.
HP:0002694.CNS_DEF: 颅底骨密度增加，骨外形无显著变化。

HP:0040162.ENG_DEF: Formation of an anuclear keratin layer

HP:0000995.ENG_DEF: A oval and round, colored (usually medium-to dark brown, reddish brown, or flesh colored) lesion. Typically, a melanocytic nevus is less than 6 mm in diameter, but may be much smaller or larger.
HP:0000995.CNS_DEF: 黑素细胞痣呈圆形或椭圆形，颜色常接近深褐色、红褐色或肉色，直径一般小于6毫米，也可以更小或更大。

HP:0009571.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009571.ENG_NAME: Curved middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009571.ENG_DEF: Curved appearance of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger.
HP:0009571.CNS_DEF: 第二个手指中节指骨弯曲外观。

HP:0001092.ENG_DEF: No identifiable superior and/or inferior lacrimal punctum.
HP:0001092.CNS_DEF: 没有明确的上和/或下泪点。

HP:0000340.ENG_DEF: Inclination of the anterior surface of the forehead from the vertical more than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or apparently excessive posterior sloping of the forehead in a lateral view.
HP:0000340.CNS_DEF: 额头的前表面倾斜度大于平均值超过2个标准偏差（客观）;或者从侧面观察额头显得过度向后倾斜。

HP:0001394.ENG_DEF: A chronic disorder of the `liver` (FMA:7197) in which liver tissue becomes `scarred` (PATO:0001850) and is partially replaced by regenerative nodules and fibrotic tissue resulting in loss of liver function.
HP:0001394.CNS_DEF: 肝脏的一种慢性疾病，其肝组织变得“伤痕累累”，并且部分被再生的结节和纤维组织取代，从而导致肝功能的丧失。

HP:0002343.ENG_DEF: A form of `hydrocephalus` (HP:0000238) characterized by enlarged cerebral ventricles and normal cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) pressure upon lumbar puncture.
HP:0002343.CNS_DEF: 伴有腰穿检测脑脊液压力正常的脑室系统扩大的一种脑积水

HP:0012894.ENG_DEF: Muscle hypertrophy affecting the paraspinal muscles.

HP:0006355.ENG_DEF: `Agenesis` (MPATH:57) of `lower secondary incisor` (FMA:55713) or `lower primary incisor` (FMA:84215).
HP:0006355.CNS_DEF: 恒下颌切牙或乳下颌切牙发育不全

HP:0200040.CNS_NAME: 角质囊肿、漏斗部囊肿、表皮包涵囊肿
HP:0200040.ENG_DEF: The presence of one or more `cysts` (MPATH:62) of the `skin` (FMA:7163).
HP:0200040.CNS_DEF: 皮肤表面单发或多发的囊肿。

HP:0004510.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0004510.ENG_DEF: Hyperplasia of the islets of Langerhans, i.e., of the regions of the pancreas that contain its endocrine cells.
HP:0004510.CNS_DEF: 朗格汉斯岛（胰岛），即胰腺含有内分泌细胞的区域的增生。

HP:0002718.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to bacterial infections, as manifested by recurrent episodes of bacterial infection.
HP:0002718.CNS_DEF: 细菌性感染的传染易感性增加，表现为反复发作的细菌感染。

HP:0006477.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the alveolar ridges (on the upper or lower jaws). The alveolar ridges contain the sockets (alveoli) of the teeth.
HP:0006477.CNS_DEF: （上侧或下颌）牙槽脊的任何异常。牙槽脊含有长牙齿的凹槽。

HP:0011230.ENG_DEF: An eyebrow that extends laterally beyond the orbital rim rather than turning gently downward at that location.
HP:0011230.CNS_DEF: 眉毛横向延伸超出眼眶缘，而不是在该位置稍微向下弯曲。

HP:0011864.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased `diphosphate(4-)` (CHEBI:18361)  concentration in the `blood` (FMA:9670). Diphosphate(4-), as ester with two phosphate groups, is also known as pyrophosphate.
HP:0011864.CNS_DEF: 一个异常升高`二磷酸（4-）`（CHEBI:18361）在`blood`浓度（FMA:9670）。二磷酸（4-），如酯具有两个磷酸基团，也被称为焦磷酸。

HP:0009383.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009383.ENG_DEF: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009383.CNS_DEF: 托架骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有托架状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0010004.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010004.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the distal phalanges of the hand
HP:0010004.ENG_DEF: A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the distal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.
HP:0010004.CNS_DEF: 的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个手的远端指骨的或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。

HP:0003402.CNS_DEF: 小型终板电位的波幅异常降低，前者指在神经肌肉接头处由单个囊泡释放的递质所产生的突触后反应。

HP:0011290.ENG_NAME: EEG with frontal sharp slow waves

HP:0011290.CNS_DEF: 脑电图额部尖慢波。尖慢波是时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂局灶尖波紧随一个慢波。

HP:0030003.ENG_DEF: A type of lagophthalmos that occurs in association with facial nerve palsy.

HP:0003108.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003108.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `glycine` (CHEBI:15428 ) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0003108.CNS_DEF: 尿液中甘氨酸浓度增加。

HP:0001134.ENG_DEF: A `polar cataract` (HP:0010696) that affects the `anterior pole of the lens` (FMA:58897).
HP:0001134.CNS_DEF: 一种极性白内障`（HP:0010696），影响晶状体`（FMA:58897）的前极。

HP:0003226.ENG_NAME: Rectilinear intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003226.CNS_NAME: 自体萤光脂色素存贮物质的直线性胞内堆积
HP:0003226.ENG_DEF: An `intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material` (HP:0003204) in a `straight` (PATO:0002180) or rectilinear pattern.
HP:0003226.CNS_DEF: 在`straight`（PATO:0002180）或直线图案:萤光lipopigment存储material`的'细胞内积累（0003204 HP）。

HP:0009378.ENG_DEF: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 5th (little) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.
HP:0009378.CNS_DEF: 小手指指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。

HP:3000073.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000073.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of levator veli palatini muscle
HP:3000073.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a levator veli palatini.

HP:0009116.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia involving bones of the skull

HP:0040196.ENG_DEF: Decreased occipito-frontal (head) circumference (OFC). For the microcephaly OFC must be between -3 SD and -2 SD compared to appropriate, age matched, normal standards (i.e. -3 SD <= OFC < -2 SD).

HP:0009598.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009598.CNS_NAME: 食指的近端指骨与第二掌骨关节粘连

HP:0009598.CNS_DEF: 食指近端指骨与第二掌骨融合。

HP:0003914.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003914.CNS_NAME: 肱骨干骺端不规则骨化

HP:0100858.ENG_DEF: Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the `celiac artery` (FMA:50737).
HP:0100858.CNS_DEF: 腹腔动脉壁的异常外翻或囊样扩张（FMA:50737）。

HP:0009436.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009436.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009436.ENG_DEF: Triangular shaped middle phalanx of the 3rd (middle) finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.
HP:0009436.CNS_DEF: 中指的中节指骨呈三角形。三角指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。

HP:0030474.CNS_NAME: 无法检出暗适应视网膜电图

HP:0010918.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `cysteine metabolic process` (GO:0006534).

HP:0012748.ENG_DEF: A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MIR) of the brainstem. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the brainstem.
HP:0012748.CNS_DEF: 在MRI T2加权像上，脑干存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指脑干特定区域的局部高信号。

HP:0006369.ENG_DEF: An alteration of the normally relatively smooth margins of the kneecap in radiographic images leading to an irregular contour.
HP:0006369.CNS_DEF: 在放射线图像导致不规则轮廓膝盖骨的通常相对平滑余量的改变。

HP:0001833.ENG_DEF: Increased back to front length of the foot.
HP:0001833.CNS_DEF: 增加回到脚的前部的长度。

HP:0100861.ENG_DEF: Increase in bone density of the vertebral body.

HP:0009442.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009442.ENG_DEF: Curved appearance of the phalanges of the 3rd finger.
HP:0009442.CNS_DEF: 第三个手指的指骨弯曲外观。

HP:0012472.ENG_DEF: A turning outward of the lip or lips, that is, eversion of the lips.
HP:0012472.CNS_DEF: 向外翻出的嘴唇，嘴唇外翻。

HP:0012513.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012513.ENG_DEF: Pain in the arm with no clear focal etiology.
HP:0012513.CNS_DEF: 没有明确局部病因的手臂疼痛。

HP:0005345.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the vena cava, which is a large vein that carries deoxygenated blood from the body into the right atrium of the heart.
HP:0005345.CNS_DEF: 腔静脉异常，即输送全身缺氧血回到心脏右心房的大静脉发生的异常。

HP:0030852.ENG_DEF: Increased amplitude of the pulse pressure (systolic blood pressure minus diastolic blood pressure).

HP:0100247.ENG_DEF: A contraction of the diaphragm that repeats several times per minute. In humans, the abrupt rush of air into the lungs causes the epiglottis to close, creating a hic sound. Also known as synchronous diaphragmatic flutter (SDF), or singultus, from the Latin singult, the act of catching one's breath while sobbing. The hiccup is an involuntary action involving a reflex arc.
HP:0100247.CNS_DEF: 每分钟重复几次的横膈膜挛缩。在人类，空气突然冲入肺中引起会厌关闭，发出打嗝的声音。也称为同步膈膜颤振，或呃逆，来自拉丁语singult（抽泣时喘气的行为）。打嗝是反射弧参与的不自主动作。

HP:0000625.ENG_DEF: A short discontinuity of the margin of the lower or upper eyelid.
HP:0000625.CNS_DEF: 下眼睑或上眼睑边缘有短的间断

HP:0001601.ENG_DEF: Laryngomalacia is a congenital abnormality of the laryngeal cartilage in which the cartilage is floppy and prolapses over the larynx during inspiration.
HP:0001601.CNS_DEF: 喉软骨软化是一种吸气时软骨松软和塌陷的喉软骨先天发畸形育。

HP:0008969.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0003217.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `glutamine` (CHEBI:28300) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0030361.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the metabolism of an icosanoid (also know as eicosanoids). These are signaling molecules derived from oxidation of 20-carbon fatty acids. Most are produced from arachidonic acid, a 20-carbon polyunsaturated fatty acid (5,8,11,14-eicosatetraenoic acid).

HP:0030797.ENG_NAME: Reduced volume of central subdivision of bed nucleus of stria terminalis
HP:0030797.CNS_NAME: 终纹床核中央区体积减少
HP:0030797.ENG_DEF: A diminished volume of the central part of the bed nucleus of the stria terminalis.

HP:0002884.ENG_DEF: A kind of `neoplasm of the liver` (HP:0002896) that originates from immature liver precursor cells and macroscopically is composed of tissue resembling fetal or mature liver cells or bile ducts.
HP:0002884.CNS_DEF: 一种肝肿瘤，起源于未成熟的肝脏前体细胞，宏观上由类似胎儿或成熟肝细胞或胆管的组织组成。

HP:0006282.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006282.CNS_NAME: 泛发性牙釉质发育不全
HP:0006282.ENG_DEF: A `generalized` (PATO:0001513) form of developmental hypoplasia of the `dental enamel` (FMA:55629).
HP:0006282.CNS_DEF: 一种泛发性的牙齿釉质发育不全

HP:0005302.ENG_DEF: Abnormal tortuous (i.e., twisted) form of the carotid arteries.

HP:0011429.ENG_DEF: A short humerus length is defined as a length below the 2.5th percentile for gestational age or as a measurement less than 0.9 of that predicted by the measured biparietal diameter. The humerus should be measured with the bone perpendicular to the ultrasound beam and with epiphyseal cartilages visible but not included in the measurement (pmid:16100637).
HP:0011429.CNS_DEF: 胎儿肱骨短小定义为肱骨长度测值小于同孕龄第2.5百分位、或小于以双顶径为标准计算孕龄的第10百分位以下。测量时肱骨应与超声波束垂直，并可见骨骺软骨，但其不包含在测量范围内。

HP:0010754.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011898.CNS_NAME: 外周血纤维蛋白原异常
HP:0011898.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the level of activity of circulating fibrinogen.
HP:0011898.CNS_DEF: 外周血中纤维蛋白原的活性异常。

HP:0040246.ENG_DEF: Reduced antithrombin antigen. A reduced level of antithrombin may lead to an increased risk of thrombus formation.

HP:0012363.ENG_NAME: Decreased sialylation of O-linked protein glycosylation
HP:0012363.CNS_NAME: O联蛋白糖基的唾液酸化降低

HP:3000006.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a medial pterygoid muscle.

HP:0003019.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003019.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the wrist, the structure connecting the hand and the forearm.
HP:0003019.CNS_DEF: 手腕的异常，手腕是连接手和前臂的结构。

HP:0009388.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009388.ENG_DEF: Sclerosis of the epiphyses of the 5th finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0009388.CNS_DEF: 硬化的第五手指的骨骺，导致的射线不透性（白色或者象牙色外观）在X射线的程度增加。

HP:0012433.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of  actions or reactions of a person taking place during interactions with others.
HP:0012433.CNS_DEF: 与他人的互动过程中发生的反应或动作异常。

HP:0000646.ENG_DEF: Reduced visual acuity that is uncorrectable by lenses in the absence of detectable anatomic defects in the eye or visual pathways.
HP:0000646.CNS_DEF: 视力下降，无可检测的解剖学缺陷，也不可用镜片矫正。

HP:0010381.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010381.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the middle phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0010381.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾中节趾骨异常

HP:0002277.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;眼睛的异常
HP:0002277.ENG_DEF: An abnormality resulting from a lesion of the sympathetic nervous system characterized by a combination of unilateral ptosis, miosis, and often ipsilateral hypohidrosis and conjunctival injection.
HP:0002277.CNS_DEF: 异常特征由交感神经系统的损伤而引起，表现为单方面上睑下垂，瞳孔缩小，并经常同侧少汗和结膜下注射。

HP:0004791.ENG_DEF: Defect in the epithelium of the esophagus, essentially an open sore in the lining of the esophagus.
HP:0004791.CNS_DEF: 食管上皮的缺损，本质上是食管的开放性溃疡。

HP:0003076.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003076.CNS_DEF: 尿液中葡萄糖的浓度增加。

HP:0011348.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the sixth cranial nerve

HP:0009693.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009693.ENG_DEF: A pseudoepiphysis (which is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis) of one or more phalanges of the thumb.
HP:0009693.CNS_DEF: 甲pseudoepiphysis（它是仲骨化中心不同于正常骨骺）的拇指的一个或多个指骨。

HP:0001217.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001217.ENG_DEF: Broadening of the soft tissues (non-edematous swelling of soft tissues) of the digital tips in all dimensions associated with an increased longitudinal and lateral curvature of the nails.
HP:0001217.CNS_DEF: 拓宽了与指甲的增加纵向和横向弯曲相关联的所有层面对数字提示的软组织（软组织无肿胀水肿）的。

HP:0009580.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009580.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009580.CNS_NAME: 食指的近节指骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0007346.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010308.ENG_DEF: The congenital absence of the sternum.

HP:0003244.ENG_DEF: Location of the urethral opening on the inferior aspect of the penis.

HP:0011629.ENG_DEF: No pericardium around the heart, occurring as a congenital defect, not the result of a surgical pericardectomy.
HP:0011629.CNS_DEF: 心脏周围没有心包膜，是先天性缺陷的一种，而不是由心包切除术所致。

HP:0000544.ENG_DEF: Paralysis of the external ocular muscles.

HP:0004044.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003690.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0003690.ENG_DEF: Reduced strength and weakness of the muscles of the arms and legs.
HP:0003690.CNS_DEF: 强度降低和手臂和腿的肌肉无力。

HP:0005441.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005441.ENG_DEF: An increased density in the cranial sutures following obliteration.
HP:0005441.CNS_DEF: 颅缝闭合后，该处骨密度增加。

HP:0000041.ENG_DEF: A condition in which the head of the penis curves downward.

HP:0012828.ENG_DEF: Having a high degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between four and five standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.

HP:0008242.ENG_DEF: A state of renal tubular unresponsiveness or resistance to the action of aldosterone.
HP:0008242.CNS_DEF: 此症表现为肾小管对醛固酮的作用无反应或失敏。

HP:0003712.ENG_DEF: Hypertrophy (increase in size) of muscle cells (as opposed to hyperplasia, which refers to an increase in the number of muscle cells).
HP:0003712.CNS_DEF: 肌细胞肥大即肌细胞体积增大，不同于增生（即肌细胞数目增多）。

HP:0005696.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005696.ENG_DEF: Supernumerary digits located at the ulnar side of the hand with a complete extra finger and extra metacarpal.
HP:0005696.CNS_DEF: 编外位位于手的尺侧有一个完整的额外的手指和额外的掌骨。

HP:0006544.ENG_DEF: A type of pulmonary sequestration that is completely enclosed in its own pleural sac, occurring above, within, or below the diaphragm, and without communication with the tracheobronchial tree.
HP:0006544.CNS_DEF: 肺隔离症的一种，具有自己完全封闭的胸腔腔，发生在膈上、膈内或膈下，并且不与气管支气管树的相通。

HP:0005180.CNS_DEF: 三尖瓣在右心室收缩时未充分关闭，从而导致血液回流（倒灌）流入右心房。

HP:0008038.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the lacrimal gland.

HP:0000577.ENG_DEF: A form of strabismus with one or both eyes deviated outward.
HP:0000577.CNS_DEF: 斜视的一种，一个或两个眼睛向外偏离。

HP:0000877.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0000877.CNS_NAME: 青春期胰岛素抵抗性糖尿病

HP:0009855.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009855.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the proximal phalanges of the hand
HP:0009855.CNS_NAME: 手的近节指骨溶骨缺陷

HP:0001094.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;免疫系统的异常
HP:0001094.ENG_DEF: A type of anterior uveitis, in which there is Inflammation of the iris and the ciliary body.
HP:0001094.CNS_DEF: 前葡萄膜炎，累及虹膜和睫状体。

HP:0012741.ENG_DEF: Absence of a testis  from the scrotum on one side owing to failure of the testis or testes to descend through the inguinal canal to the testis.
HP:0012741.CNS_DEF: 由于睾丸未能通过腹股沟管下降到阴囊，造成一侧睾丸缺失。

HP:0012845.ENG_DEF: Presence of a unitary trichilemmoma, a benign tumour originating from the outer root sheath of the hair follicle.
HP:0012845.CNS_DEF: 单一的毛根鞘瘤，来源于毛囊外毛根鞘的良性肿瘤。

HP:0011276.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0100215.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100215.ENG_NAME: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100215.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾中节趾骨的锥形骨骺

HP:0009986.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009986.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 5th finger
HP:0009986.CNS_NAME: 小手指的指骨的完全重复
HP:0009986.ENG_DEF: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 5th finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.
HP:0009986.CNS_DEF: 一个完整的复制影响一个第五手指的指骨或更多。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。

HP:0006597.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0012148.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0012148.ENG_DEF: Myelodysplasia with dysplastic changes in two or more of the myeloid lineages: erythroid, granulocytic, megakaryocytic.
HP:0012148.CNS_DEF: 脊髓发育不良影响两个或更多的骨髓细胞系:红细胞，粒细胞，巨核细胞。

HP:0011682.ENG_DEF: A ventricular septal defect that is confluent with and involves the membranous septum and is bordered by an atrioventricular valve, not including the type 3 VSDs.
HP:0011682.CNS_DEF: 膜周室间隔缺损是与膜性中隔汇合、涉及膜性中隔、以房室瓣为界、不包括3型房室间隔缺损的一类房室间隔缺损。

HP:0011569.ENG_DEF: Cleft in the anterior mitral valve leaflet not associated with an atrioventricular canal defect.
HP:0011569.CNS_DEF: 二尖瓣前叶裂与房室管缺陷无关。

HP:0005798.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005798.ENG_DEF: A dislocation of the head of the radius from its socket in the elbow joint in an posterior direction.
HP:0005798.CNS_DEF: 与其在肘关节插座半径的头的一个后方向A脱位。

HP:0001410.ENG_DEF: Reduced ability of the liver to perform its functions.
HP:0001410.CNS_DEF: 肝脏行使其功能的能力降低。

HP:0000478.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the `eye` (FMA:54448), including location, spacing, and intraocular abnormalities.
HP:0000478.CNS_DEF: 眼部异常，包括眼球的位置、间距和眼内组织的异常（54448 FMA）。

HP:0009687.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009687.ENG_DEF: Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds a phalangeal bone, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of a phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009687.CNS_DEF: 托架骨骺指其中骨骺包围指骨，具有托架状形态和一个指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0007616.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0007616.ENG_DEF: `Naevus flammeus` (HP:0001052) localised in the skin of the neck. This is one of the most common birthmarks and present in approximately 25% of all newborns.
HP:0007616.CNS_DEF: “鲜红斑痣”（HP:0001052）局限于颈部的皮肤上。这是最常见的胎记之一，新生儿约25％存在。

HP:0000085.ENG_DEF: A connection of the right and left kidney by an isthmus of functioning renal parenchyma or fibrous tissue that crosses the midline.
HP:0000085.CNS_DEF: 由肾实质或纤维组织跨越中线峡部连接左右肾，呈现马蹄状。

HP:0004566.ENG_DEF: Bulbous appearance of the anterior vertebral bodies, such that the vertebral bodies have the greatest vertical height anteriorly as well as bulbous anterior superior-inferior contours.
HP:0004566.CNS_DEF: 前椎体球状的外观，使得脊椎体具有最大的垂直高度前方以及球根前上劣轮廓。

HP:0001832.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001832.ENG_DEF: Abnormalities of the `metatarsal bones` (FMA:24492) (i.e. of five tubular bones located between the tarsal bones of the hind- and mid-foot and the phalanges of the toes).
HP:0001832.CNS_DEF: 跖骨的异常，跖骨是位于足后部和足中部的跗骨和脚趾的趾骨之间的五个管状骨。

HP:0000706.ENG_DEF: The presence of one or more embedded tooth germs which have failed to erupt.
HP:0000706.CNS_DEF: 一颗或多颗牙齿未能萌出。

HP:0004688.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0007707.CNS_NAME: 先天性原发性无晶体眼
HP:0007707.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect resulting in congenital absence of the crystalline lens.
HP:0007707.CNS_DEF: 一个发育缺陷导致先天性无晶状体。

HP:0100229.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100229.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100229.CNS_NAME: 第五趾近节趾骨的骨骺不规则

HP:0009189.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009189.ENG_DEF: Fragmented appearance of the epiphyses of the metacarpals.

HP:0011955.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0011955.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple granulomas in the liver as based on pathological examination. Granulomas are small 0.5 to 2 mm collections of modified macrophages called epithelioid cells usually surrounded by lymphocytes.
HP:0011955.CNS_DEF: 基于病理检测的肝脏中多个肉芽肿的存在。肉芽肿大小为0.5-2毫米，为由淋巴细胞包围的被称为上皮样细胞的改性巨噬细胞的集合。

HP:0004028.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0007285.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0007285.ENG_NAME: Facial palsy secondary to cranial hyperostosis
HP:0007285.CNS_NAME: 面神经麻痹继发于颅脑骨质增生
HP:0007285.ENG_DEF: Paralysis of the facial nerves on the basis of overgrowth of the cranial bones causing impingement upon the seventh cranial nerve.
HP:0007285.CNS_DEF: 颅骨过度生长导致第七颅神经受夹击，进而导致的面部神经麻痹。

HP:0010852.ENG_DEF: EEG abnormalities (epileptiform discharges) evoked by flashing lights or black and white striped patterns.
HP:0010852.CNS_DEF: 脑电图异常（癫痫样放电）由闪光刺激或黑色和白色条纹的图案诱发。

HP:0002421.ENG_DEF: Difficulty to maintain correct position of the head while standing or sitting.
HP:0002421.CNS_DEF: 站或坐时很难保持头的正确位置。

HP:0010237.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010237.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in the epiphyses of phalanges of the fingers.
HP:0010237.CNS_DEF: 点状异常（有斑点，斑点等）钙化的手指指骨骨骺的存在。

HP:0010722.ENG_DEF: An `asymmetriy` (PATO:0000616), i.e., difference in size or shape between the left and right `ear` (FMA:52780 ).
HP:0010722.CNS_DEF: 耳朵`不对称`（PATO: 0000616），即，在左，右耳（FMA: 52780）在大小或形态上存在差异。

HP:0006147.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006147.CNS_NAME: 进行性第2-5指间关节融合

HP:0008946.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0008946.ENG_DEF: Atrophy of the muscles of the pelvic girdle (also known as hip girdle), i.e., the gluteal muscles, the lateral rotators, the adductors, the psoas major and the iliacus muscle.
HP:0008946.CNS_DEF: 骨盆带（也称为臀腰带）肌萎缩，即，臀肌，横向回旋肌，内转肌，腰大和髂肌的肌肉。

HP:0012784.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012784.ENG_DEF: Inflammation of the connective and adipose tissues surrounding the kidney.
HP:0012784.CNS_DEF: 肾脏周围结缔组织和脂肪组织的炎症。

HP:0001504.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009277.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009277.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger
HP:0009277.CNS_NAME: 无名指的掌指关节挛缩
HP:0009277.ENG_DEF: Chronic loss of joint motion of the metacarpophalangeal joint of the 4th finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.
HP:0009277.CNS_DEF: 的第四手指的掌指关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。

HP:0100208.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100208.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100208.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的末节趾骨乳白色骨骺

HP:0000132.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0000132.ENG_DEF: Abnormally heavy and prolonged menstrual period.
HP:0000132.CNS_DEF: 月经异常增多和经期延长。

HP:0010047.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0200043.ENG_DEF: Warts, benign growths on the skin or mucous membranes that cause cosmetic problems as well as pain and discomfort. Warts most often occur on the hands, feet, and genital areas.
HP:0200043.CNS_DEF: 疣指发生于皮肤或粘膜，常常引起美容问题以及疼痛不适。最常发生于手，足和生殖器部位。

HP:0011737.CNS_NAME: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素（CRH）缺陷引起的肾上腺功能不全
HP:0011737.ENG_DEF: Adrenal insufficiency secondary to a defect in corticotropin-releasing hormone production.
HP:0011737.CNS_DEF: 促肾上腺皮质激素释放激素产生缺陷引起的继发性肾上腺功能不全。

HP:0003733.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0040267.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0000920.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased size of the costochondral junctions, which are located between the distal part of the ribs and the costal cartilages, which are bars of hyaline cartilage that connect the ribs to the sternum.
HP:0000920.CNS_DEF: 异常增加的肋软骨结，分别位于肋条和肋软骨，它们是肋连接到胸骨透明软骨的杆的末端部分之间的尺寸。

HP:0100708.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `microglial cells` (CL:0000129). They are also known as brain-resident macrophages or hortega cells.
HP:0100708.CNS_DEF: 在`小胶质细胞`的异常（CL:0000129）。小胶质细胞也被称为脑原始巨噬细胞或小神经胶质细胞。

HP:0011468.ENG_DEF: Sudden, repetitive, nonrhythmic motor movements (spasms), involving the eyes and muscles of the face.
HP:0011468.CNS_DEF: 眼睛和面部肌肉的突然，重复，无节奏的活动（痉挛）。

HP:0002373.ENG_DEF: Febrile seizures are convulsions induced by a fever in infants or small children and are generally characterized by loss of consciousness and tonic-clonic movements. Most febrile seizures last a minute or two.
HP:0002373.CNS_DEF: 指婴儿或幼儿发热导致的抽搐，通常表现为意识丧失和强直-阵挛发作。大多数热性惊厥持续一到两分钟。

HP:0008271.ENG_DEF: Abnormal morphology of collagen fibers in cartilage. In cartilage, collagen II, actually a collagen II:IX:XI heterofibril, is by far the most important type of collagen. A number of abnormalities may be appreciated by electron micrography or biochemical investigations, including sparse collagen fibers in the cartilage matrix.
HP:0008271.CNS_DEF: 软骨胶原纤维的形态异常。在软骨中，II型胶原（实际是胶原蛋白2:9:11异源复合纤维）是最重要的一类胶原蛋白。通过电镜或生化研究可确定一些这样的异常，包括软骨基质中的稀少胶原纤维.

HP:0005160.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0005160.ENG_DEF: Total anomalous pulmonary venous return refers to a congenital malformation in which all four pulmonary veins do not connect normally to the left atrium, but instead drain abnormally to the right atrium.
HP:0005160.CNS_DEF: 全肺静脉回流异常是一种先天性畸形，全部四个肺静脉没有连接到左心房，而是将所有血液流入到了右心房。

HP:0002659.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased tendency to fractures of bones caused by an abnormal reduction in bone strength that is generally associated with an increased risk of fracture.
HP:0002659.CNS_DEF: 一个异常增加的倾向，造成骨强度的异常降低，其通常与骨折的风险增加相关的骨头骨折。

HP:0006140.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006140.ENG_DEF: Fusion of the epiphysis and metaphysis of one or more phalanges prior to the normal age or stage of growth.
HP:0006140.CNS_DEF: 融合前的正常年龄的增长或阶段骨骺和一个或多个指骨干骺端。

HP:0000255.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;免疫系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012696.CNS_NAME: 丘脑核磁共振信号强度异常
HP:0012696.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus.
HP:0012696.CNS_DEF: 磁共振成像（MRI）上丘脑的信号偏离正常值。

HP:0011739.CNS_NAME: 地塞米松可抑性原发性醛固酮增多症
HP:0011739.ENG_DEF: A form of primary hyperaldosteronism in which the overproduction of aldosterone can be suppressed by the administration of dexamethasone.
HP:0011739.CNS_DEF: 原发性醛固酮增多症的一种形式，该病通过使用地塞米松来可以抑制过多的醛固酮产生。

HP:0010000.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010000.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the proximal phalanges of the hand
HP:0010000.CNS_NAME: 手的近端指骨的完全重复
HP:0010000.ENG_DEF: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the proximal phalanges of the hand. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.
HP:0010000.CNS_DEF: 一个完整的复制影响一个手的近端指骨或更多。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。

HP:0007695.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the reflex that controls the diameter of the pupil, in response to the intensity of light that falls on the retina of the eye.
HP:0007695.CNS_DEF: 瞳孔对光反射是指光落在视网膜上，反射性引起瞳孔直径缩小。

HP:0002607.ENG_DEF: Involuntary fecal soiling in adults and children who have usually already been toilet trained.
HP:0002607.CNS_DEF: 已经过如厕训练的成人和儿童的非自愿的排便。

HP:0000002.ENG_DEF: Deviation from the norm of height with respect to that which is expected according to age and gender norms.
HP:0000002.CNS_DEF: 身高偏离该年龄性别预期身高的正常范围。

HP:0000826.ENG_DEF: The onset of secondary sexual characteristics before a normal age. Although it is difficult to define normal age ranges because of the marked variation with which puberty begins in normal children, precocious puberty can be defined as the onset of puberty before the age of 8 years in girls or 9 years in boys.
HP:0000826.CNS_DEF: 指第二性征在正常年龄之前开始。尽管正常儿童青春期开始的年龄差别很大而难以界定“正常年龄”，性早熟通常定义为男孩9岁或者女孩8岁之前青春期发育开始。

HP:0012651.ENG_DEF: A severe form of gait ataxia such that an affected person cannot walk at all.
HP:0012651.CNS_DEF: 明显的步态共济失调，导致受累者无法行走。

HP:0007166.ENG_DEF: Episodic bouts of involuntary movements with dystonic, choreic, ballistic movements, or a combination thereof. There is no loss of consciousness during the attacks.
HP:0007166.CNS_DEF: 不自主运动的发作，表现为肌张力障碍、舞蹈病、芭蕾样动作或以上动作的综合。上述表现是无意识丧失

HP:0009050.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0011079.ENG_DEF: A tooth that has not erupted because of local impediments (overcrowding or fibrous gum overgrowth).
HP:0011079.CNS_DEF: 由于局部障碍（如牙齿过挤或纤维质牙龈过度生长）而未萌出的牙齿。

HP:0011345.CNS_DEF: 获取根据需求、愿望或想法运用语言进行交流的能力中度延迟。

HP:0005219.ENG_DEF: Absence of `gastric intrinsic factor` (PRO:000007975), which is normally produced by the parietal cells of the stomach, and is required for the absorption of vitamin B12.
HP:0005219.CNS_DEF: “胃内因子”的缺失，该因子一般由胃壁细胞产生，维生素B12的吸收需要该因子。

HP:0005506.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常

HP:0005506.CNS_DEF: 骨髓增生性疾病，其特点的粒细胞系多度增殖但仍有分化能力。

HP:0010459.ENG_DEF: The presence of both ovarian and testicular tissues either in the same or in opposite gonads. Affected persons have ambiguous genitalia and may have 46,XX or 46,XY karyotypes or 46,XX/XY mosaicism.
HP:0010459.CNS_DEF: 在个体的同一侧或相对侧性腺里存在卵巢和睾丸组织。受累个体外生殖器不能辨别性别，染色体核型可能为46,XX、46,XY或46,XX/XY嵌合体。

HP:0000546.CNS_DEF: 视网膜的病变。这里非特异性术语​​保留，因为它在文献中广泛使用，但如果可能的新注解应注明精确的类型的视网膜异常。

HP:0009185.ENG_DEF: Proximal interphalangeal (PIP) flexion deformity of the little finger. That is, the PIP joint of a little finger is bent (flexed) and cannot be straightened actively or passively. It is thus a chronic loss of joint motion due to structural changes in muscle, tendons, ligaments, or skin that prevents normal movement.

HP:0030436.ENG_DEF: Fibrofolliculoma is a clinically asymptomatic, 2-4 mm, skin-colored, dome-shaped smooth papule. It usually arises in the form of multiple lesions in adults in different areas such as the scalp, forehead, face, and neck. According to histology, the lesion is a fibrotic hamartoma characterized by infundibular epithelial proliferation and perifollicular fibrous proliferation.

HP:0009942.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009942.ENG_DEF: Complete or partial duplication of the phalanges of the thumb. Depending on the severity, the appearance on x-ray can vary from a notched phalanx (the duplicated bone is almost completely fused with the phalanx), a partially fused appearance of the two bones (bifid), two separate bones appearing side to side, or completely duplicated phalanges (proximal and distal phalanx of the thumb and/or 1st metacarpal). In contrast to the phalanges of the digits 2-5 (proximal, middle and distal), the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009942.CNS_DEF: 拇指指骨完全或部分重复。根据不同的严重程度，对X射线的外观可以从一个缺口指骨变化（重复的骨几乎完全与指骨稠合），这两个骨头（双歧）的部分熔合外观，两个单独的骨骼出现一边到另一边，或完全复制趾骨（近端和拇指和/或第1掌骨远端指骨）。相反的数字2-5（近端，中间和远端）趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此等效到的其他数字近端指骨。

HP:0008517.ENG_DEF: `Aplasia` (MPATH:58) or developmental hypoplasia of the `sacral bone` (FMA:16202).

HP:0030058.ENG_DEF: An irreversible distortion of the morphology of an erythrocyte such that the cells are elongated and curved, resembling the blade of a sickle (the hand-held agricultural tool traditionally used to harvest grains).

HP:0100211.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100211.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的末节趾骨骨骺点状钙化

HP:0012551.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0012551.CNS_NAME: 中性粒细胞特殊颗粒缺乏
HP:0012551.ENG_DEF: Lack of specific granules in neutrophils.
HP:0012551.CNS_DEF: 缺乏特定的中性粒细胞颗粒。

HP:0025013.ENG_DEF: A type of rigidity that is manifested by an exaggerated extensor posture of all extremities.

HP:0010027.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010027.ENG_DEF: Increased width of the 1st metacarapal. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0010027.CNS_DEF: 增加的宽度第一metacarapal的。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0025025.MAIN_CLASS: 泌尿生殖系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0025025.ENG_DEF: A congenital malformation characterized by an abnormal connection (fistula) between the rectum and the vulval vestibule, at the lower aspect of the vaginal opening.

HP:0001140.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;头或颈部的异常
HP:0001140.ENG_DEF: An epibulbar dermoid is a benign tumor typically found at the junction of the cornea and sclera (limbal epibullar dermoid).
HP:0001140.CNS_DEF: 眼球表面的皮样囊肿是一种良性肿瘤，通常出现在角膜和巩膜（角膜缘epibullar皮样瘤）的交界处。

HP:0004944.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0004944.ENG_DEF: The presence of a localized dilatation or ballooning of a cerebral artery.
HP:0004944.CNS_DEF: 大脑动脉出现的局部扩张或气球样膨胀。

HP:0009963.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009963.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009963.ENG_DEF: Partial or complete duplication of the `middle phalanx of middle finger` (FMA:23934).
HP:0009963.CNS_DEF: 中间finger`的`中节指骨部分或完全复制（FMA:23934）。

HP:0011848.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0007238.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006346.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of `morphology` (PATO:0000051) of the `incisor tooth` (FMA:12823) in which the tooth is shaped like a screwdriver blade, i.e., having a `rhomboid` (PATO:0001938) shape.
HP:0006346.CNS_DEF: 如螺丝刀状的切牙形态异常，即具有菱形的外形。

HP:0005263.ENG_DEF: The presence of `inflammation` (MPATH:212) of the `gastric mucous membrane` (FMA:14907).

HP:0004976.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0001540.MAIN_CLASS: 肌肉组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0001540.ENG_DEF: A separation of the rectus abdominis muscle into right and left halves (which are normally joined at the midline at the linea alba).
HP:0001540.CNS_DEF: 腹直肌分离为左右两部分（它们通常在腹白线中线处连接）。

HP:0006758.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0006758.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `malignant` (PATO:0002097) `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `genital system` (7160).

HP:0011395.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the cochlea, a spiral shaped cavity in the inner ear, owing to a developmental defect.
HP:0011395.CNS_DEF: 由于发育缺陷，导致在内耳中呈螺旋形态的耳蜗的缺失或发育不全。

HP:0030914.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the wave-like muscle contractions of the digestive tract.

HP:0030349.ENG_DEF: A reduction in the blood concentration of an androgen, that is, of a steroid hormone that controls development and maintenance of masculine characteristics. The androgens include testosterone and Dehydroepiandrosterone.

HP:0030513.ENG_NAME: Difficulty adjusting from light to dark
HP:0030513.CNS_NAME: 从明亮到黑暗适应困难

HP:0012055.ENG_DEF: Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the ciliary body.
HP:0012055.CNS_DEF: 睫状体黑色素细胞的恶性肿瘤。

HP:0009375.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009375.ENG_DEF: Bullet-shaped phalanges refers to short and wide phalanges that taper distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.
HP:0009375.CNS_DEF: 子弹形趾是指短而宽的指骨远端逐渐变细。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

HP:0100135.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100135.ENG_NAME: Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100135.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾的末节指骨骨骺缺失

HP:0200124.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0200124.ENG_NAME: Chronic hepatitis due to cryptospridium infection
HP:0200124.CNS_NAME: 隐孢子虫感染引起的慢性肝炎

HP:0009769.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009769.ENG_DEF: The presence of short and wide phalanges which taper distally ("bullet shaped").
HP:0009769.CNS_DEF: 短而宽指骨其远端逐渐变细（“子弹形”）的存在。

HP:0002454.ENG_NAME: Eye of the tiger anomaly of globus pallidus
HP:0002454.ENG_DEF: The presence, on T2-weighted magnetic resonance imaging, of markedly low signal intensity if the `globus pallidus` (FMA:61835) that surrounds a central region of high signal intensity in the anteromedial globus pallidus, producing an eye-of-the-tiger appearance.
HP:0002454.CNS_DEF: 双侧苍白球、黑质MRI T2加权像对称性低信号，且在`苍白球`(FMA:61835)低信号的前内侧出现斑点状高信号，外观类似老虎眼。

HP:0011566.ENG_DEF: A congenital anomaly with partitioning of the right atrium to form a triatrial heart caused by persistence of the right valve of the sinus venosus. Typically, the right atrial partition is due to exaggerated fetal eustachian and thebesian valves, which together form an incomplete septum across the lower part of the atrium. This septum may range from a reticulum to a substantial sheet of tissue.
HP:0011566.CNS_DEF: 由于静脉窦右阀持续性存在导致右心房先天性被分隔，形成三个心房。通常，畸形的胎儿咽鼓管和冠状窦瓣在心房下部形成一个不完成的隔膜，引起右心房分区。这种隔膜既有网状组织也有实体组织。

HP:0004942.ENG_DEF: An aortic aneurysm is enlargement (dilation) of the aorta to greater than 1.5 times normal size. They usually cause no symptoms except when ruptured. Occasionally there may be abdominal, back or leg pain.
HP:0004942.CNS_DEF: 主动脉扩大1.5倍形成主动脉瘤，通常不表现症状，除非破裂。偶尔出现腹部、背部或腿部疼痛。

HP:0030269.CNS_NAME: 血循环胰岛素样生长因子-1（IGF1）水平增加
HP:0030269.ENG_DEF: An elevated level of insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF1) in the blood circulation.

HP:0100816.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0100044.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0002444.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `hamartoma` of the `hypothalamus` (FMA:62008).

HP:0004373.ENG_DEF: A type of `dystonia` (HP:0001332) that is localized to a specific part of the body.
HP:0004373.CNS_DEF: `肌张力障碍`（HP:0001332）的一种类型，局限于身体的特定部分。

HP:0100524.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0002689.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006077.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006077.CNS_NAME: 手指近端屈曲折痕缺如
HP:0006077.ENG_DEF: Absence of the proximal interphalangeal flexion creases of the fingers.
HP:0006077.CNS_DEF: 不存在手指的近端指间屈曲折痕。

HP:0010978.CNS_NAME: 免疫系统生理机制的异常
HP:0010978.ENG_DEF: A functional abnormality of the `immune system` (FMA:9825).

HP:0002213.ENG_DEF: Hair that is fine or thin to the touch.

HP:0001449.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012284.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012284.ENG_DEF: Reduced size of the proximal epiphysis of the tibia.

HP:0012400.ENG_DEF: An abnormal concentration of aldolase in the serum. Aldolase is an enzyme responsible for converting fructose 1,6-bisphosphate into the triose phosphates dihydroxyacetone phosphate and glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate.
HP:0012400.CNS_DEF: 血清中醛缩酶的浓度异常。醛缩酶是负责将果糖-1,6-双磷酸入转化为丙糖磷酸酯二羟丙酮磷酸和甘油醛-3-磷酸的酶。

HP:0002197.ENG_DEF: Seizures of with initial involvement of both cerebral hemispheres.
HP:0002197.CNS_DEF: 癫痫发作起始时双侧大脑半球均受累。

HP:0004380.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004380.ENG_DEF: Deposition of calcium salts in the aortic valve.

HP:0006456.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006456.ENG_DEF: Anomaly of the contour of the proximal epiphysis of the tibia such that its normally smooth appearance is irregular.
HP:0006456.CNS_DEF: 胫骨的近端骨骺的轮廓的异常，使得其通常平滑的外观是不规则的。

HP:0009960.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009960.ENG_NAME: Complete duplication of the phalanges of the 3rd finger
HP:0009960.CNS_NAME: 中指的指骨的完全重复
HP:0009960.ENG_DEF: A complete duplication affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 3rd finger. As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accesory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a Pseudoepiphyses (see according terms) sometimes also refered to as Hyperphalangism.
HP:0009960.CNS_DEF: 一个完整的复制影响一个第三手指的指骨或以上。相对于一个部分复制在那里仍然是重复的骨之间的融合的可变程度，一个完整的复制导致如看到的X-射线出现一边到另一边（桡尺轴）两个单独的骨头。一个重复导致的accesory骨出现在X射线PROXIMO-远端轴，其实这是一个不同的实体，称为Pseudoepiphyses（见按照条款）有时也refered为Hyperphalangism。

HP:0001119.ENG_DEF: Limbus-to-limbus corneal thinning, often greatest in the periphery, with globular protrusion of the cornea.
HP:0001119.CNS_DEF: 角膜变薄，在周边部较大，常有角膜的球形突出。

HP:0010084.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010084.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the distal phalanx of the hallux

HP:0012754.CNS_NAME: 中枢神经系统髓鞘形成增多
HP:0012754.ENG_DEF: Increased amount of myelin in the central nervous system.
HP:0012754.CNS_DEF: 中枢神经系统髓鞘数量增加。

HP:0000511.CNS_NAME: 垂直性核上性凝视麻痹
HP:0000511.ENG_DEF: A supranuclear gaze palsy is an inability to look in a vertical direction as a result of cerebral impairment. There is a loss of the voluntary aspect of eye movements, but, as the brainstem is still intact, all the reflex conjugate eye movements are normal.
HP:0000511.CNS_DEF: 核上性凝视麻痹是一个无法看在垂直方向的脑损伤的结果。有眼球运动的自愿性方面的损失，但是，由于脑干仍然完好，所有的反射共轭眼球运动是否正常。

HP:0010151.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010151.ENG_DEF: A conical (cone-shaped) appearance of the epiphysis of the first metatarsal of the foot.
HP:0010151.CNS_DEF: 锥形（锥形）外观脚的第一跖骨的骨骺。

HP:0011421.ENG_DEF: Death during adolescence, the period between childhood and adulthood (roughly between the ages of 10 and 19 years).

HP:0011894.ENG_NAME: Impaired thromboxane A2 agonist-induced platelet aggregation
HP:0011894.CNS_NAME: 血栓素A2受体激动剂诱导的血小板凝集受损
HP:0011894.ENG_DEF: Abnormal response to thromboxane as manifested by reduced or lacking aggregation of platelets upon addition of thromboxane A2 receptor agonists.
HP:0011894.CNS_DEF: 对血栓素异常响应，表现为血小板在加入血栓烷A2受体激动剂后减少或缺乏聚集。

HP:0011538.ENG_DEF: Mirror image atrial arrangement, with morphologic right atrium on the left hand side and morphologic left atrium on the right hand side.
HP:0011538.CNS_DEF: 形态学右心房在左手边，形态学左心房在右手边的镜像心房排列。

HP:0008371.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008371.ENG_DEF: Any abnormal process of ossification of the metatarsal bones.
HP:0008371.CNS_DEF: 跖骨的骨化过程的任何异常。

HP:0009273.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009273.ENG_DEF: Displacement of the 4th finger from its normal position.
HP:0009273.CNS_DEF: 位移从它的正常位置的第四手指的。

HP:0011102.ENG_DEF: An abnormal closure, or `atresia` (PATO:0001819) of the tubular structure of the `ileum` (FMA:7208).
HP:0011102.CNS_DEF: 回肠管状结构的一种异常闭合，或“闭锁”

HP:0008473.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction of the anterioposterior diameter of the `vertebral body` (FMA:11945).

HP:0100246.ENG_DEF: Osteomas are bony growths found most commonly on the skull and mandible; however, they may occur in any bone of the body. Osteomas do not usually cause clinical problems and do not become malignant.
HP:0100246.CNS_DEF: 骨瘤是发现最常见的头骨和下颌骨骨生长;然而，它们可能发生在身体的任何骨。骨瘤通常不会引起临床问题，不要变成恶性的。

HP:0004502.ENG_DEF: Bilateral absence (atresia) of the posterior nasal aperture (choana).
HP:0004502.CNS_DEF: 后鼻开孔（鼻后孔）双侧没有（闭锁）。

HP:0012538.ENG_DEF: A detrimental reaction to the presence of gluten in food, which may include abdominal pain, fatigue, headaches and paresthesia, or celiac disease.
HP:0012538.CNS_DEF: 甲不利反应，以面筋的食物中存在，其可以包括腹部疼痛，疲劳，头痛和感觉异常，或腹腔疾病。

HP:0008066.ENG_DEF: The presence of one or more bullae on the skin, defined as fluid-filled blisters more than 5 mm in diameter with thin walls.
HP:0008066.CNS_DEF: 皮肤表面单发或多发的薄壁大疱，直径超过5mm，其内充满液体。

HP:0009145.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0009145.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of a cerebral artery. The cerebral arteries comprise three main pairs of arteries and their branches, which supply the cerebrum of the brain. These are the `anterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50028), the `middle cerebral artery` (FMA:50079), and the `posterior cerebral artery` (FMA:50583).
HP:0009145.CNS_DEF: 脑动脉的异常。供应大脑血流的脑动脉包括三支主要动脉及其分支。分别是`大脑前动脉`（FMA:50028），所述`大脑中动脉`（FMA:50079），以及`大脑后动脉`（FMA:50583）。

HP:0002936.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction in sensation in the distal portions of the extremities.
HP:0002936.CNS_DEF: 肢体的远端部分感觉异常降低。

HP:0030784.ENG_DEF: An inability to name people and objects that are correctly perceived. The individual is able to describe the object in question, but cannot provide the name.

HP:0008515.CNS_NAME: 椎骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0009919.ENG_DEF: A tumor of the eye originating from cells of the retina.
HP:0009919.CNS_DEF: 眼睛的视网膜细胞起源的肿瘤。

HP:0002901.ENG_DEF: An abnormally decreased `calcium` (CHEBI:29108) concentration in the blood.
HP:0002901.CNS_DEF: 一个异常降低`calcium`（CHEBI:29108）的浓度在血液中。

HP:0012174.ENG_DEF: A tumor arising from glia in the central nervous system with macroscopic regions of necrosis and hemorrhage. Microscopically, glioblastoma multiforme is characterized by regions of pseudopalisading necrosis, pleomorphic nuclei and cells, and microvascular proliferation.
HP:0012174.CNS_DEF: 起源于中枢神经系统胶质细胞的肿瘤，伴有肉眼可见的坏死和出血。显微镜下，多形性胶质母细胞瘤的特点是假性栅栏样坏死，多形核和细胞以及微血管增生。

HP:0030690.ENG_DEF: A fissure in the gingiva (gums), i.e., the mucosal tissue that lies over the mandible and maxilla.

HP:0011558.ENG_NAME: Double inlet to single ventricle with common atrioventricular orifice
HP:0011558.CNS_NAME: 双入口单心室伴共同房室口
HP:0011558.ENG_DEF: The condition in which both atria are joined to a single ventricle each by common atrioventricular orifice.
HP:0011558.CNS_DEF: 两个心房通过同一个房室口连接至同一个心室。

HP:0030849.ENG_DEF: The examiner applies firm but persistent pressure over the liver for 10 seconds while observing the mean jugular venous pressure. Normally there is either no rise or only a transient (i.e., 2 to 3 sec) rise in mean jugular venous pressure. A sustained increase in the mean venous pressure until abdominal compression is released is abnormal and indicates impaired right heart function. This abnormal response is called hepatojugular reflux.

HP:0008848.ENG_DEF: A moderate degree of short stature, more than -3 SD but not more than -4 SD from mean corrected for age and sex.
HP:0008848.CNS_DEF: 中等程度身材矮小，身高位于同年龄同性别平均身高下负3-4标准差之间。

HP:0100255.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100255.ENG_DEF: The presence of dysplastic regions in metaphyseal bones.
HP:0100255.CNS_DEF: 发育不良的区域在干骺端骨骼的存在。

HP:0002913.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0012167.ENG_DEF: A phenomenon in which persons repetitively pull out their own hair, resulting in noticeable hair loss.
HP:0012167.CNS_DEF: 一种异常行为，表现为人反复拉出自己的头发，造成明显的脱发。

HP:0008723.ENG_NAME: Gonadal dysgenesis with female appearance, male
HP:0008723.CNS_NAME: 男性性腺发育不全，女性外表
HP:0008723.ENG_DEF: Unusual gonadal development in a person with a 46,XY male karyotype, leading to a more female sex differentiation.
HP:0008723.CNS_DEF: 由于性腺发育异常导致46,XY男性染色体核型的个体出现更女性化的性别分化。

HP:0010303.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the spinal meninges, the system of membranes (dura mater, the arachnoid mater, and the pia mater) which envelops the spinal cord.
HP:0010303.CNS_DEF: 脊髓脊膜的任何异常，这个膜的系统（硬脑膜，蛛网膜，和软脑膜）包围脊髓。

HP:3000062.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:3000062.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an internal carotid artery.

HP:0000534.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0001493.ENG_DEF: An area of the retina that is buckled so that a sector-shaped sheet of retina lies in front of the normal retina. This feature is of congenital onset.
HP:0001493.CNS_DEF: 视网膜的局部区域皱褶，使得视网膜的扇形片在于正常视网膜的前面。此功能是先天性发病。

HP:0008438.ENG_DEF: A morphological abnormality of the `vertebral arch` (FMA:11946), i.e., of the  posterior part of a vertebra.

HP:0010782.ENG_DEF: A subtype of `skin dimples` (HP:0010781) occurring in the shoulder region.
HP:0010782.CNS_DEF: 皮肤酒窝征的亚型，发生在肩部。

HP:0004329.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the posterior segment of the eye
HP:0004329.ENG_DEF: Posterior segment include the vitreous body，retina and optic nerve.
HP:0004329.CNS_DEF: 眼后段包括玻璃体、视网膜和视神经。

HP:0002853.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0002853.ENG_NAME: Increased proportion of HLA DR+ and CD57+ T cells

HP:0011674.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;心血管系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0011674.ENG_DEF: A teratoma within the heart. Most commonly, these tumors are detected in the pericardial cavity attached to the pulmonary artery and aorta. The tumour size within the heart varies from 2 to 9 cm in diameter, and intrapericardial tumors as large as 15 cm have been reported. Intracardiac tumors arise from the atrial or ventricular wall as nodular masses protruding into the cardiac chambers. Cardiac and pericardial teratomas are easily detected in the fetus and neonate by two-dimensional echocardiography as heterogeneous and encapsulated cystic masses. Histologically, cardiac teratomas contain multiple immature elements including epithelium, neuroglial tissue, thyroid, pancreas, smooth and skeletal muscle, cartilage and bone.
HP:0011674.CNS_DEF: 在心脏内的畸胎瘤，一般，存在于与肺动脉和主动脉相连的心包腔内，直径大约2至9厘米，已报道的最大肿瘤15cm。心内的肿瘤起源于心房或心室壁的结节状肿块，扩散到心腔。由于其异质性以及包裹性囊性肿块，心脏和心包中的畸胎瘤很容易通过胎儿和新生儿的二维超声心动图检测到。组织学上，心脏畸胎瘤包含多个组分，包括上皮细胞、神经胶质组织、甲状腺、胰腺、平滑肌、横纹肌、软骨和骨。

HP:0007377.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of somatosensory evoked potentials (SSEP), i.e., of the electrical signals of sensation going from the body to the brain in response to a defined stimulus. Recording electrodes are placed over the scalp, spine, and peripheral nerves proximal to the stimulation site. Clinical studies generally use electrical stimulation of peripheral nerves to elicit potentials. SSEP testing determines whether peripheral sensory nerves are able to transmit sensory information like pain, temperature, and touch to the brain. Abnormal SSEPs can result from dysfunction at the level of the peripheral nerve, plexus, spinal root, spinal cord, brain stem, thalamocortical projections, or primary somatosensory cortex.
HP:0007377.CNS_DEF: 异常的体感诱发电位（SSEP），即躯体对特定刺激产生的传递到脑的电信号。记录电极放置在头皮、脊柱、和外周神经刺激部位的近端。临床研究一般采用外周神经电刺激引出电位波形。SSEP检测可以确定外周感觉神经是否能够向大脑传递感觉信息如疼痛、温度和触觉。SSEPs异常可定位于不同水平，如外周神经、神经丛、神经根、脊髓、脑干、丘脑皮层投射，或初级躯体感觉皮层。

HP:0030780.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the protein C anticoagulant pathway
HP:0030780.CNS_NAME: 蛋白 C 抗凝途径异常
HP:0030780.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the protein C anticoagulant pathway, which serves as a major system for controlling thrombosis, limiting inflammatory responses, and potentially decreasing endothelial cell apoptosis in response to inflammatory cytokines and ischemia. A natural anticoagulant system denoted the protein C pathway exerts its anticoagulant effect by regulating the activity of FVIIIa and FVa. The vitamin K-dependent protein C is the key component of the pathway. Activated protein C (APC) cleaves and inhibits coagulation cofactors FVIIIa and FVa, which result in downregulation of the activity of the coagulation system. The endothelial protein C receptor stimulates the T-TM-mediated activation of protein C on the endothelial cell surface. The two cofactors, protein S and the intact form of FV, enhance the anticoagulant activity of APC.

HP:0100026.CNS_DEF: 血管结构异常造成动脉血不经毛细血管直接进入静脉。

HP:0009835.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanges of the hand
HP:0009835.CNS_NAME: 手的远端指骨发育不全或发育低下
HP:0009835.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the distal phalanges.
HP:0009835.CNS_DEF: 缺席或远端指骨的不发达。

HP:0011190.ENG_NAME: Uni- and bilateral multifocal epileptiform discharges
HP:0011190.CNS_NAME: 单侧和双侧多灶性痫样放电
HP:0011190.ENG_DEF: Epileptiform discharges identified at multiple locations temporarily in both hemispheres and temporarily in one hemisphere.
HP:0011190.CNS_DEF: 在一侧半球或两侧半球多个位置确定的癫痫样放电。

HP:0100865.ENG_DEF: Increased width of the `ischium` (FMA:16592), which forms the lower and back part of the hip bone.
HP:0100865.CNS_DEF: 增加的宽度的`ischium`的（FMA:16592），其形成髋骨的下部和后部。

HP:0010287.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the submandibular glands, which are the salivary glands that are located beneath the floor of the mouth, superior to the digastric muscles.
HP:0010287.CNS_DEF: 颌下腺的任何异常。颌下腺是唾液腺，位于口腔底部，二腹肌之上。

HP:3000002.CNS_NAME: 内耳上皮细胞形态异常
HP:3000002.ENG_DEF: Any structural anomaly of an inner ear epithelium.

HP:0009202.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009202.ENG_NAME: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009202.CNS_NAME: 小手指近节指骨骨骺碎裂
HP:0009202.ENG_DEF: Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger.
HP:0009202.CNS_DEF: 小手指的近节指骨骨骺零散出现。

HP:0030211.ENG_DEF: Reduced velocity and acceleration in the pupillary light response.

HP:0100352.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100352.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd toe
HP:0100352.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的远端趾间关节挛缩
HP:0100352.ENG_DEF: The distal interphalangeal joint of the 2nd toe cannot be straightened actively or passively.
HP:0100352.CNS_DEF: 在第二趾的远端指间关节，不能主动或被动地拉直。

HP:0007989.ENG_DEF: Retinal exudate within the retinal tissue itself.
HP:0007989.CNS_DEF: 视网膜组织本身的渗出。

HP:0040243.CNS_NAME: 延长优球蛋白溶解时间
HP:0040243.ENG_DEF: Clinical assay used to measure fibrinolysis. The euglobulin fraction of plasma is precipitated and used to form clot by addition of thrombin; after clot forms the rate of clot breakdown (fibrinolysis) can be monitored.

HP:0002380.ENG_DEF: Fasciculations are observed as small, local, involuntary muscle contractions (twitching) visible under the skin. Fasciculations result from increased irritability of an axon (which in turn is often a manifestation of disease of a motor neuron). This leads to sporadic discharges of all the muscle fibers controlled by the axon in isolation from other motor units.
HP:0002380.CNS_DEF: 指在皮肤下观察到的细微、局部及不自主地肌肉收缩（抽搐），是由于轴索的兴奋性增高导致的（通常是运动神经元病的表现）。这导致了轴索支配的所有肌肉纤维独立于其他运动单位的自发性放电。

HP:0010921.ENG_DEF: A 'coral-like' pattern of opacity in the lens of the eye. That is, a cataract with an irregular, stellate form.
HP:0010921.CNS_DEF: 晶状体上“珊瑚状”的浑浊。即，具有不规则，星状形式白内障。

HP:0012116.ENG_DEF: Deviation from normal concentration of `albumin` (PR:000003918) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0012116.CNS_DEF: 血中(FMA:9670)的血清白蛋白水平偏离正常范围。

HP:0005736.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005736.CNS_DEF: 胫骨的不发达（尺寸减小）。

HP:0010060.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010060.ENG_DEF: An abnormal morphology of one or more phalanges of the big toe, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.
HP:0010060.CNS_DEF: 大脚趾的一个或多个指骨，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细的远端形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

HP:0012341.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0012341.ENG_DEF: A pituitary prolactin cell adenoma of less than 10 mm diameter.
HP:0012341.CNS_DEF: 直径小于10毫米的垂体泌乳素细胞腺瘤。

HP:0040223.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0040223.ENG_DEF: A hemorrhage occurring within the lung.

HP:0009854.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009854.ENG_NAME: Curved proximal phalanges of the hand

HP:0100627.ENG_NAME: Displacement of the external urethral meatus
HP:0100627.ENG_DEF: A displacement of the external urethral orifice from its normal position (in males normally placed at the tip of glans penis, in females normally placed about 2.5 cm behind the glans clitoridis and immediately in front of that of the vagina).
HP:0100627.CNS_DEF: 尿道外口的移位，男性尿道口通常位于在阴茎龟头尖端，女性通常位于女性阴蒂后约2.5cm、阴道前。

HP:0007471.ENG_NAME: Axillary and groin hyperpigmentation and hypopigmentation
HP:0007471.CNS_NAME: 腋窝和腹股沟部位色素沉着和色素减退

HP:0000063.ENG_DEF: Fusion of the labia minora as a result of labial adhesions resulting in vaginal obstruction.
HP:0000063.CNS_DEF: 由于阴道阻塞使阴唇粘连而造成的小阴唇融合。

HP:0003112.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of serum amino acid levels
HP:0003112.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal decrease or increase of one or more amino acids in the blood circulation.
HP:0003112.CNS_DEF: 血液循环中出现一个或多个氨基酸的升高或降低。

HP:0000274.ENG_DEF: A face that is short (HP:0011219) and narrow (HP:0000275).

HP:0000420.ENG_DEF: Reduced superior to inferior length of the nasal septum.
HP:0000420.CNS_DEF: 鼻中隔上下缘之间距离缩小。

HP:0011625.ENG_DEF: The presence of more than one VSD in the muscular septum, with or without other VSD located in the peri-membranous or outlet septum, with or without associated intra-cardiac or extra-cardiac malformations.
HP:0011625.CNS_DEF: 室间隔肌部出现多处缺损可伴／不伴有其他部位室间隔缺损或心内／心外畸形。

HP:0011849.ENG_DEF: Any anomaly in the formation of bone or of a bony substance, or the conversion of fibrous tissue or of cartilage into bone or a bony substance.
HP:0011849.CNS_DEF: 骨或骨性物质形成中的任何异常，或纤维组织或软骨转化形成骨或骨的物质过程中的任何异常。

HP:0012358.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of `protein O-linked glycosylation` (GO:0006493), i.e., of the process in which a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit is added to a protein via the hydroxyl group of a serine or threonine residue.
HP:0012358.CNS_DEF: 异常的`蛋白质O-联糖基化`（GO:0006493），即一种碳水化合物或碳水化合物衍生物单位经由丝氨酸或苏氨酸残基的羟基基团添加到蛋白质上的过程。

HP:0002595.ENG_DEF: Acute obstruction of the intestines preventing passage of the contents of the intestines.
HP:0002595.CNS_DEF: 肠的急性阻塞阻止了肠内容物的通过。

HP:0012051.ENG_DEF: Hypoglycermia following a meal (or more generally, after intake of glucose).
HP:0012051.CNS_DEF: Hypoglycermia以下一餐（或更一般地，摄取葡萄糖后）。

HP:0030136.CNS_NAME: 瑞斯托辅助因子测定活性增加
HP:0030136.ENG_DEF: Abnormal response to ristocetin as manifested by increased aggregation of platelets upon addition of low-dose ristocetin to platelet-rich plasma.

HP:0009130.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0009130.ENG_DEF: Muscular atrophy involving the muscles of the hand.
HP:0009130.CNS_DEF: 肌肉萎缩涉及手的肌肉。

HP:0010869.ENG_DEF: A type of `dyssynergy` (HP:0010867) characterized by the lack of the ability to smoothly perform the elements of a voluntary movement in the appropriate order and speed.
HP:0010869.CNS_DEF: 一种类型的`协调障碍`（HP:0010867），特点是缺乏以适当的顺序和速度平稳进行随意运动的能力。

HP:0002226.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0002226.ENG_DEF: White color (lack of pigmentation) of the eyebrow.
HP:0002226.CNS_DEF: 眉毛呈白色（无色素沉着）。

HP:0007473.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0011741.ENG_DEF: A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by abnormally increased renin levels.
HP:0011741.CNS_DEF: 一种由于肾素异常增加而导致的醛固酮增多症。

HP:3000057.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000057.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of inferior oblique extraocular muscle
HP:3000057.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an inferior oblique extraocular muscle.

HP:0011510.ENG_DEF: Drusen (singular, 'druse') are tiny yellow or white accumulations of extracellular material (lipofuscin) that build up in Bruch's membrane of the eye.
HP:0011510.CNS_DEF: 玻璃膜疣是细胞外物质（脂褐素），在眼Bruch膜上聚集形成的细小黄色或白色物质。

HP:0012662.ENG_DEF: Reduced uptake of [18F]-fluorodeoxyglucose  (FDG) in the parietal cortex as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) brain scan.
HP:0012662.CNS_DEF: 如通过正电子发射断层扫描（PET）脑部扫描测定减少[18 F] -fluorodeoxyglucose脱氧葡萄糖（FDG）在顶叶皮质摄取。

HP:0010535.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0010535.ENG_DEF: An intermittent cessation of airflow at the mouth and nose during sleep. Apneas of at least 10 seconds are considered important, but persons with sleep apnea may have apneas of 20 seconds to up to 2 or 3 minutes. Patients may have up to 15 events per hour of sleep.
HP:0010535.CNS_DEF: 睡眠时口鼻气流间歇性停止。呼吸暂停10秒以上的被认为是重要的，但睡眠呼吸暂停的人呼吸暂停可以有20秒以上甚至达到2或3分钟。患者每小时睡眠可能有高达15次呼吸暂停事件。

HP:0000851.CNS_NAME: 先天性甲状腺功能减退症
HP:0000851.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性发病(HP:0003577)的甲状腺功能低下(HP:0000821)

HP:0007607.CNS_NAME: 少汗性外胚层发育不良

HP:0012692.CNS_NAME: 丘脑局灶性T2高信号病变
HP:0012692.ENG_DEF: A lighter than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a localized hyperintensity affecting a particular region of the thalamus.
HP:0012692.CNS_DEF: 在MRI T2加权像上，丘脑存在的比通常更亮的信号。这个术语指丘脑特定区域的局部高信号。

HP:0003354.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `threonine` (CHEBI:26986) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0004821.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0004821.CNS_NAME: 中性粒细胞核分化过度
HP:0004821.ENG_DEF: An excessive division of the lobes of the nucleus of a `neutrophil` (CL:0000775).
HP:0004821.CNS_DEF: 中性粒细胞（:0000775 CL）核分叶过度。

HP:0009290.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009290.ENG_NAME: Short distal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009290.ENG_DEF: Hypoplastic/small `distal phalanx of the fourth finger` (FMA:23948).

HP:0011816.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011816.ENG_DEF: An encephalocele located between bregma and lambda.
HP:0011816.CNS_DEF: 位于前囟和人字缝与矢状缝交界处之间的脑膨出。

HP:0100594.ENG_DEF: Thin (2-3mm) membranes of normal esophageal tissue consisting of mucosa and submucosa that can be congenital or acquired. Congenital webs commonly appear in the middle and inferior third of the esophagus, and they are more likely to be circumferential with a central or eccentric orifice. Acquired webs are much more common than congenital webs and typically appear in the cervical area (postcricoid). Clinical symptoms of this condition are selective (solid more than liquids) dysphagia, thoracic pain, nasopharyngeal reflux, aspiration, perforation and food impaction (the last two are very rare).
HP:0100594.CNS_DEF: 先天的或获得性的由粘膜和粘膜下层组成的正常食管组织的薄的（2-3mm）膜。先天的蹼通常出现在食管中部和下三分之一处，它们更可能是一个中心或偏心孔的圆周。获得性的蹼较先天蹼更为常见，通常出现在颈部区域（环状软骨后）。这种情况的临床症状包括选择性的（固体多于液体）吞咽困难、胸痛、鼻咽返流、误吸、穿孔和食物嵌塞（最后两个非常罕见）。

HP:0006781.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0006781.ENG_DEF: A kind of `thyroid adenoma` (HP:0000854) characterized by the presence of `oxyphil cells` (CL:0002200).
HP:0006781.CNS_DEF: 甲状腺腺瘤的一种，特征为存在嗜酸细胞。

HP:0011105.ENG_DEF: An increase in the amount of intravascular fluid, particularly in the volume of the circulating blood.
HP:0011105.CNS_DEF: 血管内液的量增加，特别是循环血液的体积。

HP:0002883.ENG_DEF: Hyperventilation refers to an increased pulmonary ventilation rate that is faster than necessary for the exchange of gases. Hyperventilation can result from increased frequency of breathing, an increased tidal volume, or both, and leads to an excess intake of oxygen and the blowing off of carbon dioxide.
HP:0002883.CNS_DEF: 过度通气指肺通气速率快于所需要的气体交换率。过度通气可由呼吸频率增加、潮气量增加或两者都有的原因所致，可以引起氧摄取和二氧化碳呼出过量。

HP:0010420.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010420.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010420.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾三角形末节趾骨

HP:0000007.ENG_DEF: A mode of inheritance that is observed for traits related to a gene encoded on one of the autosomes (i.e., the human chromosomes 1-22) in which a trait manifests in homozygotes. In the context of medical genetics, autosomal recessive disorders manifest in homozygotes (with two copies of the mutant allele) or compound heterozygotes (whereby each copy of a gene has a distinct mutant allele).

HP:0009562.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009562.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009562.CNS_NAME: 第二手指末节指骨硬化
HP:0009562.ENG_DEF: Uneven (irregular) increase in bone density of the distal phalanx of the second finger.
HP:0009562.CNS_DEF: 不均匀的（不规则）增加第二手指的远端指骨的骨密度。

HP:0006748.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0006748.ENG_DEF: Pheochromocytoma originating from the adrenal medulla.
HP:0006748.CNS_DEF: 由肾上腺髓质起源的嗜铬细胞瘤。

HP:0011928.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011928.ENG_DEF: Developmental hypoplasia (shortening) of `proximal phalanx of toe` (FMA:75828).
HP:0011928.CNS_DEF: 的`toe`近节指骨发育不全发展（缩短）（FMA:75828）。

HP:0002891.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0002891.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `leiomyosarcoma` (MPATH:426) of the `uterus` (FMA:17558).

HP:0009709.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of interferon alpha in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).
HP:0009709.CNS_DEF: 脑脊液（CSF）中干扰素α的浓度升高。

HP:0100534.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;免疫系统的异常
HP:0100534.ENG_DEF: Inflammation of the `episclera` (FMA:58362), a thin layer of tissue covering the white part (sclera) of the eye.
HP:0100534.CNS_DEF: 巩膜表面的炎症（FMA:58362），表层巩膜是指覆盖眼睛白色部分的薄的一层组织（巩膜）。

HP:0003071.CNS_DEF: 骨骺异常平整度（降低高度）。

HP:0004244.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0004020.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004020.ENG_NAME: Irregular ossification of the radial metaphysis
HP:0004020.CNS_NAME: 桡骨干骺端不规则骨化

HP:0009288.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009288.ENG_NAME: Curved proximal phalanx of the 4th finger

HP:0003204.ENG_NAME: Intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent lipopigment storage material
HP:0003204.CNS_NAME: 自体荧光脂色素存储材料的胞内堆积增加
HP:0003204.ENG_DEF: The intracellular accumulation of autofluorescent storage material.
HP:0003204.CNS_DEF: 自发荧光存储材料的胞内积累。

HP:0012825.ENG_DEF: Having a relatively minor degree of severity. For quantitative traits, a deviation of between two and three standard deviations from the appropriate population mean.

HP:0100303.ENG_DEF: The presence of inclusion bodies within the cytoplasm of muscle cells. Inclusion bodies are aggregates (deposits) or stainable material, usually misfolded proteins.
HP:0100303.CNS_DEF: 肌细胞的细胞质内存在包涵体。包涵体聚集（沉积），或可着色物质，通常是错误折叠的蛋白质。

HP:0006937.ENG_DEF: A reduced sense of touch (tactile sensation) on the skin of the distal limbs. This is usually tested with a wisp of cotton or a fine camel's hair brush, by asking patients to say 'now' each time they feel the stimulus.
HP:0006937.CNS_DEF: 肢体远端皮肤触摸（触觉）感觉减退。通常使用棉毛或细驼绒毛刷进行测试，要求病人每次感觉到刺激时说“现在”。

HP:0000399.CNS_NAME: 学语前感音神经性听力损失
HP:0000399.ENG_DEF: A form of `sensorineural deafness` (===HP:0008538===) with either `congenital onset` (===HP:0003577===) or `infantile onset` (===HP:0003593===), i.e., before the acquisition of speech.
HP:0000399.CNS_DEF: 感音神经性耳聋（===HP:0008538=== ）的一种，先天性（===HP:0003577===）或婴幼儿期发病（===HP:0003593===），即学会语言前发病。

HP:0030785.ENG_DEF: A lymphangioma (congenital malformation consisting of focal proliferations of well-differentiated lymphatic tissue in multi cystic or sponge like structures) located within the mediastinum, i.e., the central compartment of the thoracic cavity that is surrounded by loose connective tissue. Mediastinal lymphangioma is a slow growing mass with benign features, and accounts for 1% of all mediastinal tumors.

HP:0100237.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100635.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0100635.ENG_DEF: A paraganglioma (a  neuroendocrine neoplasm) originating in a carotid artery.
HP:0100635.CNS_DEF: 起源于颈动脉的副神经节瘤（神经内分泌肿瘤）。

HP:0100832.ENG_DEF: Deposits of various size, shape, consistency, refractive index, and motility within the eye's vitreous humour, which is normally transparent.
HP:0100832.CNS_DEF: 玻璃体内出现的各种尺寸，形状，一致性，折射率，和蠕动的沉积物，玻璃体通常是透明的。

HP:0006821.CNS_NAME: 多小脑回，从前到后的梯度

HP:0009329.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009329.ENG_NAME: Small epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009329.ENG_DEF: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0009329.CNS_DEF: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于中指中节指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。

HP:0004960.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0004960.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect with aplasia (absence) of one of the right or left pulmonary artery.
HP:0004960.CNS_DEF: 左肺动脉或右肺动脉的先天缺失（不发育）。

HP:0000722.ENG_DEF: Recurrent obsessions or compulsions that are severe enough to be time consuming (i.e., they take more than 1 hour a day) or cause marked distress or significant impairment (DSM-IV).
HP:0000722.CNS_DEF: 复发性强迫观念或强迫行为导致严重的耗时现象（患者每天需要浪费1小时以上），或者引起明显的痛苦或损伤（DSMⅣ）

HP:0012222.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;心血管系统的异常
HP:0012222.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple hemangiomas in the arachnoid.

HP:0000540.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of refraction characterized by the ability to see objects in the distance clearly, while objects nearby appear blurry.
HP:0000540.CNS_DEF: 屈光的一种，特征是看到清楚远处物体的能力，而附近的物体出现模糊。

HP:0000518.CNS_DEF: 白内障是指晶状体或晶状体的囊膜不透明或混浊。

HP:0011414.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the placenta in which there are numerous cystic spaces within the placenta as well as placental enlargement.
HP:0011414.CNS_DEF: 胎盘异常的一种，胎盘内有众多囊腔合并胎盘增大。

HP:0006976.ENG_DEF: A type of encephalopathy (brain disease, damage, or malfunction accompanied by an altered mental state) that is characterized by evidence of necrosis of brain tissue.
HP:0006976.CNS_DEF: A型脑病（脑疾病，损伤或故障伴随着改变的精神状态），其特征是脑组织坏死的证据。一种脑损伤或精神状态有异常改变的脑病，主要以脑组织坏死为特征

HP:0001586.CNS_DEF: 膀胱与阴道之间形成瘘道。

HP:0100397.ENG_NAME: Short proximal phalanx of the 5th toe
