HP:0100397.CNS_DEF: 第五toe`的`近节指骨的发育发育不全（FMA:32621）。

HP:0001337.ENG_DEF: An unintentional, oscillating to-and-fro muscle movement.
HP:0001337.CNS_DEF: 一种无意的，振荡的肌肉往复运动。

HP:0100569.ENG_DEF: An abnormal formation and mineralization of one or more vertebraes.
HP:0100569.CNS_DEF: 一个或多个椎骨的异常骨组织形成.

HP:0003212.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0003212.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased level of immunoglobulin E in blood.
HP:0003212.CNS_DEF: 免疫球蛋白E在血液中异常。

HP:0000155.ENG_DEF: Erosion of the mucous membrane of the mouth with local excavation of the surface, resulting from the sloughing of inflammatory necrotic tissue.
HP:0000155.CNS_DEF: 口腔粘膜表面局部开口受侵蚀，导致炎性坏死组织脱落。

HP:0002075.ENG_DEF: A type of `ataxia` (HP:0001251) characterized by the impairment of the ability to perform rapidly alternating movements, such as rhythmically tapping the fingers on the knee, generally related to a cerebellar lesion.
HP:0002075.CNS_DEF: `共济失调`（HP:0001251）的表现之一，表现为进行快速交替运动的功能受损，比如不能有节奏地用手拍打膝盖，一般为小脑病变所致。

HP:0006060.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012722.ENG_DEF: Impaired conduction of cardiac impulse occurring anywhere along the conduction pathway.
HP:0012722.CNS_DEF: 发生在沿传导通路任何地方的心搏动传导受损。

HP:0003639.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003639.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `adrenaline` (CHEBI:33568) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0003639.CNS_DEF: 尿液中肾上腺素浓度增加。

HP:0002530.ENG_DEF: A type of dystonia that affects the midline muscles, i.e., the chest, abdominal, and back muscles.
HP:0002530.CNS_DEF: 一种影响中线肌肉的肌张力障碍，例如胸部、腹部和背部肌肉。

HP:0003674.ENG_DEF: The age group in which disease manifestations appear.

HP:0011736.ENG_DEF: A form of hyperaldosteronism caused by a defect within the adrenal gland.
HP:0011736.CNS_DEF: 由于肾上腺缺陷而引起的醛固酮过多症。

HP:0000635.ENG_DEF: A markedly blue coloration of the iris.

HP:0002982.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002982.ENG_DEF: A bending or abnormal curvature of the `tibia` (FMA:24476).

HP:0011584.ENG_DEF: A type of ectopia cordis with the heart partially in the cervical region with a defect of the superior portion of the sternum.
HP:0011584.CNS_DEF: A型的心脏异位，心脏部分位于颈部区域，同时胸骨上部异常。

HP:0011719.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0011719.ENG_NAME: Supracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
HP:0011719.CNS_NAME: 心上型完全肺静脉异位连接
HP:0011719.ENG_DEF: Type 1 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

HP:0000372.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `External acoustic tube` (FMA:61734) (also known as the auditory canal).
HP:0000372.CNS_DEF: “外耳道”(FMA:61734)（也被称为耳道）的异常。

HP:0040030.CNS_NAME: 脉络膜视网膜色素沉着减退

HP:0003950.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005321.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005321.ENG_DEF: A type of craniofacial dysostosis associated with abnormalities of the external ears, mirognathia, macrostomia, coloboma of the lower eyelid, and cleft palate. This is a bundled term that is left in the HPO now for convenience with legacy annotations but should not be used for new annotations.
HP:0005321.CNS_DEF: 一种颅面发育障碍，与外耳发育异常，小下颌畸形，巨口畸形，下眼睑缺损以及腭裂畸形有关。该术语被HPO收存是因为与其他术语存在传统上的关联以方便索引，但不应用于新的注释。

HP:0007365.CNS_NAME: 累及皮质脊髓束的发育缺陷/发育不全

HP:0030781.ENG_NAME: Increased circulating free fatty acid level
HP:0030781.CNS_NAME: 循环游离脂肪酸水平增加
HP:0030781.ENG_DEF: A higher than normal levels of the fatty acids which can occur in plasma as a result of lipolysis in adipose tissue or when plasma triacyglycerols are taken into tissues.

HP:0100726.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0100726.ENG_DEF: A systemic disease which can present with cutaneous lesions with or without internal involvement. Tumors are caused by Human herpesvirus 8 (HHV8), also known as Kaposi's sarcoma-associated herpesvirus (KSHV).
HP:0100726.CNS_DEF: 一种系统性疾病，表现为伴或不伴内脏受累的皮肤损伤。由人疱疹病毒8（HHV8），又称卡波西肉瘤相关疱疹病毒（KSHV）引起。

HP:0010387.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010387.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 5th toe
HP:0010387.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾趾骨溶骨性缺陷

HP:0000303.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000303.ENG_DEF: Abnormal prominence of the `chin` (FMA:46495) related to `increased length` (PATO:0000573) of the `mandible` (FMA:52748).
HP:0000303.CNS_DEF: 与下颌长度增加相关的下巴异常突出

HP:0012549.ENG_DEF: A lipoma (a benign tumor composed of adipose tissue) located in the conjunctiva.
HP:0012549.CNS_DEF: 位于结膜上的脂肪瘤（良性肿瘤脂肪组织组成）。

HP:0000864.CNS_NAME: 下丘脑 - 垂体轴异常
HP:0000864.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the pituitary gland (also known as hypophysis), which is an endocrine gland that protrudes from the bottom of the hypothalamus at the base of the brain. The pituitary gland secretes the hormones ACTH, TSH, PRL, GH, endorphins, FSH, LH, oxytocin, and antidiuretic hormone. The secretion of hormones from the anterior pituitary is under the strict control of hypothalamic hormones, and the posterior pituitary is essentially an extension of the hypothalamus, so that  hypothalamus and pituitary gland may be regarded as a functional unit.
HP:0000864.CNS_DEF: 垂体（也称为脑下垂体），是在脑的底部从下丘脑的底端突出的一个内分泌腺。垂体分泌的激素有促肾上腺皮质激素，促甲状腺激素，泌乳素，生长激素，内啡肽，卵泡刺激素，黄体生成素，催产素，抗利尿激素。垂体前叶的激素分泌受下丘脑激素的严格控制，而垂体后叶基本上是下丘脑的延伸，所以下丘脑和垂体可被认为是一个功能单元。

HP:0006919.ENG_NAME: Abnormal aggressive, impulsive or violent behavior

HP:0012493.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0012493.ENG_DEF: Narrowing or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the `middle cerebral artery` (FMA:50079).
HP:0012493.CNS_DEF: 大脑中动脉（FMA:50079）内壁（内腔）收缩或狭窄。

HP:0000636.ENG_DEF: A short discontinuity of the margin of the `upper eyelid` (FMA:54439).
HP:0000636.CNS_DEF: 上眼睑的部分缺失导致眼睑变短畸形

HP:0010310.MAIN_CLASS: 呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0010310.ENG_DEF: Accumulation of excessive amounts of lymphatic fluid (chyle) in the pleural cavity.
HP:0010310.CNS_DEF: 胸膜腔淋巴积液（乳糜）过量积累

HP:0040226.ENG_NAME: Decreased level of heparin co-factor II
HP:0040226.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of coagulation related to a decreased concentration of heparin co-factor II

HP:0005170.ENG_NAME: Complete heart block with broad RS complexes
HP:0005170.CNS_NAME: 完全性心传导阻滞伴宽RS波群
HP:0005170.ENG_DEF: All impulse can not conduct from atrial to ventricle with broad RS complexes.
HP:0005170.CNS_DEF: 全部心房冲动均不能传导至心室，伴随RS波群增宽。

HP:0011168.ENG_DEF: Focal seizure with eyelid myoclonia, not eyelid myoclonias in the context of absence seizures.
HP:0011168.CNS_DEF: 表现为眼睑肌阵挛的局灶性癫痫发作，不是失神发作情况下的眼睑肌阵挛。

HP:0009337.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009337.ENG_NAME: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009337.CNS_NAME: 中指的末节指骨锥形骨骺
HP:0009337.ENG_DEF: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.
HP:0009337.CNS_DEF: 锥形外观手的3手指的末节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。

HP:0004980.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004980.ENG_DEF: Reduction in density of metaphyseal bony tissue.
HP:0004980.CNS_DEF: 减少在干骺端骨组织的密度。

HP:0006313.ENG_DEF: Increased space between the primary teeth. Note this phenotype should be distinguished from increased space due purely to microdontia.
HP:0006313.CNS_DEF: 乳牙之间的间隙增大，请注意，此型应与由小牙畸形导致的牙间隙增宽区分开来。

HP:0010884.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010884.ENG_DEF: Shortening of the extremities affecting primarily the distal parts of the limbs (hands and feet) in relation to the other segments of the limbs.
HP:0010884.CNS_DEF: 缩短影响四肢（手和脚）与四肢的其他分部主要是末梢部位四肢。

HP:0002928.ENG_NAME: Decreased activity of the pyruvate dehydrogenase (PDH) complex
HP:0002928.CNS_NAME: 丙酮酸脱氢酶（PDH）复合物活性降低

HP:0009667.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009667.ENG_NAME: Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009667.CNS_NAME: 拇指近节指骨骨骺膨大
HP:0009667.ENG_DEF: Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms. In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009667.CNS_DEF: 位于拇指近节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0012020.ENG_DEF: Aorta descends on right instead of on the left.
HP:0012020.CNS_DEF: 主动脉下降发生在右侧，正常发生在左侧。

HP:0002086.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `respiratory system` (FMA:7158), which include the airways, lungs, and the respiratory muscles.
HP:0002086.CNS_DEF: 呼吸系统（FMA:7158）的异常，其中包括呼吸道，肺部和呼吸肌。

HP:0009697.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009697.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joints of the fingers
HP:0009697.CNS_NAME: 手指的远端指间关节挛缩
HP:0009697.ENG_DEF: Chronic loss of joint motion in one or more distal interphalangeal joints of the fingers.
HP:0009697.CNS_DEF: 慢性损失关节运动的手指的一个或多个远端指间关节。

HP:0007913.CNS_DEF: 视网膜营养不良呈网格状

HP:0004448.ENG_DEF: Hepatic failure refers to the inability of the liver to perform its normal synthetic and metabolic functions, which can result in coagulopathy and alteration in the mental status of a previously healthy individual. Hepatic failure is defined as fulminant if there is onset of encephalopathy within 4 weeks of the onset of symptoms in a patient with a previously healthy liver.
HP:0004448.CNS_DEF: 肝功能衰竭是指肝脏无法行使其正常的合成和代谢功能，这将导致凝血病和正常个体的精神状态的改变。若原先肝脏为正常的病人在肝功能衰竭症状发生4周内脑病发作，则为爆发性肝功能衰竭。

HP:0009543.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009543.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger

HP:0100016.ENG_DEF: Folds of membranous tissue (peritoneum, mesothelium) attached to the wall of the abdomen and enclosing viscera. Examples include the mesentery for the small intestine; the transverse mesocolon, which attaches the transverse portion of the colon to the back wall of the abdomen; and the mesosigmoid, which enfolds the sigmoid portion of the colon. Cells of the same embryologic origin also surround the other organs of the body such as the lungs (pleura) or the heart (pericardium).
HP:0100016.CNS_DEF: 附着于腹壁及其包裹的内脏之间的膜状组织（腹膜，间皮）的折叠。包括小肠肠系膜、连接横结肠和背侧腹壁的结肠系膜、以及结肠乙状弯曲部分折叠而成的乙状结肠系膜。相同胚系起源的细胞也环绕身体的其他器官，如肺（胸膜）或心脏（心包膜）。

HP:0006532.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0006532.ENG_DEF: An increased susceptibility to pneumonia as manifested by a history of recurrent episodes of pneumonia.
HP:0006532.CNS_DEF: 肺炎的易感性增加，表现为肺炎反复发作的病史。

HP:0001386.MAIN_CLASS: 骨骼系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常

HP:0003256.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the coagulation cascade, which is comprised of the contact activation pathway (also known as the intrinsic pathway) and the tissue factor pathway (also known as the extrinsic pathway) as well as cofactors and regulators.
HP:0003256.CNS_DEF: 凝血级联的异常，包括接触活化途径（也称为内在途径）和组织因子途径（也称为外源性途径）以及辅因子和调节因子的异常。

HP:0002793.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the rhythm or depth of breathing.
HP:0002793.CNS_DEF: 呼吸的节奏或深度异常。

HP:0000472.ENG_DEF: Increased inferior-superior length of the neck.

HP:0000809.ENG_DEF: Congenital absence of the normal opening of a structure of the urinary tract.
HP:0000809.CNS_DEF: 尿路结构正常开口先天性缺如。

HP:0012165.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012165.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect resulting in the presence of fewer than the normal number of digits.
HP:0012165.CNS_DEF: 一个发育缺陷造成比数字的正常数量少的存在。

HP:0001216.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001216.ENG_DEF: Ossification of carpal bones occurs later than age-adjusted norms.
HP:0001216.CNS_DEF: 腕骨骨化发生后比年龄调整规范。

HP:0009204.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009204.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009204.CNS_NAME: 小指中节指骨支架样骨骺
HP:0009204.ENG_DEF: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009204.CNS_DEF: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0011649.ENG_NAME: Patent ductus arteriosus after premature birth
HP:0011649.ENG_DEF: Abnormal persistent patency of the ductus arteriosus when birth was at less than 37 weeks completed gestation.
HP:0011649.CNS_DEF: 婴儿在少于完整的37周妊娠期出生时，动脉导管异常地持续开放。

HP:0030324.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment of the vertebral artery on both sides.

HP:0100904.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100904.ENG_NAME: Sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0100904.CNS_NAME: 第二手指中节指骨硬化

HP:0006986.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0001114.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0001114.ENG_DEF: The presence of xanthomata in the skin of the eyelid.
HP:0001114.CNS_DEF: 眼睑皮肤的黄色斑块沉着。

HP:0030893.ENG_NAME: Abnormal response to short acting pulmonary vasodilator
HP:0030893.CNS_NAME: 对短效肺血管扩张剂反应异常
HP:0030893.ENG_DEF: Pulmonary vasodilator testing is performed during right-heart catheterization and involves a short-acting vasoactive agent such as adenosine, epoprostenol, or inhaled nitric oxide. The current definition of a normal (positive) response is a drop in mean pulmonary artery pressure of at least 10 mm Hg (or 20 percent) to below 40 mm Hg.

HP:0004057.ENG_DEF: Fusion of the hands and feet by a thin membrane of skin (scarring) seen in forms of dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa and leading to a "mitten" hand deformity.
HP:0004057.CNS_DEF: 融合看出，在营养不良大疱性表皮松解，并导致形成一个“手套”手畸形的手和脚用薄的皮肤（疤痕）膜。

HP:0010567.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010567.ENG_DEF: Y-shaped metatarsals are the result of a partial fusion of two metatarsal bones, with the two arms of the Y pointing in the distal direction. Y-shaped metatarsals may be seen in combination with polydactyly.
HP:0010567.CNS_DEF: Y形跖骨是两个跖骨近端部分融合的结果，Y的两臂指向远端方。 见到Y形跖骨与多趾伴随出现。

HP:3000016.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000016.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the styloglossus muscle.

HP:0002951.ENG_DEF: Congenital absence of a part of the `vermis of cerebellum` (FMA:76928).
HP:0002951.CNS_DEF: 先天性部分小脑蚓部缺如

HP:0008846.CNS_NAME: 严重的胎儿宫内发育迟缓
HP:0008846.ENG_DEF: Intrauterine growth retardation that is 4 or more standard deviations below average, corrected for sex and gestational age.
HP:0008846.CNS_DEF: 胎儿宫内发育迟缓程度低于同性别同胎龄平均水平超过4个标准差。

HP:0012054.ENG_DEF: Malignant tumor of melanocytes of the choroid. HP:0008158.CNS_DEF: Hyperapobetalipoproteine​​mia被定义为一个正常的低密度脂蛋白（LDL）中的胆固醇增加的LDL载脂蛋白B（apoB的）蛋白质的面的组合。

HP:0007561.CNS_NAME: 日光曝露或非曝露的皮肤毛细血管扩张

HP:0012774.CNS_DEF: 身体上半部分与下半部分身长比值增加，其中下半身被定义为耻骨联合顶端到地板之间的长度，上半身被定义为头顶到顶耻骨联合的顶部。

HP:0000445.CNS_DEF: 两侧鼻翼之间的距离大于同年龄平均值超过2个标准偏差，即鼻基宽度和鼻翼之间的宽度显得增加。

Normal muscle tissue has a random distribution of type I and type II fibers.

HP:0011732.ENG_DEF: Any structural anomaly of the `adrenal glands` (FMA:9604).
HP:0011732.CNS_DEF: 肾上腺的任何结构异常。

HP:0010048.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010048.ENG_DEF: Developmental defect associated with absence of one or more metacarpal bones.
HP:0010048.CNS_DEF: 与不存在的一个或多个掌骨发育缺陷相关联。

HP:3000059.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an inferior thyroid vein.

HP:0012641.ENG_DEF: A reduction of the pressure inside the cranium (skull) and thereby in the brain tissue and cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0012641.CNS_DEF: 颅骨（头盖骨）内的压力下降，并由此，脑组织和脑脊髓液的压力减少。

HP:0100341.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0008205.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0008205.CNS_NAME: 胰岛素依赖但非酮症性糖尿病
HP:0008205.ENG_DEF: Ketosis-resistant diabetes is a synonym for type II diabetes. This term thus refers to a form of type II diabetes in which patients are dependent on insulin.
HP:0008205.CNS_DEF: 非酮症性糖尿病是2型糖尿病的同义词。因此，该术语是指2型糖尿病的一种形式，其患者依赖胰岛素治疗​​。

HP:0011292.ENG_DEF: EEG with sharp waves in the occipital region, i.e., sharp transient waves of a duration between 80 and 200 msec.
HP:0011292.CNS_DEF: 脑电图，在枕区时限80至200毫秒之间的短暂尖波。

HP:0000025.ENG_NAME: Functional abnormality of male internal genitalia
HP:0000025.CNS_NAME: 男性内生殖器功能异常

HP:0003278.ENG_DEF: An abnormally squared appearance of the bony pelvis, a normally rounded or basin-shaped structure.
HP:0003278.CNS_DEF: 异常方形外观的骨盆，通常是圆形或盆形结构。

HP:0005832.ENG_DEF: A type of dysharmonic skeletal maturation in which there is a delay in skeletal maturation whose degree differs markedly in different bones.
HP:0005832.CNS_DEF: A型dysharmonic骨骼成熟，其中有在骨骼成熟的程度明显不同在不同的骨骼延迟。

HP:0009459.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009459.ENG_NAME: Short proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009459.ENG_DEF: Hypoplasia (congenital reduction in size) of the `proximal phalanx of the third finger` (FMA:23920).
HP:0009459.CNS_DEF: 第三finger`（:23920 FMA）的`近节指骨发育不全（先天性减小尺寸）。

HP:0025019.ENG_DEF: Sudden breakage of an artery leading to leakage of blood from the circulation.

HP:0011412.ENG_DEF: Delivery of newborn by means of a ventouse, a vacuum device used to assist the delivery of a baby when the second stage of labour has not progressed adequately.
HP:0011412.CNS_DEF: 当第二产程进展延长时，应用一个真空设备的吸引装置辅助胎儿分娩。

HP:0012897.CNS_NAME: 上肢运动诱发电位异常
HP:0012897.ENG_DEF: An anomaly identified by motor evoked potentials (MEPs) in the arm.
HP:0012897.CNS_DEF: 一种在上肢发现的运动诱发电位（MEPs）的异常。

HP:0030002.ENG_DEF: The inability to close the eyelids during sleep.

HP:0002155.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase in the level of `triglycerides` (CHEBI:17855) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0002155.CNS_DEF: 在`blood`（FMA:9670）:在'triglycerides`（17855 CHEBI）水平的异常增加。

HP:0011880.CNS_NAME: 急性弥散性血管内凝血
HP:0011880.ENG_DEF: An acute form of `disseminated intravascular coagulation` (HP:0005521). Acute DIC can occur following sudden exposure of blood to procoagulants, with the compensatory hemostatic mechanisms becoming overwhelmed.
HP:0011880.CNS_DEF: 弥散性血管内凝血一种急性型（HP:0005521）凝血功能异常综合征。急性DIC可能由于促凝血剂突然增多，使止血机制不堪代偿而发生。

HP:0012029.ENG_DEF: An `abnormal` (PATO:0000460) `concentration` (PATO:0000033) of a `hormone` (CHEBI:24621) in the urine.

HP:0000967.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0000967.ENG_DEF: Petechiae are pinpoint-sized reddish/purple spots, resembling a rash, that appear just under the skin or a mucous membrane when capillaries have ruptured and some superficial bleeding into the skin has happened. This term refers to an abnormally increased susceptibility to developing petechiae.
HP:0000967.CNS_DEF: 瘀点是针尖大小红色或紫色的斑点，类似红疹，是皮肤或粘膜下毛细血管破裂发生浅表出血的表现。瘀点一般有发生出血的倾向。

HP:0012777.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the retina.

HP:0001710.ENG_DEF: A congenital malformation of the outflow tract of the heart. Conotruncal defects are thought to result from a disturbance of the outflow tract of the embryonic heart, and comprise truncus arteriosus, tetralogy of Fallot, interrupted aortic arch, transposition of the great arteries, and double outlet right ventricle.
HP:0001710.CNS_DEF: 先天性心脏流出道畸形。圆锥动脉干畸形被认为是由胚胎心脏流出道畸形造成的，和包括永存动脉干，法洛四联症，主动脉弓中断，大动脉转位以及右心室双出口。

HP:0004263.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0002403.ENG_DEF: The patient stands with the feet placed together and balance and is asked to close his or her eyes. A loss of balance upon eye closure is a positive Romberg sign and is interpreted as indicating a deficit in proprioception.
HP:0002403.CNS_DEF: 病人站立时并脚来保持平衡，然后被要求闭上眼睛。如果闭眼后失去平衡曾考虑为Romberg征阳性，可能存在本体感觉的异常。

HP:0003281.ENG_DEF: Abnormal raised concentration of ferritin, a ubiquitous intracellular protein that stores iron, in the blood.
HP:0003281.CNS_DEF: 铁蛋白的异常升高浓度，存储铁，在血液中普遍存在的细胞内蛋白质。

HP:0008480.ENG_DEF: The presence of `arthrosis` (MPATH:27), i.e., of degenerative joint disease, affecting the `cervical vertebral column` (FMA:24138).
HP:0008480.CNS_DEF: 的`arthrosis`存在（的mpath:27），即，退行性关节病，影响`颈椎column`（FMA:24138）。

HP:0010448.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect resulting in complete obliteration of the lumen of the colon. That is, there is an abnormal closure, or `atresia` (PATO:0001819) of the tubular structure of the `colon` (FMA:14543).
HP:0010448.CNS_DEF: 一种导致结肠腔完全消失的发育缺陷。即，结肠的管状结构有一个异常的闭合，或“闭锁”。

HP:0009983.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009983.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009983.CNS_NAME: 第四手指的近节指骨部分重复
HP:0009983.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of the `fourth proximal phalanx of hand` (FMA:23921), seen on x-rays as a broad and/or bifid phalanx.
HP:0009983.CNS_DEF: hand`的'第四近节指骨（FMA:23921）的部分重复，看到X光片是一个广泛的和/或双歧方阵。

HP:0011130.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the morphology of the `major calices` (FMA:15613) or `minor calices` (FMA:15614) of the kidney.
HP:0011130.CNS_DEF: 主肾盏或次肾盏的形态学异常。

HP:0012369.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012369.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of `frontal process of maxilla` (FMA:52894).

HP:0025426.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `set of bronchi`(FMA:70774).

HP:0100852.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of fear/anxiety-related behavior, which may relate to either abnormally reduced fear/anxiety-related response or increased fear/anxiety-related response.
HP:0100852.CNS_DEF: 恐惧/焦虑相关行为的异常，这可能涉及到任何异常降低的恐惧/焦虑相关反应或增强的恐惧/焦虑相关的反应。

HP:0100586.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0100586.ENG_DEF: Leukocyturia without bacterial growth upon urine culture.
HP:0100586.CNS_DEF: 尿存在白细胞，但尿培养无细菌生长。

HP:0000068.ENG_DEF: Congenital anomaly characterized by closure or failure to develop an opening in the urethra.
HP:0000068.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性异常，尿道开口闭锁或未发育形成。

HP:0006498.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006498.CNS_NAME: 髌骨发育不全或发育低下
HP:0006498.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the patella.

HP:0430014.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of musculature of soft palate
HP:0430014.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of one or more of the five muscles of the soft palate.

HP:0011826.ENG_DEF: Narrow ridge in the midline of the philtral groove.

HP:0010112.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010112.ENG_DEF: The presence of a supernumerary toe (not a hallux) involving the third or fourth metatarsal with associated osseous syndactyly.
HP:0010112.CNS_DEF: 一个额外趾（不是拇）涉及第三或第四跖骨与相关的骨并指的存在。

HP:0010388.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0010388.ENG_DEF: Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the phalanges of the fifth toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.
HP:0010388.CNS_DEF: 片状（不规则）的增加在一个第五脚趾的指骨或更多的骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0011992.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0011992.ENG_DEF: An abnormal form or size of neutrophils.
HP:0011992.CNS_DEF: 不正常的中性粒细胞的形态或大小。

HP:0100421.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100421.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0100421.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾的中节趾骨部分多趾
HP:0100421.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of the middle phalanx of the 5th toe.
HP:0100421.CNS_DEF: 第5脚趾的中节指骨部分重复。

HP:0011543.ENG_NAME: Superior-inferior ventricles without criss-cross atrioventricular valves
HP:0011543.CNS_NAME: 无十字房室瓣型上下排列心室
HP:0011543.ENG_DEF: A type of superior-inferior ventricles which presents no criss-cross atrioventricular valves.
HP:0011543.CNS_DEF: 一种心室呈上下排列样疾病，但无十字型房室瓣。

HP:0005003.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005003.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis
HP:0005003.CNS_NAME: 股骨头骨骺发育不全或发育低下
HP:0005003.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841).
HP:0005003.CNS_DEF: 缺席或femur`的`近端骨骺不发达（FMA:32841）。

HP:0011088.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the incisor characterized by invagination of the enamel, giving a radiographic appearance that suggests a tooth within a tooth.
HP:0011088.CNS_DEF: 一种切牙异常，表现特征为釉质的内陷，从放射影像结果看来类似于牙齿内的牙齿。

HP:0011619.CNS_NAME: 肺脏定位模糊并双侧形态学左肺
HP:0011619.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the pulmonary situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the morphological right and left lungs, in which both lungs have the morphology of a left lung.
HP:0011619.CNS_DEF: 肺形态定位的异常，即左右肺形态异常，左侧和右侧肺的形态均为左肺。

HP:0006176.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006176.ENG_NAME: Two carpal ossification centers present at birth
HP:0006176.CNS_NAME: 出生时腕骨就有两个骨化中心

HP:0011163.ENG_DEF: Auras with sensation of tingling, numbness, electric shock sensations, pain, sense of movement, or desire to move.
HP:0011163.CNS_DEF: 先兆伴随刺痛感，麻木，触电的感觉，疼痛，运动感，或想要活动。

HP:0005829.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0004598.ENG_DEF: Three ossification sites are present in typical vertebral bodies (C3-L5): a single ossification center in the vertebral body, and one each in the two neural arches. This term applies if there are additional vertebral ossification centers present during the development and maturation of the spine.
HP:0004598.CNS_DEF: 典型的椎体（C3-L5）中存在三骨化中心:椎体一个、两个椎弓各一个。该术语适用于下列情况:在脊椎的发育和成熟过程中存在额外椎体骨化中心。

HP:0004947.ENG_DEF: An arteriovenous fistula is an abnormal connection or passageway between an artery and a vein. It may be congenital, surgically created for hemodialysis treatments, or acquired due to pathologic process, such as trauma or erosion of an arterial aneurysm.
HP:0004947.CNS_DEF: 动静脉瘘是动脉与静脉之间的异常连接或通道，可能是先天性的，也可能是血液透析外科手术或动脉瘤的病变引起的。

HP:0012709.ENG_NAME: Abnormal brain choline/creatine ratio by MRS
HP:0012709.CNS_NAME: 磁共振脑胆碱/肌酐比值异常
HP:0012709.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal in the ratio of choline to creatine in the brain identified by magnetic resonance spectroscopy (MRS).
HP:0012709.CNS_DEF: 从正常的胆碱的比率A偏离到肌酸在确定了磁共振波谱（MRS）的大脑。

HP:0009853.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009853.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped proximal phalanges of the hand
HP:0009853.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的手的近端指骨

HP:0012582.ENG_DEF: A bilateral form of `developmental dysplasia` (MPATH:64) of the `kidney` (FMA:7203).

HP:0006606.CNS_NAME: 肋与肋软骨关节不规则
HP:0006606.ENG_DEF: Irregular surface of the normally relatively smooth border between the distal part of the ribs and the costal cartilages, which are bars of hyaline cartilage that connect the ribs to the sternum.
HP:0006606.CNS_DEF: 肋和肋软骨，它们是肋连接到胸骨透明软骨的杆的末端部分之间的通常相对平滑边界的不规则表面。

HP:0012252.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of the respiratoy system.

HP:0030102.ENG_DEF: A decreased amount of alpha sarcoglycan in muscle. Immunohistochemistry reveals reduced alpha sarcoglycan protein in the muscle biopsy.

HP:0007277.ENG_NAME: Paucity of anterior horn motor neurons

HP:0006753.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `stomach` (FMA:7148).

HP:0012594.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012594.ENG_DEF: The presence of mildly increased concentrations of albumin in the urine (in adults, 30-150 mg per day).
HP:0012594.CNS_DEF: 尿液中白蛋白浓度轻度增加（成人每天30-150毫克）。

HP:0009830.ENG_DEF: Peripheral neuropathy is a general term for any disorder of the `peripheral nervous system` (FMA:9903). The main clinical features used to classify peripheral neuropathy are distribution, type (mainly demyelinating versus mainly axonal), duration, and course.
HP:0009830.CNS_DEF: 周围神经病是外周神经系统疾病的总称，主要根据其临床特征包括分布、分型（主要累及髓鞘还是轴索）、持续时间、病程而分类的。

HP:0010695.ENG_DEF: A type of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) in which the opacity follows the anterior or posterior Y suture.
HP:0010695.CNS_DEF: 先天性白内障的一种（HP:0000519），晶体的浑浊位于前或后ÿ缝。

HP:0011631.ENG_NAME: Complete right sided absence of pericardium
HP:0011631.ENG_DEF: No pericardium is present on the righthand side of the heart. It is a congenital absence of pericardium rather than the result of a pericardectomy.
HP:0011631.CNS_DEF: 心脏右侧心包完全缺失，属于先天性无心包而非心包切除术的结果。

HP:0000947.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000947.ENG_DEF: An abnormal appearance of the long bones with resemblance to a dumbbell, a short bar with a weight at each end. That is, the long bone is shortened and displays flaring (widening) of the metaphyses.
HP:0000947.CNS_DEF: 长骨的不正常外观相似哑铃，具有重量在每端一个短路棒。即，长骨被缩短并显示燃烧干骺端的（扩大）。

HP:0009956.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009956.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd finger
HP:0009956.CNS_NAME: 第二手指的指骨部分重复
HP:0009956.ENG_DEF: A partial duplication, depending on severity leading to a broad or bifid appearance, affecting one or more of the phalanges of the 2nd finger. As opposed to a complete duplication there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones.
HP:0009956.CNS_DEF: 的部分重复，根据其严重性，导致宽的或双歧外观，影响一个第二手指的指骨或更多。而不是一个完整的复制仍有复制骨头之间融合的可变程度。

HP:0002000.ENG_DEF: Reduced distance from the anterior border of the naris to the subnasale.
HP:0002000.CNS_DEF: 从鼻孔前缘到鼻中隔下点的距离减少。

HP:0007755.CNS_NAME: 青少年上皮性角膜变性
HP:0007755.CNS_DEF: 青少年上皮性角膜变性

HP:0006349.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect characterized by the absence of one or more permanent teeth, including oligodontia, hypodontia, and adontia of the of `permanent teeth` (FMA:55654).
HP:0006349.CNS_DEF: 先天性畸形特征是缺一个或多个恒牙，包括牙先天缺失，牙齿发育不全，以及不长恒牙

HP:0011624.ENG_DEF: A muscular ventricular septal defect located at the apex of the heart.
HP:0011624.CNS_DEF: 一种位于心脏顶端的肌部室间隔缺损。

HP:0001376.ENG_DEF: A reduction in the freedom of movement of one or more joints.
HP:0001376.CNS_DEF: 在一个或多个关节移动的自由的减少。

HP:0010425.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010425.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010425.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾末节趾骨部分重复
HP:0010425.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of the `distal phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32628).
HP:0010425.CNS_DEF: 第二toe`的`末节指骨部分重复（FMA:32628）。

HP:0010576.ENG_DEF: A cystic lesion originating within the brain.
HP:0010576.CNS_DEF: 起源于脑内的囊性病灶。

HP:0004851.CNS_NAME: 对叶酸治疗有反应的巨幼细胞性贫血
HP:0004851.ENG_DEF: A type of megaloblastic anemia (i.e., anemia characterized by the presence of erythroblasts that are larger than normal) that improves upon the administration of folate.
HP:0004851.CNS_DEF: 一型巨幼细胞贫血（即贫血特点是红细胞体积是大于正常），用叶酸治疗后的改善。

HP:0009678.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009678.ENG_NAME: Enlarged epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the thumb
HP:0009678.CNS_NAME: 拇指末节指骨骨骺膨大
HP:0009678.ENG_DEF: Abnormally large size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the thumb with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0009678.CNS_DEF: 位于拇指末节指骨的近端相对于年龄依赖性规范骨骺异常大尺寸。

HP:0010895.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `glycine metabolic process` (GO:0006544).

HP:0001869.ENG_DEF: The presence of unusually deep creases (ridges/wrinkles) on the `skin of sole of foot` (FMA:37849).
HP:0001869.CNS_DEF: 跖部皮肤明显的皱褶（呈脊或皱纹）。

HP:0004855.ENG_DEF: An `abnormality of coagulation` (HP:0001928) related to a `decreased concentration` (PATO:0001163) of `vitamin K-dependent protein S` (PR:000013269). Protein S is a cofactor of protein C.
HP:0004855.CNS_DEF: 与`维生素K依赖的蛋白S`（PR:000013269）浓度（PATO:0001163）下降相关的凝血异常（HP:0001928）。centration`的。蛋白S是蛋白C的辅因子

HP:0009792.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0030320.ENG_DEF: An increase in the vertical distance between adjacent vertebral bodies, observed as an increase in the intervertebral disc space.

HP:0005419.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常;代谢/内稳态异常

HP:0001993.ENG_DEF: Acidosis resulting from accumulation of ketone bodies.
HP:0001993.CNS_DEF: 酸中毒从酮体蓄积造成。

HP:0008232.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常

HP:0001065.ENG_DEF: Thinned, erythematous, depressed bands of atrophic skin. Initially, striae appear as flattened and thinned, pinkish linear regions of the skin. Striae tend to enlarge in length and become reddish or purplish. Later, striae tend to appear as white, depressed bands that are parallel to the lines of skin tension. Striae distensae occur most often in areas that have been subject to distension such as the lower back, buttocks, thighs, breast, abdomen, and shoulders.

This is caused by autoantibodies to the TSH-receptor (TSHR-Ab) that activate that TSH-receptor (TSHR), thereby stimulating thyroid hormone synthesis and secretion, and thyroid growth (causing a diffusely enlarged goiter). The resulting state of hyperthyroidism can cause a dramatic constellation of neuropsychological and physical signs and symptoms, which can severely compromise the patients.
HP:0100647.CNS_DEF: 一种自身免疫性疾病，其中甲状腺过度活跃，产生过量的甲状腺激素（导致严重代谢失衡称为甲状腺功能亢进和甲状腺毒症）。这是由于抗TSH受体的自身抗体激活TSH受体（TSHR），从而刺激甲状腺激素合成和分泌，以及甲状腺生长（导致弥漫性甲状腺肿）引起的。甲状腺功能亢进症可引起神经心理和生理症状和体征，会严重影响患者健康。

HP:0011873.ENG_DEF: Abnormal number of platelets per volume of blood. In a healthy adult, a normal platelet count is between 150,000 and 450,000 per microliter of blood.
HP:0011873.CNS_DEF: 每升血液中血小板数量异常。健康成年血小板计数为每微升血液15万至45万。

HP:0001227.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0001227.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the thenar eminence, i.e., of the muscle on the palm of the human hand just beneath the thumb.
HP:0001227.CNS_DEF: 大鱼际异常，大鱼际是拇指下方的手掌肌肉。

HP:0009234.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009234.ENG_NAME: Symphalangism of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger with the 5th metatcarpal
HP:0009234.CNS_NAME: 小指近端指骨与第五掌骨指关节粘连
HP:0009234.ENG_DEF: Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger with the 5th metacarpal.
HP:0009234.CNS_DEF: 小指近端指骨与第5掌骨融合。

HP:0002077.ENG_DEF: A type of `migraine` (HP:0002076) in which there is an aura characterized by focal neurological phenomena that usually proceed, but may accompany or occur in the absence of, the headache. The symptoms of an aura may include fully reversible visual, sensory, and speech symptoms but not motor weakness. Visual symptoms may include flickering lights, spots and lines and/or loss of vision and/or unilateral sensory symptoms such as paresthesias or numbness. At least one of the symptoms of an aura develops gradually over 5 or more minutes and/or different symptoms occur in succession.
HP:0002077.CNS_DEF: 偏头痛（HP:0002076）的一种类型，先兆的特点为局灶性神经现象，通常进行性的，可伴有或不伴有头痛。先兆的症状可以包括完全可逆的视觉，感觉，和言语症状，但无运动无力。视觉症状可能包括闪光、点、线和/或视觉缺失，和/或单侧感觉症状诸如感觉异常或麻木。至少一个的先兆症状逐渐发展超过5分钟或更长时间，和/或不同的症状连续发生。

HP:0002616.ENG_DEF: Aortic root dilation occurs when the aortic root becomes enlarged. It can be caused by many different factors, including age, connective tissue disorders, and high blood pressure.
HP:0002616.CNS_DEF: 主动脉根部扩大引起主动脉根部扩张，致病原因包括年龄、结缔组织疾病以及高血压等。

HP:0003634.ENG_DEF: Generalized congenital lack of development of the muscles, which are then replaced by a mixture of dense fat and fibrous tissue.
HP:0003634.CNS_DEF: 广泛的先天性肌肉发育缺乏，由致密脂肪和纤维组织的混合物代替。

HP:0008288.CNS_NAME: 非酮症性高甘氨酸血症

HP:0006000.ENG_DEF: Obstruction of the flow of urine through the `ureter` (FMA:9704).
HP:0006000.CNS_DEF: 尿液在输尿管流动出现阻塞。

HP:0008838.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008838.CNS_NAME: 肱骨近端骨骺点状钙化

HP:0045060.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0045060.ENG_NAME: Aplasia/hypoplasia involving bones of the extremities
HP:0045060.CNS_NAME: 四肢骨不发育/发育不全

HP:0012511.ENG_DEF: A pale yellow discoloration of the temporal (lateral) portion of the optic disc.
HP:0012511.CNS_DEF: 视盘的颞侧（横）部分浅黄色的变色。

HP:0000148.ENG_DEF: Congenital occlusion of the vagina or adhesion of the walls of the vagina causing occlusion.
HP:0000148.CNS_DEF: 阴道先天闭塞或阴道壁粘连造成闭锁。

HP:0030661.ENG_DEF: Yellow-white inflammatory aggregates in the vitreous that are found in the midvitreous and inferior periphery.

HP:0002333.ENG_DEF: Loss of previously present motor (i.e., movement) abilities.
HP:0002333.CNS_DEF: 既有的运动能力的损失。

HP:0100363.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100363.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the phalanges of the 4th toe
HP:0100363.CNS_NAME: 第四趾的趾骨发育不全

HP:0000204.ENG_DEF: A gap in the `upper lip` (FMA:59817). This is a congenital defect resulting from nonfusion of tissues of the lip during embryonal development.
HP:0000204.CNS_DEF: 上唇的间隙。这是胚胎发育过程中唇组织非融合造成的先天性缺陷。

HP:0004616.ENG_DEF: A discontinuity of the vertebral arch (FMA:11946), i.e., of the posterior part of a vertebra.
HP:0004616.CNS_DEF: 椎弓的不连续性（FMA:11946）脊椎的后部，即，。

HP:0100669.ENG_NAME: Abnormal pigmentation of the oral mucosa
HP:0100669.CNS_NAME: 口腔粘膜色素沉着异常
HP:0100669.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the pigmentation of the `mucosa of the mouth`
HP:0100669.CNS_DEF: 口腔黏膜色素沉着的异常

HP:0030509.MAIN_CLASS: 眼睛的异常;肿瘤;头或颈部的异常

HP:0011249.ENG_DEF: Absence of the anterosuperior prominence of the area between the bottom of the incisura and the inner margin of the antihelix.
HP:0011249.CNS_DEF: 切迹的底部和对耳轮的内缘之间的区域的前上突出的缺失。

HP:0030040.ENG_DEF: A congenital anomaly characterized by a joining (fusion) of two or more lumbar vertebral bodies with one another.

HP:0100681.ENG_DEF: A developmental disorder in which there is a duplication of a portion of the muscle and submucosa of the esophagus without epithelial duplication.
HP:0100681.CNS_DEF: 食管的部分肌肉和粘膜下层发生复制，而不伴有上皮复制的一种发育障碍。

HP:0003946.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003946.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphyses of the elbow

HP:0010035.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010035.ENG_DEF: In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0010035.CNS_DEF: 相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0006465.ENG_NAME: Periosteal thickening of long tubular bones
HP:0006465.ENG_DEF: Thickening of the `periosteum of long bone` (FMA:32677).

HP:0045039.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0045039.ENG_NAME: Osteolysis involving bones of the upper limbs

HP:0011811.ENG_DEF: A reduced ability to identify precisely the site of a touch. This test is usually carried out by asking a patient, whose eyes are closed or covered, to touch the same site with a fingertip.
HP:0011811.CNS_DEF: 准确地识别触摸部位的能力下降。测试要求病人闭眼或盖住眼睛，用指尖触摸同一部位。

HP:0012817.ENG_DEF: A type of cardiomyopathy characterized anatomically by deep trabeculations in the ventricular wall, which define recesses communicating with the main ventricular chamber.
HP:0012817.CNS_DEF: 心肌致密化不全是以心室内异常粗大的肌小梁和交错的深隐窝为特征的一种遗传性心肌病。

HP:0010713.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010713.ENG_DEF: 1-5 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 5th toe (complete syndactyly of all toes of the foot).
HP:0010713.CNS_DEF: 全部脚趾融合型并趾（所有脚趾完全并趾）。

HP:0007678.ENG_DEF: Narrowing of a tear duct (lacrimal duct).

HP:0000317.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0000317.ENG_DEF: Facial myokymia is a fine fibrillary activity of the facial muscles.
HP:0000317.CNS_DEF: 面肌纤维颤搐是面部肌肉的细微纤丝活动。

HP:0000463.ENG_DEF: Anteriorly-facing nostrils viewed with the head in the Frankfurt horizontal and the eyes of the observer level with the eyes of the subject. This gives the appearance of an upturned nose (upturned nasal tip).
HP:0000463.CNS_DEF: 观察者与被观察者头部保持法兰克福水平且两人眼睛平齐，在这样的视角下观察到鼻孔朝前。外观表现为朝天鼻（鼻尖上翘）。

HP:0012129.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of bone marrow stromal cells

HP:0100427.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100427.ENG_NAME: Broad middle phalanx of the 5th toe

HP:0003125.ENG_DEF: Reduced activity of `coagulation factor VIII` (PR:000007302). Factor VIII (fVIII) is a cofactor in the intrinsic clotting cascade that is activated to fVIIIa in  the presence of minute quantities of thrombin. fVIIIa acts as a receptor, for factors IXa and X.
HP:0003125.CNS_DEF: `凝血因子VIII`（PR:000007302）的活性减少。因子VIII（fVIII生物）是内源性凝血系统中的一个辅助因子， 被微量凝血酶活化后成为fVIIIa。 fVIIIa是因子IXa的和X的受体。

HP:0005984.CNS_NAME: 孕妇血清α-甲胎蛋白水平升高
HP:0005984.ENG_DEF: An elevation of alpha-feto protein in the maternal serum.
HP:0005984.CNS_DEF: 阿尔法 - 胎儿蛋白在母体血清升高。

HP:0002157.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `nitrogen compounds` (CHEBI:51143) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0002157.CNS_DEF: `血液`（FMA:9670）中'氮化合物`(CHEBI:51143)的浓度增加。

HP:0012067.ENG_DEF: Increased excretion of `glycopeptides` (CHEBI:24396) in the urine. Glycopeptides are peptides with carbohydrate moieties covalently attached to the side chains of the amino acid residues.
HP:0012067.CNS_DEF: 尿液中:增加`glycopeptides`（24396 CHEBI）的排泄。糖肽的肽与碳水化合物部分共价连接到氨基酸残基的侧链。

HP:0001343.ENG_DEF: Damage to cerebral nuclei caused in infants by highly increased levels of unconjugated bilirubin. The basal ganglia and brainstem nuclei could be shown to have a yellow staining historically in infants who died of kernicterus, that is, kernicterus is strictly speaking a pathological diagnosis. The presence of kernicterus may be inferred in infants with characteristic acute or chronic bilirubin-induced neurological dysfunction.
HP:0001343.CNS_DEF: 间接胆红素水平极度升高导致的婴儿大脑核团损害。死于核黄疸的婴儿组织学上显示基底节和脑干黄染，也就是说，核黄疸严格来说是一个病理诊断。婴儿存在核黄疸意味着特征性急性或慢性胆红素引起的神经功能障碍。

HP:0011753.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0011753.ENG_DEF: Abnormal development of the `neurohypophysis` (FMA:74628) during embryonic growth and development.
HP:0011753.CNS_DEF: 胚胎期时垂体后叶的异常发育。

HP:0003749.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0003749.ENG_DEF: Weakness of the muscles of the pelvic girdle (also known as the hip girdle), that is, lack of strength of the muscles around the pelvis.
HP:0003749.CNS_DEF: 骨盆带（也称为臀腰带）肌肉无力，即骨盆周围肌肉缺乏肌力。

HP:0009125.ENG_DEF: Degenerative changes of the fat tissue.
HP:0009125.CNS_DEF: 脂肪组织的退行性改变。

HP:0003982.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003982.ENG_DEF: Missing ulna bone associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0003982.CNS_DEF: 用发展的先天性故障缺少尺骨骨有关。

HP:0000662.ENG_DEF: Inability to see well at night or in poor light.
HP:0000662.CNS_DEF: 在夜间或光线不佳时视物不清。

HP:0030804.ENG_DEF: Excessive longitudinal ridging that gives the surface of the nail plate a rough appearance. It results from multiple foci of defective keratinization of the proximal nail matrix.

HP:0010472.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the heme biosynthetic pathway
HP:0010472.CNS_NAME: 血红素生物合成途径的异常
HP:0010472.ENG_DEF: An abnormality in the synthesis or catabolism of heme. Heme is composed of ferrous iron and protoporphyrin IX and is an essential molecule as the prosthetic group of hemeproteins such as hemoglobin, myoglobin, mitochondrial and microsomal cytochromes.
HP:0010472.CNS_DEF: 血红素的合成或降解的异常。血红素是由亚铁和原卟啉IX组成的,作为血红素蛋白,例如血红蛋白，肌红蛋白，线粒体和微粒体细胞色素的辅基成分,是一个重要的组分分子。

HP:0001360.ENG_DEF: Holoprosencephaly is a structural anomaly of the brain in which the developing forebrain fails to divide into two separate hemispheres and ventricles.
HP:0001360.CNS_DEF: 前脑无裂畸形是一种发育时前脑未能分成两个单独的半球和脑室的脑结构异常。

HP:0012046.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;四肢异常
HP:0012046.ENG_DEF: Inability to elicit tendon reflexes in the upper limbs.

HP:0005587.CNS_NAME: 泛发性色素性皮肤病变

HP:0030377.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030377.CNS_NAME: 不成熟 B 细胞计数增加
HP:0030377.ENG_DEF: An elevation above normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they're specific (IgM+/IgD+).

HP:0010345.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010345.ENG_DEF: One or more bent (flexed) joints of the fifth toe that cannot be straightened actively or passively.
HP:0010345.CNS_DEF: 一个或多个弯曲（挠曲）的第五脚趾不能被主动或被动地拉直的关节。

HP:0002406.ENG_DEF: A type of `dysmetria` (HP:0001310) involving the limbs.
HP:0002406.CNS_DEF: 累及肢体的一种辨距不良（HP:0001310）。

HP:0010453.ENG_DEF: Pelvic asymmetry refers to asymmetric positioning of landmarks on the two sides of the pelvis and may have a structural or functional etiology.
HP:0010453.CNS_DEF: 骨盆不对称是指对骨盆的两侧不对称地标定位，并且可以具有一个结构或功能的病因。

HP:0030838.ENG_DEF: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the hip.

HP:0040052.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0012102.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal number of mitochondria per cell.
HP:0012102.CNS_DEF: 每个细胞中的线粒体数目偏离正常。

HP:0011194.ENG_NAME: EEG with series of focal spikes
HP:0011194.ENG_DEF: Focal spikes occurring for several seconds.
HP:0011194.CNS_DEF: 几秒钟内出现的多个局灶棘波。

HP:0000339.ENG_DEF: Coarse facial features reminiscent of those of a boxer.
HP:0000339.CNS_DEF: 粗糙的面部特征让人联想起一个拳击手。

HP:0011703.ENG_DEF: A simple tachycardia with origin in the sinus node with gradual onset and termination.
HP:0011703.CNS_DEF: 一种单纯的心动过速，起源于窦房结，启动和终止都比较缓慢。

HP:0006352.ENG_NAME: Failure of eruption of permanent teeth
HP:0006352.ENG_DEF: Lack of `tooth eruption` (MeSH:D014078) of the `secondary dentition` (FMA:55654).
HP:0006352.CNS_DEF: 恒牙列的牙齿萌出失败。

HP:0011662.ENG_DEF: Failure to develop of the tricuspid valve and thus lack of the normal connection between the right atrium and the right ventricle.
HP:0011662.CNS_DEF: 三尖瓣发育障碍导致右心房和右心室之间无法正常连接。

HP:0003885.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100289.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials
HP:0100289.CNS_NAME: 图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常
HP:0100289.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of pattern reversal visual evoked potentials
HP:0100289.CNS_DEF: 图形翻转视觉诱发电位异常

HP:0009595.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;体壁的异常
HP:0009595.ENG_DEF: Neurofibromas present in a smaller number than usually seen in neurofibromatosis type 1.
HP:0009595.CNS_DEF: 发生率较小的神经纤维瘤，多存在于1型神经纤维瘤

HP:0030652.ENG_DEF: Vitreous haze is the obscuration of fundus details by vitreous cells and protein exudation.

HP:0100416.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100416.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the distal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100416.CNS_NAME: 第三个脚趾的末节趾骨部分多趾
HP:0100416.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of  `distal phalanx of third toe` (FMA:32629).
HP:0100416.CNS_DEF: 的'第三toe`的末节指骨部分重复（FMA:32629）。

HP:0012161.ENG_DEF: A separation (dissection) of the layers of the `external carotid artery` (FMA:10635) wall.
HP:0012161.CNS_DEF: “颈外动脉”（ FMA:10635）夹层（内膜撕裂血液进入到中膜）。

HP:0012297.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0012297.ENG_DEF: Reduced diameter of the `proximal phalanx of finger` (FMA:75816).
HP:0012297.CNS_DEF: finger`的`近节指骨的直径缩小（FMA:75816）。

HP:0009602.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009602.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of one or more phalanges of the thumb.
HP:0009602.CNS_DEF: 拇指的一个或多个指骨的结构异常。

HP:0006449.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005564.ENG_DEF: A lack of differentiation between renal cortex and medulla on diagnostic imaging.
HP:0005564.CNS_DEF: 影像学诊断中肾皮质和髓质之间的分界不明显。

HP:0012187.CNS_NAME: 红细胞原卟啉浓度增高
HP:0012187.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `protoporphyrins` (CHEBI:26361) in erythrocytes.
HP:0012187.CNS_DEF: 红细胞:`protoporphyrins`（26361 CHEBI）的浓度增加。

HP:0011953.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;血液和造血组织异常;呼吸系统异常

HP:0005423.CNS_NAME: 补体旁路途径功能失调

HP:0006400.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011721.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0011721.ENG_NAME: Infracardiac total anomalous pulmonary venous connection
HP:0011721.CNS_NAME: 心下完全性肺静脉异常连接
HP:0011721.ENG_DEF: Type 3 total anomalous pulmonary venous connection.

HP:0012132.ENG_DEF: Increased count of erythroid precursor cells, that is,  `erythroid lineage cells` (CL:0000764) in the bone marrow.
HP:0012132.CNS_DEF: 红细胞前体细胞增加计数，也就是说，`红细胞谱系细胞`（CL:0000764）在骨髓中增多。

HP:0030810.ENG_DEF: Any functional anomaly of the tongue.

HP:0100685.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of Sharpey's fibers (bone fibers, or perforating fibers), which are a matrix of connective tissue consisting of bundles of strong collagenous fibres connecting periosteum to bone.
HP:0100685.CNS_DEF: 穿通纤维的一种异常。穿通纤维（perforating fibers）又被称为贯通纤维、夏贝氏纤维（Sharpey's fibers）、沙比纤维、夏皮氏纤维、夏佩纤维、夏皮纤维或骨纤维（bone fibers），是一种结缔组织基质，由结实的胶原纤维束构成，并将骨外膜连接到骨质之上。

HP:0000739.ENG_DEF: Feeling or dread, apprehension, and impending disaster.
HP:0000739.CNS_DEF: 感觉恐惧、忧虑、和即将发生灾难。

HP:0010033.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010033.ENG_DEF: This term applies to a triangular shaped 1st metacarpal.
HP:0010033.CNS_DEF: 本术语系指第一掌骨呈三角形。

HP:0010130.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010130.ENG_NAME: Enlarged epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010130.CNS_NAME: 脚母趾近节趾骨骨骺膨大

HP:0001643.ENG_DEF: In utero, the ductus arteriosus (DA) serves to divert ventricular output away from the lungs and toward the placenta by connecting the main pulmonary artery to the descending aorta. A patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) in the first 3 days of life is a physiologic shunt in healthy term and preterm newborn infants, and normally is substantially closed within about 24 hours after bith and completely closed after about three weeks. Failure of physiologcal closure is referred to a persistent or patent ductus arteriosus (PDA). Depending on the degree of left-to-right shunting, PDA can have clinical consequences.
HP:0001643.CNS_DEF: 在子宫内，动脉导管（DA）通过主肺动脉连接到降主动脉从肺离开并朝向胎盘转移心室输出。动脉导管未闭（PDA）在生命的前3天是在健康情况和早产新生儿中是生理上分流的，通常出生后约24小时之内本关闭的，约三个星期后完全关闭。生理上关闭失败是指持久的动脉导管未闭（PDA）。根据左到右分流的程度，动脉导管未闭具有临床后果。

HP:0010624.CNS_DEF: 趾甲发育不全或者不发育。

HP:0100487.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100487.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped distal phalanx of the 5th toe

HP:0006611.CNS_NAME: 胸骨骨化中心数量减少
HP:0006611.ENG_DEF: A less than normal number of sternal ossification centers. The sternum is initially formed from bilateral sternal plates that chondrify and begin to fuse with ribs at 10 weeks gestational age. Ossification starts in the manubrium and upper part of the sternal body at the 6th month, in the middle of the sternal body at the 7th month, in the lower part of the body during the 1st postnatal year and in the xiphoid process between years 5 and 18. The number of ossification centers vary up to six, and it is the ossification centers that are visualized by prenatal ultrasound. This term describes a reduction in the number of ossification centers compared with age-related norms.
HP:0006611.CNS_DEF: 一个不到正常数量的胸骨骨化中心。胸骨开始从双边胸骨板指chondrify，并开始与肋骨融合10周的胎龄形成。骨化开始在柄与胸骨上身在第6个月，在胸骨体的在第7个月的中间，在身体的下部在第一产后年和在之间年5和剑突

HP:0010546.ENG_DEF: Fine, rapid twitching of individual muscle fibers with little or no movement of the muscle as a whole. If a motor neuron or its axon is destroyed, the muscle fibers it innervates undergo denervation atrophy. This leads to hypersensitivity of individual muscle fibers to acetyl choline so that they may contract spontaneously. Isolated activity of individual muscle fibers is generally so fine it cannot be seen through the intact skin, although it can be recorded as a short-duration spike in the EMG.
HP:0010546.CNS_DEF: 不会引起肌肉动作的单个肌纤维精细的、快速的抽动。如果一个运动神经元或轴突被损害，则它支配的肌纤维会出现去神经萎缩。

HP:0012535.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the communication from a neuron to a target across a synapse. This is a four step process, comprising (i) synthesis and storage of neurotransmitters; (ii) neurotransmitter release; (iii) activation of postsynaptic receptors by the neurotransmitter; and (iv) inactivation of the neurotransmitter. Thus, this term is defined as an anomaly of `neurotransmitter metabolic process` (GO:0042133).
HP:0012535.CNS_DEF: 从神经元跨突触到目标靶点联络异常。在这个四步骤的过程中包括:（i）合成和储存神经递质; （ⅱ）神经递质释放; （ⅲ）通过神经递质激活突触后受体;和（iv）神经递质的失活。因此，该术语被定义为'神经递质代谢程序process`（GO:0042133）的异常。

HP:0009073.ENG_DEF: Lack of strength of the proximal muscles that becomes progressively more severe.
HP:0009073.CNS_DEF: 近端肌肉缺乏力量并且逐渐加重。

HP:0010957.CNS_DEF: 一种发育异常，导致男性后尿道发生瓣膜状阻塞。

HP:0012871.CNS_DEF: 精索静脉曲张是沿精索发生静脉扩大，导致阴囊内增大、扭曲的静脉，临床表现为睾丸无痛性肿块、阴囊肿胀或阴囊膨出。

HP:0000270.ENG_DEF: Infants normally have two fontanels at birth, the diamond-shaped anterior fontanelle at the junction of the coronal and sagittal sutures, and the posterior fontanelle at the intersection of the occipital and parietal bones. The posterior fontanelle usually closes by the 8th week of life, and the anterior fontanel closes by the 18th month of life on average. This term applies if there is delay of closure of the fontanelles beyond the normal age.
HP:0000270.CNS_DEF: 婴儿在出生时通常有两个囟门，菱形前囟在冠状缝和矢状缝交界处，后囟门在枕顶骨的交点。后囟通常出生后第8周闭合，前囟平均出生后18个月闭合。本术语适用于如果超出正常年龄的囟门闭合延迟。

HP:0012522.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0012522.ENG_DEF: A form of telangiectasis characterized by a central elevated red dot the size of a pinhead, representing an arteriole, with numerous small blood vessels that radiate out thereby resembling the legs of a spider. Characteristically, compression of the central arteriole causes the entire lesion to blanch, and the lesion quickly refills once the compression is released.
HP:0012522.CNS_DEF: 毛细血管扩张的一种类型，以针尖样隆起的红点为中心，，周围辐射性分布较多小动脉，形似蜘蛛腿。典型的特征为按压中央动脉导致整个病变区域发白且松开后又迅速恢复。

HP:0005307.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;心血管系统的异常

HP:0000564.ENG_DEF: A developmental disorder of the lacrimal drainage system that most often affects the lacrimal ostium and resulting in non-opening of the nasolacrimal duct. It usually results from a non-canalization of the nasolacrimal duct.
HP:0000564.CNS_DEF: 泪液排泄系统的发育障碍，导致鼻泪管不通。

HP:0005743.ENG_NAME: Avascular necrosis of the capital femoral epiphysis
HP:0005743.CNS_NAME: 股骨头骨骺缺血性坏死
HP:0005743.ENG_DEF: Avascular necrosis of the `proximal epiphysis of the femur` (FMA:32841) occurring in growing children and caused by an interruption of the blood supply to the head of the femur close to the hip joint. The necrosis is characteristically associated with flattening of the femoral head, for which reason the term coxa plana has been used to refer to this feature in the medical literature.
HP:0005743.CNS_DEF: 所述femur`的`近端骨骺股骨头缺血性坏死（FMA:32841）发生在成长的儿童和引起的血液供应到股骨接近髋关节头部的中断。坏死特征性地与平坦化股骨头，由于这个原因，术语髋玻璃体已被用来指该功能在医学文献中的相关联。

HP:0010693.ENG_DEF: A kind of `congenital cataract` (HP:0000519) that is characterized by a hollow sphere of punctate opacities involving the fetal nucleus and that usually occurs bilaterally.
HP:0010693.CNS_DEF: 一类先天性白内障（HP:0000519），其特征在于晶状体胎儿核点状混浊，并且通常发生双侧。

HP:0000729.ENG_DEF: A disorder beginning in childhood. Manifestations of the disorder vary greatly depending on the developmental level and chronological age of the individual (DSM-IV).
HP:0000729.CNS_DEF: 婴幼儿期出现的异常，它的特点是社会互动和沟通能力明显异常或发育障碍，活动和兴趣显著受限。该病的临床表现差异很大，取决于个体的发育水平和实际年龄

HP:0004012.ENG_DEF: A premature fusion of the epiphyseal plates of the radius. Epiphyseal plates are located at the distal and proximal ends of the long bones, in this case of the radius and premature fusion will have an effect on the growh of the radial bone, inhibiting or at least disturbing the normal growth and development of the bone.

Neonatal jaundice affects over half of all newborns to some extent in the first week of life. Prolonged neonatal jaundice is said to be present if the jaundice persists for longer than 14 days in term infants and 21 days in preterm infants.
HP:0006579.CNS_DEF: 新生儿黄疸是指新生儿皮肤或其他组织呈黄色，是血液中胆红素浓度升高所致。新生儿黄疸影响超过一半的一周大的新生儿。如果黄疸在足月儿持续超过14天，在早产儿持续超过21天则为新生儿黄疸期延长。

HP:0010734.ENG_DEF: Tumor-like growths that consist of replacement of the medullary bone with fibrous tissue, causing the expansion and weakening of the areas of bone involved. Especially when involving the skull or facial bones, the lesions can cause externally visible deformities. The skull is often, but not necessarily, affected, and any other bone or bones may be involved. Fibrous dysplasia can either effect isolated bones (Monostotic fibrous dysplasia) or also generalized all bones of the body (Polyostotic fibrous dysplasia).

HP:0000944.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0000944.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of one or more metaphysis, i.e., of the somewhat wider portion of a long bone that is adjacent to the epiphyseal growth plate and grows during childhood.
HP:0000944.CNS_DEF: 一个或多种干骺端异常，干骺端是长骨末端略宽部分，它连接骨骺生长板，在儿童期增长。

HP:0010486.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0010486.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `hypothenar eminence`(FMA:61523), i.e., of the muscles on the ulnar side of the palm of the hand (i.e., on the side of the little finger).
HP:0010486.CNS_DEF: 小鱼际的异常，即手掌尺侧（在小指一侧）肌肉的异常。

HP:0002500.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the cerebral white matter
HP:0002500.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `cerebral white matter` (FMA:241998).

HP:0003182.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003564.ENG_DEF: The presence of a folate sensitive fragile site at chromosome Xq28.
HP:0003564.CNS_DEF: 在染色体Xq28叶酸敏感脆弱点的存在。

HP:0002573.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;心血管系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0002573.ENG_DEF: The passage of fresh (red) blood per anus, usually in or with stools. Most rectal bleeding comes from the colon, rectum, or anus.
HP:0002573.CNS_DEF: 通常伴随粪便或在粪便中经由肛门而出的（红色的）鲜血。大多数直肠出血来自结肠、直肠或肛门。

HP:0000431.ENG_DEF: Increased breadth of the nasal bridge (and with it, the nasal root).
HP:0000431.CNS_DEF: 鼻梁（形成鼻根）的宽度增加。

HP:3000017.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000017.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a temporalis muscle.

HP:0006165.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012869.ENG_DEF: Spermatozoa with very small cranial ends devoid of any nuclear material, that is, lacking a typical sperm head.
HP:0012869.CNS_DEF: 精子缺乏典型的头部结构，只有非常小的头部、没有任何核酸物质。

HP:0005026.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005026.CNS_NAME: 肢体中部/根部肢体短缩

HP:0010608.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0010608.ENG_DEF: Hordeola interna are acute purulent infections affecting the meibomian sebacious glands, often caused by staphylococcus infections. In contrast to chalazia (chronic epithelioid cell granulomatous inflammation of the meibomian gland caused by inflammation of a blocked meibomian gland), hordeola are extremely painfull and can cause extreme local swelling.
HP:0010608.CNS_DEF: 内麦粒肿是影响睑板皮脂腺的急性化脓性感染，常由金黄色葡萄球菌感染引起。相对于霰粒腫（引起堵塞睑板腺发炎的睑板腺慢性上皮样细胞肉芽肿性炎症）而言，麦粒肿极其疼痛并可造成极度局部肿胀。

HP:0005376.CNS_NAME: 反复流感嗜血杆菌感染
HP:0005376.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to Haemophilus influenzae infections as manifested by recurrent episodes of infection by Haemophilus influenzae.
HP:0005376.CNS_DEF: 流感嗜血杆菌传染易感性的增加，表现为反复发作的流感嗜血杆菌感染史。

HP:0004963.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004963.ENG_DEF: `Calcification` (PATO:0001447), that is, pathological deposition of calcium salts in the `aorta` (FMA:3734).

HP:0005182.ENG_DEF: The presence of a bicuspid `pulmonary valve` (FMA:7246).

HP:0010565.ENG_DEF: This term applies if the Epiglottis is absent or hypoplastic.
HP:0010565.CNS_DEF: 本术语指会厌缺失或发育不全。

HP:0005328.ENG_DEF: A degree of wrinkling of the facial skin that is more than expected for the age of the individual, leading to a prematurely aged appearance.
HP:0005328.CNS_DEF: 面部皮肤出现超出正常年龄范围的皱纹，导致过早老化面容。

HP:0009148.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009148.ENG_NAME: Small epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009148.CNS_NAME: 小手指末节指骨小骨骺
HP:0009148.ENG_DEF: Abnormally small size of the epiphysis located at the proximal end of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger with respect to age-dependent norms.
HP:0009148.CNS_DEF: 相对于年龄依赖性标准，位于小手指的末节指骨的近端骨骺的尺寸异常小。

HP:0200005.ENG_NAME: Abnormal shape of the palpebral fissure
HP:0200005.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal shape of the `palpebral fissure` (FMA:59110).

HP:0012795.ENG_DEF: A morphological abnormality of the optic disc, i.e., of the portion of the optic nerve clinically visible on fundoscopic examination.
HP:0012795.CNS_DEF: 视盘是眼底检查中临床可见的视神经部分，视盘形态异常。

HP:0004188.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004188.ENG_DEF: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone of the 4nd finger.
HP:0004188.CNS_DEF: 第四手指的异常结构或形态。

HP:3000035.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the plexus of the ventral rami of the first four cervical spinal nerves which are located from C1 to C4 cervical segment in the neck.

HP:0007045.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011152.ENG_DEF: Typical absence seizures starting before the age of 4 years.
HP:0011152.CNS_DEF: 4岁之前开始的典型失神发作。

HP:0000553.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `uvea` (FMA:58103), the vascular layer of the eyeball.
HP:0000553.CNS_DEF: 在葡萄膜的异常（FMA:58103），葡萄膜是眼球的血管层。

HP:0005129.ENG_DEF: A developmental left ventricular hypertrophy with congenital onset.

HP:0011877.ENG_DEF: Average platelet volume above the upper limit of the normal reference interval.
HP:0011877.CNS_DEF: 平均血小板体积高于正常参考区间的上限。

HP:0012014.CNS_NAME: 脑电图，伴中央区局灶棘波
HP:0012014.ENG_DEF: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec in the central region.
HP:0012014.CNS_DEF: 脑电图，位于中央区的局灶短暂尖峰样波，持续时间小于80毫秒。

HP:0012723.ENG_DEF: Disturbance in the atrial activation that is caused by transient failure of impulse conduction from the sinoatrial node to the cardiac atria.
HP:0012723.CNS_DEF: 由窦房结到心脏心房引起冲动瞬时传导故障产生的心房激动紊乱。

HP:0030484.ENG_NAME: Supernormal dark-adapted bright flash electroretinogram b-wave
HP:0030484.CNS_NAME: 暗适应暗淡闪光视网膜电图 b-波超常

HP:0000859.ENG_DEF: Overproduction of the mineralocorticoid aldosterone by the adrenal cortex.
HP:0000859.CNS_DEF: 肾上腺皮质生产的盐皮质激素醛固酮过多。

HP:0006362.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006684.ENG_NAME: Ventricular preexcitation with multiple accessory pathways
HP:0006684.CNS_NAME: 多旁路心室预激综合征
HP:0006684.ENG_DEF: A form of `ventricular preexcitation` (HP:0004309) due to the presence of multiple accessory pathways for cardiac conduction.
HP:0006684.CNS_DEF: 因多旁心脏传导存在导致的一种心室预激（HP:0004309）的形式。

HP:0011260.ENG_DEF: Small defect of the helical fold that lies at the junction of the superior and descending portions of the helix.
HP:0011260.CNS_DEF: 位于耳轮后上部交接处的耳轮结节性小缺损。

HP:0000793.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0000793.ENG_DEF: Proliferation of mesangial cells, increase in the mesangial extracellular matrix, and a thickening of the glomerular capillary walls.
HP:0000793.CNS_DEF: 肾小球系膜细胞的增殖，主要是系膜细胞外基质增加，和肾小球毛细血管壁的增厚。

HP:0008138.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008138.ENG_DEF: Abnormal plantar flexion of the calcaneus relative to the longitudinal axis of the tibia. This results in the angle between the long axis of the tibia and the long axis of the heel bone (calcaneus) being greater than 90 degrees.
HP:0008138.CNS_DEF: 相对于胫骨的纵向轴线跟骨异常跖屈。这导致胫骨的长轴和脚跟骨（跟骨）大于90度的长轴之间的角度。

HP:0003066.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030658.ENG_DEF: Insertion of the umbilical cord within 2 cm from the placental edge.

HP:3000028.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:3000028.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of depressor anguli oris muscle
HP:3000028.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a depressor anguli oris muscle.

HP:0001806.ENG_DEF: Detachment of the nail from the nail bed.

HP:0010196.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010196.ENG_DEF: An abnormal morphology of one or more middle phalanges of the toes, with a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally. Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction.
HP:0010196.CNS_DEF: 脚趾的一个或多个中间指骨，具有短而宽的方阵逐渐变细的远端形态异常。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。

HP:0100088.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100088.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0100088.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的末节趾骨骨骺异常

HP:0003146.ENG_DEF: An decreased concentration of `cholesterol` (CHEBI:16113) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0003063.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003063.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the humerus (i.e., upper arm bone).

HP:0030730.ENG_DEF: A herniation of meninges through a congenital bone defect in the skull in the parietal region.

HP:0000734.ENG_DEF: A lack of restraint manifested in several ways, including disregard for social conventions, impulsivity, and poor risk assessment.
HP:0000734.CNS_DEF: 缺乏约束表现在几个方面，包括无视社会规范，冲动，风险评估能力差。

HP:0006958.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the auditory evoked potentials, which are used to trace the signal generated by a sound, from the cochlear nerve, through the lateral lemniscus, to the medial geniculate nucleus, and to the cortex.
HP:0006958.CNS_DEF: 听觉诱发电位的异常，用于描记声音产生的信号从耳蜗神经、经过外侧丘系和内侧膝状体，最终到达皮层的过程。

HP:0040266.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0007687.CNS_DEF: 发生于一只眼（PATO:0000634）的上睑下垂。

HP:0012334.ENG_DEF: Impairment of bile flow due to obstruction in large bile ducts outside the liver.
HP:0012334.CNS_DEF: 由于肝外大型胆管阻塞引起的胆汁流动障碍。

HP:0003158.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003158.ENG_DEF: An abnormally low urinary specific gravity, i.e., reduced concentration of solutes in the urine.
HP:0003158.CNS_DEF: 异常低的尿比重，即尿中溶质的浓度降低。

HP:0001579.ENG_DEF: Hypercortisolemia associated with a primary defect of the adrenal gland leading to overproduction of cortisol.
HP:0001579.CNS_DEF: 由于原发性的肾上腺缺陷而导致的皮质醇过度生产。

HP:0010418.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010418.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010418.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾的末节趾骨斑状硬化

HP:0009431.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009431.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped middle phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009431.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的中指中节指骨
HP:0009431.ENG_DEF: Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the middle phalanx of the 3rd finger is affected.
HP:0009431.CNS_DEF: 子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第三手指的指骨中间受到影响。

HP:0000618.ENG_DEF: Blindness is the condition of lacking visual perception due to physiological or neurological factors.
HP:0000618.CNS_DEF: 失明是缺乏视觉感知, 可由生理或神经因素引起。

HP:0004013.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005472.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005541.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005541.ENG_DEF: Congenital onset of a marked decrease in the number of `granulocytes` (CL:0000094).
HP:0005541.CNS_DEF: 先天性发病的粒细胞（CL:0000094）的数量显着减少。

HP:0003918.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012853.ENG_DEF: Hypospadias with location of the urethral meatus in the scrotum.
HP:0012853.CNS_DEF: 尿道口位于阴囊位置的尿道下裂。

HP:0003276.ENG_DEF: A benign growth the projects outward from the bone surface of the pelvis. Exostoses are cappped by cartilage, and arise from a bone that develops from cartilage.
HP:0003276.CNS_DEF: 甲良性生长向外项目从骨盆的骨表面。外生骨疣是由软骨cappped，并产生于骨，从软骨发展。

HP:0011425.ENG_DEF: An finding upon obstetric ultrasound examination performed at around 16 to 20 weeks of gestation that is abnormal but not clearly identifiable as a  fetal anatomic malformation or growth restriction. Such findings are known as soft markers since they are associated with increased risk for fetal aneuploidy or other disorders.
HP:0011425.CNS_DEF: 在大约16〜20周妊娠是不正常的，但不能清楚地标识为胎儿解剖畸形或发育迟缓的表现后，产科超声检查的发现。这些发现被称为软标记物，因为它们是与风险为胎儿非整倍或其他病症的增加有关。

HP:0007058.CNS_NAME: 广泛性脑萎缩/发育不全
HP:0007058.ENG_DEF: Generalized atrophy or hypoplasia of the cerebrum.
HP:0007058.CNS_DEF: 广泛性大脑萎缩或发育不全。

HP:0002823.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006895.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0011730.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of cortical sensation. Assuming the primary sensory modalities are intact and the patient is alert and cooperative, the presence of an abnormality of sensory function usually indicates a lesion of a parietal cortex or of the thalamocortical projections to the parietal cortex.
HP:0011730.CNS_DEF: 皮质性感觉的异常。假设初级感觉形态完好，且患者处于觉醒和协作状态，感觉功能异常的存在通常表明的丘脑突起到顶叶皮质的病变。

HP:0002133.ENG_DEF: Seizures lasting for more than 30 minutes or longer or multiple seizures repeated frequently without regaining consciousness between seizures.
HP:0002133.CNS_DEF: 发作持续时间超过30分钟或更长时间或多次癫痫频繁重复发作，发作之间未恢复知觉。

HP:0010773.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0010773.ENG_DEF: A form of `anomalous pulmonary venous return` (HP:0010772) in which not all pulmonary veins drain abnormally. Partial anomalous pulmonary venous return frequently involves one or both of the veins from one lung.
HP:0010773.CNS_DEF: 部分肺静脉（一条或两条肺静脉）回流异常。

HP:0011400.CNS_NAME: 中枢神经系统髓鞘异常
HP:0011400.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of `myelination` (GO:0042552) of nerves in the central nervous system.
HP:0011400.CNS_DEF: 在中枢神经系统中神经髓鞘发育`myelination（GO:0042552）异常。

HP:0007700.ENG_DEF: Abnormal development (dysgenesis) of the anterior segment of the eye globe. These structures are mainly of mesenchymal origin.
HP:0007700.CNS_DEF: 眼球前段的发育异常（发育不全）。这些结构主要是间充质起源。

HP:0012300.ENG_DEF: Failure of the ureter to undergo development.

HP:0005135.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the T wave on the electrocardiogram, which mainly represents the repolarization of the ventricles.
HP:0005135.CNS_DEF: 心电图上的T波异常，它主要表示心室复极化。

HP:0001761.ENG_DEF: The presence of an unusually high `plantar arch` (FMA:43942). Also called high instep, pes cavus refers to a distinctly hollow form of the sole of the foot when it is bearing weight.
HP:0001761.CNS_DEF: 一个非常高的`足底arch`的存在（FMA:43942）。也称为脚背高，PES高弓足是指当它承受重量的脚的鞋底的一个明显的镂空表。

HP:0030331.CNS_NAME: 刺激诱导皮肤起皱能力受损
HP:0030331.ENG_DEF: A reduced ability of the skin of the fingertips to wrinkle when exposed to stimuli such as soaking in water or application of EMLA cream (the fingertip remains smooth).

HP:0010298.ENG_DEF: Glossy appearance of the entire tongue surface.

HP:0010473.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased excretion of `porphyrins` (CHEBI:26214) in the urine.
HP:0010473.CNS_DEF: 尿液中的:异常增加`porphyrins`（26214 CHEBI）的排泄。

HP:0030777.ENG_NAME: Modic type II vertebral endplate changes
HP:0030777.CNS_NAME: Modic II 型椎体终板改变
HP:0030777.ENG_DEF: An abnormal magnetic resonance tomography signal from a vertebral endplate with a high signal on T1-weighted sequences and high- or isointense signal on T2 sequences. Modic type II signals are thought to indicate fatty replacement in the bone marrow.

HP:0010808.ENG_DEF: Tongue extending beyond the alveolar ridges or teeth at rest.
HP:0010808.CNS_DEF: 舌在休息位时超出牙槽脊或牙齿。

HP:0003510.ENG_DEF: A severe degree of short stature, more than -4 SD from the mean corrected for age and sex.
HP:0003510.CNS_DEF: 严重程度身材矮小，身高位于同年龄同性别平均身高下超过负4标准差。

HP:0002068.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0003744.ENG_NAME: Genetic anticipation with paternal anticipation bias
HP:0003744.CNS_NAME: 具父系传递倾向的遗传早现
HP:0003744.ENG_DEF: A type of genetic anticipation observed predominantly upon transmission from affected males.

HP:0002492.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the corticospinal tract, which is the chief element of the pyramidal system (the principle motor tract) and is the only direct connection between the cerebrum and the spinal cord.
HP:0002492.CNS_DEF: 皮质脊髓束的异常，其是锥体系统的主要组成部分，是大脑和脊髓之间唯一的直接连接。

HP:0011002.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased formation of dense trabecular bone tissue. Despite the increased density of bone tissue, osteopetrotic bones tend to be more fracture-prone than normal.
HP:0011002.CNS_DEF: 异常增高形成致密的骨小梁组织。尽管骨组织的增加的密度，骨硬化骨骼更趋于断裂倾向比正常。

HP:0000055.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `female external genitalia` (FMA:45649).

HP:0012212.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the volume of water filtered out of plasma through glomerular capillary walls into Bowman's capsules per unit of time.
HP:0012212.CNS_DEF: 每单位时间通过肾小球毛细血管壁进入肾小囊所滤出液的数量异常。

HP:0001340.ENG_DEF: Increase in amplitude of a long-loop response upon somatosensory evoked potential testing, representing an electrically evoked myoclonic response.
HP:0001340.CNS_DEF: 体感诱发电位长环路反应的波幅增高，代表一种电诱发的肌阵挛反应。

HP:0009166.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009166.ENG_NAME: Fragmentation of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009166.CNS_NAME: 小手指末节指骨骨骺碎裂
HP:0009166.ENG_DEF: Fragmented appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger.
HP:0009166.CNS_DEF: 第五手指的末节指骨骨骺零散出现。

HP:0009407.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009407.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 4th finger
HP:0009407.ENG_DEF: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 4th finger. A triangular or so called delta shaped phalanx is a typical result after a bracket epiphysis of the affected phalanx.
HP:0009407.CNS_DEF: 无名指指骨呈三角形。三角形指骨是指骨骨骺受累后的典型结果。

HP:0004299.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0004299.ENG_DEF: The presence of a hernia in the `abdominal wall` (FMA:259054).

HP:0009512.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009512.ENG_NAME: Triangular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
HP:0009512.CNS_NAME: 食指的末节指骨三角形骨骺
HP:0009512.ENG_DEF: A triangular appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger of the hand. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat.

HP:0011921.ENG_DEF: A type of pleural effusion with a exudate (extravascular fluid that has exuded out of a tissue or its capillaries due to injury or inflammation). Pleural effusions can be classified as transudates or exudates based on Light's criteria, which classify an effusion as exudate if one or more of the following are present: (1) the ratio of pleural fluid protein to serum protein is greater than 0.5, (2) the ratio of pleural fluid lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) to serum LDH is greater than 0.6, or (3) the pleural fluid LDH level is greater than two thirds of the upper limit of normal for serum LDH.
HP:0011921.CNS_DEF: 一种具有渗出液的胸膜腔积液，渗出液为组织或其毛细血管因损伤或炎症而渗出的血管外液。胸腔积液分类基于Light标准，依据该标准，渗出液应符合以下至少一条:（1）胸水白蛋白/血清白蛋白的比值大于0.5，（2）胸水乳酸脱氢酶（LDH）/血清LDH比值大于0.6，或（3）胸液LDH水平大于正常血清LDH上的限三分之二。

HP:0011521.CNS_DEF: 完全缺乏M波长感光色素，由L感光色素替代。患者分辨不出红色和绿色。

HP:0008165.CNS_DEF: 辅助性T细胞的数目减少（CL:0000912）。

HP:0004614.ENG_DEF: The closed form of spina bifida with incomplete closure of S1 with intact overlying skin.
HP:0004614.CNS_DEF: 封闭性的脊柱裂伴S1的闭合不全，有完整的覆盖皮肤。

HP:0010602.ENG_DEF: An abnormal predominance of type II muscle fibers (in general, this feature can only be observed on muscle biopsy).
HP:0010602.CNS_DEF: 2型肌纤维的异常优势（在一般情况下，该功能只能在肌肉活组织检查观察到的）。

HP:0000337.ENG_DEF: Width of the forehead or distance between the frontotemporales is more than two standard deviations above the mean (objective); or apparently increased distance between the two sides of the forehead.
HP:0000337.CNS_DEF: 前额宽度或前颞间距大于平均值两个标准偏差（客观）;或前额两侧之间的距离显得增加。

HP:0002389.ENG_DEF: If the two laminae of the septum pellucidum are not fused then a fluid-filled space or cavum is present. The cavum septum pellucidum is present at birth but usually obliterates by the age of 3 to 6 months. It is up to 1cm in width and the walls are parallel. It is an enclosed space and is not part of the ventricular system or connected with the subarachnoid space.
HP:0002389.CNS_DEF: 如果透明隔的两个薄层未融合在一起，那么就会出现的一个充满液体的空间或空腔。透明隔间腔在出生时存在，但通常3-6个月时消失。它宽约1cm，壁是平行的。它是一个封闭的空间，不属于脑室系统的一部分，不与蛛网膜下腔相连。

HP:0001678.ENG_DEF: Delayed or lack of conduction of atrial depolarizations through the atrioventricular node to the ventricles.
HP:0001678.CNS_DEF: 房室结介导的心房去极化向心室传到的延迟或阻滞。

HP:0007483.CNS_NAME: 皮肤色素脱失/色素沉着

HP:0012757.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of a neuron.

HP:0000471.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;消化系统的异常

HP:0000471.CNS_DEF: `影响胃肠道血管的发育异常。

HP:0012767.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal size of the placenta.
HP:0012767.CNS_DEF: 胎盘大小与正常尺寸的偏差。

HP:0007731.CNS_NAME: 脉络膜视网膜发育不良
HP:0007731.ENG_DEF: Abnormal development of the choroid and retina.
HP:0007731.CNS_DEF: 脉络膜和视网膜的发育异常。

HP:0012262.ENG_DEF: Any anomaly of the normal motility of motile cilia. Evaluation of ciliary beat frequency and ciliary beat pattern requires high-speed videomicroscopy of freshly obtained ciliary biopsies that are maintained in culture media under controlled conditions.
HP:0012262.CNS_DEF: 正常运动纤毛的任何异常运动。评价纤毛运动频率和纤毛摆动模式，需活检获得新鲜运动纤毛，使用要高速电视显微镜在特定培养条件下进行观察。

HP:0011132.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0011132.ENG_DEF: A furuncle (boil) is a skin infection involving an entire hair follicle and nearby skin tissue. Chronic furunculosis refers to recurrent episodes of furuncles, often caused by recurrent staphylococcus infection.
HP:0011132.CNS_DEF: 疖（疖子）是一种累及整个毛囊及附近皮肤组织的皮肤感染性疾病。慢性疖病是指疖的反复发作，常由葡萄球菌反复感染引起。

HP:0012008.ENG_DEF: Auras with an alteration of actual percepts involving the visual, auditory, somatosensory, olfactory or gustatory systems.
HP:0012008.CNS_DEF: 伴随真实感觉改变的先兆，涉及视觉，听觉，体感，嗅觉或味觉系统。

HP:0002652.ENG_DEF: A general term describing features characterized by abnormal development of bones and connective tissues.
HP:0002652.CNS_DEF: 一般术语，描述的功能特征为骨骼和结缔组织发育异常。

HP:0100022.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of movement with a neurological basis characterized by changes in coordination and speed of voluntary movements.
HP:0100022.CNS_DEF: 神经支配异常为原因的运动异常，以随意运动的协调和速度的改变为特征。

HP:0012835.ENG_DEF: Being located on the left side of the body.

HP:0100947.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100947.ENG_DEF: An elevation in bone density in one or more middle phalanges of the toes. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0100947.CNS_DEF: 骨密度在脚趾的一个或多个中间指骨标高。硬化的是，X射线照片作为增加不透明度的区域正常检测。

HP:0000582.ENG_DEF: The palpebral fissure inclination to the up is more than two standard deviations above the mean for age (objective); or, the upper inclination of the palpebral fissure is greater than typical for age.
HP:0000582.CNS_DEF: 睑裂向上倾斜度大于同龄人平均值加两倍标准差（客观）;或者，睑裂向上的倾斜度明显增大。

HP:0030250.ENG_DEF: The presence of multiple granulomata (small nodular inflammatory lesions containing grouped mononuclear phagocytes) in the lung.

HP:0003324.ENG_DEF: Generalized weakness or decreased strength of the muscles, affecting both distal and proximal musculature.
HP:0003324.CNS_DEF: 全身乏力或肌力降低，影响到远端和近端肌肉。

HP:0007024.MAIN_CLASS: 声音的异常;神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0007024.ENG_DEF: Bilateral impairment of the function of the cranial nerves 9-12, which control musculature involved in eating, swallowing, and speech. Pseudobulbar paralysis is characterized clinically by dysarthria, dysphonia, and dysphagia with bifacial paralysis, and may be accompanied by `Pseudobulbar behavioral symptoms` (HP:0002193) such as enforced crying and laughing.
HP:0007024.CNS_DEF: 颅神经9-12双侧受损的症状主要表现为进食、吞咽、语言困难。假性球麻痹主要以构音障碍、发音困难、吞咽困难为主，可能伴有强哭强笑等假性球部行为异常。

HP:0011686.ENG_DEF: An abnormal path of a coronary artery.
HP:0011686.CNS_DEF: 冠状动脉血管走向的异常。

HP:0000691.ENG_DEF: `Decreased size` (PATO:0000587) of the `teeth` (FMA:12516), which can be defined as a mesiodistal tooth diameter (width) more than 2 SD below mean. Alternatively, an apparently decreased maximum width of tooth.
HP:0000691.CNS_DEF: 牙齿的尺寸减小，定义为近中侧到远侧的牙齿直径（宽度）低于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或者，牙齿的最大宽度显得减小。

HP:0005534.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005534.CNS_NAME: 暂时性的骨髓增生综合征

HP:0001878.CNS_DEF: 一型由血红细胞（溶血）过早破坏引起贫血。

HP:0000446.ENG_DEF: Decreased width of the bony bridge of the nose.

HP:0004835.ENG_DEF: The presence of erythrocytes that are sphere-shaped and reduced in size.
HP:0004835.CNS_DEF: 红细胞是球形和尺寸减小。

HP:0008103.ENG_DEF: Delayed maturation and calcification of any of the `tarsal bones` (FMA:71339), seven bones of the foot comprising the calcaneus, talus, cuboid, navicular, and the cuneiform bones.
HP:0008103.CNS_DEF: 延迟成熟任何`跗bones`（FMA:71339）的和钙化，脚七骨骼包括跟骨，距骨，长方体，舟和楔状骨。

HP:0006645.ENG_DEF: Abnormally reduced diameter (cross section) of the clavicles.
HP:0006645.CNS_DEF: 锁骨的直径（横截面）异常减小。

HP:0011434.ENG_DEF: An abnormally low concentration of maternal serum human chorionic gonadotropin as compared to normal values for gestational-age.
HP:0011434.CNS_DEF: 与相同胎龄的正常值相比，异常降低的母体血清人绒毛膜促性腺激素浓度。

HP:0030476.ENG_NAME: Abnormal amplitude of dark-adapted dim flash electroretinogram
HP:0030476.CNS_NAME: 暗适应暗淡闪光视网膜电图振幅异常

HP:0011666.ENG_DEF: Absence of the right superior vena cava (RSVC). An absent RSVC is always associated with a persistent left superior vena cava (PLSVC). During normal fetal development, the left-sided anterior venous cardinal system regresses, leaving the coronary sinus (CS) and the ligament of Marshall. Failure of the closure of the left anterior cardinal vein results in PLSVC. In general, PLSVC is associated with the right superior vena cava (RSVC) and drains into the RA via a dilated CS. When developmental arrest occurs at an earlier stage, the CS is absent and the PLSVC drains into the left atrium.
HP:0011666.CNS_DEF: 右上腔静脉（RSVC）的缺失。右上腔静脉的缺失常与永存左上腔静脉（PLSVC）有关。胎儿正常发育过程中，左侧前静脉离开冠状窦（CS）和Marshall韧带后，系统性退化。左侧前静脉的关闭不全导致右上腔静脉的缺失。在一般情况下，PLSVC与右上腔静脉（RSVC）连接，通过扩张的CS汇入RA。在较早阶段发育停滞时，CS缺失，PLSVC汇入进入左心房。

HP:0012598.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012598.ENG_DEF: An abnormal concentration of `potassium(1+)` (CHEBI:29103) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0012598.CNS_DEF: 尿液中钾离子的浓度异常。

HP:0000306.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `chin` (FMA:46495), i.e., of the inferior portion of the face lying inferior to the lower lip and including the central prominence of the lower jaw.
HP:0000306.CNS_DEF: 下巴的异常。下巴指面下部下唇以下部分，包括下颌中央突出部位。

HP:0009326.CNS_DEF: 中指中节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。

HP:0008444.CNS_DEF: 椎骨的形状，使得它们的楔形（向后窄）的异常。

HP:0009515.CNS_NAME: 食指中节指骨的锥形骨骺

HP:0000592.CNS_DEF: 在巩膜上的异常蓝色着色（FMA:58269）。

HP:0002418.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `midbrain` (FMA:61993), which has as its parts the tectum, cerebral peduncle, midbrain tegmentum and cerebral aqueduct.
HP:0002418.CNS_DEF: 中脑（61993 FMA）的形态异常，其组成部分包括中脑顶盖，大脑脚，中脑被盖和中脑导水管。

HP:0002753.ENG_DEF: Abnormal thinning of the cortical region of bones.

HP:0012644.ENG_DEF: An elevated concentration of lactate in the caudate nucleus. This finding can be elicited by magnetic resonance spectroscopy imaging.
HP:0012644.CNS_DEF: 尾状核乳酸的浓度升高。可通过磁共振波谱成像发现这一点。

HP:0002043.ENG_DEF: A pathological narrowing of the esophagus that is caused by the development of a ring of scar tissue that constricts the esophageal lumen.
HP:0002043.CNS_DEF: 食管的一种病理狭窄，由于一个环形的瘢痕组织的发展而压迫食管腔引起。

HP:0009340.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009340.ENG_NAME: Irregular epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009340.CNS_NAME: 中指末节指骨骨骺不规则
HP:0009340.ENG_DEF: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger.
HP:0009340.CNS_DEF: 中指的末节指骨骨骺不规则放射透明度。

HP:0000551.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the ability to discriminate between or recognize colors.
HP:0000551.CNS_DEF: 区分或识别颜色的能力异常。

HP:0009429.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009429.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the distal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009429.CNS_NAME: 中指的末节指骨发育不全
HP:0009429.ENG_DEF: Absence of the distal phalanx of the middle (3rd) finger.
HP:0009429.CNS_DEF: 缺席的中间（3）手指的末节指骨。

HP:0004470.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004470.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect in the occipital region of the skull, covered by skin of the scalp and containing meninges or remnants of glial or neural tissues.
HP:0004470.CNS_DEF: 在颅骨枕骨区域的先天性畸形，被头皮皮肤覆盖并含有脑膜或神经胶质或神经组织的残余。

HP:0030890.ENG_NAME: Hyperintensity of cerebral white matter on MRI
HP:0030890.ENG_DEF: A brighter than expected signal on magnetic resonance imaging emanating from the cerebral white matter.

HP:0100453.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the middle phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100453.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾中节趾骨溶骨性缺陷
