HP:0012406.ENG_DEF: A greater than normal concentration of `citrate(3-)` (CHEBI:16947) in the urine.
HP:0012406.CNS_DEF: 尿液中柠檬酸浓度超出正常范围。

HP:0010354.ENG_NAME: Triangular shaped phalanges of the 2nd toe

HP:0012577.ENG_DEF: Reduction in thickness of the basal lamina of the glomerulus of the kidney.
HP:0012577.CNS_DEF: 肾脏肾小球基底膜的厚度减少。

HP:0006767.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肿瘤;内分泌系统的异常
HP:0006767.ENG_DEF: A type of pituitary adenoma originating in prolactin secreting cells. This kind of adenoma is characterized by overproduction of prolactin, and may cause loss of menstrual periods and breast milk production in women.
HP:0006767.CNS_DEF: 一种源自于泌乳素分泌细胞的垂体腺瘤。这种腺瘤的特征是泌乳素生产过剩，并可能导致女性月经周期消失和溢乳。

HP:0003376.ENG_DEF: An abnormal gait pattern that arises from weakness of the pretibial and peroneal muscles due to a lower motor neuron lesion. Affected patients have footdrop and are unable to dorsiflex and evert the foot. The leg is lifted high on walking so that the toes clear the ground, and there may be a slapping noise when the foot strikes the ground again.
HP:0003376.CNS_DEF: 一种由于胫前肌和腓骨肌下运动神经元病变导致肌无力而产生的异常步态。患者有足下垂，并且不能足不能背屈和外翻。行走时腿部高举以使脚趾离开地面，脚步落地时可能因为足部和地面碰撞而产生拍击声。

HP:0012069.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012069.ENG_DEF: An `increased concentration` (PATO:0001162) of `keratan sulfate` (CHEBI:60924)  in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0012069.CNS_DEF: 硫酸角质素在尿中排出。

HP:0011022.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of unsaturated fatty acid metabolism
HP:0011022.CNS_NAME: 不饱和脂肪酸代谢异常
HP:0011022.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of `unsaturated fatty acid` (CHEBI:27208) metabolism.

HP:0002744.ENG_DEF: Cleft lip and cleft palate affecting both sides of the face.
HP:0002744.CNS_DEF: 唇裂和腭裂影响面部的两侧。

HP:0100191.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100191.ENG_NAME: Absent epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100191.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾近节趾骨骨骺缺失

HP:0100797.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the development of the toenails.

HP:0001931.ENG_DEF: A type of anemia characterized by an abnormally low concentration of hemoglobin in the erythrocytes.
HP:0001931.CNS_DEF: 一型贫血，特征在于红细胞血红蛋白浓度异常低。

HP:0001290.ENG_DEF: Generalized muscular hypotonia (abnormally low muscle tone).
HP:0001290.CNS_DEF: 广泛的肌张力减退（异常低肌张力）。

HP:0010541.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0010541.ENG_DEF: The presence of convoluted folds and furrows formed from thickened skin of the `scalp` (FMA:46494), resembling cerebriform pattern. The scalp has convoluted and elevated folds, 1 to 2 cm in thickness. The convolutions generally cannot be flattened by traction.
HP:0010541.CNS_DEF: 由于头皮增厚而形成的类似大脑沟回的复杂褶皱和回纹。头皮有复杂和升高的折叠，厚度为1〜2厘米。复杂折叠通常不能由牵引拉平。

HP:0002516.ENG_DEF: An increase of the pressure inside the cranium (skull) and thereby in the brain tissue and cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0002516.CNS_DEF: 在颅骨（头骨）、脑组织和脑脊髓液之间的压力增加。

HP:0030193.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0030193.ENG_DEF: A type of weakness of the muscles involved in chewing that occurs after a muscle group is used and lessens if the muscle group has some rest. That is, there is diminution of strength with repetitive muscle actions.

HP:0003779.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0000024.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0045047.ENG_DEF: Presence of an abnormal type of hemoglobin characterized by the subsitution of a glutamic acid residue at position 7 following the initial methionine residue by a valine (the mutation causative of sickle cell disease). The mutation promotes the polymerization of the HbS under conditions of low oxygen concentration. HbS can be identified by multiple methodologies including hemoglobin electrophoresis and high-performance liquid chromatography.

HP:0010444.ENG_DEF: Backflow of blood from the pulmonary artery into the right ventricle,owing to imperfect functioning of the pulmonary valve.
HP:0010444.CNS_DEF: 由于肺动脉瓣功能不全使得在心脏舒张期间血流逆行通过肺动脉瓣进入右心室。

HP:0004660.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0010903.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a `glutamine metabolic process` (GO:0006541).

The skull base is made up of five bones: the ethmoid, sphenoid, occipital, paired frontal, and paired parietal bones, and is subdivided into 3 regions: the anterior, middle, and posterior cranial fossae. The petro-occipital fissure subdivides the middle cranial fossa into 1 central component and 2 lateral components.

HP:0001057.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect resulting in the congenital absence of skin in multiple or solitary non-inflammatory, well-demarcated, oval or circular ulcers with a diameter of about 1 to 2 cm. Aplasia cutis congenita most commonly occurs on the scalp, but may present in the face, trunk, or limbs.
HP:0001057.CNS_DEF: 发育缺陷导致的多个或单独的非炎症性的,边界清楚，直径约1 - 2厘米椭圆形或圆形溃疡，是一种先天性皮肤缺损。这种先天性表皮发育不全最常发生在头皮上,但也可能出现在面部、躯干或四肢。

HP:0100323.CNS_DEF: 少年无菌性坏死包括一组特征为血液供应骨的中断骨科疾病，接着局部骨坏死最多的儿童或青少年的骨的骨骺。

HP:0001116.ENG_DEF: A congenital defect of the macula distinct from coloboma associated with optic fissure closure defects.

HP:0008063.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the lens.
HP:0008063.CNS_DEF: 晶状体缺如或发育不全。

HP:0002960.ENG_DEF: The occurrence of an immune reaction against the organisms own cells or tissues.
HP:0002960.CNS_DEF: 对自身细胞或组织发生的免疫反应。

HP:0011562.ENG_DEF: Anomalous insertion of the chordae tendinae or papillary muscles into the contralateral ventricle in the presence of a ventricular septum defect.
HP:0011562.CNS_DEF: 腱索和乳头肌异常插入室间隔缺损的对侧心室。

HP:0009200.CNS_DEF: 一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。

HP:0100053.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾骨骺点状钙化

HP:0010639.CNS_DEF: （:000003968 PRO）在血液的异常增加`碱性磷酸酶，组织非特异性isozyme`的骨同种型的水平。

HP:0004860.CNS_NAME: 硫胺素治疗有效巨幼细胞性贫血
HP:0004860.ENG_DEF: A type of megaloblastic anemia (i.e., anemia characterized by the presence of erythroblasts that are larger than normal) that improves upon the administration of thiamine.
HP:0004860.CNS_DEF: 一型巨幼细胞贫血（即贫血特点是红细胞是大于正常的存在），硫胺素治疗后改善。

HP:0004438.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004438.ENG_DEF: Bony overgrowth of the internal (endosteal) surface of the `frontal bone` (FMA:52734).
HP:0004438.CNS_DEF: 额骨（FMA:52734）的内侧（内膜）面发生骨性增生。

HP:0011914.ENG_DEF: Excessive, increased hair growth located in the thoracic region.
HP:0011914.CNS_DEF: 位于胸部区域毛发的过度生长。

HP:0030388.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030388.ENG_NAME: Decreased class-switched memory B cell count
HP:0030388.CNS_NAME: 类别转换记忆 B 细胞计数降低
HP:0030388.ENG_DEF: A reduction from the normal count of class-switched memory B cells (CD19+/CD27+/IgM+/IgD+). Marginal zone B cells undergo limited somatic hypermutation and produce high-affinity IgM and some IgG, whereas class-switched memory B-cells synthetize IgG, IgM, and IgA.

HP:0009256.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009256.ENG_NAME: Ivory epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009256.CNS_NAME: 我们指末节指骨乳白色骨骺
HP:0009256.ENG_DEF: Sclerosis of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the ring finger, leading to an increased degree of radiopacity (white or ivory appearance) in X-rays.
HP:0009256.CNS_DEF: 硬化无名指的末节指骨骨骺，导致辐射不透明性（白色或象牙色外观）的X射线程度增加。

HP:0012653.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0012653.ENG_DEF: Severe asthma unresponsive to repeated courses of beta-agonist therapy such as inhaled albuterol, levalbuterol, or subcutaneous epinephrine.
HP:0012653.CNS_DEF: 严重的哮喘，对反复β-受体激动剂治疗，如吸入沙丁胺醇，左旋沙丁胺醇，或皮下注射肾上腺素无反应。

HP:0003540.ENG_DEF: An abnormality in the rate and degree to which platelets aggregate after the addition of an agonist that stimulates platelet clumping. Platelet aggregation is measured using aggregometer to measure the optical density of platelet-rich plasma, whereby platelet aggregation causes the plasma to become more transparent.
HP:0003540.CNS_DEF: 血小板激动剂使用后血小板聚集的速度和程度异常。血浆在血小板聚集后变得更加透明，对光密度的测量是测定血小板聚集功能的一种方法。

HP:0004222.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004222.ENG_NAME: Cone-shaped epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0004222.CNS_NAME: 小手指的末节指骨锥形骨骺
HP:0004222.ENG_DEF: A cone-shaped appearance of the epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the little finger of the hand, producing a 'ball-in-a-socket' appearance. This epiphysis is located at the proximal end of the phalanx and is normally nearly flat. The related entity 'angel-shaped' epiphysis refers to a pronounced cone-shaped epiphysis in combination with a pseudoepiphysis at the distal end of the phalanx.
HP:0004222.CNS_DEF: 锥形外观手的小指末节指骨骨骺，产生“球在一个插座'的出现。这骨骺位于指骨的近端，通常是几乎持平。在相关的实体'天使形“骨骺是指一种明显的锥形骨骺结合一个pseudoepiphysis在方阵的远端。

HP:0006298.ENG_DEF: Prolonged bleeding post dental extraction sufficient to require medical intervention.
HP:0006298.CNS_DEF: 拔牙后出血时间延长，需要医疗干预。

HP:0011165.ENG_DEF: Auras with sensation of flashing or flickering lights, spots, simple patterns, scotomata, or amaurosis.
HP:0011165.CNS_DEF: 先兆伴有与闪烁感或闪烁的灯光、点、单一相、暗点、或黑蒙。

HP:0002570.ENG_DEF: Greater than normal amounts of fat in the feces. This is a result of malabsorption of lipids in the small intestine and results in frothy foul-smelling fecal matter that floats.
HP:0002570.CNS_DEF: 粪便中脂肪含量比正常高。是小肠脂质吸收不良的结果，导致泡沫状、恶臭味的排泄物漂浮。

HP:0001005.CNS_NAME: 全身性疾病的皮肤表现

HP:0030068.ENG_DEF: A malignant olfactory neuroblastoma arising from the olfactory epithelium of the superior nasal cavity and cribriform plate.

HP:0010355.ENG_NAME: Duplication of the phalanges of the 2nd toe

HP:0010355.CNS_DEF: 第二toe`的'方阵部分或完全复制（FMA:32899）。

HP:0100482.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100482.CNS_NAME: 第五趾近节/中节趾关节粘连
HP:0100482.ENG_DEF: Bony fusion of the middle and proximal phalanges of the 5th toe.
HP:0100482.CNS_DEF: 骨融合的第五脚趾的中间和近端指骨。

HP:0410012.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the mouth floor.

HP:0003337.ENG_DEF: The prothrombin consumption test measures the formation of intrinsic thromboplastin by determining the residual serum prothrombin after blood clotting is complete. If there is a defect in the process, less prothrombin will be converted to thrombin than normal (less prothrombin is consumed). This test may be abnormal with conditions including deficiency of factors VIII or IX, with circulating anticoagulants, thrombocytopenia.
HP:0003337.CNS_DEF: 凝血酶原消耗测试是用来测量内源性凝血酶的形成，通过确定血液凝固完成后残留血清凝血酶原浓度。如果在这个过程中有缺陷，较少的凝血酶原被转化为凝血酶（较少的凝血酶原被消耗）。这个测试可见于多种异常情况，包括因子VIII或IX缺乏，使用循环抗凝剂，血小板减少症。

HP:0030731.ENG_DEF: A malignant tumor arising from epithelial cells. Carcinomas that arise from glandular epithelium are called adenocarcinomas, those that arise from squamous epithelium are called squamous cell carcinomas, and those that arise from transitional epithelium are called transitional cell carcinomas (NCI Thesaurus).

HP:0010208.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010208.ENG_NAME: Patchy sclerosis of proximal toe phalanx
HP:0010208.CNS_NAME: 脚趾近节趾骨斑片状硬化
HP:0010208.ENG_DEF: Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more of the proximal phalanges of the toes. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.
HP:0010208.CNS_DEF: 片状（不规则）的增加在一个脚趾的近端指骨或更多的骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0025017.ENG_DEF: Reduced resistance to rupture of capikllary blood vessels. Capillary fragility may manifest as a bleeding diathesis with spontaneous ecchymoses (bruises).

HP:0002120.ENG_DEF: Atrophy of the cortex of the cerebrum.

HP:0011941.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the shape of the lumbar vertebra L2 such that it is wedge-shaped (narrow towards the front).
HP:0011941.CNS_DEF: 腰椎L2的形状的异常，例如，它是楔形（朝向前窄）。

HP:0006488.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006488.ENG_DEF: A bending or abnormal curvature affecting a `long bone` (FMA:7474) of the arm.
HP:0006488.CNS_DEF: 的弯曲或弯曲异常影响了`长bone`:手臂（FMA 7474）。

HP:0010320.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010320.ENG_DEF: This term means any abnormal structure or form of the phalangeal bone of the 3rd toe.
HP:0010320.CNS_DEF: 第三手指的异常结构或形态。

HP:0012505.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;内分泌系统的异常

HP:0012039.CNS_DEF: Descement膜是角膜内皮的基底膜， Descement膜褶皱一般是角膜炎症或水肿的表现。

HP:0012027.MAIN_CLASS: 呼吸系统异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0012027.ENG_DEF: An abnormal accumulation of fluid and swelling in the tissues of the `larynx` (FMA:55097).
HP:0012027.CNS_DEF: 喉部组织的异常液体积聚和肿胀。（FMA:55097）。

HP:0030187.ENG_DEF: Nodding movement of the head or body.

HP:0005206.ENG_DEF: Cyst-like space not lined by epithelium and contained within the pancreas. Pancreatic pseudocysts are often associated with pancreatitis.
HP:0005206.CNS_DEF: 位于胰腺内的不含上皮细胞的囊肿样空间。胰腺假性囊肿通常与胰腺炎有关。

HP:0009225.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009225.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the proximal phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009225.CNS_NAME: 小手指近节指骨发育不全
HP:0009225.ENG_DEF: Absence of the proximal phalanx of the little (5th) finger.
HP:0009225.CNS_DEF: 没有小（5日）手指的近节指骨。

HP:0005686.ENG_DEF: Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.
HP:0005686.CNS_DEF: 片状（不规则）增加骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0030765.ENG_DEF: Episodes of intense fear, screaming and flailing although affected individuals are still asleep.

HP:0011772.ENG_DEF: A structural abnormality of the `thyroid gland` (FMA:9603).

HP:0000550.CNS_NAME: 视网膜电流图检测不到波形
HP:0000550.ENG_DEF: Lack of any response to stimulation upon electroretinography.
HP:0000550.CNS_DEF: 视网膜电流图检测，结果呈熄灭型。

HP:0003457.ENG_DEF: Abnormal results of investigations using electromyography (EMG).

HP:0012114.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012114.ENG_DEF: A carcinoma of the endometrium, the mucous lining of the uterus.

HP:0009108.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009108.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia involving the femoral head and neck
HP:0009108.CNS_NAME: 股骨头和股骨颈发育不全或发育低下

HP:0011328.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0040015.ENG_NAME: Increased activity of mitochondrial respiratory chain
HP:0040015.CNS_NAME: 线粒体呼吸链活性增加

HP:0012703.ENG_DEF: Abnormality in the space in the meninges beneath the arachnoid membrane and above the pia mater that contains the cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0012703.CNS_DEF: 蛛网膜下腔即蛛网膜下方与软脑膜上方之间的间隙，其中包含脑脊液。

HP:0000539.ENG_DEF: An abnormality in the process of focusing of light by the eye in order to produce a sharp image on the retina.
HP:0000539.CNS_DEF: 在光的聚焦由眼睛，以产生一清晰的影像在视网膜上的过程中出现异常。

HP:0006518.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常

HP:0002922.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of protein in the cerebrospinal fluid.
HP:0002922.CNS_DEF: 脑脊液中蛋白的浓度升高。

HP:0005477.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005477.ENG_DEF: Progressively increasing bone density of the skull base without significant changes in bony contour.
HP:0005477.CNS_DEF: 逐渐增加的颅底骨密度无骨轮廓显著变化。

HP:0012157.ENG_DEF: Atrophy of the cerebral subcortical white and gray matter, termed subcortical atrophy, reflects loss of nerve cells in the basal ganglia or fibers in the deep white matter.
HP:0012157.CNS_DEF: 大脑皮质下白质和灰质萎缩，称为皮层下萎缩，反映基底节的神经细胞或深部白质纤维的脱失。

HP:0000260.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0000260.CNS_DEF: 前囟增大，（FMA:75439）考虑到年龄-相关等因素。

HP:0001561.ENG_DEF: The presence of excess amniotic fluid surrounding the fetus during pregnancy, the sonographic diagnosis of Polyhydramnios is usually based on an AFI >25cm or on a single deepest pocket of amnionic fluid >8cm,several groups have termed Polyhydramnios as mild if the AFI is 25 to 29.9cm, moderate if 30 to 34.9cm, and severe if 35 cm or more.
HP:0001561.CNS_DEF: 在妊娠期间围绕胎儿的羊水量过多， 超声诊断提示羊水指数大于25cm或羊水暗区大于8cm，其中轻度羊水过多羊水指数为25-29.9cm，中度羊水过多羊水指数为30-34.9cm，严重羊水过多羊水指数大于35cm。

HP:0011812.ENG_DEF: Impaired ability to recognize letters or numbers drawn by an examiner's fingertip on the patient's skin (the patients eyes are closed or covered throughout this examination).

HP:0030357.ENG_DEF: Small cell lung cancer (SCLC) is a type of highly malignant lung cancer that is composed of small ovoid cells. In the past, SCLC was called oat cell carcinoma because the microscopic appearance of the cells was felt to resemble oats. SLCLC usually originates near the bronchi and in many cases may grow and metastasize quickly.

HP:0000458.CNS_DEF: 不能感知气味。这是一个通用术语，描述不能闻到的任何气味，可以是嗅觉过程中任何一部分异常而引起的，这一过程包括把气味物质吸收到覆盖嗅觉上皮的鼻腔粘膜，扩散到纤毛，与嗅觉神经元的受体位点结合，产生神经电冲动，从而感知的气味。

As opposed to a partial duplication were there is still a variable degree of fusion between the duplicated bones, a complete duplication leads to two separate bones appearing side to side (radio-ulnar axis) as seen on x-rays. A duplication leading to an accessory bone appearing in the proximo-distal axis on x-rays, this is actually a different entity called a pseudoepiphysis (see corresponding terms) sometimes also referred to as hyperphalangism.

HP:0006702.CNS_DEF: 没有明显的触发因素而发生的冠状动脉急性夹层（内膜撕裂血液进入到中膜）。

HP:0011986.CNS_DEF: 形成异常，骨骼外骨组织，即，骨的软组织的存在，其中骨通常不存在的。

HP:0100443.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾中节趾骨弯曲

HP:0100443.CNS_DEF: 从第三脚趾的中节指骨的正常直线形式的偏差。

HP:0005208.CNS_DEF: 由于离子和水的分泌与吸收的不平衡而产生的大量水样腹泻。

HP:0030360.ENG_DEF: A type of non-small cell lung carcinoma that is derived from undifferentiated malignant neoplasms originating from transformed epithelial cells in the lung, and which is differentiate from small-cell lung carcinoma by the larger size of the anaplastic cells, a higher cytoplasmic-to-nuclear size ratio, and a lack of salt-and-pepper appearance of the chromatin.

HP:0008607.CNS_DEF: 一种进行性下降的（PATO:0001818）传导性耳聋（===HP:0000367===）。

HP:0030898.ENG_DEF: Pruritus is an itch or a sensation that makes a person want to scratch. This term refers to an abnormally increased sensation of itching over the skin of the abdomen.

HP:0005924.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphyses of the hand
HP:0005924.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the epiphyses of the phalanges or metacarpal bones.
HP:0005924.CNS_DEF: 指骨或掌骨的骨骺的任何异常。

HP:0004968.ENG_DEF: Recurrent bleeding into the parenchyma of the brain.

HP:0004430.ENG_DEF: Severe combine immunodeficiency (SCID) is a primary immune deficiency that is characterized by a severe defect in both the T- and B-lymphocyte systems.
HP:0004430.CNS_DEF: 重症联合免疫缺陷（SCID）是一种原发性免疫缺陷，其特征是T和B淋巴细胞系统的严重缺陷。

HP:0010383.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾趾骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0030408.ENG_DEF: Pineoblastoma is a rare primitive neuroectodermal tumour (PNET) arising in the pineal gland. Pineoblastomas are classified as a WHO grade IV tumour and comprise one-fourth to one-half of pineal parenchymal tumours. Pineoblastoma is a highly cellular tumor originating in the pineal gland and containing small, poorly differentiated cells.

HP:0011245.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of superior crus of antihelix
HP:0011245.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the superior crus of the antihelix is the upper cartilaginous ridge arising at the bifurcation of the antihelix that ends beneath the fold of the ascending helix, and separates the concha from the triangular fossa.
HP:0011245.CNS_DEF: 对耳轮上脚异常是对耳轮脚螺旋上升至外耳三角窝处分离出对耳轮脚，在此皱襞上方软骨脊的产生。

HP:0002942.ENG_DEF: Over curvature of the thoracic region, leading to a round back or if sever to a hump.
HP:0002942.CNS_DEF: 胸部区域过度屈曲，导致圆背，严重时发生驼背。

HP:0004364.CNS_NAME: 氮化合物稳态平衡异常
HP:0004364.ENG_DEF: The presence of an abnormal concentration of `nitrogen compounds` (CHEBI:51143).
HP:0004364.CNS_DEF: 出现`氮化合物`（CHEBI:51143）浓度的异常。

HP:0030623.ENG_NAME: Intraretinal hyporeflective spaces on macular OCT
HP:0030623.CNS_NAME: OCT 测量法黄斑区视网膜内低反射性间隙

HP:0005297.ENG_DEF: Premature occlusive vascular disease is a occlusive or constriction of the inner surface (lumen) of the vascular occuring at an age that is younger than usual.
HP:0005297.CNS_DEF: 血管内发生闭塞的患者年龄小于正常水平。

HP:0030470.CNS_NAME: 暗适应明亮闪光视网膜电图异常

HP:0005067.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005067.ENG_DEF: Overgrowth of the proximal part of the fibula.
HP:0005067.CNS_DEF: 疯狂生长腓骨近端部分。

HP:0010034.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010034.ENG_DEF: In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0010034.CNS_DEF: 相反的数字2-5近端趾骨，拇指的近端指骨是胚胎学上相当于其它位中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学指骨原点，因此相当于该近端趾骨其他数字。

HP:0011387.ENG_DEF: Increased size of the vestibular aqueduct.

HP:0011416.ENG_DEF: Placental infarcts are macroscopically-evident focal parenchymal lesions in which microscopy shows necrosis and approximation of villi. The pathogenesis are that the infarctions are to be attributed to spastic or organic obliteration of the spiral arteries. Placental infarctions are significantly associated with fetal mortality, dysmaturity, and fetal distress.
HP:0011416.CNS_DEF: 胎盘梗死是肉眼可见的局灶性损伤，显微镜下表现为绒毛膜坏死样病变，病因为绒毛膜螺旋动脉痉挛或物理性梗阻。胎盘梗死与死胎。胎儿窘迫和成熟障碍有明确关系。

HP:0003549.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the soft tissues, including both connective tissue (tendons, ligaments, fascia, fibrous tissues, and fat).
HP:0003549.CNS_DEF: 软组织的任何异常，包括结缔组织（腱，韧带，腱膜，纤维组织）和脂肪。

HP:0004242.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011934.ENG_DEF: Abnormal outpouching or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the `inferior mesenteric artery ` (FMA:14750) or `superior mesenteric artery ` (FMA:14749).
HP:0011934.CNS_DEF: “肠系膜下动脉”（FMA:14750）或“肠系膜上动脉”（FMA:14749）壁的异常外翻或囊样扩张。

HP:0000822.ENG_DEF: The presence of `chronic` (PATO:0001863) `increased pressure` (PATO:0001576) in the `systemic arterial system` (FMA:45623).
HP:0000822.CNS_DEF: 在全身动脉系统中存在慢性的（肺动脉参数:0001863）血压升高（肺动脉参数:0001576）。

HP:0012131.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal count of erythroid precursor cells, that is,  `erythroid lineage cells` (CL:0000764) in the bone marrow.
HP:0012131.CNS_DEF: 红系前体细胞的计数异常，也就是骨髓中的有核红系细胞（CL:0000764）数量异常。

HP:0030799.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0030799.ENG_DEF: Scaphocephaly is a subtype of dolichocephaly where the anterior and posterior aspects of the cranial vault are pointed (boat-shaped). Scaphocephaly is caused by a precocious fusion of sagittal suture without other associated synostosis.

HP:0100525.ENG_DEF: Persistence of the urachal canal with drainage of urine from the bladder through the persistent allantois canal to the umbilicus.
HP:0100525.CNS_DEF: 尿囊管未闭，形成膀胱至脐部的持久性脐尿管，尿液经过这个管道从膀胱流出。

HP:0000092.ENG_DEF: The presence of renal tubules with thick redundant basement membranes, or a reduction of greater than 50% in tubular diameter compared to surrounding non-atrophic tubules.
HP:0000092.CNS_DEF: 肾小管形成厚冗余基底膜，或与周围未萎缩小管相比直径减小超过一半。

HP:0001848.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001848.ENG_DEF: This is a postural deformity in which the foot is positioned up against the tibia. The heel (calcaneus) is positioned downward (that is, the ankle is flexed upward), and the heel is turned outward (valgus).
HP:0001848.CNS_DEF: 这是在其中所述脚定位靠在胫骨中的姿势畸形。鞋跟（跟骨）被向下定位（即，踝向上弯曲），和足跟接通向外（外翻）。

HP:0005583.ENG_DEF: Disruption and breaking up of the basement membrane of the tubules of the kidney.
HP:0005583.CNS_DEF: 肾脏肾小管基底膜破坏。

HP:0010306.ENG_DEF: Reduced inferior to superior extent of the thorax.
HP:0010306.CNS_DEF: 减少不如胸廓优越程度。

HP:0006511.ENG_DEF: An abnormal high-pitched noisy sound, occurring during inhalation or exhalation caused by the incomplete obstruction in the throat.
HP:0006511.CNS_DEF: 由于喉不完全梗阻导致的吸气和呼气时的高调的异常噪声。

HP:0011643.CNS_NAME: 冠状静脉窦型房间隔缺损
HP:0011643.ENG_DEF: An atrial septal defect characterized by a deficiency in the tissue separating the coronary sinus from the left atrium (LA). This results in partial or complete unroofing of the coronary sinus leading to a predominantly left-to-right shunt through the coronary sinus (LA to coronary sinus to right atrium [RA]). The orifice of the ostium is frequently large because of the increased flow. From the RA side, the defect is located at the level of the coronary sinus ostium and may also include some deficiency in atrial tissue around the ostium. From the LA side, the size can be variable depending on the degree of unroofing of the coronary sinus.
HP:0011643.CNS_DEF: 伴随冠状静脉窦与左心房连接的组织缺损的房间隔缺损。这将导致冠状窦的部分或全部去顶，引起通过冠状窦的左向右分流（左心房流向冠状动脉窦然后到右心房（RA））。由于血流量增大，窦孔逐渐变大。右心房的缺损主要存在于冠状窦口，也包括窦口周围的心房组织缺损。左心房缺损的大小依赖于冠状窦去顶的程度。

HP:0009190.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009190.ENG_DEF: Irregular radiographic opacity of the epiphyses of the metacarpals.
HP:0009190.CNS_DEF: 掌骨的骨骺不规则放射透明度。

HP:0011535.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the spatial relationship of the atria to other components of the heart.
HP:0011535.CNS_DEF: 心房与心脏其它部位间空间关系的异常。

HP:0004467.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0004467.ENG_DEF: Small indentation anterior to the insertion of the ear.

HP:0010924.ENG_DEF: A `cataract` (HP:0000518) that affects the posterior part of the `cortex of the lens` (FMA:58970).
HP:0010924.CNS_DEF: 此型白内障主要累及晶体后方的皮质。

HP:0001894.ENG_DEF: Increased numbers of platelets in the peripheral blood.
HP:0001894.CNS_DEF: 在外周血血小板的数目增高。

HP:0007799.ENG_DEF: The presence of whitish deposits in the  `conjunctiva` (FMA:59011) resembling salt. May be related to calcinosis.
HP:0007799.CNS_DEF: 结膜上的白色沉积物（FMA:59011）。可能与钙质沉着有关。

HP:0012088.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0012088.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal odor of the urine.
HP:0012088.CNS_DEF: 尿的气味与正常的不同。

HP:0012516.CNS_NAME: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁
HP:0012516.ENG_DEF: An extreme form of tetralogy of Fallot characterized by absence of flow from the right ventricle to the pulmonary arteries.
HP:0012516.CNS_DEF: 法洛四联症伴肺动脉闭锁是法洛四联症的一种极端的形式，其特点为右心室的血液无法流入到肺动脉。

HP:0010392.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010392.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the distal phalanx of the 5th toe
HP:0010392.CNS_NAME: 第五脚趾末节趾骨异常

HP:0100062.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0002623.ENG_DEF: An overriding aorta is a congenital heart defect where the aorta is positioned directly over a ventricular septal defect, instead of over the left ventricle. The result is that the aorta receives some blood from the right ventricle, which reduces the amount of oxygen in the blood. It is one of the four conditions of the Tetralogy of Fallot. The aortic root can be displaced toward the front (anteriorly) or directly above the septal defect, but it is always abnormally located to the right of the root of the pulmonary artery. The degree of override is quite variable, with 5-95% of the valve being connected to the right ventricle.
HP:0002623.CNS_DEF: 主动脉骑跨是一种先天性心脏缺陷，指主动脉的位置直接跨过室间隔缺损而不是跨过左心室。其结果是主动脉接收一部分来自右心室的血液，导致血液中氧含量降低了。

HP:0000533.ENG_DEF: Atrophy of the choroid and retinal layers of the fundus.
HP:0000533.CNS_DEF: 眼底脉络膜和视网膜层的萎缩。

HP:0010479.ENG_DEF: Persistence of the urachal canal resulting in a canal between the bladder and the umbilicus.
HP:0010479.CNS_DEF: 性脐膀胱通道持续存在，导致膀胱和肚脐之间永久性开放脐尿管。

HP:0006677.ENG_DEF: Increased time for the complex comprised of the Q wave, R wave, and S wave as measured by the electrocardiogram (EKG).. In adults, normal values are 0.06 - 0.10 sec.
HP:0006677.CNS_DEF: 由心电图（EKG）测量所得的由Q波，R波和S波组成的复合波的时间过长，成年人的正常的数值是0.06 - 0.10秒。

HP:0002723.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0002723.ENG_NAME: Absence of bactericidal oxidative 'respiratory burst' in phagocytes
HP:0002723.CNS_NAME: 吞噬细胞氧化杀菌作用缺失

HP:0011193.ENG_DEF: EEG with focal sharp transient waves of a duration less than 80 msec.
HP:0011193.CNS_DEF: 脑电图持续时间小于80毫秒的短暂局灶尖波。

HP:0011256.ENG_NAME: Crus of helix connected to antihelix
HP:0011256.ENG_DEF: Extension of the ridge of the crus helix across the ear and connection of the crus to the antihelix.
HP:0011256.CNS_DEF: 穿过耳和对耳轮脚连接处的耳轮脚脊的延伸。

HP:0012086.ENG_DEF: An abnormal color of the urine, that is, the color of the urine appears different from the usual straw-yellow color.
HP:0012086.CNS_DEF: 尿液的异常的颜色，正常的颜色为麦草黄色。

HP:0010833.ENG_DEF: Spontaneous pain is a kind of neuropathic pain which occurs without an identifiable trigger.
HP:0010833.CNS_DEF: 自发痛是一种神经性疼痛其发生没有明确的诱发因素。

HP:0009471.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 3rd finger
HP:0009471.CNS_NAME: 中指的近端指间关节挛缩
HP:0009471.ENG_DEF: Chronic loss of joint motion of the proximal interphalangeal joint of the 3rd finger due to structural changes in non-bony tissue.
HP:0009471.CNS_DEF: 的第三手指的近端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。

HP:0011840.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal count of `T cells` (CL:0000084).

HP:0006234.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006234.ENG_DEF: An increased resorption of bone matrix by osteoclasts leading to bony defects involving the tarsal bones.

HP:0000474.MAIN_CLASS: 胎儿发育或出生异常;头或颈部的异常

The measurement is taken from the outer edge of the occiput bone to the outer skin limit directly in the midline. A measurement 6 mm or more is considered significant between 18 and 24 weeks and a measurement of 5 mm or more is considered significant at 16 to 18 weeks (pmid:16100637).
HP:0000474.CNS_DEF: 胎儿颈后皮肤厚度增厚。通过胎儿头部横断位位于透明隔腔和丘脑水平，倾斜向后包括小脑处测量皱褶。测量取自枕骨中部外侧缘至皮肤最外侧。在18至24周大于或等于6mm，或16至18周大于或等于5毫米可认为测量值显著。

HP:0002308.ENG_DEF: Arnold-Chiari malformation consists of a downward displacement of the cerebellar tonsils and the medulla through the foramen magnum, sometimes causing hydrocephalus as a result of obstruction of CSF outflow.
HP:0002308.CNS_DEF: Arnold-Chiari 畸形包括小脑扁桃体向下移位，并且延髓通过枕骨大孔，有时会由于阻塞脑脊液外流造成脑积水。

Lesions can increase or decrease in size and number in serial radiographs or even disappear and do not have increased bone radiotracer uptake.
HP:0010739.CNS_DEF: 骨斑点症是骨良性，无症状硬化发育不良。它影响男性和女性，并且可以看出，在任何年龄。 X线片硬化圆形或卵圆形病灶，通常对称地分布在关节周围的位置。病变可以增加或减少在尺寸和数量中的串行X光片或甚至消失，没有增加的骨放射性摄取。

HP:0030733.ENG_DEF: An abdominal wall defected related to a developmental anomaly of the allantois, which is an embryonic structure that develops as a diverticulum off the yolk sac at about 16 days post fertilization. During further development, the allantois becomes incorporated into the body of the embryo, connecting the ventral aspect of the urogenital sinus (which will develop into the upper pole of the urinary bladder) to the external portion of the umbilicus. Upon further development, the lumen of the allantois becomes obliterated and forms a thick fibrous cord called the urachus, which connects the apex of the bladder to the umbilicus. In adults, the urachus is known as the median umbilical ligament. Failure of the allantoic cavity to obliterate can result of one of four conditions: 1) congenital patent urachus (a completely open connection between bladder and umbilicus); 2) vesicourachal diverticulum (a diverticulum off the bladder but not communicating with the umbilicus); umbilical cyst and sinus (not communicating with the bladder); and 4) alternating urachal sinus. An abdominal wall defect can be associated with a urachal cyst.

HP:0030183.ENG_DEF: The vestibulo-ocular reflex is responsible for the stabilization of the retinal image during movement. HP:0003653.ENG_DEF: Metachromasia (also known as metachromacy) is a characteristic color change which certain aniline dyes exhibit when bound to particular substances or when concentrated in solution. For example, the basic dye toluidine blue becomes distinctly pink when bound to cartilage matrix. In the sense used here, the metachromasia refers to a change in color not observed with normal tissues, anomalous staining with the cationic dyes toluidine blue O and Alcian blue resulting from excessive amounts of the polyanionic glycosaminoglycans.
HP:0003653.CNS_DEF: 异染（也称为异染色）是颜色发生的一种特异性改变，发生在某些苯胺染料与特定的物质结合或在液体中浓缩时。例如，当碱性染料甲苯胺蓝与软骨基质结合时，颜色变成明显的粉红色。在这里特指，异染是指在正常组织中无法观察到颜色的变化，却非常规的用阳离子染料甲苯胺蓝O和阿尔新蓝染色，由于阴离子糖胺多糖糖胺过量所致的颜色改变。

HP:0011141.ENG_DEF: A type of cataract (opacification of the lens) that forms during the course of aging.

HP:0100571.ENG_DEF: A cardiac diverticulum is a rare congential malformation which is either fibrous or muscular.
HP:0100571.CNS_DEF: 一个心脏憩室是一种罕见的先天性畸形，它可以是纤维或肌肉。

HP:0005720.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005720.ENG_DEF: Abnormal reduction in length of all metacarpal bones.
HP:0005720.CNS_DEF: 异常减少所有掌骨头的长度。

HP:0000414.ENG_DEF: Increased volume and globular shape of the anteroinferior aspect of the nose.
HP:0000414.CNS_DEF: 鼻子前下方呈球形形状且体积增加

HP:0006681.ENG_DEF: Absence of atrioventricular node，which is a small nodular mass of specialized muscle fibers located in the interatrial septum near the opening of the coronary sinus. It gives rise to the atrioventricular bundle of the conduction system of the heart. a section of nodal tissue that lies on the right side of the partition that divides the atria, near the bottom of the right atrium.
HP:0006681.CNS_DEF: 房室结是一小块结节性特化肌纤维，位于房间隔内，靠近冠状窦开口处，其功能是将心脏传导系统的冲动传给房室束。它的缺失即房室结缺失。

HP:0003860.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003860.ENG_NAME: Diaphyseal sclerosis of the upper limbs
HP:0003860.ENG_DEF: An elevation in bone density in one or more diaphyses of the arms. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0003860.CNS_DEF: 骨密度在臂中的一个或多个diaphyses标高。硬化的是，X射线照片作为增加不透明度的区域正常检测。

HP:0001905.CNS_DEF: 先天性发病的血小板减少症。

HP:0009170.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009170.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger
HP:0009170.CNS_NAME: 第五手指中节指骨溶骨性缺陷
HP:0009170.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the middle phalanx of the 5th finger.
HP:0009170.CNS_DEF: 解散或第五手指中节指骨骨组织的退化。

HP:0009815.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009815.CNS_NAME: 四肢发育不全或发育低下
HP:0009815.ENG_DEF: Absence (due to failure to form) or underdevelopment of the extremities.
HP:0009815.CNS_DEF: 缺席（由于未形成）或四肢不发达。

HP:0009088.ENG_DEF: Impairment in the physical production of speech sounds.
HP:0009088.CNS_DEF: 物理性的语音产生障碍。

HP:0100248.ENG_DEF: Hemiballismus is a rare movement disorder that is caused primarily by damage to various areas in the `basal ganglia` (FMA:84013). Hemiballismus is usually characterized by involuntary flinging motions of the extremities. The movements are often violent and have wide amplitudes of motion. They are continuous and random and can involve proximal and/or distal muscles on one side of the body, while some cases even include the facial muscles. The more a patient is active, the more the movements increase. With relaxation comes a decrease in movements.
HP:0100248.CNS_DEF: 偏身投掷是主一种基底节不同区域损害（FMA:84013）造成的罕见的运动障碍。 偏身投掷的特点通常是肢体不自主的投掷样运动。这些运动往往是大幅度的、剧烈的。它们可以是连续的，随机的，累及一侧身体的近端和/或远端，某些情况下甚至累及面部肌肉。患者越是活动，运动越是明显；随着放松，运动减弱。

HP:0003911.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003911.ENG_DEF: Flaring (increase of width with a splayed appearance) of the `humeral metaphysis` (FMA:32830).
HP:0003911.CNS_DEF: 迸出了`肱骨metaphysis`（FMA:32830）（宽度增加了叉开外观）。

HP:0030794.ENG_DEF: An anomolous circulating concentration of the connecting (C) peptide, which links the insulin A and B chains in proinsulin, providing thereby a means to promote their efficient folding and assembly in the endoplasmic reticulum during insulin biosynthesis. After cleavage of proinsulin, C-peptide is stored with insulin in the soluble phase of the secretory granules and is subsequently released in equimolar amounts with insulin, providing a useful independent indicator of insulin secretion.

HP:0012060.ENG_DEF: A type of cutaneous melanoma localized to the palm, sole, or beneath the nail (subungual melanoma). Acral lentiginous melanoma starts as a slowly-enlarging flat patch of discoloured skin and usually displays a size above 6 mm and often several centimetres or more in diameter upon diagnosis and variable pigmentation with a mixture of colors including brown, and blue-grey, black and red. The surface of the lesion is initially smooth but later in the course may become thicker and irregular, and may ulcerate or bleed.
HP:0012060.CNS_DEF: 一种位于掌跖或甲下（甲下黑色素瘤）的皮肤黑色素瘤。肢端雀斑样黑色素瘤往往初起为一褪色扁平斑点，之后缓慢扩大至直径超过6毫米甚至数厘米，此外，包括棕色、蓝灰色、黑色和红色的混合性色素沉着也是特征之一。皮损起初表面光滑，之后慢慢变得粗糙且不规则，甚至可能出现溃疡和出血。

HP:0030458.ENG_NAME: Abnormal timing of pattern onset/offset visual evoked potentials
HP:0030458.CNS_NAME: 图形起始/偏移视觉诱发电位时机异常

HP:0010423.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010423.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of the proximal phalanx of the 2nd toe
HP:0010423.CNS_NAME: 第二脚趾近节趾骨部分重复
HP:0010423.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of `proximal phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32618).
HP:0010423.CNS_DEF: 的'第二toe`近节指骨部分重复（FMA:32618）。

HP:0009893.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;耳朵的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0005922.ENG_DEF: Any abnormal structural or form of the`hand`.

HP:0100450.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100450.ENG_NAME: Curved distal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100450.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾末节趾骨弯曲
HP:0100450.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal straight form of the distal phalanx of the fourth toe.
HP:0100450.CNS_DEF: 从第四脚趾的末节指骨的正常直线形式的偏差。

HP:0001230.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0011651.ENG_NAME: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011651.CNS_NAME: 右室双出口伴靠近两大动脉室中隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄
HP:0011651.ENG_DEF: Double outlet right ventricle with doubly committed ventricular septal defect and pulmonary stenosis
HP:0011651.CNS_DEF: 右室双出口，伴靠近两大动脉室中隔缺损和肺动脉狭窄。靠近两大动脉室间隔缺损（double committed ventricular septal defect）:此型缺损在右心室双出口罕见，约占3%～4%。两大动脉多为并列关系。由于此缺损位于室间隔上方和漏斗隔严重发育不全或缺如，所以缺损则位于两大动脉环的下方。两大动脉瓣环为缺损后上缘，缺损的前下缘为隔缘束的上支，后下缘为隔缘束下支。往往无主动脉下圆锥或仅在室间隔缺损和两大动脉瓣环之间有一窄条肌肉束，可伴有主动脉与二尖瓣或肺动脉与三尖瓣纤维连续。心脏传导束离开缺损边缘较远，很少因手术产生心脏传导阻滞。

HP:0005145.ENG_DEF: Reduction of the diameter of the coronary arteries.

HP:0010983.ENG_DEF: A type of multifactorial inheritance governed by the simultaneous action of a few gene loci. It is recommended this term be used for traits governed by three loci, although it is noted that usage of this term in the literature is not uniform.

HP:0001884.ENG_DEF: Talipes calcaneovalgus is a flexible foot deformity (as opposed to a rigid congenital vertical talus foot deformity) that can either present as a positional or structural foot deformity depending on severity and/or causality. The axis of calcaneovalgus deformity is in the tibiotalar joint, where the foot is positioned in extreme hyperextension. On inspection, the foot has an "up and out" appearance, with the dorsal forefoot practically touching the anterior aspect of the ankle and lower leg.
HP:0001884.CNS_DEF: 仰趾外翻足是一种柔软的足畸形（相对于僵硬的先天性垂直型距骨变形足），可以任一形式出现，位置性的或结构性的足变形，取决于其严重性和/或病因。 仰趾外翻足变形的轴线是在胫距关节，足的位置处于极端过伸状态。脚呈现“向上向外”的外观，足背几乎接触到踝关节和小腿的前部。

HP:0003006.ENG_DEF: Neuroblastoma is a solid tumor that originate in neural crest cells of the sympathetic nervous system. Most neuroblastomas originate in the abdomen, and most abdominal neuroblastomas originate in the adrenal gland. Neuroblastomas can also originate in the thorax, usually in the posterior mediastinum.
HP:0003006.CNS_DEF: 神经母细胞是一种起源于交感神经系统神经嵴细胞的实质肿瘤。大部分神经母细胞瘤起源于腹腔，而腹腔内的神经母细胞瘤最常见于肾上腺。神经母细胞瘤也可起源于胸，通常在后纵隔。

HP:0030259.ENG_DEF: Localized or generalized decreased genital pigmentation.

HP:0002211.ENG_DEF: A triangular depigmented region of white hairs located in the anterior midline of the scalp.
HP:0002211.CNS_DEF: 位于头皮的前正中线三角形区域的毛发变白。

HP:0030791.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0030791.ENG_DEF: A structural anomaly of the jaw, the bony structure of the mouth that consists of the mandible and the maxilla.

HP:0100268.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0100268.ENG_DEF: Depression located on the vermilion of the upper lip, usually paramedian.
HP:0100268.CNS_DEF: 上唇唇红中线处两旁形成的凹陷。

HP:0011665.ENG_DEF: takotsubo cardiomyopathy is characterized by transient regional systolic dysfunction involving the left ventricular apex and/or mid-ventricle in the absence of obstructive coronary disease on coronary angiography. Patients present with an abrupt onset of angina-like chest pain, and have diffuse T-wave inversion, sometimes preceded by ST-segment elevation.
HP:0011665.CNS_DEF: 应激性心肌病的特征是通过血管造影术并未发现冠脉阻滞症状但却出现了涉及左心室心尖和/或中心室的短暂局部收缩功能障碍。患者表现为突发性的胸绞痛和弥漫性T波倒置，有时会有ST段抬高和轻度心肌酶升高。

HP:0001459.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001459.ENG_DEF: `1-3 toe syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 3rd toe.
HP:0001459.CNS_DEF: 第一至三脚趾融合型并趾。

HP:0002691.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0002691.ENG_DEF: A developmental malformation of the occipital bone and upper end of the cervical spine, in which the latter appears to have pushed the floor of the occipital bone upward such that there is an  abnormal flattening of the skull base.
HP:0002691.CNS_DEF: 枕骨和颈椎上端的发育畸形，其中后者出现导致枕骨向上的颅底的异常平坦。

HP:0008363.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008363.CNS_NAME: 跗骨发育不全或发育低下
HP:0008363.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the tarsal bones.

HP:0001363.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001363.ENG_DEF: Craniosynostosis refers to the premature closure of the cranial sutures. Primary craniosynostosis refers to the closure of one or more sutures due to abnormalities in skull development, and secondary craniosynostosis results from failure of brain growth.
HP:0001363.CNS_DEF: 颅缝早闭指颅缝的过早闭合。原发性颅缝早闭指由于头骨发育异常而导致的一个或多个颅骨缝合线闭合过早，而继发性颅缝早闭指由于大脑发育失败导致的结果。

HP:0001727.ENG_DEF: A cerebrovascular accident (stroke) that occurs because of thromboembolism.
HP:0001727.CNS_DEF: 由于血栓栓塞发生脑血管意外（中风）。

HP:0008048.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the line of Schwalbe
HP:0008048.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `line of Schwalbe` (FMA:58422).

HP:0100730.ENG_DEF: A rare congenital cystic lesion of the lungs in the mediastinum.
HP:0100730.CNS_DEF: 纵隔内罕见的先天性肺囊性病变。

HP:0005199.MAIN_CLASS: 肌肉组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0005199.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

HP:0002905.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased `phosphate` (CHEBI:18367) concentration in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0000421.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0000421.ENG_DEF: Epistaxis, or nosebleed, refers to a `hemorrhage` (MPATH:119) localized in the`nose` (FMA:46472).

HP:0002612.ENG_DEF: The presence of `fibrosis` (MPATH:181) of that part of the `liver` (FMA:7197) with `congenital onset` (HP:0003577).
HP:0002612.CNS_DEF: 先天发生于肝脏部位的“纤维化”。

HP:0008362.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0008362.CNS_NAME: 脚拇趾发育不全或发育低下
HP:0008362.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the big toe.
HP:0008362.CNS_DEF: 缺席或大脚趾的不发达。

HP:0000154.ENG_DEF: Distance between the oral commissures more than 2 SD above the mean. Alternatively, an apparently increased width of the oral aperture (subjective).
HP:0000154.CNS_DEF: 两侧嘴角之间的距离大于平均值超过2个标准偏差。或嘴巴开口宽度显得增大（主观）。

HP:0005463.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0006333.ENG_DEF: A type of dental misalignment with `crowded` (PATO:0000619) central incisors, i.e., of `maxillary secondary incisor` (FMA:55712), or of `maxillary central primary incisor` (FMA:84216).
HP:0006333.CNS_DEF: 中切牙（即恒或乳上颌中切牙）拥挤的一类牙齿错位

HP:0001718.ENG_DEF: Ab abnormal narrowing of the orifice of the mitral valve.
HP:0001718.CNS_DEF: 二尖瓣的孔口异常狭窄。

HP:0000349.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0000349.ENG_DEF: Frontal hairline with bilateral arcs to a low point in the midline of the forehead.
HP:0000349.CNS_DEF: 两侧前额发际线呈弧形并在中线处略低。

HP:0010268.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010268.ENG_NAME: Absent epiphyses of the proximal phalanges of the hand
HP:0010268.CNS_NAME: 手的近端指骨骨骺缺失

HP:0011203.CNS_NAME: 伴异常缓慢频率的脑电图
HP:0011203.CNS_DEF: 脑电图中伴有异常缓慢的频率。

HP:0004216.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0004216.ENG_NAME: Osteolytic defects of the phalanges of the 5th finger
HP:0004216.CNS_NAME: 第五手指的指骨溶骨性缺陷
HP:0004216.ENG_DEF: Dissolution or degeneration of bone tissue of the phalanges of the 5th finger.
HP:0004216.CNS_DEF: 解散或第五手指的指骨骨组织的退化。

HP:0100692.ENG_DEF: An increase in the degree of curvature of the cornea compared to normal.
HP:0100692.CNS_DEF: 相比于正常，角膜的曲率一定程度上增加。

HP:0007570.ENG_DEF: Hyperkeratosis lenticularis perstans (HLP), also known as Flegel disease, is a keratinization abnormality characterized by small, asymptomatic erythematous papules that leave characteristic punctate bleeding when they become detached. The lesions generally occur symmetrically along the top of the foot and on the legs, appearing more rarely on the arms, forearms, palms, and soles, and even on the oral mucosa.
HP:0007570.CNS_DEF: 持久性豆状角化过度病（HLP），又名Flegel病，是一种角化不良性疾病，主要特征为针头大小的红色丘疹，刮除表面可见点状出血，不伴其他症状。皮疹一般对称性发生在足背、小腿，较罕见于上肢掌趾，口腔黏膜更少见。

HP:0003344.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0001803.ENG_DEF: Small (typically about 1 mm or less in size) depressions on the dorsal nail surface.
HP:0001803.CNS_DEF: 甲背面小的凹点（通常约1毫米或更小）。

HP:0002100.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0002100.ENG_DEF: Increased susceptibility to aspiration pneumonia, defined as pneumonia due to breathing in foreign material, as manifested by a medical history of repeated episodes of aspiration pneumonia.
HP:0002100.CNS_DEF: 吸入性肺炎的易感性增加，吸入性肺炎是由于吸入异物导致的肺炎，表现为吸入性肺炎反复发作的病史。

HP:0200037.ENG_DEF: A circumscribed, fluid-containing, epidermal elevation generally considered less than 10mm in diameter at the widest point.
HP:0200037.CNS_DEF: 局限的，含有液体的表皮隆起，直径通常小于10mm。

HP:0011246.ENG_DEF: Decreased protrusion of the superior crus relative to the prominence of a normal antihelix stem.
HP:0011246.CNS_DEF: 与正常对耳轮干的突出相比，对耳轮上脚的突出减少。

HP:0005640.ENG_DEF: Abnormal vertebral segmentation means the irregular division and combination of any vertebral bones.
HP:0005640.CNS_DEF: 椎体的不规则分割和结合。

HP:0030344.CNS_NAME: 循环黄体生成素水平降低
HP:0030344.ENG_DEF: A reduction in the circulating level of luteinizing hormone (LH).

HP:0002996.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0100370.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100370.ENG_NAME: aplasia/Hypoplasia of the distal phalanx of the 4th toe
HP:0100370.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾的末节趾骨发育不全或发育低下

HP:0030774.ENG_DEF: The mitochondrial matrix refers to the substance occupying the space enclosed by the inner membrane of a mitochondrion, which contains enzymes, DNA, granules, and inclusions of protein crystals, glycogen, and lipid. Mitochondrial swelling refers to an increase in size of the mitochondrial matrix. This phenomenon is thought to be related to a permeabilized inner membrane that originates a large swelling in the mitochondrial matrix. Mitochondrial swelling may distend the outer membrane until it ruptures.

HP:0010128.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010128.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010128.CNS_NAME: 脚姆趾近端趾骨支架样骨骺
HP:0010128.ENG_DEF: The epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the hallux surrounds the diaphysis, having a bracket-like form.
HP:0010128.CNS_DEF: 拇趾的近节指骨骨骺围绕骨干，有一个支架状。

HP:0009347.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009347.ENG_NAME: Bracket epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009347.CNS_NAME: 中指的近节指骨支架样骨骺
HP:0009347.ENG_DEF: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009347.CNS_DEF: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0011687.ENG_DEF: A type of supraventricular tachycardia that originates in the atrioventricular node.
HP:0011687.CNS_DEF: 一种起源于房室结的室上性心动过速。

HP:0012719.ENG_NAME: Functional abnormality of the gastrointestinal tract
HP:0012719.CNS_DEF: 胃肠道在功能上出现异常。

HP:0040242.MAIN_CLASS: 血液和造血组织异常;肌肉组织的异常;心血管系统的异常

HP:0100069.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003239.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003239.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of ` phosphoethanolamine` (CHEBI:36711) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).
HP:0003239.CNS_DEF: 尿液中磷酸乙醇胺浓度增加。

HP:0006946.ENG_DEF: An increased susceptibility to meningitis as manifested by a medical history of recurrent episodes of meningitis.
HP:0006946.CNS_DEF: 易感性增加脑膜炎其表现脑膜炎反复发作的病史。

HP:0030271.CNS_NAME: 红细胞 2，3-二磷酸甘油酸浓度降低
HP:0030271.ENG_DEF: 2,3-diphosphoglycerate (2,3-DPG) controls the movement of oxygen from red blood cells to tissues. Anemia is usually accompanied by an increased level of 2,3-DPG in order to promote tissue oxygenation. This term refers to an inappropriate low 2,3-DPG concentration in erythrocytes.

HP:0012532.ENG_DEF: Persistent pain, usually defined as pain that has laster longer than 3 to 6 months.
HP:0012532.CNS_DEF: 持续性疼痛，通常定义为持续3至6个月以上的疼痛。

HP:0006378.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0030795.ENG_DEF: A decreased concentration of C-peptide in the circulation. Since C-peptide is secreted in equimolar amounts to insulin, this feature correlates with reduced insulin secretion.

HP:0011182.ENG_DEF: Electroencephalographic patterns that resemble epileptogenic abnormalities.
HP:0011182.CNS_DEF: 显示癫痫源异常的脑电图模式。

HP:0012725.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0008321.ENG_DEF: Reduced activity of `coagulation factor X` (PR:000007294). The extrinsic and intrinsic pathways converge at factor X (fX). The extrinsic pathway activates fX by means of d factor VII with its cofactor, tissue factor. The intrinsic pathway activates fX by means of the tenase complex (Ca2+ and factors VIIIa, IXa and X) on the surface of activated platelets. Factor Xa in turn activates prothrombin (factor II) to thrombin (factor IIa).
HP:0008321.CNS_DEF: `凝血因子X`（PR:000007294）的活性减少。外在和内在的途径在凝血因子X（FX）会合。外源性途径通过D-因子VII及其辅助因子，组织因子激活FX。内在途径由活化的血小板的表面上的tenase复合物（Ca 2+和因子VIIIa，Ⅸa和X）的共同作用激活FX。 然后Xa因子激活凝血酶原（II因子）生成凝血酶（IIa因子）。

HP:0008368.ENG_DEF: Synostosis (bony fusion) involving one or more bones of the tarsus (calcaneus, talus, cuboid, navicular, cuneiiform bones).
HP:0008368.CNS_DEF: 累及跗骨（距骨、跟骨、骰骨、舟状骨和楔状骨）的一个或多个骨骼的骨性连接（骨性融合）。

HP:0009785.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常

HP:0010603.ENG_DEF: A benign uni- or multicystic, intraosseous tumor of odontogenic origin, with a characteristic lining of parakeratinized stratified squamous epithelium and potential for aggressive, infiltrative behaviour.
HP:0010603.CNS_DEF: 良性的单或多囊性的牙源骨内肿瘤，其特征为有类角化的复层鳞状上皮作衬里，且具有攻击性浸润性举动的潜力。

HP:0011795.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常

HP:0011795.CNS_DEF: 婴儿肾小叶中存在肾母细胞瘤小岛，可以在肾小叶（肾锥体和肾皮质的一部分）的任何位置。

HP:0011926.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011926.ENG_DEF: `Proximal mislocalization` (PATO:0002179) of the `big toe` (FMA:25047) from its normal position.
HP:0011926.CNS_DEF: 从正常位置:在'大toe`（25047 FMA）的:`近端mislocalization`（0002179 PATO）。

HP:0030311.ENG_DEF: Displacement or malalignment of one or more joints in the lower extremity (leg).

HP:0003846.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0003846.ENG_NAME: Wide epiphyseal plates of the upper limbs

HP:0004027.ENG_DEF: Any Abnormal structure or form of the main section of  radial bone.

HP:3000005.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a masseter muscle.

HP:0005066.ENG_NAME: Cone-shaped epiphyses fused within their metaphyses
HP:0005066.CNS_NAME: 干骺端融合的锥形骨骺

HP:0100650.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0100650.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `neoplasm` (MPATH:218) of the `vagina` (FMA:19949).

HP:0011940.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the shape of the thoracic vertebra T12 such that it is wedge-shaped (narrow towards the front).
HP:0011940.CNS_DEF: 的胸椎T12的形状的异常，例如，它是楔形（朝向前窄）。

HP:0009028.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0009028.ENG_DEF: Generalized weakness of the muscles of the arms and legs.
HP:0009028.CNS_DEF: 手臂和腿部的肌肉全身乏力。

HP:0005325.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0005325.ENG_NAME: Extension of hair growth on temples to lateral eyebrow
HP:0005325.CNS_NAME: 太阳穴处的头发向眉外侧延伸
HP:0005325.ENG_DEF: A pattern of hair growth in which there is hair exnteding from the temples to the lateral eyebrows.
HP:0005325.CNS_DEF: 头发生长的方式，指头发从太阳穴向眉毛外侧延伸。

HP:0000217.ENG_DEF: Dryness of the mouth due to salivary gland dysfunction.
HP:0000217.CNS_DEF: 因唾液腺功能障碍导致的口腔黏膜干燥。

HP:0002948.ENG_DEF: A developmental defect leading to the union of two adjacent vertebrae.
HP:0002948.CNS_DEF: 发育缺陷导致两个相邻椎骨融合。

HP:0030824.ENG_DEF: Change in the color of the fundus from red in the dark-adapted state to golden immediately or shortly after the onset of the light. The color of the fundus reflex in the light adapted state has also been described as golden-yellow, gray-white, and yellow-white. This reflex can appear either homogeneous or in streaks in the fundus. The retinal vessels appear to be protruding in contrast to the radiant background. Dark adaptation leads to disappearance of the unusual fundus coloration [Digital Journal of Ophthalmology 2008; Volume 14, Number 14].

HP:0009462.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009462.ENG_DEF: Displacement of the 3rd finger towards the radial side (i.e., towards the thumb).
HP:0009462.CNS_DEF: 排量向桡侧（即朝向拇指）第三手指。

HP:0400007.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0400007.ENG_DEF: Frequent menses; menstrual cycles lasting less than 21 days.

HP:0009906.ENG_DEF: Absence or underdevelopment of the ear lobes.
HP:0009906.CNS_DEF: 耳垂的缺席或发育不全。

HP:0010554.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010554.ENG_DEF: A soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that extends distally to at least the level of the proximal interphalangeal joints, or a soft tissue continuity in the A/P axis between two fingers that lies significantly distal to the flexion crease that overlies the metacarpophalangeal joint of the adjacent fingers.
HP:0010554.CNS_DEF: 两个手指之间的A /轴线P在软组织连续性远侧到近侧指间关节的至少一级，或两个手指之间的A /轴线P在软组织连续性延伸摆在显著远端的屈曲折缝，其覆盖在相邻的手指的掌指关节。

HP:0010115.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012200.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of clotting factor II, which is known as prothrombin, a vitamin K-dependent proenzyme that functions in the blood coagulation cascade.
HP:0012200.CNS_DEF: 凝血因子II，又被称为凝血酶原，是一种维生素K依赖性酶原，因其异常引起的血液凝固的异常。

HP:0003214.ENG_NAME: Prolonged G2 phase of cell cycle

HP:0010197.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010197.ENG_DEF: A deviation from the normal straight form of one or more middle toe phalanges.
HP:0010197.CNS_DEF: 从一个或多个中间趾趾骨正常的直线形式的偏差。

HP:3000040.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:3000040.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of an ethmoid sinus.

HP:0000161.ENG_DEF: A type of `cleft lip` (HP:0000204) presenting as a midline (median) gap in the upper lip.
HP:0000161.CNS_DEF: 一种表现为有上唇中线（中）沟痕的唇裂。

HP:0007494.ENG_NAME: Discrete 2 to 5-mm hyper- and hypopigmented macules
HP:0007494.CNS_NAME: 散在的2至5mm大小的色素减退斑

HP:0011488.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the `corneal endothelium` (FMA:63882), that is, the single layer of cells on the inner surface of the cornea.
HP:0011488.CNS_DEF: 角膜内皮细胞异常（FMA:63882），即，角膜内皮细胞是角膜内表面上的单层细胞。

HP:0005542.ENG_DEF: An abnormal prolongation (delay) in the time required by whole blood to produce a visible clot.
HP:0005542.CNS_DEF: 由全血到凝固为凝块所需要的时间异常延长（延迟）。

HP:0000973.ENG_DEF: Wrinkled, redundant, inelastic and sagging skin.
HP:0000973.CNS_DEF: 皮肤出现皱纹，赘肉，松弛且弹性减少。

HP:0009837.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped distal phalanges of the hand
HP:0009837.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的手骨末节指骨

HP:0006906.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006906.ENG_DEF: The presence of `calcium deposition` (MPATH:36) within brain structures that is present already at the time of birth.
HP:0006906.CNS_DEF: 出生的时候大脑结构内已经出现钙沉积(MPATH:36)。

HP:0005476.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0005476.ENG_DEF: The presence of a sagittal suture (the cranial suture that separates the left and right parietal bones) that is not ossified but rather wide open at an age when it is normally closed.
HP:0005476.CNS_DEF: 矢状缝（左右两顶骨之间的缝隙）到达一定年龄后应闭合而尚未闭合的状态。

HP:0003856.ENG_DEF: Increased width (breadth) of metaphyses of the arms.
HP:0003856.CNS_DEF: 手臂干骺端的宽度增加。

HP:0002263.ENG_DEF: More pronounced paramedian peaks and median notch of the Cupid's bow.
HP:0002263.CNS_DEF: 丘比特弓（唇弓）的更显著的正中两侧的双峰和正中切口。

HP:0002912.ENG_DEF: Increased concentration of `methylmalonic acid` (CHEBI:30860) in the blood.
HP:0002912.CNS_DEF: 血液中的:增加`甲基丙acid`（30860 CHEBI）的浓度。

HP:0003341.ENG_DEF: The formation of bullae (blisters) with cleavage in the `lamina lucida` (FMA:62921) layer of the skin.
HP:0003341.CNS_DEF: 皮肤透明层断裂分离引起大疱（水泡）的形成。

HP:0100876.ENG_DEF: Skin crease extending from below the inner canthus laterally along the malar process of the maxilla and zygoma.
HP:0100876.CNS_DEF: 从内眦下方沿颌骨和颧骨的颧突横向延伸的皮肤皱纹。

HP:0001167.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0001167.ENG_DEF: An abnormal movement of any finger.

HP:0003891.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0009302.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009302.ENG_NAME: Bullet-shaped distal phalanx of the 4th finger
HP:0009302.CNS_NAME: 子弹形的无名指末节指骨
HP:0009302.ENG_DEF: Bullet-shaped phalanx refers to a short and wide phalanx that tapers distally . Bullet-shaped phalanges lack the normal diaphyseal constriction. This term is used if the distal phalanx of the 4th finger is affected.
HP:0009302.CNS_DEF: 子弹形方阵是指短而宽的方阵逐渐变细远端。子弹形趾缺乏正常的骨干收缩。此术语用于如果第四手指的远端指骨受到影响。

HP:0012103.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of the `mitochondrion` (FMA:63835), the membranous cytoplasmic organelle the interior of which is subdivided by cristae. The `mitochondrion` (GO:0005739) is a self replicating organelle that is the site of tissue respiration.
HP:0012103.CNS_DEF: `线粒体` (FMA:63835),即内部被线粒体嵴所分开的膜状细胞质细胞器，的异常。`线粒体`（GO:0005739）为一种自我复制的细胞器,是组织呼吸的部位。

HP:0009746.ENG_DEF: Abnormally increased thickness of the nasal septum.

HP:0003351.ENG_DEF: An decreased level of renin (PRO:000013883) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).
HP:0003351.CNS_DEF: 血液循环中肾素水平异常降低

HP:0010063.ENG_DEF: Patchy (irregular) increase in bone density of one or more phalanges of the big toe. This can take on many forms depending on severity and distribution as can be seen on x-rays.
HP:0010063.CNS_DEF: 片状（不规则）增加的大脚趾的一个或多个指骨骨密度。这可能需要对根据其严重性和分配许多形式如可以看到的X射线。

HP:0008430.ENG_DEF: Anterior tongue-like protrusions of the vertebral bodies of the lumbar spine.

HP:0001605.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;呼吸系统异常
HP:0001605.ENG_DEF: A loss of the ability to move the `vocal folds` (FMA:55457).

HP:0012632.ENG_DEF: An anomaly in the amount of force per unit area exerted by the intraocular fluid within the eye.
HP:0012632.CNS_DEF: 眼内压是指眼内流体施加的单位面积的力的大小。

HP:0000552.ENG_DEF: Difficulty distinguishing between yellow and blue, possible related to dysfunction of the S photopigment.
HP:0000552.CNS_DEF: 黄色和蓝色区分障碍，可能是由于蓝色感光色素功能障碍所致。

HP:0100690.CNS_NAME: 马赛克中央角膜营养不良
HP:0100690.CNS_DEF: 马 赛克中央角膜营养不良

HP:0000176.ENG_DEF: Hard-palate submucous clefts are characterized by bony defects in the midline of the bony palate that are covered by the mucous membrane of the roof of the mouth. It may be possible to detect a submucous cleft hard palate upon palpation as a notch in the bony palate.
HP:0000176.CNS_DEF: 粘膜下硬腭裂以形成口腔顶部的骨性硬腭中间部缺损为特征。可能在触诊硬腭时检查出来。

HP:0009336.ENG_DEF: The epiphysis is normally located on the proximal surface of the phalanges. Bracket epiphysis refers to an abnormality in which the epiphysis surrounds the phalanx, having a bracket-like form and reaching from the proximal side of the phalanx to the distal side.
HP:0009336.CNS_DEF: 骨骺通常位于指骨的近端表面。托架骨骺指其中骨骺围绕方阵，具有托架状形态和指骨的近端侧延伸到前端侧的异常。

HP:0100935.ENG_NAME: Sclerosis of the middle phalanx of the 2nd toe

HP:0009450.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009450.ENG_NAME: Broad proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger
HP:0009450.ENG_DEF: Increased width of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd finger.
HP:0009450.CNS_DEF: 增加的宽度第三手指的近节指骨。

HP:0008176.CNS_NAME: 新生儿高非结合胆红素血症

HP:0010138.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010138.ENG_NAME: Absent epiphysis of the distal phalanx of the hallux
HP:0010138.CNS_NAME: 脚母趾末节趾骨骨骺缺失

HP:0010138.CNS_DEF: 脚拇趾的末节趾骨骨骺未能形成（发育不全）。

HP:0002599.CNS_DEF: 中等速度（3至4赫兹）的前 - 后方向的头部震颤。

HP:0012214.ENG_DEF: An abnormal rise in the volume of water filtered out of plasma through glomerular capillary walls into Bowman's capsules per unit of time.
HP:0012214.CNS_DEF: 每单位时间通过肾小球毛细血管壁进入肾小囊所滤出液的数量异常升高。

HP:0002493.ENG_DEF: A functional deficit of the tract that conveys nervous impulses from the motor cortex of the brain to the spinal cord. The corticospinal tract mediates discrete voluntary skilled movements.
HP:0002493.CNS_DEF: 从大脑运动皮层传递神经冲动到脊髓束的功能缺损。皮质脊髓束介导不相关联的自主技能运动。

HP:0003966.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005359.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常

HP:0011620.MAIN_CLASS: 生长异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0011620.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the abdominal situs, i.e., of the sidedness of the abdomin and its organs.
HP:0011620.CNS_DEF: 腹部位置的异常，即，腹部及其中脏器的边界异常。

HP:0030081.CNS_NAME: 点状脑室周围白质 T2 高信号灶
HP:0030081.ENG_DEF: Multiple pointlike areas of high T2 signal observed upon magnetic resonance imaging of the periventricular cerebral white matter.

HP:0006729.CNS_NAME: 腹膜后膀胱化学受体瘤
HP:0006729.ENG_DEF: A tumor of the chemodectomas type arising in the retroperitoneal space and projecting between the layers of the transverse mesocolon.
HP:0006729.CNS_DEF: 一种化学受体类型的肿瘤发生在腹膜后间隙，突出于横结肠系膜层之间。

HP:0030664.MAIN_CLASS: 肌肉组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0030664.ENG_DEF: Weakness of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, which is ascertained clinically as follows. When a patient sits up or raises the head from a recumbent position, the umbilicus is displaced toward the head. This is the result of paralysis of the inferior portion of the rectus abdominal muscle, so that the upper fibres predominate pulling upwards the umbilicus.

HP:0003049.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0005517.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0005517.ENG_DEF: A type of T-cell lymphoma in which cancerous T-cells may present in the blood (leukemia), lymph nodes (lymphoma), skin or in multiple areas.
HP:0005517.CNS_DEF: 一型T细胞淋巴瘤，其中恶性T细胞可以存在于血液中（白血病），淋巴结（淋巴瘤），以及皮肤或多个领域。

HP:0009184.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009184.ENG_NAME: Contracture of the distal interphalangeal joint of the 5th finger
HP:0009184.CNS_NAME: 小指的远端指间关节挛缩

HP:0009184.CNS_DEF: 第五手指的远端指间关节的关节运动的慢性损失，由于在非骨组织结构变化。

HP:0011908.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011908.ENG_DEF: Missing radius bone on one side only associated with congenital failure of development.
HP:0011908.CNS_DEF: 单侧桡骨阙如，与先天性发育失败有关。

HP:0040209.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;代谢/内稳态异常
HP:0040209.CNS_NAME: 脑脊液生物喋呤水平降低
HP:0040209.ENG_DEF: Decreased concentration of biopterin in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF).

HP:0003300.ENG_DEF: When viewed in lateral radiographs, vertebral bodies have a roughly rectangular configuration. This term applies if the vertebral body appears rounded or oval.
HP:0003300.CNS_DEF: 当侧位X线片观察，椎体有一个大致矩形结构。本术语适用于如果椎体出现圆形或椭圆形。

HP:0003993.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0003131.MAIN_CLASS: 代谢/内稳态异常;泌尿生殖系统的异常
HP:0003131.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of `cystine` (CHEBI:17376) in the `urine` (FMA:12274).

HP:0010245.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphyses of the proximal phalanges of the hand

HP:0010523.CNS_DEF: 获得性的感觉性失语的一种类型，由于大脑的损伤导致了阅读能力的丧失。

HP:0011539.ENG_DEF: Common atrium without defining morphologic features.
HP:0011539.CNS_DEF: 没有固定形态学特征的心房。

HP:0011058.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;免疫系统的异常

HP:0011820.ENG_DEF: Absence of the normal opening of the choana (the posterior nasal aperture) as a result of an obstructing choanal membrane that may be thin and strandlike or thick and pluglike.
HP:0011820.CNS_DEF: 后鼻孔（鼻后孔）缺乏正常开口，由细条状或粗塞状的后鼻孔膜阻挡所致。

HP:0100037.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0100037.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the `hair of head` (FMA:54241).

HP:0005528.ENG_DEF: A reduced number of hematopoietic cells present in the bone marrow.
HP:0005528.CNS_DEF: 存在于骨髓的造血细胞的数目减少。

HP:0025030.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0025030.ENG_DEF: Deterioration of enteric neurons with impairment of enteric neuronal structure. Typical neuropathological findings include qualitative (e.g., neuronal swelling, intranuclear inclusions, axonal degeneration) and quantitative (e.g., reduction in the number of neurons) abnormalities of the enteric neurons.

HP:0001735.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0001735.CNS_DEF: 一种急性形式的胰腺炎。

HP:0030207.ENG_DEF: Breathing movements in which the chest wall moves in on inspiration and out on expiration, in reverse of the normal movements. It may be seen in children with respiratory distress of any cause, which leads to indrawing of the intercostal spaces during inspiration. Patients with chronic airways obstruction also show indrawing of the lower ribs during inspiration, due to the distorted action of a depressed and flattened diaphragm. Crush injuries of the chest, with fractured ribs and sternum, can lead to a severe degree of paradoxical breathing.

In contrast to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5, the proximal phalanx of the thumb is embryologically equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits, whereas the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the other digits.
HP:0009664.CNS_DEF: 拇指近节指骨的近端骨骺缺失。与食指至小指的近端指骨不同，拇指的近端指骨在胚胎学上相当于其它手指的中间指骨，而第一掌骨是胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他指骨的近端指骨。

HP:0008486.ENG_DEF: Narrowing (becoming gradually narrower) of the distance between lumbar vertebral pedicles that gets progressively more severe towards to caudal (lower) end of the vertebral column.
HP:0008486.CNS_DEF: 该得到逐步朝到脊柱的尾部（下）端更严重的腰椎椎弓根之间的距离缩小（而逐渐变窄）。

HP:0011817.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0011817.ENG_DEF: Basal encephalocele is an encephalocele that occurs along the cribriform plate or through the sphenoid bone. The mass may appear in the nasal cavity, nasopharynx, epipharynx, sphenoid sinus, posterior orbit, or pterygopalatine fossa. The important distinction from other types is that no external tumor is visible except in those rare instances of herniations so large that they protrude through the mouth or nares.
HP:0011817.CNS_DEF: 基底脑膨出是发生沿筛板或通过蝶骨的膨出。膨出物质可能会出现在鼻腔，鼻咽，鼻旁咽，蝶窦，后眼眶，或翼腭窝。与其他类型的重要区别是没有外部肿瘤可见，除了大膨出压迫至使从嘴巴或鼻孔突出的罕见情况。

HP:0009193.ENG_DEF: A pseudoepiphysis is a secondary ossification center distinct from the normal epiphysis. The normal metacarpal epiphyses are located at the distal ends of the metacarpal bones. Accessory epiphyses (which are also known as pseudoepiphyses) can also occasionally be observed at the proximal ends of the metacarpals, usually involving the 2nd metacarpal bone.
HP:0009193.CNS_DEF: 一个pseudoepiphysis是二次骨化中心从正常骨骺截然不同。正常掌骨骨骺位于该掌骨的远端。附件骨骺（其也被称为pseudoepiphyses）也偶尔会在掌骨的近端观察，通常涉及的第二掌骨。

HP:0012185.ENG_DEF: Injury to the median nerve caused by its entrapment at the wrist as it traverses through the carpal tunnel. Clinically, constrictive median neuropathy is characterized by pain, paresthesia, and weakness in the median nerve distribution of the hand.
HP:0012185.CNS_DEF: 由于正中神经在手腕处穿越腕管时受困损伤。压迫性正中神经病变临床表现特征是手的正中神经分布区出现疼痛，感觉异常和无力。

HP:0001647.CNS_DEF: 主动脉瓣只有两个瓣膜，而不是正常的三个。

HP:0030909.CNS_NAME: 抗肝细胞胞浆抗原1型抗体阳性
HP:0030909.ENG_DEF: The presence of autoantibodies (immunoglobulins) in the serum that react against a 60-kd peptide contained in the liver cytosolic fraction.

HP:0045053.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality of the lumbosacral nerve plexus.

HP:0011430.ENG_DEF: On prenatal ultrasound, the nasal bone is a thin echogenic line within the bridge of the fetal nose. The fetus is imaged facing the transducer with the fetal face strictly in the midline. The angle of insonation is 90 degrees, with the longitudinal axis of the nasal bone as the reference line. Calibres are placed at each end of the nasal bone. Absence of the nasal bone or measurements below 2.5th percentile are considered significant (pmid:16100637).
HP:0011430.CNS_DEF: 产前超声，鼻骨是胎儿鼻梁内的薄回声带。胎儿面部面对探头，成像面在颜面部正中矢状切面，超声声束与鼻骨长轴成90°，测量两端鼻骨边界的距离。鼻骨缺失，或其长度小于同孕周正常值的第2.5百分位数是有显著差异的。

HP:0003694.ENG_DEF: Lack of strength of the proximal musculature occuring late in the clinical course.
HP:0003694.CNS_DEF: 缺乏近端肌肉在临床过程中存在的后期强度。

HP:0008187.ENG_DEF: No secondary sexual characteristics are present at puberty.

HP:0005521.ENG_DEF: Disseminated intravascular coagulation is characterized by the widespread activation of coagulation, which results in the intravascular formation of fibrin and ultimately thrombotic occlusion of small and midsize vessels.

HP:0007479.CNS_NAME: 鱼鳞病样红皮病(大疱型)、大疱性鱼鳞病样角化过度症、显性遗传性先天性鱼鳞病、表皮松解性角化过度鱼鳞病
HP:0007479.ENG_DEF: The term collodion baby applies to newborns who appear to have an extra layer of skin (known as a collodion membrane) that has a collodion-like quality. It is a descriptive term, not a specific diagnosis or disorder (as such, it is a syndrome). Affected babies are born in a collodion membrane, a shiny waxy outer layer to the skin. This is shed 10-14 days after birth, revealing the main symptom of the disease, extensive scaling of the skin caused by hyperkeratosis. With increasing age, the scaling tends to be concentrated around joints in areas such as the groin, the armpits, the inside of the elbow and the neck. The scales often tile the skin and may resemble fish scales.
HP:0007479.CNS_DEF: 火棉胶样婴儿指新生儿皮肤表层附着类火胶棉样物质（称火胶棉层），这只是一个描述性术语（如综合征），而非特异性的诊断或疾病。患病婴儿出生时皮肤呈光泽蜡质外观，出生后10-14天皮肤表层大面积角化过度并发生脱落，是该病的一个特征。随着生长，皮肤脱屑主要在关节周围区域，如腹股沟、腋窝、肘窝、颈部。脱落的表层如瓦片状覆盖皮肤，似鱼鳞样外观。

The condition primarily occurs after age 60, and is marked pathologically by severe cortical atrophy and the triad of senile plaques, neurofibrillary tangles, and neuropil threads.
HP:0002511.CNS_DEF: 一种脑部的退行性疾病，其特点是以隐袭性起病的痴呆。记忆、判断力、注意力和解决问题的能力受损，继之出现严重的失用和全面的认知能力损害。首发症状出现在60岁后，其病理学标记是严重的皮质萎缩和老年斑、神经元纤维缠结、神经毡细丝。

HP:0002144.ENG_DEF: During normal embryological development, the spinal cord first occupies the entire length of the vertebral column but goes on to assume a position at the level of L1 due to differential growth of the conus medullaris and the vertebral column. The filum terminale is a slender, threadlike structure that remains after the normal regression of the distal embryonic spinal cord and attaches the spinal cord to the coccyx. A tethered cord results if there is a thickened rope-like filum terminale which anchors the cord at the level of L2 or below, potentially causing neurologic signs owing to abnormal tension on the spinal cord.
HP:0002144.CNS_DEF: 在正常的胚胎发育中，脊髓最初占据整个脊柱的长度，但随着脊髓圆锥和椎体的分化、生长，最终位于L1水平的位置。终丝是远侧胚胎脊髓退缩之后形成的一种细长的线状结构并将脊髓附着在尾骨上。如果有一根粗大的绳子样的终丝将脊髓固定在L2水平或以下就会导致脊髓栓系，并且可能会因为脊髓收到的异常张力而导致神经系统体征。

HP:0009721.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0009721.ENG_DEF: A plaque representing a connective-tissue nevus. Connective tissue naevi are uncommon skin lesions that occur when the deeper layers of the skin do not develop correctly or the components of these layers occur in the wrong proportion. Shagreen patches are oval-shaped and nevoid, skin-colored or occasionally pigmented, smooth or crinkled, The word shagreen refers to a type of roughened untanned leather.
HP:0009721.CNS_DEF: 结缔组织痣的特征性斑块。结缔组织痣是一种罕见皮损，由深层皮肤的不正常发育或者错误比例的皮层构成所致。鲛鱼皮斑呈椭圆形痣样，可表现为正常肤色或偶见色素沉着，表面光滑或有皱纹，鲛鱼皮一词指一种粗糙未经加工的皮革。

HP:0030754.ENG_DEF: A swelling formed at the base of umbilicus associated with a patent urachus which results from an allantoic remnant. The urachus is a fibrous remnant of the allantois which communicates from the apex of the urinary bladder to the umbilicus. Failed obliteration of the urachus can lead to various abnormalities: urachal cyst, urachal diverticulum, sinus or patent urachus - the most common type. Allantoic cysts in infants with patent urachus can be formed due to the drainage of urine into the umbilical cord, or in uncommon situations, after leakage of hypo-osmotic urine into the Wharton's jelly.

HP:0100245.ENG_DEF: Benign, slow-growing tumors without any metastatic potential. Despite their benign nature, they can damage nearby structures causing organ dysfunction. Histologically they resemble low-grade fibrosarcomas, but they are very locally aggressive and tend to recur even after complete resection. There is a tendency for recurrence in the setting of prior surgery and the most common localisation of these tumors is intraabdominal from smooth muscle cells of the instestine.
HP:0100245.CNS_DEF: 良性的，生长缓慢的肿瘤，没有任何转移的可能。尽管具有良性属性，它们能损害周围结构从而引起器官功能障碍。组织学上，它们与低度恶性纤维肉瘤类似，但它们仅限于原位侵袭且易于复发，即使是完全切除后。施行手术前即有复发的趋势，且这些肿瘤最常见定位于腹内肠道平滑肌细胞。

HP:0002080.ENG_DEF: An oscillatory cerebellar ataxia that tends to be absent when the limbs are inactive and during the first part of voluntary movement but worsening as the movement continues and greater precision is required (e.g., in touching a target such as the patient's nose or a physician's finger).
HP:0002080.CNS_DEF: 摆动性小脑性共济失调，肢体静止或刚开始随意运动时消失，持续运动和需要更加精准时加重（例如，触摸目标如患者的鼻子或医生的手指） 。

HP:0010014.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010014.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal
HP:0010014.ENG_DEF: In contrast to the metacarpals 2-5, the first metacarpal is embryologically of phalangeal origin and as such equivalent to the proximal phalanges of the digits 2-5 (whereas the proximal phalanx of the thumb is equivalent to the middle phalanges of the other digits). The epiphysis of the first metacarpal is localized at the proximal end (as seen in the proximal phalanges of the other digits), whereas the epiphyses of the other metacarpal bones are located at the distal end. This term applies if the epiphysis of the 1st metacarpal is in any way abnormal, referring to age and gender depending norms, as seen on x-rays.
HP:0010014.CNS_DEF: 与第二至五掌骨不同，第一掌骨来源于胚胎学的指骨，相当于其他手指的近端指骨（而拇指的近端指骨相当于其它手指的中间指骨） 。第一掌骨骨骺位于掌骨近端（如同其它手指的近端指骨所见），而其他掌骨的骨骺位于远端。本术语适用于X光片上第一掌骨骨骺的任何形态异常，其形态标准因年龄和性别不同而异。

HP:0002495.ENG_DEF: A decrease in the ability to perceive vibration. Clinically, this is usually tested with a tuning fork which vibrates at 128 Hz and is applied to bony prominences such as the malleoli at the ankles or the metacarpal-phalangeal joints. There is a slow decay of vibration from the tuning fork. The degree of vibratory sense loss can be crudely estimated by counting the number of seconds that the examiner can perceive the vibration longer than the patient.
HP:0002495.CNS_DEF: 感知振动的能力下降。临床上，通常使用128Hz的音叉放置于骨性突起，如踝尖或掌指关节。音叉的振动缓慢衰减。振动觉缺失的程度可以通过检查者感知振动长于患者的时间粗略计算。

HP:0010492.ENG_DEF: Webbing or fusion of the fingers, involving soft parts and including fusion of individual finger bones. Bony fusions are revered to as "bony" Syndactyly if the fusion occurs in a radio-ulnar axis. Fusions of bones of the fingers in a proximo-distal axis are refered to as "Symphalangism".
HP:0010492.CNS_DEF: 织带或融合的手指，涉及软件和包括融合各个手指的骨头。骨融合物尊称为“骨”指畸形如果融合发生在桡尺轴线。手指在PROXIMO - 远端轴骨头融合物refered为“Symphalangism”。

HP:0100820.ENG_DEF: Inflammatory or noninflammatory diseases affecting the glomeruli of the nephron.
HP:0100820.CNS_DEF: 累及肾小球的炎症或者非炎症性疾病。

HP:0012347.ENG_DEF: An anomaly of `protein N-linked glycosylation` (GO:0006487), i.e., an abnormality of the protein glycosylation process in which a carbohydrate or carbohydrate derivative unit is added to a protein via a nitrogen atom in an amino acid residue in a protein.
HP:0012347.CNS_DEF: 蛋白质N-联糖基化（GO:0006487）的一种异常，即蛋白质糖基化过程中的一种异常，其中一个碳水化合物或碳水化合物衍生物单体通过在蛋白质上的氨基酸中的氮原子被加入蛋白质上。

HP:3000065.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:3000065.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a lacrimal artery.

HP:0005474.ENG_DEF: Abnormal reduction in ossification of the calvaria (roof of the skull consisting of the frontal bone, parietal bones, temporal bones, and occipital bone).
HP:0005474.CNS_DEF: 颅顶骨（头顶骨包括额骨，顶骨，颞骨，和枕骨）骨化异常减少

HP:0009695.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009695.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormal punctate (speckled, dot-like) calcifications in one or more of the epiphyses of the thumb.
HP:0009695.CNS_DEF: 拇指一个或多个指骨骨骺发生异常点状（斑点、圆点状）钙化。

HP:0001602.ENG_DEF: Stricture or narrowing of the larynx that may be associated with symptoms of respiratory difficulty depending on the degree of laryngeal narrowing.
HP:0001602.CNS_DEF: 喉部受限或狭窄，可伴有与喉狭窄程度相关呼吸困难。

HP:0010629.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010629.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the cortex of the humerus
HP:0010629.ENG_DEF: Any abnormality affecting the cortex of the humerus.
HP:0010629.CNS_DEF: 任何影响肱骨皮质的异常。

HP:0008845.ENG_DEF: A type of `disproportionate short stature` (===[[HP:0003498) characterized by disproportionate shortening of the medial parts of the extremities (forearm or lower leg).
HP:0008845.CNS_DEF: `不成比例矮小（HP:0003498）的一种，其特征是四肢（前臂或小腿）的中间部分不成比例的缩短。

HP:0010760.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010760.ENG_DEF: Aplasia of a `toe` (FMA:25046). That is, absence of all phalanges of a non-hallux digit of the foot and the associated soft tissues.
HP:0010760.CNS_DEF: 的`toe`再生障碍性贫血（FMA:25046）。也就是说，由于没有足的非拇数字和相关联的软组织的所有指骨。

HP:0012271.ENG_DEF: Intermittent episodes of increased resistance to the passage of air in the upper airway.
HP:0012271.CNS_DEF: 间断发作的上气道空气通过阻力增加。

HP:0003458.ENG_DEF: The presence of abnormal electromyographic patterns indicative of myopathy, such as small-short polyphasic motor unit potentials.
HP:0003458.CNS_DEF: 异常指示肌病肌电图案，如小短多相电动机单元电位的存在。

HP:0009742.ENG_DEF: Shoulder joint stiffness is a perceived sensation of tightness in shoulders when attempting to move them after a period of inactivity.
HP:0009742.CNS_DEF: 肩关节僵硬是一种在一段时间不活动后试图活动肩部时肩膀发紧的感觉。

HP:0012101.ENG_DEF: An abnormally reduced amount of `creatinine` (CHEBI:16737) in the `blood` (FMA:9670).

HP:0002345.ENG_DEF: A tremor present when the limbs are active, either when outstretched in a certain position or throughout a voluntary movement.
HP:0002345.CNS_DEF: 当肢体处于活动状态，或者当肢体伸出在某个位置或在自主运动过程中出现的震颤。

HP:0003979.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常

HP:0012228.ENG_DEF: A type of headache that last hours with continuous pain of mild or moderate intensity, bilateral location, a pressing/tightening (non-pulsating) quality and that is not aggravated by routine physical activity such as walking or climbing stairs.
HP:0012228.CNS_DEF: 是一种持续数小时的持续性轻到中度的双侧性头痛，性质为压迫性或紧缩性（非搏动性）并且日常体力活动比如行走、爬楼梯不会加重。

HP:0000052.ENG_DEF: Congenital anomaly characterized by closure or failure to develop an opening in the urethra in males.
HP:0000052.CNS_DEF: 一种先天性异常，男性的尿道开口闭锁或未发育形成。

HP:0011684.ENG_DEF: Any ventricular septal defect (VSD) that does not restrict flow across it sufficiently to generate a pressure gradient between the two sides of the VSD.
HP:0011684.CNS_DEF: 不限制血流经过，但足以在室间隔两侧产生压力梯度的室间隔缺损。

HP:0011241.ENG_DEF: Posterior curving of the antihelix from its origin at the antitragus, traveling initially almost perpendicular to the descending helix and obscuring some of the concha.
HP:0011241.CNS_DEF: 后路从它的起源对耳轮的弯曲的耳屏，最初旅行几乎垂直的下降螺旋和模糊一些外耳的。

HP:0009278.CNS_DEF: 无名指向尺侧（即朝无名指）歪斜。

HP:0007915.CNS_NAME: 多形性后角膜营养不良
HP:0007915.ENG_DEF: This corneal dystrophy affects the posterior limiting membrane of the cornea and is characterized by polymorphous plaques of calcium deposits in the deep stromal layers of the cornea, and occasionally by vesicular lesions of the endothelium and edema of the deep corneal stroma.
HP:0007915.CNS_DEF: 此角膜营养不良影响角膜后弹力层，特征是角膜的深基质层有钙沉积的多形性斑块，偶尔由角膜内皮和基质水肿。

HP:0012544.ENG_DEF: An increased concentration of  fructose 1,6-bisphosphate aldolase in the serum.
HP:0012544.CNS_DEF: 的血清中果糖-1,6-双磷酸醛缩酶的浓度增加。

HP:0010707.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010707.ENG_DEF: `1-4 finger syndactyly means the fusion of 1st to 4th finger.

HP:0001751.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of the functioning of the vestibular apparatus.
HP:0001751.CNS_DEF: 前庭器官的功能的异常。

HP:0010107.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010107.ENG_DEF: Underdevelopment (hypoplasia) of the `proximal phalanx of big toe` (FMA:43252).
HP:0010107.CNS_DEF: 大toe`的`近节指骨不发达（发育不全）（FMA:43252）。

HP:0007209.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;头或颈部的异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0007209.ENG_DEF: Complete loss of ability to move facial muscles innervated by the facial nerve (i.e., the seventh cranial nerve).
HP:0007209.CNS_DEF: 由面部神经（即第七颅神经）支配的面部肌肉的活动能力完全丧失。

HP:0012562.CNS_NAME: 手过早外延干骺端融合
HP:0012562.ENG_DEF: Stop of growth at the epiphyseal plate the hyaline cartilage plate in the metaphysis at one or more long bones in the hand, at an earlier than normal age, resulting in growth arrest and shortening of the involved bone.
HP:0012562.CNS_DEF: 在骺板的透明软骨板在干骺端在一个或多个长骨中的手，生长停止在一个比正常年龄早，导致生长停滞和所涉及的骨的缩短。

HP:0004749.ENG_DEF: A type of atrial arrhythmia characterized by atrial rates of between 240 and 400 beats per minute and some degree of atrioventricular node conduction block. Typically, the ventricular rate is half the atrial rate. In the EKG; atrial flutter waves are observed as sawtooth-like atrial activity. Pathophysiologically, atrial flutter is a form of atrial reentry in which there is a premature electrical impulse creates a self-propagating circuit.
HP:0004749.CNS_DEF: 一种240~400次/min 心跳的房性心律失常，一定程度的房室传导阻滞。通常，心室率是心房率的一半。心电图显示，心房扑动波呈现锯齿状的心房活动。病理生理学上，心房扑动是心房折返的一种。

HP:0010433.CNS_DEF: 长度缩短第二toe`（FMA:32628）的`末节指骨的发育发育不良的结果。

HP:0100520.CNS_DEF: 尿液减少，临床上<300-500 ml/天排尿量定义为少尿症。

HP:0008107.CNS_DEF: 存在于足底第1-2脚趾之间皮肤的异常深在皱褶。

HP:0100185.CNS_NAME: 第四脚趾的中节趾骨骨骺不规则
