HP:0100001.ENG_DEF: Malignant mesothelioma is a form of cancer that originates from the cells of the mesothelium, a thin tissue layer surrounding the body's internal organs. Malignant mesothelioma is almost exclusively caused by asbestos exposure, pleural mesothelioma being the most common form, affecting the lining of the lungs called the pleura. Other forms such as perioneal-, percardial- or testicular- mesothelioma are much rarer.
HP:0100001.CNS_DEF: 恶性间皮瘤起源于间皮细胞，即一层包绕人体内脏的薄层组织。恶性间皮瘤的发生几乎都与石棉的暴露接触有关，胸膜间皮瘤是最常见的形式，发生于胸膜组织。其他还有发生于腹膜、心包以及睾丸的间皮瘤，后者更为少见。

HP:0002304.ENG_DEF: Inability to initiate changes in activity or movement and to perform ordinary volitional movements rapidly and easily.
HP:0002304.CNS_DEF: 没有发起自主活动或运动并能快速、轻松地执行日常的自主运动的能力。

HP:0030059.ENG_DEF: An abnormal reduction in mitochondrial DNA content of cells.

HP:0008772.ENG_DEF: The presence of `aplasia` (MPATH:58) or developmental hypoplasia of all or part of the `external ear` (FMA:52781).

HP:0012690.ENG_DEF: A darker than expected T2 signal on magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the thalamus. This term refers to a diffuse hypointensity affecting the entire thalamus.
HP:0012690.CNS_DEF: 丘脑在磁共振成像（MRI）上T2信号比预期暗。这个术语是指一个影响整个丘脑的漫低信号。

HP:0001874.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常

HP:0030903.ENG_DEF: A type of primitive reflex that can be elicated when the hand of the examiner is gently inserted into the palm of the patient's hand. The palmar surface is stroked or simply touched. The flexor surfaces of the fingers may be stimulated also by the examiner's fingers. The stimulus should be in a distal direction. With a positive response, the patient grasps the examiner's hand with variable strength and continues to grasp as the examiner's hand is moved. Ability to release the grip voluntarily depends on the activity of the reflex; some patients can do so readily, while others can even be lifted off the bed, since the grasp has such power [NCBI Books:NBK395].

HP:0012391.MAIN_CLASS: 神经系统的异常;四肢异常
HP:0012391.ENG_DEF: Reduced intensity of muscle tendon reflexes in the upper limbs. Reflexes are elicited by stretching the tendon of a muscle, e.g., by tapping.
HP:0012391.CNS_DEF: 上肢肌肉腱反射强度减弱。腱反射通过拉伸肌肉的肌腱引出，例如轻敲。

HP:0008936.ENG_DEF: Muscular hypotonia (abnormally low muscle tone) affecting the musculature of the trunk.
HP:0008936.CNS_DEF: 肌张力减退（异常低肌张力）影响躯干的肌肉。

HP:0012877.ENG_DEF: The emission of semen and seminal fluid into the bladder instead of through the penis during orgasm.
HP:0012877.CNS_DEF: 高潮时精子和精液的射入膀胱而不是通过阴茎射出。

HP:0000919.ENG_DEF: Any anomaly of the `costochondral junction` (FMA:7956). The costochondral junctions are located between the distal part of the ribs and the costal cartilages, which are bars of hyaline cartilage that connect the ribs to the sternum.
HP:0000919.CNS_DEF: 肋软骨交界处的任何异常。肋软骨交界处位于肋骨的远端和肋软骨之间，连接肋骨和胸骨的杆状透明软骨。

HP:0100093.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100093.ENG_NAME: Abnormality of the epiphysis of the proximal phalanx of the 3rd toe
HP:0100093.CNS_NAME: 第三脚趾近节趾骨骨骺异常

HP:0010428.ENG_NAME: Partial duplication of phalanx of the 2nd toe

HP:0010428.ENG_DEF: Partial duplication of a `phalanx of second toe` (FMA:32899).

HP:0011572.ENG_DEF: A congenital stenotic mitral valvular anomaly with a ring of tissue above the mitral valve.
HP:0011572.CNS_DEF: 一种二尖瓣先天性狭窄，二尖瓣上部有环状组织。

HP:0010321.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010321.ENG_DEF: Any abnormal structure or form of the fourth toe.
HP:0010321.CNS_DEF: 第四脚趾的异常结构或形态。

HP:0004844.ENG_DEF: A type of `hemolytic anemia` (HP:0001878) in which the Coombs test is positive.
HP:0004844.CNS_DEF: 一型溶血性贫血（HP:0001878），在其中Coombs试验阳性。

HP:0011423.ENG_DEF: An abnormally increased `chloride` (CHEBI:17996) concentration in the blood.
HP:0011423.CNS_DEF: 异常增加`chloride`（CHEBI:17996）的浓度在血液中。

HP:0009657.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009657.ENG_DEF: Abnormal shape of one or more phalanges of the thumb such that affected phalanges resemble a triangle.
HP:0009657.CNS_DEF: 拇指的一个或多个指骨形状异常，使得受累的指骨类似于一个三角形。

HP:0009751.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;肌肉组织的异常
HP:0009751.ENG_NAME: aplasia of the pectoralis major muscle
HP:0009751.ENG_DEF: Absence of the pectoralis major muscle.

HP:0009640.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0009640.ENG_NAME: Synostosis of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metatcarpal
HP:0009640.CNS_NAME: 拇指近节指骨与第一掌骨骨性连合
HP:0009640.ENG_DEF: Fusion of the proximal phalanx of the thumb with the 1st metacarpal.
HP:0009640.CNS_DEF: 拇指近端指骨与第一掌骨融合。

HP:0002036.MAIN_CLASS: 结缔组织的异常;消化系统的异常
HP:0002036.ENG_DEF: The presence of a `hernia` (MPATH:75) in which the upper part of the stomach, i.e., mainly the `gastric cardia` (FMA:14561) protrudes through the diaphragmatic `esophageal hiatus` (FMA:58289).
HP:0002036.CNS_DEF: 一个疝的存在，其中，胃的上部，即，主要是胃的贲门，通过膈食管裂孔伸出。

HP:0000033.ENG_DEF: `Ambiguous genitalia` (HP:0000062) in an individual with XY genetic gender.
HP:0000033.CNS_DEF: `遗传学性别为XY个体的外阴性别不明。

HP:0100847.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;体壁的异常

HP:0030201.ENG_NAME: Response to drugs acting on neuromuscular transmission
HP:0030201.CNS_NAME: 对作用于神经肌肉传递过程的药物的反应
HP:0030201.ENG_DEF: Specific drugs interfere selectively with the different cellular mechanisms involved in neuromuscular transmission (synthesis, storage, release, action and inactivation of transmitter). The response of a patient to a specific drug can therefore be useful information for the differential diagnosis.

HP:0100899.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0100899.ENG_DEF: An elevation in bone density in one or more phalanges of the fingers. Sclerosis is normally detected on a radiograph as an area of increased opacity.
HP:0100899.CNS_DEF: 骨密度在手指的一个或多个趾骨标高。硬化的是，X射线照片作为增加不透明度的区域正常检测。

HP:0011375.ENG_DEF: Absence of the cochlea, a spiral shaped cavity in the inner ear, owing to a developmental defect.

HP:0010517.MAIN_CLASS: 内分泌系统的异常;免疫系统的异常
HP:0010517.ENG_DEF: The presence of ectopic `thymus` (FMA:9607) tissue. Normally, cells of the ventral bud of the third pharyngeal pouch detach and migrate in the eighth gestational week caudally and medially towards the location of the mature thyroid. They migrate further retrosternally into the superior mediastinum. There are two main ways ectopic thymus tissue can develop. Either cells detach along the descensus path and proliferate, thereby forming accessory thymus tissue, or the entire gland fails to descend.
HP:0010517.CNS_DEF: 组织:异位`胸腺`（9607 FMA）。正常情况下，在第八孕周末第三咽囊的腹侧胚芽细胞分离并迁移，其内侧朝向成熟甲状腺的位置。他们进一步从胸骨后迁移到上纵隔。主要有两种途径形成异位胸腺组织。每一细胞沿下行路径分离和增殖，从而形成副胸腺组织，或整个腺体无法下降。

HP:0010832.ENG_DEF: Pain is an unpleasant sensation that can range from mild, localized discomfort to agony, whereby the physical part of pain results from nerve stimulation and is often accompanied by an emotional component. These tumors are almost always associated with tuberous sclerosis.

HP:0011707.ENG_DEF: Progressive PR interval prolongation with the subsequent occurrence of a single nonconducted P wave that results in a pause. The pause that follows the nonconducted impulse is less than fully compensatory (less than the sum of two normal sinus intervals).
HP:0011707.CNS_DEF: 心电图表现为PR间期逐渐延长直至QRS波群脱落（P波不能下传），RR间期逐渐缩短直至一个P波不能下传，包含受阻P波在内的RR间期小于正常窦性PP间期的两倍。

HP:0030119.CNS_NAME: 肌肉纤维钙蛋白酶-3异常
HP:0030119.ENG_DEF: A deviation from normal in the amount of calpain-3 in muscle tissue. Calpains are intracellular nonlysosomal cysteine proteases modulated by calcium ions. A typical calpain is a heterodimer composed of two distinct subunits, one large (over 80 kDa) and the other small (30 kDa). While only one gene encoding the small subunit has been demonstrated, there are many genes for the large one. CAPN3 is similar to ubiquitous Calpain 1 and 2 (m-calpain and micro-calpain), but contains specific insertion sequences (NS, IS1 and IS2). Calpains cleave target proteins to modify their properties, rather than breaking down the substrates.

HP:0000939.ENG_DEF: Osteoporosis is a systemic skeletal disease characterized by low bone density and microarchitectural deterioration of bone tissue with a consequent increase in bone fragility. According to the WHO, osteoporosis is characterized by a value of BMD 2.5 standard deviations or more below the young adult mean.
HP:0000939.CNS_DEF: 骨质疏松症是一种全身骨骼疾病，其特征为低骨密度和骨组织的微结构退化与骨脆性随之增加。根据世界卫生组织，骨质疏松症的特征在于骨密度值2.5个标准差以上的年轻成人下面的意思。

HP:0012097.ENG_DEF: A congenital inclusion cysts that arises from the inclusion of ectodermally committed cells at the time of neural tube closure (3rd-5th week of embryogenesis). The capsule of dermoid cysts consists of simple epithelium supported by collagen. In thicker parts, the lining is supplemented with dermis containing hair follicles, sebaceous glands, and apocrine glands.
HP:0012097.CNS_DEF: 先天性包涵囊肿，源于神经管闭合时（胚胎发育的第3-5周）外胚层干细胞的封入。皮样囊肿的囊是由胶原支撑的单层上皮细胞组成。在较厚的部分，内壁辅以含有毛囊，皮脂腺，汗腺的真皮。

HP:0002705.ENG_DEF: The presence of a high and narrow palate.

HP:0006150.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0006150.ENG_NAME: Swan neck-like deformities of the fingers
HP:0006150.ENG_DEF: A swan neck deformity describes a finger with a hyperextended PIP joint and a flexed DIP joint. The most common cause for a swan neck-like deformity is a disruption of the end of the extensor tendon. Conditions that loosen the PIP joint and allow it to hyperextend, for example conditions that weaken the volar plate, can produce a swan neck deformity of the finger. One example is rheumatoid arthritis. Another cause are conditions that tighten up the small (intrinsic) muscles of the hand and fingers, for example hand trauma or nerve disorders, such as cerebral palsy, Parkinson's disease, or stroke.
HP:0006150.CNS_DEF: 天鹅颈样变形所描述的是手指有过度伸展的PIP关节和弯曲的DIP关节。导致天鹅颈状变形最常见的原因是伸肌肌腱的末端的损坏。PIP关节松弛使手指能够过伸，例如掌板力量减弱，这些因素都可产生手指的天鹅颈变形。例如类风湿性关节炎。另一个原因是手和手指的小（内收）肌群挛缩，例如手外伤或神经疾病（如脑性麻痹、帕金森氏病或中风）。

HP:0002204.MAIN_CLASS: 心血管系统的异常;呼吸系统异常

HP:0100757.ENG_DEF: A rare pediatric carcinoma of the pancreas.
HP:0100757.CNS_DEF: 一种罕见的小儿胰腺癌。

HP:0002301.ENG_DEF: Paralysis (complete loss of muscle function) in the arm, leg, and in some cases the face on one side of the body.
HP:0002301.CNS_DEF: 一侧上下肢瘫痪（肌肉功能完全丧失），有时累及面部。

HP:0007434.MAIN_CLASS: 肿瘤;头或颈部的异常;心血管系统的异常
HP:0007434.ENG_DEF: Hemangioma is a benign tumor of the vascular endothelial cells. This term refers to facial hemangiomas that have a plaque-like morphology.
HP:0007434.CNS_DEF: 血管瘤是血管内皮细胞的良性肿瘤。该术语是指具有一个斑块样形态的面部血管瘤。

HP:0010744.MAIN_CLASS: 四肢异常;骨骼系统的异常
HP:0010744.ENG_DEF: A developmental abnormality characterized by the absence (aplasia) of a `metatarsal bone` (FMA:24492).
HP:0010744.CNS_DEF: 一个`跖骨bone`的特点是没有（再生障碍性贫血），一个致力于发展异常（FMA:24492）。

HP:0009488.ENG_DEF: Absence of the epiphyses of the 2nd finger.

HP:0030378.CNS_NAME: 未成熟 B 细胞计数减少
HP:0030378.ENG_DEF: A reduction from normal of the count in the ciculation of immature B cells (CD19+/ CD21low). Immature B cells (IgM+) are still in final stages of development within the bone marrow. Naive B cells are those which have left the bone marrow, before they bind to the antigen for which they're specific (IgM+/IgD+).

HP:0012050.ENG_DEF: An extreme form of generalized edema with widespread and massive edema due to effusion of fluid into the extracellular space.
HP:0012050.CNS_DEF: 由于体液渗出进入细胞外间隙，导致极端性的全身广泛大量的水肿。

HP:0003184.CNS_DEF: 减少向外移动股骨侧的能力。

HP:0008303.ENG_DEF: Degeneration of the olivary bodies, prominent oval structures in the medulla oblongata.
HP:0008303.CNS_DEF: 橄榄体变性，即延髓中突触的椭圆结构

HP:0004464.MAIN_CLASS: 头或颈部的异常;体壁的异常
HP:0004464.ENG_DEF: Benign congenital lesion of the postauricular soft tissue consisting of a blind-ending narrow tube or pit.
HP:0004464.CNS_DEF: 耳后软组织的良性先天性病变，包括狭窄的盲管或凹陷。

HP:0012701.ENG_DEF: A sudden, irresistible need to have a bowel movement.
HP:0012701.CNS_DEF: 一种突然且不可抗拒的排便需求。

HP:0000603.ENG_DEF: An area of depressed vision located at the point of fixation and that interferes with central vision.
HP:0000603.CNS_DEF: 视物时视野中央部存在暗区，并与中央视觉干扰。

HP:0012441.CNS_DEF: 肝胰壶腹括约肌动力降低，导致胆汁和胰液从总胆管流至十二指肠受阻。

HP:0002506.CNS_DEF: 大脑弥漫非局灶性萎缩。

HP:3000072.ENG_DEF: An abnormality of a levator palpebrae superioris.

HP:0100134.ENG_DEF: Abnormality of the growth of the axillary hair. Axillary hair is part of the secondary sexual hair, which normally ensues during puberty.
HP:0100134.CNS_DEF: 异常的腋毛生长。腋毛是第二性征毛发的一部分，通常在青春期开始生长。

HP:0000527.ENG_DEF: Mid upper eyelash length >10 mm or increased length of the eyelashes (subjective).
HP:0000527.CNS_DEF: 中间的上睫毛长度大于10mm或睫毛的长度增加（主观）。

HP:0004450.CNS_DEF: 直接位于耳前的皮肤凹槽。

HP:0002039.CNS_DEF: 缺乏或丧失食欲（如某种医疗条件下）。

HP:0008873.CNS_DEF: 不成比例的身材矮小（HP:0003498）的一种，特点是四肢短小，但躯干尺寸正常。

HP:0010519.ENG_DEF: An abnormal increase in quantity or strength of fetal movements.
HP:0010519.CNS_DEF: 胎动次数或强度异常增加。

HP:0007480.CNS_NAME: 植物神经功能紊乱性少汗

HP:0009306.CNS_NAME: 无名指三角形末节指骨

HP:0009306.CNS_DEF: 无名指（环指）的末节呈三角形。三角指骨是受累指骨骨骺的典型结果。

HP:0011589.CNS_NAME: 右侧头臂干和左侧颈总动脉的共同起源
HP:0011589.ENG_DEF: The left common carotid artery has a common origin with the innominate artery.
HP:0011589.CNS_DEF: 左颈总动脉与无名动脉有一个共同的起源。

HP:0030886.MAIN_CLASS: 免疫系统的异常;血液和造血组织异常
HP:0030886.ENG_DEF: A anomaly in the rate of apoptosis in lymphocytes.

HP:0008722.ENG_DEF: The presence of a diverticulum (sac or pouch) in the wall of the urethra.
HP:0008722.CNS_DEF: 尿道壁存在憩室（囊或小袋）。

HP:0007321.CNS_DEF: 磁共振成像显示深部脑白质多个区域所产生的信号比预期信号暗。

HP:0012040.ENG_DEF: Abnormal accumulation of fluid and swelling of the `stroma of cornea` (FMA:58306).
HP:0012040.CNS_DEF: 角膜基质层出现的非正常的液体积聚和肿胀（FMA:58306）。

HP:0000982.CNS_DEF: 手掌和足跖皮肤异常肥厚。

HP:0003750.ENG_DEF: An abnormal, increased fatiguability of the musculature.
HP:0003750.CNS_DEF: 肌肉组织的异常，增加疲惫状况。

HP:0012648.CNS_DEF: 损伤或感染引起的`炎症反应异常减少（GO:0006954）。

HP:0010508.ENG_DEF: A condition in which the anterior part of the foot rotates outward away from the midline of the body and the heel remains straight.
HP:0010508.CNS_DEF: 其中在脚的前部向外旋转远离所述主体的中线和足跟的条件仍然是直。

HP:0008464.ENG_NAME: Absent spinous processes of lower thoracic and lumbar vertebrae
HP:0008464.CNS_NAME: 下部胸椎和腰椎的棘突缺如

HP:0009795.ENG_DEF: A congenital fistula in the neck resulting from incomplete closure of a branchial cleft.
HP:0009795.CNS_DEF: 由鳃裂闭合不完全引起的颈部先天性瘘管。
